src: Make sure your hand is as relaxed as possible while still hitting all the notes correctly - also try not to make much extraneous motion with your fingers. This way, you will tire yourself out as little as possible. Remember there's no need to hit the keys with a lot of force for extra volume like on the piano. On the accordion, to get extra volume, you use the bellows with more pressure or speed.

ref: Notalarning barchasini to'g'ri bosar ekansiz, qo'lingizning iloji boricha bo'shashganligiga ishonch hosil qiling — shuningdek, barmoqlaringiz bilan tegishli bo'lmagan harakatlarni ko'p qilmaslikka urining. Shu tarzda, siz o'zingizni imkon qadar kamroq toliqtirasiz. Unutmang, pianinodagi singari qo'shimcha kuch uchun klaviaturani katta kuch bilan urishga hojat yo'q. Akkordeonda qo'shimcha tovush chiqarish uchun ohangdan kuchliroq bosim yoxud tezlik bilan foydalanasiz.

src: One of the most common problems when trying to convert a movie to DVD format is the overscan. Most televisions are made in a way to please the general public. For that reason, everything you see on the TV had the borders cut, top, bottom and sides. This is made to ensure that the image covers the whole screen. That is called overscan. Unfortunately, when you make a DVD, it's borders will most likely be cut too, and if the video had subtitles too close to the bottom, they won't be fully shown.
mt: Eng keng tarqalgan kinolar DVD formatiga o'tkazishda muammolaridan biri - o'tish. Ko'pchilik televizorlar umumiy jamoatchilik uchun ishlab chiqarilgan. Shuning uchun, barcha narsa televizorda ko'rishda qirgichlar kesib tashlangan, tepa, past va tomonlari. Bu narsa o'tishni ta'minlaydi. Buning uchun, siz DVDni o'tkazishda qirgichlar ham kesib tashlanadi, va agar video da subtitrlar ham pastga yaqin bo'lsa, ular to'liq ko'rsatilmaydi.
ref: Kinofilmni DVD formatiga aylantirishda eng ko'p uchraydigan muammolardan biri bu tasvirni ortiqcha yoyib yuborishdir. Ko'pchilik televideniyelar keng ommaga yoqadigan tarzda tayyorlanadi. Ana shu sababli siz televizorda ko'radigan barcha narsalar yuqoridan, pastdan va yon tomonlardan kesilgan chegaralarga ega bo'ladi. Bu tasvir ekranni to'liq qoplashini ta'minlash uchun qilingan. Bu overskan deyiladi. Afsuski, DVDga yozganingizda uning chetlari ham kesilishi mumkin, agar videoda taglavha tag qismga juda yaqin joylashgan bo'lsa, ular ko'rinmaydi.

src: The American plan relied on launching coordinated attacks from three different directions. General John Cadwalder would launch a diversionary attack against the British garrison at Bordentown, in order to block off any reinforcements. General James Ewing would take 700 militia across the river at Trenton Ferry, seize the bridge over the Assunpink Creek and prevent any enemy troops from escaping. The main assault force of 2,400 men would cross the river nine miles north of Trenton, and then split into two groups, one under Greene and one under Sullivan, in order to launch a pre-dawn attack.
mt: Qo'shimcha hujumlardan foydalanishga ishonchli amerikalik plan boshqa uchta yo'nalishdan birlashtirilgan hujumlarni amalga oshirishga asoslangan edi. Jeneral John Cadwalder Bordentowndagi britaniya garnizoniga qarshi bo'linma hujumini amalga oshiradi, shuning uchun uni qo'shimcha kuchlardan himoya qilishga qaratilgan edi. Jeneral James Ewing 700 militsiyani Trenton Feriydan katta daryoga o'tkazadi, Assunpink daryosining ustidan o'tadigan ko'prikni egallab, shuning uchun dushman qo'shimcha kuchlardan qochishga yo'l qo'yishga qaratilgan edi. Asosiy hujum kuchlari 2,400 kishidan iborat bo'lib, ulardan 9 mil shimolida daryoga o'tish va keyin Greene va Sullivan birlashtirilgan hujumni amalga oshirish uchun ikkita guruhga bo'linishlari kerak edi.
ref: Amerikaning rejasi uchta turli yo'nalishdan muvofiqlashtirilgan hamlalarni amalga oshirishga asoslangandi. General Jon Kadvalder har qanday qo'shimcha vositalarni to'sib qo'yish uchun Bordentaundagi ingliz garnizoniga qarshi chalg'ituvchi hujum boshlaydi. General Jeyms Eving Trenton Ferridagi daryodan 700 nafar militsiyani olib o'tdi, Assunpink daryosi ustidagi ko'prikni qo'lga kiritdi hamda hech bir dushman qo'shinining qochib qolishiga yo'l qo'ymadi. 2400 kishilik asosiy hujum kuchi Trentondan to'qqiz mil shimoldagi daryodan kesib o'tib, so'ng biri Grin qo'l ostida hamda yana biri Sallivan qo'l ostida tong otishiga yaqin hujum boshlash maqsadida ikki guruhga bo'lingan.

src: "After its adoption by Congress on July 4, a handwritten draft signed by the President of Congress John Hancock and the Secretary Charles Thomson was then sent a few blocks away to the printing shop of John Dunlap. Through the night between 150 and 200 copies were made, now known as ""Dunlap broadsides"". The first public reading of the document was by John Nixon in the yard of Independence Hall on July 8. One was sent to George Washington on July 6, who had it read to his troops in New York on July 9. A copy reached London on August 10. The 25 Dunlap broadsides still known to exist are the oldest surviving copies of the document. The original handwritten copy has not survived."
mt: “Yuliy 4-da Kongress tomonidan qabul qilingandan so'ng, Prezident John Hancock va Sekretar Charles Thomson tomonidan yozilgan yozma nusxa bir necha blok uzoqda joylashgan John Dunlap nashriyotiga yuborildi. Dunlap broadsides deb ataladigan 150-200 nusxa o'rtacha o'ngda ertalab o'rtacha o'ngda ertalab o'rtacha o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda ertalab o'ngda
ref: "U 4-iyulda Kongress tomonidan qabul qilinganidan keyin, Kongress Prezidenti Jon Henkok va kotib Charlz Tomson tomonidan imzolangan qo'lyozma nusxasi keyinchalik bir necha blok naridagi Jon Dunlapning bosmaxonasiga yuborildi. Tun davomida 150 dan 200 ga qadar nusxalar tayyorlandi, ular hozirda ""Danlep yon zambaraklari"" deb ataladi. 8-iyul kuni Mustaqillik zali hovlisida hujjat Jon Nikson tomonidan birinchi marotaba ommaga o'qib berildi. Ularning bittasi 6-iyulda Jorj Vashingtonga yuborilgan va 9-iyul kuni Nyu-Yorkdagi lashkarlarga o'qib eshittirilgan. Bir nusxasi 10-avgustda London shahriga yetib borgan. Hali ham mavjudligi ma'lum bo'lgan 25 ta Dunlap plakatlari hujjatning eng eski saqlanib qolgan nusxasidir. Asl qo'lyozma saqlanib qolmagan."

src: The Colonists, seeing this activity, had also called for reinforcements. Troops reinforcing the forward positions included the 1st and 3rd New Hampshire regiments of 200 men, under Colonels John Stark and James Reed (both later became generals). Stark's men took positions along the fence on the north end of the Colonist's position. When low tide opened a gap along the Mystic River along the northeast of the peninsula, they quickly extended the fence with a short stone wall to the north ending at the water's edge on a small beach. Gridley or Stark placed a stake about 100 feet (30 m) in front of the fence and ordered that no one fire until the regulars passed it.
mt: Kolonistlar bu faollikni ko'rgan holda, ular ham qo'shimcha kuchlar bilan murojaat qilishdi. Peninsuladagi oldingi pozitsiyalarni kuchaytirishda ishtirok etgan qo'shimcha kuchlar orasida 200 kishilik 1- va 3- New Hampshire polkining 200 kishilik qo'shimcha kuchlari, general bo'lgan John Stark va James Reed (keyinchalik general bo'lgan) ostida edi. Starkning kuchlari shimoldagi Colonistlarning pozitsiyasida to'qimachilik xonadonlarida joylashdilar. Shartlar oqib ketganda, bu yerda Myistik daryosining shimoli-sharqida peninsulani o'rab turgan o'qish joyi ochiladi, ular tezda to'qimachilik xonadonlarini shimolga qo'shimcha qilish uchun qisqa tosh devorga qo'shimcha qilishdi. Gridley yoki Stark 100 fut (30 m) to'qimachilik xonadonlaridan oldinda bir tanga qo'ydi va Colonistlarga shartni o'tkazishni buyurdi.
ref: Mazkur faoliyatni ko'rgach, mustamlakachilar ham qo'shimcha kuchlarni chaqirdi. Oldingi pozitsiyalarni mustahkamlovchi qo'shinlar polkovniklar Jon Stark va Jeyms Rid (har ikkalasi ham keyinchalik general bo'lishgan) qo'l ostilaridagi 200 kishidan iborat 1 va 3-polklarni o'z ichiga oldi. Starkning odamlari mustamlakachi pozitsiyasining shimoliy yakunidagi panjara bo'ylab o'z o'rinlarini egalladilar. Quyi oqim yarimorolning shimoli-sharqi bo'ylab Mistik daryo yoqalab bo'shliq ochganida, ular tezda to'siqni qisqa tosh devor bilan kichik sohildagi suv havzasining shimoliy chekkasiga qadar kengaytirishdi. Gridli yoki Stark to'siq oldiga taxminan 100 fut (30 m) masofada ustun o'rnatib, oddiy odamlar o'tib ketgunicha hech kim o't ochmasligini buyurdi.

src: Ancient China had a unique way of showing different time periods; each stage of China or each family that was in power was a distinctive dynasty. Also between each dynasty was an unstable age of divided provinces. The best-known of these periods was the Three Kingdoms epoch taking place for 60 years between the Han and the Jin Dynasty. During these periods fierce warfare took place between many nobles fighting for the throne. The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
mt: Qadimgi Xitoyda turli davrlarni ko'rsatish uchun o'ziga xos usul bor edi; har bir davr yoki har bir oila hukmronligi ajralmas dinastiya edi. Har bir dinastiya o'rtasida provinsiyalarning bo'linishi davri bor edi. Eng mashhur davr bu Xan va Jin dinastiyalari o'rtasidagi uchta davlat davri edi. Ushbu davrda qirg'in urushlari sodir bo'ldi, bu urushlarda ko'plar o'ldirildi. Uchta davlat davri qadimgi Xitoyning tarixida eng qonli davrlardan biri edi.
ref: Qadimiy Xitoy turli vaqt davrlarini ko'rsatishning noyob usuliga ega edi; Xitoyning har bir bosqichi yoki har bir hukmron oila aniq bir sulolaga bo'lgan. Shuningdek, har bir sulola orasida beqaror parokanda provinsiyalar davri bo'lgan. Bu davrlardan eng mashhuri Xan hamda Sin sulolalari o'rtasida 60 yil davomida yuz bergan Uch qirollik davridir. Bu davrlarda taxt uchun kurashayotgan zodagonlar o'rtasida shiddatli to'qnashuvlar bo'lib o'tdi. Uch qirollik Qadimgi Xitoy davridagi eng qonli davrlardan biri bo'lib, minglab odamlar Sian shahrida joylashgan hashamatli saroydagi taxtga o'tirish maqsadida kurashib halok bo'lgan.

src: Army ant colonies march and nest in different phases as well. In the nomadic phase, army ants march at night and stop to camp during the day. The colony begins a nomadic phase when available food has decreased. During this phase, the colony makes temporary nests that are changed everyday. Each of these nomadic rampages or marches lasts for approximately 17 days.
mt: Armiya antlarining koloniyasi harakatlanish va yashash fazalarida turli xil. Nomadik fazada, armiya antlari kechqurun yurishadi va kunduzi istiqomat qilishadi. Koloni bu fazaga kelganda mavjud oshxona kamayadi. Bu fazada koloni har kuni o'zgarmoqda bo'lgan istiqomat qilishlari mavjud. Har bir nomadik yurish yoki yurish 17 kun davom etadi.
ref: Chumoli koloniyalar armiyasi turli bosqichlarda ham yuradi va uya quradi. Ko'chish bosqichida chumolilar armiyasi tunda yuradi va kun davomida dam olish uchun to'xtashadi. Mavjud oziq-ovqat kamayganida koloniya ko'chmanchilik fazasini boshlaydi. Bu faza davomida koloniya har kuni o'zgaruvchi vaqtinchalik in quradi. Mazkur ko'chmanchi g'alayon yoxud yurishlarning har biri qariyb 17 kun davom etadi.

Each of these nomadic rampages or marches lasts for approximately 17 days.

Koloni bu fazaga kelganda mavjud oshxona kamayadi. Bu fazada koloni har kuni o'zgarmoqda bo'lgan istiqomat qilishlari mavjud. Har bir nomadik yurish yoki yurish 17 kun davom etadi.
ref: Chumoli koloniyalar armiyasi turli bosqichlarda ham yuradi va uya quradi. Ko'chish bosqichida chumolilar armiyasi tunda yuradi va kun davomida dam olish uchun to'xtashadi. Mavjud oziq-ovqat kamayganida koloniya ko'chmanchilik fazasini boshlaydi. Bu faza davomida koloniya har kuni o'zgaruvchi vaqtinchalik in quradi. Mazkur ko'chmanchi g'alayon yoxud yurishlarning har biri qariyb 17 kun davom etadi.

src: Many observed rhythms in physiology and behavior often crucially depend on the presence of endogenous cycles and their production through biological clocks. Periodic rhythms, which are not simply responses to external periodic cues, have been documented for most living beings, including bacteria, fungi, plants, and animals. Biological clocks are self sustaining oscillators which will continue a period of free-running cycling even in the absence of external cues.
mt: Hayotiyot va xatti-harakatlarning ko'plari biologik soatlarning mavjudligi va ularning biologik soatlardan tashqarida tashqi periodik belgilarga javoban emas, balki endogen sikllar orqali ishlab chiqarilishi kabi muhim qonunlariga asoslanadi. ref: Fiziologiya va xulq-atvorda kuzatilgan ko'plab ritmlar ko'p hollarda endogen sikllar mavjudligi va ularning biologik soatlar orqali hosil bo'lishiga nihoyatda bog'liq. Tashqi davriy signallarga oddiygina javob bo'lmagan davriy ritmlar ko'plab tirik jonzotlar, jumladan, bakteriya, zamburug', o'simlik hamda hayvonlar uchun hujjatlashtirilgan. Biologik soatlar hattoki tashqi signallar bo'lmaganida ham avtonom harakatlanish davrini davom ettiruvchi avtogeneratordir.

src: A population is the collection of organisms of a particular species within a given geographic area. When all individuals in a population are identical with regard to a particular phenotypic trait they are known as monomorphic. When the individuals show several variants of a particular trait they are polymorphic.
mt: Populyatsiya - bu biror turi organizmlarning biror geografik hudud ichida to'planishi. Agar populyatsiyadagi barcha shaxslar biror xususiyatlarga oid fenotipik xususiyatda bir xil bo'lsa, ular monomorfik deyiladi. Agar shaxslar bir xil xususiyatlarga ega bo'lmagan bo'lsa, ular polimorfik deyiladi.
ref: Populyatsiya berilgan geografik hudud doirasidagi ma'lum bir turlardagi organizmlar to'plamidir. Populatsiyaning barcha alohida vakillari aniq bir xususiyatga nisbatan bir xil bo'lgan hollarda ular monomorfik deb ataladi. Jismoniy shaxslarda muayyan xususiyatning bir qancha variantlari namoyon bo'lsa, ular polimorfikdir.

src: Nature-based tourism attracts people interested in visiting natural areas for the purpose of enjoying the scenery, including plant and animal wildlife. Examples of on-site activities include hunting, fishing, photography, bird watching, and visiting parks and studying information about the ecosystem. An example is visiting, photographing, and learning about organgatuangs in Borneo.

Joylardagi mashg'ulotlarga misol sifatida ov qilish, baliq ovlash, suratga olish, qushlarni tomosha qilish, bog'larga tashrif buyurish va ekotizim haqidagi ma'lumotlarni o'rganishni keltirish mumkin. Misol, Borneoga tashrif buyurib orangatuanglarni suratga olish va ularni o'rganishdir.

src: Every morning, people leave small country towns in cars to go their workplace and are passed by others whose work destination is the place they have just left. In this dynamic transport shuttle everyone is somehow connected with, and supporting, a transport system based on private cars. Science now indicates that this massive carbon economy has dislodged the biosphere from one of its stable states that has supported human evolution for the past two million years.
mt: Har kuni, odamlar o'z ish joyiga avtomobil bilan qishloqqa chiqib ketishadi va boshqa odamlar o'z ish joyiga qishloqdan chiqib ketishadi. Bu dinamik transport shuttle barcha odamlar o'z transport tizimini qo'llab-quvvatlaydigan va qo'llab-quvvatlaydigan bir xil narsa bilan bog'langan. Ilm o'rganish shuni ko'rsatadiki, bu katta karbon iqtisodiyoti biosferani ikki million yil davomida odam evolyutsiyasini qo'llab-quvvatlagan birinchi mustahkam holatdan ajratib qo'ydi.
ref: Har kuni ertalab odamlar avtomobillarda kichik shaharlarni tashlab ishga ketishar ekan, ular hozirgina ketgan joyda ishxonalari bo'lgan odamlar bilan kesishadilar. Mazkur dinamik transport marshrutida har bir kishi shaxsiy avtomashinaga asoslangan transport tizimi bilan qandaydir bog'liq va uni qo'llab-quvvatlaydi. Endilikda ilm-fan shuni ko'rsatib turibdiki, mazkur yirik uglerod iqtisodi biosferani o'zining oxirgi 2 mln. Yildan beri inson evolyutsiyasini qo'llab kelgan barqaror holatlarining biridan mahrum qilgan.

src: The atom can be considered to be one of the fundamental building blocks of all matter. Its a very complex entity which consists, according to a simplified Bohr model, of a central nucleus orbited by electrons, somewhat similar to planets orbiting the sun - see Figure 1.1. The nucleus consists of two particles - neutrons and protons. Protons have a positive electric charge while neutrons have no charge. The electrons have a negative electric charge.
mt: Atomni barcha narsaning asosiy qurilish qismlaridan biri sifatida ko'rish mumkin. U juda murakkab tashkiyot bo'lib, uning markazida nukleus mavjud bo'lib, u elektronlarni o'rab turgan, shuningdek, yerdagi Quyoshga o'z orbitasida aylanayotgan sayyoralar kabi - qarang 1.1. rasm. Nukleusda ikkita zarrachadan - neytron va protonlardan iborat. Protonlar elektr zaryadiga ega bo'lib, ularning zaryadi pozitiv bo'lib, neytronlar esa zaryadga ega emas. Elektronlar esa elektr zaryadiga ega.
ref: Atomni barcha moddalarning asosiy qurilish g'ishtlaridan biri deb hisoblasa bo'ladi. U Quyosh atrofida aylanayotgan sayyoralar singari Borning soddalashtirilgan modeliga asosan elektron orbitasi bo'ylab harakatlanayongan markaziy yadrodan tashkil topgan juda murakkab obyektdir — 1.1-rasmga qarang. Yadro ikkita zarrachalar — neytronlar va protonlarni o'z ichiga oladi. Neytronlar zaryadsiz, protonlar esa musbat elektr zaryadga ega. Elektronlarda manfiy elektr zaryadlar mavjud.

src: Virtually all computers in use today are based on the manipulation of information which is coded in the form of binary numbers. A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon.
mt: Bugungi kunda foydalaniladigan barcha kompyuterlar ma'lumotlarni ikki qiymatli raqamlar bilan kodlangan ma'lumotlarni manipulyatsiyasi asosida ishlaydi. Ikki qiymatli raqam faqat 0 yoki 1 qiymatiga ega bo'lishi mumkin va bu raqamlar kompyuter jargoni bilan "bit" deb ataladi.
ref: Ayni vaqtda foydalaniladigan barcha kompyuterlar axborot manipulyatsiyasi ikkilik raqamlar shaklida kodlanishiga asoslangan. Ikkilik raqamlar faqatgina ikkita qiymatdan biriga ega bo'la oladi, misol uchun 0 yoki 1 hamda mazkur raqamlar kompyuter jargonida foydalanish uchun bitlar yoki ikkilik raqamlar deb yuritiladi.

src: "Blogs can also help improve student writing. While students often begin their blog experience with sloppy grammar and spelling, the presence of an audience generally changes that. Since students are often the most critical audience, the blog writer begins to strive to improve writing to avoid criticism. Also blogging ""forces students to become more savvy about the world around them."" The need to feed the interest of the audience inspires students to be clever and interesting (Toto, 2004). Blogging is a tool that inspires collaboration, and encourages students to extend learning well beyond the traditional school day. Appropriate use of blogs ""can empower students to become more analytical and critical; through actively responding to Internet materials, students can define their positions in the context of others' writings as well as outline their own perspectives on particular issues (Oravec, 2002)."
mt: "Bloggerlar yozuvchilikni yaxshilashga yordam berishi mumkin. Blogga kirgan birinchi talabalar ko'pincha yozuvda xatoliklar va so'zlashuvda xatoliklar bilan boshlanishadi, ammo jamoatchilik mavjudligi bu holatni o'zgartiradi. Talabalar ko'pincha eng keng jamoatchilik bo'lib, talabalar yozuvchilikni yaxshilashga urinadilar, xatolarni tushunishdan qochish uchun. Bloggerlar talabalar uchun o'qishni osonlashtiradi. Talabalar o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun o'qishni osonlashtirish uchun
ref: "Bloglar talabalarning yozish mahoratini yaxshilashga ham yordam beradi. Talabalar ko'pincha o'z blog tajribasini pala-partish grammatika va imlo bilan boshlasa-da, auditoriyaning borligini odatda buni o'zgartiradi. Talabalar ko'p hollarda eng tanqidiy tinglovchilar bo'lganligi tufayli, bloger tanqiddan qochish uchun yozayotganlarini yaxshilashga intiladi. Shu bilan birga, blog yuritish ""talabalarni atrofidagi olam haqida yanada bilimli bo'lishga majburlaydi"". Ommadagi qiziqishni qanoatlantirish zarurati talabalarni fahmli hamda qiziqarli bo'lishga ilhomlantiradi (Toto, 2004). Blog yuritish hamkorlikka ilhomlantiruvchi va talabalarni an'anaviy o'qish kunidan tashqari bilimlarini kengaytirishga rag'batlantiradigan vositadir. Bloglardan to'g'ri foydalanish ""talabalarga yaxshiroq tahliliy va tanqidiy fikrlaydigan bo'lish imkonini beradi; Internet materiallarga faol javob berish orqali talabalar boshqalarning yozuvlari kontekstida o'z pozitsiyasini belgilashi, shuningdek, muayyan masalalar bo'yicha o'z nuqtayi nazarlarini bayon qilishi mumkin"". (Oravek, 2002)"

src: Asynchronous communication encourages time for reflection and reaction to others. It allows students the ability to work at their own pace and control the pace of instructional information. In addition, there are fewer time restrictions with the possibility of flexible working hours. (Bremer, 1998) The use of the Internet and the World Wide Web allows learners to have access to information at all times. Students can also submit questions to instructors at any time of day and expect reasonably quick responses, rather than waiting until the next face-to-face meeting.
mt: Asinkron kommunikatsiya o'qituvchilar va o'quvchilar o'rtasida refleksi va boshqa shaxslar tomonidan reaksiyani o'zlashtirishga imkoniyat beradi. U o'quvchilarga o'ziga xos o'qish vaqti va o'qituvchilarning o'qituvchilik ma'lumotlarini boshqarish imkoniyatini beradi. Shuningdek, o'qituvchilar va o'quvchilar o'rtasidagi vaqt cheklovlari kamroq bo'lib, ish vaqtida ishlashga imkoniyat beradi. (Bremer, 1998) Internet va Jahon maydoni o'quvchilarga ma'lumotga doimiy kirish imkoniyatini beradi. O'quvchilar o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qit
ref: Asinxron aloqa mulohaza hamda boshqalarga reaksiya bildirish uchun vaqtni beradi. Bu talabalarga o'z sur'atida ishlash va o'quv ma'lumoti sur'atini nazorat qilish imkonini beradi. Bundan tashqari ish soatlarini moslashtirish mumkin bo'lgani holda vaqt cheklanishlari kamroqdir. (Bremer, 1998) Internet va Jahon tarmog'idan foydalanish ta'lim oluvchilarga ma'lumotlarni istalgan vaqtda olishlariga imkon beradi. Talabalar kunning har qanday paytida ustozlariga savol bera olishlari hamda keyingi yuzma-yuz uchrashuvni kutib o'tirgandan ko'ra, oqilona tez javoblarni kutishlari mumkin.

src: Asynchronous communication encourages time for reflection and reaction to others. It allows students the ability to work at their own pace and control the pace of instructional information. In addition, there are fewer time restrictions with the possibility of flexible working hours. (Bremer, 1998) The use of the Internet and the World Wide Web allows learners to have access to information at all times. Students can also submit questions to instructors at any time of day and expect reasonably quick responses, rather than waiting until the next face-to-face meeting.
mt: Asinkron kommunikatsiya o'qituvchilar va o'quvchilar o'rtasida refleksi va boshqa shaxslar tomonidan reaksiyani o'zlashtirishga imkoniyat beradi. U o'quvchilarga o'ziga xos o'qish vaqti va o'qituvchilarning o'qituvchilik ma'lumotlarini boshqarish imkoniyatini beradi. Shuningdek, o'qituvchilar va o'quvchilar o'rtasidagi vaqt cheklovlari kamroq bo'lib, ish vaqtida ishlashga imkoniyat beradi. (Bremer, 1998) Internet va Jahon maydoni o'quvchilarga ma'lumotga doimiy kirish imkoniyatini beradi. O'quvchilar o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qituvchilarga har kuni o'qit
ref: Asinxron aloqa mulohaza hamda boshqalarga reaksiya bildirish uchun vaqtni beradi. Bu talabalarga o'z sur'atida ishlash va o'quv ma'lumoti sur'atini nazorat qilish imkonini beradi. Bundan tashqari ish soatlarini moslashtirish mumkin bo'lgani holda vaqt cheklanishlari kamroqdir. (Bremer, 1998) Internet va Jahon tarmog'idan foydalanish ta'lim oluvchilarga ma'lumotlarni istalgan vaqtda olishlariga imkon beradi. Talabalar kunning har qanday paytida ustozlariga savol bera olishlari hamda keyingi yuzma-yuz uchrashuvni kutib o'tirgandan ko'ra, oqilona tez javoblarni kutishlari mumkin.

src: The traditional medieval castle has long inspired the imagination, conjuring up images of jousts, banquets and Arthurian chivalry. Even standing amidst thousand year-old ruins it is easy to bring to mind the sounds and smells of battles long gone, to almost hear the clatter of hooves on the cobbles and to smell the fear rising from the dungeon pits. But is our imagination based on reality? Why were castles built in the first place? How were they designed and built?

ref: An'anaviy o'rta asrlar qal'asi ritsarlar turnirlari, banketlar va Artur rutsarligini qiyofalantirgan holda uzoq vaqtlar tasavvurlarni ilhomlantirib keldi. Hattoki ming yillik eski harobalar orasida turib ham uzoq o'tmishda o''tib ketgan janglarning tovushlari va hidlarini tasavvur qilish, toshlar ustida tuyoqlarning yurishlarini deyarli eshitish va zindon ostidan ko'tarilayotgan qo'rquvni sezish mumkin. Biroq bizning tasavvurimiz haqiqatga asoslanganmi? Nega birinchi navbatda qasrlar qurilgan? Ular qanday qilib loyihalashtirilgan va bunyod etilgan?

src: Typical for the period, Kirby Muxloe Castle is more of a fortified house than a true castle. Its large glazed windows and thin walls would not have been able to resist a determined attack for long. In the 1480s, when its construction was begun by Lord Hastings, the country was relatively peaceful and defense was only required against small bands of roving marauders.
mt: Usuliga xos bo'lgan davrda Kirby Muxloe qal'asi nisbatan qal'a emas, balki qal'a bo'lib qolgan yirik qal'a. Uning katta o'chirilgan jamlar va qalin devorlari uzun davom etgan hujumga qarshi qolmaydi. 1480-yillarda, uning qurilishi Lord Hastings tomonidan boshlangan, mamlakat o'zgarmagan va qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rqoq qo'rq
ref: o'sha davrga xos bo'lgan Kibri Muxloe qal'asi haqiqiy qal'adan ko'ra, ko'proq mustahkamligi oshirilgan uydir. Uning katta oynaband derazalari va ingichka devori keskin hujumga uzoq dosh berolmagan bo'lardi. 1480-yillarda qurilishi Lord Gastings tomonidan boshlangan vaqtda mamlakat nisbatan tinch bo'lgan va mudofaa izg'ib yurgan mayda qaroqchilar to'dalariga qarshi talab qilingan xolos.

src: With the change from the quarter to the half mile run, speed becomes of much less importance and endurance becomes an absolute necessity. Of course a first-class half-miler, a man who can beat two minutes, must be possessed of a fair amount of speed, but endurance must be cultivated at all hazards. Some cross country running during the winter, combined with gymnasium work for the upper part of the body, is the best preparation for the running season.
mt: Yarmi yugurishdan yarim mil yugurishga o'tish bilan tezlik katta ahamiyatga ega bo'lmaydi va omon qolish zarur bo'ladi. Tabiiyki, birinchi sinf yarim mil yuguruvchisi, ikki daqiqa yugurishga qodir bo'lgan odam tezlikka ega bo'lishi kerak, lekin omon qolishni o'zlashtirish zarur bo'ladi. Qishda yozgi yugurishni o'z ichiga olgan gimnastika ishlarini jismoniy tashqi qism uchun eng yaxshi tayyorlash usuli hisoblanadi.
ref: Chorak mil yugurishdan yarim mil yugurishga otilganida tezlikning ahamiyatini ancha kamayadi va bardoshlilik mutlaq zaruriyatga aylanadi. Albatta, ikki daqiqani ishlab olishi mumkin bo'lgan birinchi darajali o'rta masofaga yuguruvchi sportchi juda katta tezlikka ega bo'lishi lozim, biroq nima bo'lganda ham chidamlilik rivojlantirilishi kerak. Qish paytida kross yugurish, tananing yuqori qismi uchun gimnastik mashqlar bilan birgalikda, yugurish mavsumi uchun eng yaxshi tayyorgarlikdir.

src: Proper nutritional practices alone cannot generate elite performances, but they can significantly affect young athletes' overall wellness. Maintaining a healthy energy balance, practicing effective hydration habits, and understanding the various aspects of supplementation practices can help athletes improve their performance and increase their enjoyment of the sport.
mt: Yaxshi ovqatlanish tizimi yagona o'yinchilar yutuqlari uchun emas, balki yosh sportchilar umumiy sog'lig'ini oshirishga yordam berishi mumkin. Salbiy energiya bilan bog'liq muammolarni bartaraf etish, samarali hidratlash tizimlarini amalga oshirish va turli xil ta'minot tizimlarini tushunish yosh sportchilar o'yinlari uchun yaxshi natijalarga erishishlari va sportga qiziqishni oshirishlari mumkin.
ref: To'g'ri ovqatlanish amaliyotlarining o'zi a'lo ko'rsatkichlarni ta'minlay olmaydi, lekin ular yosh sportchilarning umumiy salomatligiga sezilarli ta'sir qila oladi. Sog'lom quvvat muvozanatini saqlash, foydali suv ichish odatiga amal qilish va qo'shimchalar iste'molining turli jihatlarini tushunish sportchilarga o'z ko'rsatkichlarini yaxshilash va sportdan ko'proq zavq olishlariga yordam beradi.

src: Middle distance running is a relatively inexpensive sport; however, there are many misconceptions regarding the few pieces of equipment required to participate. Products can be purchased as needed, but most will have little or no real impact on performance. Athletes may feel that they prefer a product even when it provides no real benefits.
mt: Ortadagi masofa yugurish sporti juda arzon bo'lib, shu sababli, ishtirok etish uchun kerakli bo'lgan qo'shimcha vositalar haqida ko'plab xato tushunishlar mavjud. Bunday vositalar kerak bo'lganda sotib olinishi mumkin, lekin ko'pchilik sportchilar o'zlarining ishonchini o'zlashtirishlari uchun foydali bo'lmagan vositalar sotib olishlari mumkin.
ref: O'rta masofaga yugurish nisbatan arzon sport turi bo'lsa-da, u bilan shug'ullanish uchun zarur qancha anjom zarurligi borasida yanglish tushunchalar ko'p. Mahsulotlar ehtiyojga qarab sotib olinishi mumkin, biroq aksariyati faoliyatga arzimas ta'sir ko'rsatadi yoki umuman ta'sir ko'rsatmaydi. Atletlar hattoki haqiqiy foyda bermaganida ham, ular mahsulotni afzal ko'rishni his qilishlari mumkin.

src: MRI is based on a physics phenomenon called nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), which was discovered in the 1930s by Felix Bloch (working at Stanford University) and Edward Purcell (from Harvard University). In this resonance, magnetic field and radio waves cause atoms to give off tiny radio signals. In the year 1970, Raymond Damadian, a medical doctor and research scientist, discovered the basis for using magnetic resonance imaging as a tool for medical diagnosis. Four years later a patent was granted, which was the world's first patent issued in the field of MRI. In 1977, Dr. Damadian completed the construction of the first “whole-body” MRI scanner, which he called the ”Indomitable”.
mt: MR tomografiyasi (MR tomografiyasi) yoki MR tomografiyasi (MR tomografiyasi) - bu fizik hodisasi nuklear magnit rezonans (NMR) asosida ishlaydi, bu hodisa 1930-yillarda Feliks Blox (Stenford Universitetida ishlagan) va Edvard Purcell (Harvard Universitetidan) tomonidan kashf etilgan. Bu rezonans magnit maydoni va radio to'lqinlari tufayli atomlarni kichik radio signallar berishga sabab bo'ldi. 1970-yilda tibbiyot doktori va tadqiqot olimi Raymon Damadian, tibbiy tashxis uchun magnit rezonansni qo'llash asosini kashf etdi. To'rt yil o'tgach, patent berildi, bu dunyodagi birinchi MR tomografiyasi patenti bo'ldi. 1977-yilda Dr. Damadian dunyodagi birinchi "butun jasad" MR tomografiyasi tizimini qurib, uni "Indomitable" deb atadi.
ref: "MRI 1930-yillarda Feliks Blok (Stenford universitetida ishlayotgan) va Edvard Pursell (Garvard universitetidan) tomonidan kashf qilingan yadro-magnit rezonansi (NMR) deb ataluvchi fizik hodisaga asoslangan. Bu rezonansda magnit maydon hamda radio to'lqinlar atomlarning ingichka radio signallarni yuborishiga sabab bo'ladi. 1970-yili tibbiyot shifokori hamda tadqiqotchi olim Raymond Damadian magnit-rezonans tomografiyadan tibbiy tashxis vositasi sifatida foydalanish asosini kashf etdi. To'rt yil o'tib, MRT sohasida chiqarilgan dunyodagi ilk patent berildi. 1977-yili doktor Damadian ilk ""butun tana"" MRT skanerini yaratishni yakunladi hamda uni ""Indomitable"" deb nomladi."

mt: MR tomografiyasi (MR tomografiyasi) yoki MR tomografiyasi (MR tomografiyasi) - bu fizik hodisasi nuklear magnit rezonans (NMR) asosida ishlaydi, bu hodisa 1930-yillarda Feliks Blox (Stenford Universitetida ishlagan) va Edvard Purcell (Harvard Universitetidan) tomonidan kashf etilgan. Bu rezonans magnit maydoni va radio to'lqinlari tufayli atomlarni kichik radio signallar berishga sabab bo'ldi. 1970-yilda tibbiyot doktori va tadqiqot olimi Raymon Damadian, tibbiy tashxis uchun magnit rezonansni qo'llash asosini kashf etdi. To'rt yil o'tgach, patent berildi, bu dunyodagi birinchi MR tomografiyasi patenti bo'ldi. 1977-yilda Dr. Damadian dunyodagi birinchi "butun jasad" MR tomografiyasi tizimini qurib, uni "Indomitable" deb atadi.
ref: "MRI 1930-yillarda Feliks Blok (Stenford universitetida ishlayotgan) va Edvard Pursell (Garvard universitetidan) tomonidan kashf qilingan yadro-magnit rezonansi (NMR) deb ataluvchi fizik hodisaga asoslangan. Bu rezonansda magnit maydon hamda radio to'lqinlar atomlarning ingichka radio signallarni yuborishiga sabab bo'ladi. 1970-yili tibbiyot shifokori hamda tadqiqotchi olim Raymond Damadian magnit-rezonans tomografiyadan tibbiy tashxis vositasi sifatida foydalanish asosini kashf etdi. To'rt yil o'tib, MRT sohasida chiqarilgan dunyodagi ilk patent berildi. 1977-yili doktor Damadian ilk ""butun tana"" MRT skanerini yaratishni yakunladi hamda uni ""Indomitable"" deb nomladi."

src: Humans are by far the most talented species in reading the minds of others. That means we are able to successfully predict what other humans perceive, intend, believe, know or desire. Among these abilities, understanding the intention of others is crucial. It allows us to resolve possible ambiguities of physical actions. For example, if you were to see someone breaking a car window, you would probably assume he was trying to steal a stranger’s car. He would need to be judged differently if he had lost his car keys and it was his own car that he was trying to break into.
mt: Insonlardan keyin boshqa turlarda o'z-o'zidan boshqa turlarni o'qish qobiliyati eng yaxshi. Shuning uchun biz boshqa insonlarning qanday ko'rish, qanday niyat, qanday ishonch, qanday bilish yoki qanday xohishlari borligini tushunishimiz mumkin. Bu qobiliyatlardan biri, boshqa insonlarning maqsadini tushunish muhimdir. U bizga fizikalik harakatlarning mumkin bo'lgan ambigulyalarini hal qilishga imkon beradi. Masalan, siz biror kishi o'z avtomobilini qirib tashlaganini ko'rgan bo'lsangiz, siz uning boshqa odamning avtomobilini o'g'irlashga urinayotganini taxmin qilishingiz mumkin. Ushbu holatda u o'z avtomobilini qirib tashlaganini ko'rgan bo'lsa, u o'z avtomobilini o'g'irlashga urinayotganini tushunish uchun boshqa narsa kerak.
ref: Insonlar boshqalarning fikrlarini o'qish bo'yicha eng qobiliyatli turlardir. Bu bizning boshqa insonlar nimani idrok etishini, niyat qilishini, ishonishi, bilishi yoki xohlashini oldindan bashorat qila olishimizni anglatadi. Bu qobiliyatlar orasida boshqalarning maqsadini tushunish nihoyatda muhim. Bu jismoniy harakatlarning ehtimoliy noaniqlikarini hal etish imkonini beradi. Masalan, agar kimsa biror kimning avtomobil oynasini sindirayotganligini ko'rsangiz, siz u begonaning avtomobilini o'g'irlashga urinayotganligini taxmin qilgan bo'lardingiz. Agarda u avtomobilining kalitini yo'qotib qo'ygan bo'lsa hamda u buzib kirishga urinayotgan avtomobil o'ziniki bo'lsa, u boshqacha baholanishi kerak bo'lardi.

src: Although AI has a strong connotation of science fiction, AI forms a very important branch of computer science, dealing with behavior, learning and intelligent adaptation in a machine. Research in AI involves making machines to automate tasks that require intelligent behavior. Examples include control, planning and scheduling, the ability to answer customer diagnoses and questions, as well as handwriting recognition, voice and face. Such things have become separate disciplines, which focus on providing solutions to real life problems. The AI ​​system is now often used in the fields of economics, medicine, engineering and the military, as has been built in several home computer and video game software applications.
mt: AIga ilmiy fantastika tushunchasi kuchliroq, lekin AI kompyuter ilmiyotining katta qismi tashkil etadi, bu mashinalarda xatti-harakat, o'qitish va intellektli moslashuvni o'z ichiga oladi. AI tadqiqotlari mashinalarni intellektli xatti-harakat talab qiladigan vazifalarni avtomatlashtirishga qaratilgan. Masalan, boshqarish, planlash va rejalashtirish, xabar berish va savol berish qobiliyati, yozuvni tan olish, ovoz va yuz. Bunday narsalar mustahkam o'zgaruvchan tushunchalarga aylanib, bu muammolarga javob berishga qaratilgan maxsus fanlarga aylanadi. AI tizimi hozirda iqtisodiyot, tibbiyot, muhandislik va harbiy sohalarda qo'llaniladi, shuningdek, bir nechta uy kompyuter va video o'yin dasturlari tizimida qurilgan.
ref: AI kuchli ilmiy fantastika mazmuniga ega bo'lsa-da, AI xulq-atvor, mashinada o'rganish va aqlli moslashish bilan shug'ullanadigan kompyuter fanlarining juda muhim sohasini tashkil qiladi. AI bo'yicha tadqiqotlar aqlli xatti-harakatlar talab etiluvchi vazifalarni avtomatlashtirish uchun mashinalar yaratishdan iborat. Nazorat, rejalashtirish va jadval tuzish, mijoz tashxislariga va savollariga javob berish qobiliyati hamda qo'lyozma, ovoz va yuzni tanib olish bunga misol bo'la oladi. Bu kabi haqiqiy hayotiy muammolarga yechim topishga qaratilgan narsalar alohida fanlarga aylangan. Hozirda bir qancha uy kompyuteri hamda video-o'yin dasturlari tarkibiga kiritilgani kabi, AI tizimidan iqtisot, tibbiyot, muhandislik hamda harbiy sohalarda tez-tez foydalaniladi.

src: Convergent thinking patterns are problem solving techniques that unite different ideas or fields to find a solution. The focus of this mindset is speed, logic and accuracy, also identification of facts, reapplying existing techniques, gathering information. The most important factor of this mindset is: there is only one correct answer. You only think of two answers, namely right or wrong. This type of thinking is associated with certain science or standard procedures. People with this type of thinking have logical thinking, are able to memorize patterns, solve problems and work on scientific tests.
mt: Qo'shimcha o'ylash usullari muammolarni hal qilish usullaridir, ularda turli xil fikrlar yoki sohalar birlashtiriladi va hal qilish usuli topiladi. Bu tushunchaning markazi tezlik, logika va to'g'ri xatolikdir, shuningdek, faktlarni aniqlash, mavjud usullarni qayta qo'llash, ma'lumotlarni to'plash. Bu tushunchaning eng muhim faktori: faqat bir xil javob bor. Siz faqat ikkita javobga oydin, ya'ni to'g'ri yoki noto'g'ri. Bu tushuncha ilmiy yoki standart usullar bilan bog'liq. Bu tushuncha bilan shug'ullanuvchilar logik tushunchaga ega, o'ylash usullarini yodlashga qodir, muammolarni hal qilish va ilmiy testlarda ishlashga qodir.
ref: Konvergent fikrlash namunalari — bu yechim topish uchun turli xil g'oyalarni yoxud sohalarni birlashtiradigan muammoni hal qilish usulidir. Tezkorlik, mantiq va aniqlik, shu bilan birga faktlarni aniqlash, mavjud texnikalarni qayta qo'llash, axborot yig'ish mazkur fikrlash tarzining asosiy yo'nalishidir. Mazkur fikrlash tarzining eng muhim omili bu: faqat bitta to'g'ri javob bor. Siz faqat ikkita javob, ya'ni to'g'ri yoki noto'g'ri haqida o'ylaysiz. Bu turdagi tafakkur muayyan bir fan yoki standart tartib-qoidalar bilan bog'liq. Bu tarzda o'ylaydigan insonlar mantiqiy tafakkurga ega bo'lib, namunalarni yodlab qolish, muammolarni yechish va ilmiy testlar ustida ishlashlari mumkin.

src: The use of video recording has led to important discoveries in the interpretation of micro-expressions, facial movements which last a few milliseconds. In particular, it is claimed that one can detect whether a person is lying by interpreting micro-expressions correctly. Oliver Sacks, in his paper The President's Speech, indicated how people who are unable to understand speech because of brain damage are nevertheless able to assess sincerity accurately. He even suggests that such abilities in interpreting human behavior may be shared by animals such as domestic dogs.
mt: Video yozuvlarning ishlatilishi, mikro-ekspressiyalarni tushunishda muhim izlanishlarga olib keldi. Shuningdek, xabar berishicha, odamni yolg'izlikda tushunish mumkin bo'lgan mikro-ekspressiyalarni to'g'ri tushunish orqali odamni yolg'izlikda tushunish mumkin bo'lgan mikro-ekspressiyalarni to'g'ri tushunish orqali odamni yolg'izlikda tushunish mumkin bo'lgan mikro-ekspressiyalarni to'g'ri tushunish orqali odamni yolg'izlikda tushunish mumkin bo'lgan mikro-ekspressiyalarni to'g'ri tushunish orqali odamni yolg'izlikda tushunish mumkin bo'lgan mikro-ekspressiyalarni to'g'ri tushunish orqali odamni yolg'izlikda tushunish mumkin bo'lgan mikro-ekspressiyalarni to'g'ri tushunish orqali odamni yolg'izlikda tushunish mumkin bo'lgan mikro-ekspressiyalarni to'g'ri tushunish orqali odamni yolg'izlikda tushunish mumkin bo'lgan mikro-ekspressiyalarni to'g'ri tushunish orqali odamni yolg'izlikda tushunish mumkin bo'lgan mikro-ekspressiyalarni to'g'ri tushunish orqali odamni yolg'izlikda tushunish mumkin bo'lgan mikro-ekspressiyalarni to'g'ri tushunish orqali odamni yolg'izlikda tushunish mumkin bo'lgan mikro-ekspressiyalarni to'g'ri tushunish orqali odamni yolg'izlikda tushunish mumkin bo'lgan mikro-eks
ref: "Videoyozuvlardan foydalanish bir necha millisoniya davom etuvchi mikro-ifodalar va yuz harakatlarini talqin qilishda muhim kashfiyotlarga sababchi bo'ldi. Xususan, kichik ifodalarni to'g'ri talqin qilish orqali kishi yolg'on gapirayotgani yoki yolg'on gapirmayotganligini aniqlash mumkin, deya da'vo qilinmoqda. Oliver Saks ""Prezident nutqi"" maqolasida, miyadagi shikastlanish tufayli nutqni tushuna olmaydigan insonlarning qay tarzda samimiylikni aniq baholay olishini ko'rsatib o'tgan. U hattoki odam xulq-atrvorini talqin qilishdagi bunday qobiliyatlar uy itlari kabi hayvonlar tomonidan o'zlashtirilgan bo'lishi mumkin deb taxmin qilgan."

src: As the ability to obtain knowledge and to learn changed in such a way as mentioned above the base rate at which knowledge was obtained changed. The approach to obtaining information was different. No longer did pressure reside within individual recall, but the ability to recall text became more of a focus. In essence, the Renaissance made a significant change in the approach to learning and the dissemination of knowledge.
mt: Yuklab olish va o'rganish qobiliyatining o'zgarishi shu kabi ko'rsatilganidek, bilim olishning asosiy darajasi o'zgarib ketdi. Ma'lumotlarni olish usuli farq qildi. Shuningdek, individual xotiraning bosimi yo'q edi, lekin yozuvni eslab qolish qobiliyati ko'proq markazga qo'yildi. Jumladan, Renessans o'rganish va bilimlarni tarqatish usulida katta o'zgarish kiritdi.
ref: Bilim olish hamda o'rganish slohiyati yuqorida tilga olinganidek o'zgargani tufayli, bilim olishning bazaviy darajasi ham o'zgargan. Axborot olish bo'yicha yondashuv boshqacha edi. Individual eslash vaqtida ortiq bosim bo'lmas edi, biroq matnni eslash qobiliyatiga ko'proq e'tibor qaratila boshlagandi. Aslini olganda, Uyg'onish davri o'rganish hamda bilim berishga nisbatan bo'lgan yondashuvda katta o'zgarishlar qildi.

src: The Internet combines elements of both mass and interpersonal communication. The distinct characteristics of the Internet lead to additional dimensions in terms of the uses and gratifications approach. For example, “learning” and “socialization” are suggested as important motivations for Internet use (James et al., 1995). “Personal involvement” and “continuing relationships” were also identified as new motivation aspects by Eighmey and McCord (1998) when they investigated audience reactions to websites.
mt: Internet mass va shaxsiy aloqalar elementlarini birlashtiradi. Internetning ajralmas xususiyatlari foydalanish va qo'llanma usullari tushunchasini qo'llab-quvvatlaydi. Masalan, "o'qish" va "jamiyatlashish" Internet foydalanishining muhim motivatsiyalari sifatida taklif qilinadi (James va bosh. 1995). "Shaxsiy ishtirok" va "davom etadigan munosabatlar" Eighmey va McCord (1998) tomonidan internetdagi saytlarga munosabatni o'rganishda yangi motivatsiya elementlari sifatida aniqlangan.
ref: "Internet o'zida ommaviy hamda shaxslararo aloqa elementlarini mujassamlashtiradi. Internetning alohida xususiyatlari undan foydalanish hamda mamnun etuvchi yondashuv borasida qo'shimcha o'lchamlarga yetaklaydi. Misol uchun, ""ta'lim"" va ""ijtimoiylashuv"" internetdan foydalanish uchun muhim motivatsiyalar sifatida taklif qilinadi (Jeyms va boshqalar, 1995). Auditoriyaning vebsaytlarga munosabatini tadqiq qilganlarida, Eymey va Mak-Kord (1998) tomonidan ""shaxsiy ishtirok"" va ""davomiy munosabatlar"" ham motivatsiyaning yangi jihatlari deb topilgan."

src: The Internet combines elements of both mass and interpersonal communication. The distinct characteristics of the Internet lead to additional dimensions in terms of the uses and gratifications approach. For example, “learning” and “socialization” are suggested as important motivations for Internet use (James et al., 1995). “Personal involvement” and “continuing relationships” were also identified as new motivation aspects by Eighmey and McCord (1998) when they investigated audience reactions to websites.
mt: Internet mass va shaxsiy aloqalar elementlarini birlashtiradi. Internetning ajralmas xususiyatlari foydalanish va qo'llanma usullari tushunchasini qo'llab-quvvatlaydi. Masalan, "o'qish" va "jamiyatlashish" Internet foydalanishining muhim motivatsiyalari sifatida taklif qilinadi (James va bosh. 1995). "Shaxsiy ishtirok" va "davom etadigan munosabatlar" Eighmey va McCord (1998) tomonidan internetdagi saytlarga munosabatni o'rganishda yangi motivatsiya elementlari sifatida aniqlangan.
ref: "Internet o'zida ommaviy hamda shaxslararo aloqa elementlarini mujassamlashtiradi. Internetning alohida xususiyatlari undan foydalanish hamda mamnun etuvchi yondashuv borasida qo'shimcha o'lchamlarga yetaklaydi. Misol uchun, ""ta'lim"" va ""ijtimoiylashuv"" internetdan foydalanish uchun muhim motivatsiyalar sifatida taklif qilinadi (Jeyms va boshqalar, 1995). Auditoriyaning vebsaytlarga munosabatini tadqiq qilganlarida, Eymey va Mak-Kord (1998) tomonidan ""shaxsiy ishtirok"" va ""davomiy munosabatlar"" ham motivatsiyaning yangi jihatlari deb topilgan."

src: Gothic style peaked in the period between the 10th - 11th centuries and the 14th century. At the beginning dress was heavily influenced by the Byzantine culture in the east. However, due to the slow communication channels, styles in the west could lag behind by 25 to 30 year. towards the end of the Middle Ages western Europe began to develop their own style. one of the biggest developments of the time as a result of the crusades people began to use buttons to fasten clothing.
mt: Gothik uslub 10-11-asrlar va 14-asrlar orasida cho'zilgan. Boshida libos Bizans madaniyatiga ta'sir qilgan. Biroq, tashqi aloqalar tufayli uslublar g'arbda 25 yoki 30 yilga to'xtab qolishi mumkin edi. o'rta asrlar oxirida g'arbda o'z uslubini rivojlantirish boshladi. Xochin urushi natijasida kiyim-kechakni biriktirish uchun tugmali ishlatish boshlandi.
ref: Gotik uslub 10–11-asrlar va 14-asr oralig'ida o'z cho'qqisiga chiqqan. Dastlab ko'ylakka sharqdagi Vizantiya madaniyati kuchli ta'sir ko'rsatdi. Ammo aloqa kanallarining sekinligi sababli g'arbdagi uslublar 25 yildan 30 yilgacha ortda qolgan bo'lishi mumkin. o'rta asrlarning oxiriga kelib g'arbiy Yevropa o'z uslubini yaratishni boshladi. Salb yurishlari natijasidagi o'sha vaqtdagi eng katta rivojlanishlardan biri, odamlar kiyimlarni mahkamlash uchun tugmalardan foydalana boshladilar.

src: We can start living more friendly to the environment, we can join to the environmental movement, and we can even be activists in order to reduce the future suffering in some degree. This is just like symptomatic treatment in many cases. However, if we do not only want a temporary solution, then we should find the root of the problems, and we should deactivate them. It is obvious enough that the world has changed much because of humankind's scientific and technological advancements, and problems have become greater because of overpopulation and mankind's extravagant lifestyle.
mt: Biz o'zimizga ekologik jihatdan yaxshi bo'lishimiz mumkin, ekologik harakatga qo'shilishimiz mumkin, va biz shu tariqa kelajakdagi boshqa xalqlarning qiyinchiliklarini kamaytirish uchun faol bo'lishimiz mumkin. Bu ko'pincha simptomatik davolashga o'xshaydi. Biroq, agar biz faqat o'zimiz uchun muvaffaqiyatli bo'lishni istasak, shubhali emas, biz muammolarning asosini topib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib, ularni faollashtirib
ref: Biz atrof-muhitga nisbatan yana do'stona hayot kechirishni boshlashimiz, atrof-muhitni himoya qilish harakatiga qo'shilishimiz hamda hattoki kelgusidagi azob-uqubatlarni muayyan darajada kamaytirish uchun faol bo'lishimiz ham mumkin. Bu ko'pincha xuddi simptomatik davolashga o'xshab ketadi. Lekin agar biz faqatgina vaqtinchalik yechimni xohlamasak, unda muammolarning ildizini topishimiz hamda ularni faolsizlantirishimiz lozim. Dunyoda insoniyatning ilmiy va texnikaviy yutuqlari tufayli katta o'zgarishlar yuz bergani va aholining haddan ortiq ko'payishi hamda insoniyatning isrofgar turmush tarzi sababli muammolarning yanada kattalashgani hammaga ayon.

src: The balance of power was a system in which European nations sought to maintain the national sovereignty of all European states. The concept was that all European nations had to seek to prevent one nation from becoming powerful, and thus national governments often changed their alliances in order to maintain the balance. The War of Spanish Succession marked the first war whose central issue was the balance of power. This marked an important change, as European powers would no longer have the pretext of being religious wars. Thus, the Thirty Years' War would be the last war to be labeled a religious war.
mt: Quyoshli kuchlarning muvozanati - Yevropa davlatlari o'zaro mustahkamlikni saqlash uchun Yevropa davlatlarining barcha davlatlari uchun milliy suverenitetga erishishga intilish tizimi edi. Tushuntirish shuni ko'rsatadiki, barcha Yevropa davlatlari bitta davlatdan kuchli bo'lishidan qochishga intayyor bo'lishlari kerak edi, shuning uchun milliy hukumatlar odatda muvozanatni saqlab qolish uchun o'z ittifoqlarini o'zgartirishlari kerak edi. Ispaniya meros urushi Yevropa kuchlari o'rtasidagi muvozanat muammosi bo'lgan birinchi urush bo'ldi. Bu muhim o'zgarishni ko'rsatdi, chunki Yevropa kuchlari diniy urushlarga qarama-qarshi hech qanday sababga ega bo'lmaganligi sababli, Yevropa urushlari diniy urushlarga etib bo'lmaydigan oxirgi urush bo'ldi.
ref: Kuchlar muvozanati Yevropa mamlakatlari barcha Yevropa davlatlarining milliy suverenitetini saqlashga harakat qilgan tizim edi. Konsepsiya Yevropaning barcha davlatlari bir davlatning qudratli bo'lishing oldini olishga intilishlaridan iborat edi va shu tarzda milliy hukumatlar muvozanatni saqlash maqsadida o'z ittifoqlarini tez-tez o'zgartirib turardilar. Ispaniya merosi uchun urush kuchlar muvozanati asosiy muammosi bo'lgan birinchi urushni belgilab berdi. Bu muhim o'zgarish bo'ldi, chunki Yevropaning qudratli davlatlari endi diniy urushni bahona qila olmas edi. Shu tarzda, diniy urush deb nomlangan o'ttiz yillik urush oxirgi urush bo'ldi.

src: During this period of European history, the Catholic Church, which had become rich and powerful, came under scrutiny. For over a thousand years the Christian religion had bound European states together despite differences in language and customs. I Its all-pervading power affected everyone from king to commoner. One of the main Christian tenets is that wealth should be used to alleviate suffering and poverty and that the monetary funds of the church are there specifically for that reason. The central authority of the church had been in Rome for over a thousand years and this concentration of power and money led many to question whether this tenet was being met.
mt: Bu davrda Yevropada katolik cherkovi, uning qimmatbaho va kuchli bo'lib qolganligi sababli, qizg'in bahs-munozaraga tushdi. Bir ming yildan ortiqroq vaqt davomida xristian dinining barcha yevropalik davlatlarni birlashtirib, uning til va an'analariga qaramaslikka qaramasdan birlashtirgan. Barcha xristian dinining asosiy tamoyillaridan biri shundaki, xalqqa yordam berish va qashshoqlikni bartaraf etish uchun mablag'larni ishlatish kerakligi. Cherkovning markaziy hokimiyati bir ming yildan ortiqroq vaqt davomida Rimda bo'lganligi sababli, bu kuch va mablag'l boshqa cherkovning tamoyillariga qaramasdan birlashtirganligi sababli, bu tamoyillar qanday qilib ta'qib qilinmaganligi haqida ko'plar shubha qilishgan.
ref: Yevropa tarixining mazkur davrida boylik va qudratga erishgan Katolik cherkovi qattiq tekshiruv ostida qoldi. Xristian dini til va urf-odatdagi farqlarga qaramasdan, Yevropa davlatlarini ming yillar davomida bir-biri bilan bog'lab kelgan. Uning keng qamrovli qudrati shohdan tortib, oddiy insongacha ta'sir qildi. Nasroniylikning asosiy tamoyillaridan biri, boylik azob-uqubatlar hamda qashshoqlikni yengillashtirish uchun kerak va cherkovning pul mablag'lari aynan ana shu maqsad yo'lida qo'llanishidir. Cherkovning markaziy hokimiyati ming yildan beri Rimda bo'lib kelmoqda, qudrat va mablag'ning bunday jamlanishi ko'pchilikni bu qoidaning bajarilayotgan yoki bajarilmayotganligini savol ostiga qo'yishiga olib keldi.

src: The terrified King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette their two young children (11 year old Marie Therese and four year old Louis-Charles) and the King's sister, Madam Elizabeth, on the 6th October 1789 were forced back to Paris from Versailles by a mob of market women. In a carriage, they traveled back to Paris surrounded by a mob of people screaming and shouting threats against the King and Queen. The mob of people forced the King And Queen to have their carriage windows wide open. At one point a member of the mob waved the head of a royal guard killed at Versailles in front of the terrified Queen.
mt: Qo'rqib qolgan Luiz XVI, Mari Antuanet, ularning ikki yosh bolasi (11 yoshli Mari Terese va 4 yoshli Luiz-Xarlz) va qirolichaning singlisi, Madam Elizabet, 6-oktyabr 1789-yilda Versaydan Parijga qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoqchilar tomonidan qo'rqoq
ref: Dahshatga tushgan qirol Lyudovik XVI, qirolicha Mari Antuanetta, ularning ikki nafar yosh farzandi (11 yoshli Mari Tereza hamda to'rt yoshli Lui-Charlz) hamda qirolning singlisi, Yelizaveta xonim, 1789-yilning 6-oktyabrida bozorchi ayollar olomoni tomonidan Versaldan Parijga majburan qaytarilgan. Ular aravada shoh va malikaga qarshi tahdidlarni aytib qichqirayotgan va baqirayotgan odamlar to'dasi bilan birgalikda Parijga qaytib keldilar. Olomon qirol va qirolichani o'z aravalarining derazalarini katta ochishga majbur qilishdi. Bir vaqt olomonning bir a'zosi Versalda qatl qilingan qirol tansoqchisining boshini dahshat og'ushidagi qirolichaning oldida silkidi.

src: Soon after the outbreak of hostilities, Britain initiated a naval blockade of Germany. The strategy proved effective, cutting off vital military and civilian supplies, although this blockade violated generally accepted international law codified by several international agreements of the past two centuries. Britain mined international waters to prevent any ships from entering entire sections of ocean, causing danger to even neutral ships. Since there was limited response to this tactic, Germany expected a similar response to its unrestricted submarine warfare.
mt: Urush boshlanishidan keyinroq Britaniya Germaniyaga dengiz blokadasini boshladi. Strategiya samarali, yirik harbiy va aholi uchun muhim tashishlarni to'xtatdi, bu esa o'z-o'zidan qabul qilingan xalqaro huquqni aks ettiruvchi bir nechtadan xalqaro kelishuvlarning ikki asrlik tarixi bilan belgilangan xalqaro qonunlarga zid edi. Britaniya o'zining barcha dengizlarni minlagan, shuning uchun boshqa barcha dengizlarni ham minlagan, shu tufayli boshqa barcha dengizlarni ham minlagan, shu tufayli boshqa barcha dengizlarni ham minlagan, shu tufayli boshqa barcha dengizlarni ham minlagan, shu tufayli boshqa barcha dengizlarni ham minlagan, shu tufayli boshqa barcha dengizlarni ham minlagan, shu tufayli boshqa barcha dengizlarni ham minlagan, shu tufayli boshqa barcha dengizlarni ham minlagan, shu tufayli boshqa barcha dengizlarni ham minlagan, shu tufayli boshqa barcha dengizlarni ham minlagan, shu tufayli boshqa barcha dengizlarni ham minlagan, shu tufayli boshqa barcha dengizlarni ham minlagan, shu tufayli boshqa barcha dengizlarni ham minlagan, shu tufayli boshqa barcha dengizlarni ham minlagan, shu tufayli boshqa barcha dengizlarni ham minlagan, shu tufayli boshqa barcha dengizlarni ham minlagan,
ref: Harbiy harakatlar xurujidan ko'p o'tmay, Britaniya Germaniyani dengizda blokada qilishni boshladi. Garchi ushbu blokada o'tgan ikki asrning bir nechta xalqaro shartnomalari bilan kodifikatsiya qilingan umumqabul qilingan xalqaro huquqni buzsa-da, strategiya samarali bo'ldi, u muhim harbiy va fuqarolik ta'minotini uzib qo'ydi. Britaniya hattoki neyral kemalarga ham xavf tug'dirib, har qanday kemaning butun okean qismlariga kirishining oldini olish maqsadida xalqaro suv hududlarini minalashtirdi. Mazkur taktikaga nisbatan cheklangan javob bo'lgani tufayli Germaniya o'zining cheklanmagan suvosti urushiga o'xshaydigan javob kutgandi.

src: Soon after the outbreak of hostilities, Britain initiated a naval blockade of Germany. The strategy proved effective, cutting off vital military and civilian supplies, although this blockade violated generally accepted international law codified by several international agreements of the past two centuries. Britain mined international waters to prevent any ships from entering entire sections of ocean, causing danger to even neutral ships. Since there was limited response to this tactic, Germany expected a similar response to its unrestricted submarine warfare.

src: Across the United States of America, there are approximately 400,000 known cases of Multiple Sclerosis (MS), leaving it as the leading neurological disease in younger and middle aged adults. MS is a disease that affects the central nervous system, which is made up of the brain, the spinal cord and the optic nerve. Research has found that females are two times more likely to have MS then males.
mt: Qo'shimcha qonunlar (MS) bilan og'rigan odamlarning soni AQShda taxminan 400 000 nafar bo'lib, bu o'smir va o'rtacha yoshdagi odamlar uchun eng katta nolgiyot tizimining kasalligi bo'lib, u tizimning markaziy nerv tizimini, ya'ni beyn, shaxsiy qavat va ko'z nervini o'z ichiga oladi. Olimlar ayollarning erkaklarga ikki marta ko'proq MS bilan og'rinishini topdilar.
ref: Butun Amerika Qo'shma Shtatlari bo'ylab taxminan 400 000 ta parishonxotirlik sklerozi (MS) holatlari ma'lum bo'lib, bu yoshroq va o'rta yoshdagi kattalar orasida yetakchi nevrologik kasallik bo'lib qolmoqda. MS — miya, orqa miya hamda optik asab tolalaridan iborat markaziy asab tizimiga ta'sir ko'rsatuvchi xastalikdir. Tadqiqotda ayollarning MS darajasini olish ehtimoli ikki marta balandligi aniqlandi.

src: The study found that depression, fear and catastrophising mediated the relationship between pain and disability in lower back pain sufferers. Only the effects of catastrophizing, not depression and fear was conditional of regular weekly structured PA sessions. Those participating in regular activity required more support in terms of negative perception of pain distinguishing the differences of chronic pain and discomfort feel from normal physical movement.

Tushkunlik va qo'rquv emas, faqatgina halokatlashtirishning ta'sirlari haftalik qilib tuzilgan muntazam PA seanslarining sharti edi. Domiy faoliyat ishtirokchilariga surunkali og'riqdagi farqlar va odatiy jismoniy harakatdan noqulaylik hissini ajratib turuvchi og'riqning salbiy qabul qilinishi nuqtai-nazaridan ko'proq ko'makni talab qilindi.

src: The modern sport of fencing is played at many levels, from students learning at a university to professional and Olympic competition. The sport is primarily played in a duel format, one fencer dueling another.

src: Internal poisoning may not be immediately apparent. Symptoms, such as vomiting are sufficiently general that an immediate diagnosis cannot be made. The best indication of internal poisoning may be the presence of an open container of medication or toxic household chemicals. Check the label for specific first aid instructions for that specific poison.
mt: Ichki zaharlanish ko'pincha o'zini ko'rsatmaydi. Belgilari, masalan, qaytish ko'p xil bo'lib, shaxsiy tashxis qilinmaydi. Aksariyat zaharlanishlarning eng yaxshi belgilari shu zaharlanishning ochiq qog'ozida yozilgan shaxsiy tibbiy yordam talab qiladigan zaharlanishlardir.
ref: Ichki zaharlanish darhol bilinmasligi mumkin. Qayt qilish kabi alomatlar darhol tashxis qo'yish mumkin bo'lmagan umumiy belgilardir. Dori vositasi yoki uyda foydalaniluvchi zaharli kimyoviy moddalarning ochiq idishda qolganligi ichki zaharlanishga yaxshi misol bo'lishi mumkin. Mazkur maxsus zahar uchun maxsus birinchi tibbiy yordam ko'rsatmalari yorlig'ini tekshiring.

src: To Check the victim, you must first survey the scene to ensure your safety. You need to notice the victim's position as you approach him or her and any automatic red flags. If you get hurt trying to help, you may only serve to make matters worse.
mt: Shaxsni tekshirish uchun, siz birinchi navbatda o'z xavfsizligini ta'minlash uchun joyni tekshirishingiz kerak. Siz shaxsni qo'ng'iroq qilishda uning pozitsiyasini aniqlash va avtomatik qizil bayroqlarni aniqlash kerak. Agar siz shaxsni yordam berishga urinib, og'rindisiz yaralanib qolishingiz mumkin, bu holatda boshqa narsalarga yomonroq bo'lishi mumkin.
ref: Qurbonni tekshirish uchun siz xavfsizligingizga ishonch hosil qilish maqsadida avval voqea sodir bo'lgan joyni o'rganishingiz kerak. Jabrlanuvchiga yaqinlashganingizda uning (erkak yoki ayol) holatini va har qanday avtomatik xavf alomatlarini payqashingiz kerak. Agar siz yordam berishga urinib jarohat olsangiz, vaziyatni yanada og'irlashtirish uchungina xizmat qilishingiz mumkin.

src: There are a lot of social and political effects such as the use of metric system, a shift from absolutism to republicanism, nationalism and the belief the country belongs to the people not to one sole ruler. Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed. Same goes for the military because instead of army rankings being based on class they were now based on cailaber. The French Revolution also inspired many other repressed working class people of other country's to began their own revolutions.
mt: Fransuz inqilobi jamiyat va siyosiy ta'sirlari kabi metrik tizimning qo'llanilishi, absolyutizmni respublikaga o'tish, millatchilik va mamlakat xalqqa tegishli emas, balki bitta yagona hukmdorga tegishli emasligi haqidagi insonparvarlik, shuningdek, inqilobdan keyin barcha erkaklarga ish olish imkoniyatlarini ochdi, bu esa eng ambitsionli va muvaffaqiyatli shaxslarni o'z ichiga oladi. Shuningdek, Fransuz inqilobi harbiy unvonlarning sinfga asoslanishiga qaramay, o'zgarishiga olib keldi. Fransuz inqilobi boshqa mamlakatlarning ishchilari orasida ham qo'llab-quvvatlandi.
ref: Metrik tizimni qo'llash, absolyutizmdan respublikachilikka o'tish, millatchilik va davlatning yakka hukmdorga emas, xalqqa tegishli ekani haqidagi aqida kabi ko'plab ijtimoiy va siyosiy ta'sirlar bor. Shuningdek, inqilobdan keyin kasblar barcha erkak nomzodlarga ochiq bo'lib, eng shuhratparast va omadlilarga muvaffaqiyat qozonish imkonini berardi. Bu harbiylarga ham taalluqli bo'lgan, chunki armiya reytingi sinflar bo'yicha emas, endi kaliberga asoslanadigan bo'ldi. Fransuz inqilobi boshqa mamlakatlarning zulm ostidagi boshqa ko'plab ishchi sinf vakillarini ham o'z inqiloblarini boshlashga ilhomlantirdi.

Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed. src: Everyone participates in society and uses transportation systems. Almost everyone complains about transportation systems. In developed countries you seldom hear similar levels of complaints about water quality or bridges falling down. Why do transportation systems engender such complaints, why do they fail on a daily basis? Are transportation engineers just incompetent? Or is something more fundamental going on?
mt: Jamiyatda barcha ishtirok etadi va transport tizimlaridan foydalanadi. Qo'shma Shtatlarda transport tizimlariga nisbatan shunday darajadagi shikoyatlar kamdan-kam uchraydi. Suv sifatiga nisbatan shunday darajadagi shikoyatlar yoki ko'priklar qulab tushishi kabi narsalarga nisbatan shunday darajadagi shikoyatlar. Transport tizimlari shikoyatlariga nisbatan shunday darajadagi shikoyatlar, transport muhandislari faqat qobiliyatsizmi? Yoki nima asosli sodir bo'layotgan?
ref: Har bir odam jamiyat ishtirokchisi bo'lib, transport tizimlarini qo'llaydi. Deyarli barcha odamlar transport tizimlaridan noliydilar. Taraqqiy etgan davlatlarda siz ichimlik suvining sifati yoki ko'priklarning buzilib tushishiga oid bu kabi shikoyatlarga kamdan-kam guvoh bo'lasiz. Nima uchun transport tizimlari bunday shikoyatlarni paydo qiladi, nima uchun ular har kuni xatolar qilishadi? Transport muhandislari shunchaki malakasizmi? Yoki yanada muhimroq nimadir bormi?

src: Traffic Flow is the study of the movement of individual drivers and vehicles between two points and the interactions they make with one another. Unfortunately, studying traffic flow is difficult because driver behavior cannot be predicted with one-hundred percent certainty. Fortunately, drivers tend to behave within a reasonably consistent range; thus, traffic streams tend to have some reasonable consistency and can be roughly represented mathematically. To better represent traffic flow, relationships have been established between the three main characteristics: (1) flow, (2) density, and (3) velocity. These relationships help in planning, design, and operations of roadway facilities.
mt: Traffic Flow - harakatni o'rganish - ikki nuqtadan boshlanib ketgan shaxslar va transport vositalarining harakati va ular o'rtasidagi aloqalarni o'rganish. Buning uchun boshqa narsa kerak emas. ref: Yo'l harakati oqimi – ikki nuqta orasidagi alohida haydovchilar hamda transport vositalarining harakatlari va ularning bir-birlariga nisbatan o'zaro aloqalarini o'rganishdir. Afsuski, qatnov oqimini o'rganish mashaqqatli, chunki haydovchining xatti-harakatlarini yuz foiz aniqlik bilan oldindan aytib bo'lmaydi. Yaxshiki, haydovchilar o'zini oqilona izchil doirada tutishga moyil; shu sababli qatnov oqimlari bir oz oqilona izchillikka ega va matematik jihatdan taxminan ifodalanishi mumkin. Tarfik oqimini yaxshiroq ifodalash uchun uch asosiy xususiyat orasida quyidagi aloqalar o'rnatildi: (1) oqim, (2) zichlik hamda (3) tezlik. Mazkur munosabatlar yo'l obyektlarini rejalashtirish, loyihalash hamda eksplutatsiya qilishga ko'maklashadi.

ref: Yo'l harakati oqimi – ikki nuqta orasidagi alohida haydovchilar hamda transport vositalarining harakatlari va ularning bir-birlariga nisbatan o'zaro aloqalarini o'rganishdir. Afsuski, qatnov oqimini o'rganish mashaqqatli, chunki haydovchining xatti-harakatlarini yuz foiz aniqlik bilan oldindan aytib bo'lmaydi. Yaxshiki, haydovchilar o'zini oqilona izchil doirada tutishga moyil; shu sababli qatnov oqimlari bir oz oqilona izchillikka ega va matematik jihatdan taxminan ifodalanishi mumkin. Tarfik oqimini yaxshiroq ifodalash uchun uch asosiy xususiyat orasida quyidagi aloqalar o'rnatildi: (1) oqim, (2) zichlik hamda (3) tezlik. Mazkur munosabatlar yo'l obyektlarini rejalashtirish, loyihalash hamda eksplutatsiya qilishga ko'maklashadi.

src: The Hershey and Chase experiment was one of the leading suggestions that DNA was a genetic material. Hershey and Chase used phages, or viruses, to implant their own DNA into a bacterium. They did two experiments marking either the DNA in the phage with a radioactive phosphorus or the protein of the phage with radioactive sulfur.
mt: Hershey va Chase tajribasi DNAning genetik material ekanligini isbotlashda birinchi o'rinlarni egalladi. Hershey va Chase faglar yoki viruslar orqali bakteriyaga o'z DNA-larini o'zlashtirishdi. Ularning ikkita tajribasi faglarning DNA-sini radioaktiv fosfor bilan yoki faglarning proteini radioaktiv surfla belgilashdi.
ref: DNK genetik material ekanligi Xershey va Cheyz tajribasining asosiy taxminlaridan biri edi. Xershi va Cheyz o'z DNKlarini bakteriyaga ko'chirib o'tkazish uchun faglar yoki viruslardan foydalangan. Ular ham fagdagi DNKni radioaktiv fosfor bilan, ham fagning oqsilini radioaktiv oltingugurt bilan belgilab olib, ikki eksperimentni amalga oshirdi.

src: Mutations can have a variety of different effects depending on the type of mutation, the significance of the piece of genetic material affected and whether the cells affected are germ-line cells. Only mutations in germ-line cells can be passed on to children, while mutations elsewhere can cause cell-death or cancer.
mt: Mutatsiyalar turli xil ta'sirlar tufayli o'zgarishi mumkin, bu mutatsiyalarning turi, o'zgarishga uchragan genetik materialning ahamiyati va mutatsiyalangan hujayralarning germ-lin hujayralariga kirishi mumkin emas. Boshqa joylarda mutatsiyalar hujayra o'limiga yoki saratonga olib kelishi mumkin.
ref: Mutatsiyalar mutatsiya turi, ta'sirlangan genetik material bo'lagining ahamiyati va ta'sirlangan hujayralar jinsiy hujayralar ekani yoki yo'qligiga qarab turli xil ta'sirga ega bo'lishi mumkin. Faqatgina jinsiy hujayralardagi mutatsiyalar bolalarga o'tishi mumkin, boshqa har qanday yerdagi mutatsiyalar hujayraning nobud bo'lishi yoki saratonga sabab bo'lishi mumkin.

src: Goats seem to have been first domesticated roughly 10,000 years ago in the Zagros Mountains of Iran. Ancient cultures and tribes began to keep them for easy access to milk, hair, meat, and skins. Domestic goats were generally kept in herds that wandered on hills or other grazing areas, often tended by goatherds who were frequently children or adolescents, similar to the more widely known shepherd. These methods of herding are still used today.
mt: Qo'ylar taxminan 10 000 yil oldin Eronning Zagros tog'larida birinchi marta o'zlashtirilgan. Qadimiy madaniyatlar va qabilalar ularni sut, teri, go'sht va terilardan o'z foydalarini olish uchun saqlashni boshladilar. Domlanmagan qo'ylar asosan tog'larda yoki boshqa o't o'chirish maydonlarida yurib kelgan bo'lib, ularni boshqarishda go'ndiruvchilar ko'pincha bolalar yoki o'smirlar bo'lgan, bu esa go'ndiruvchilar bilan bir xil bo'lgan. Bu usullar bugun ham qo'llanilmoqda.
ref: Echkilar ilk bor 10 ming yilcha avval Eronning Zagros tog'larida qo'lga o'rgatilgan ko'rinadi. Qadimgi madaniyatlar hamda qabilalar ularni sut, jun, go'sht va terilardan oson qo'lga kiritish maqsadida saqlay boshlaganlar. Xonaki echkilar odatda tepaliklar yoki boshqa boqish joylarida o'tlab yuradigan podalarda saqlanardi, ular ko'p hollarda ommaga yaxshiroq tanish bo'lgan cho'ponga o'xshash echkiboqarlar tomonidan boqilgan va ular ko'pincha bolalar yoki o'smirlar bo'lgan. Chorvachilikning mazkur usullaridan bugungi kunda ham foydalaniladi.

src: Golf is a game in which players use clubs to hit balls into holes. Eighteen holes are played during a regular round, with players usually starting on the first hole on the course and finishing on the eighteenth. The player who takes the fewest strokes, or swings of the club, to complete the course wins. The game is played on grass, and the grass around the hole is mown shorter and called the green.
mt: Golf - bu o'yinchilar to'plarini tayoq bilan urish orqali o'ynaydigan o'yin. O'yin davomida o'n oltita o'rin o'ynaladi, o'yinchilar odatda kursning birinchi o'rinidan boshlanib, o'n oltinchi o'rinida tugaydi. O'yinchi o'ynagan kursda eng kam urish, yoki tayoqni qo'yish bilan g'alaba qozonadi. O'yin o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir o'tkir
ref: Golf — bu o'yinchilar koptoklarni urib, chuqurchalarga tushirish uchun klyushkalardan foydalanadigan o'yindir. Odatiy raund davomida o'n sakkizta chuqurcha o'ynaladi, o'yinchilar odatda yo'lakdagi birinchi chuqurchadan boshlashadi va o'n sakkizinchisida tugatishadi. Bosqichni yakunlash uchun eng kam chavgon zarbalari yoxud tebranishlaridan foydalangan o'yinchi g'alaba qiladi. o'yin o't ustida o'ynaladi va chuqurcha atrofidagi o'tlar qisqaroq qilib o'rilib, yashil deb nom beriladi.
