src: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river. The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide. A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon. The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.
mt: Amazon daryosi - Yerda ikkinchi eng uzun va eng yirik daryo. Uning suv oqimi ikkinchi eng yirik daryodan 8 marta ko'p. Amazon daryosi - Yerda eng keng daryo, ba'zida 6 milya keng. Amazon daryosidan tashqariga chiqadigan suvning 20 foizi Yer tashqarisidagi daryolardan o'tadi. Amazon daryosining asosiy qismi 6,387 km (3,980 milya) ga teng. Uning suvini minglab kichikroq daryolardan to'playdi.
ref: Amazonka yer yuzidagi eng katta va ikkinchi eng uzun daryodir. U ikkinchi eng katta daryodan 8 karra ko'proq suv tashiydi. Shuningdek, Amazonka Yer yuzidagi eng keng daryo bo'lib, kengligi ba'zi joylarda olti milga yetadi. Sayyora daryolaridan okeanlarga quyiladigan suvning to'liq 20 foizi Amazonka daryosidan keladi. Asosiy Amazonka daryosi — 6387 km (3980 mil). U minglab kichikroq daryolardan suv to'playdi.

The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.

Amazon daryosidan tashqariga chiqadigan suvning 20 foizi Yer tashqarisidagi daryolardan o'tadi. Amazon daryosining asosiy qismi 6,387 km (3,980 milya) ga teng. Uning suvini minglab kichikroq daryolardan to'playdi.
ref: Amazonka yer yuzidagi eng katta va ikkinchi eng uzun daryodir. U ikkinchi eng katta daryodan 8 karra ko'proq suv tashiydi. Shuningdek, Amazonka Yer yuzidagi eng keng daryo bo'lib, kengligi ba'zi joylarda olti milga yetadi. Sayyora daryolaridan okeanlarga quyiladigan suvning to'liq 20 foizi Amazonka daryosidan keladi. Asosiy Amazonka daryosi — 6387 km (3980 mil). U minglab kichikroq daryolardan suv to'playdi.

src: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture. An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.
mt: Venesuelaliklarning 18 foizi ishsiz, ularning aksariyati xususiy sektorda ishlaydi. Ikki yarmi xizmat sektorida ishlaydi, qariyb yarmi sanoatda ishlaydi va besh foizi qishloq xo'jaligida ishlaydi. Venesuelaliklarning muhim sanoati neft bo'lib, u mamlakatda net eksportchi bo'lib, bu esa neft sanoatida ishlaydiganlarning bir foizini tashkil etadi.
ref: Venesuelaliklarning o'n sakkiz foizi ishsiz bo'lib, ish bilan ta'minlanganlarning ko'pchiligi norasmiy iqtisodda ishlaydi. Ishlaydigan venesuelaliklarning uchdan ikki qismi xizmat ko'rsatish sohasida mehnat qiladi, deyarli chorak qismi sanoatda va beshdan bir qismi qishloq xo'jaligida ishlaydi. Venesuelaliklar uchun muhim sanoat bu mamlakat sof eksportchi bo'lgan neft sanoatidir, garchi neft sanoatida aholining faqat bir foizi ishlasa ham.

src: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements. Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way. This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.
mt: Yulduzlar o'z energiyasini hosil qilish uchun hidrogenni birlashtirish (yoki aralashtirish) orqali yorug'lik va issiqlik chiqaradi. Ilmiyotashuvchilar o'z energiyasini shunday hosil qilish uchun reaktor yaratishga ishlayotganlar. Biroq, bu muammoni hal qilish juda qiyin masala bo'lib, bizga foydali aralashish reaktorlarini qurishdan oldin ko'p yillar kerak bo'ladi.
ref: Yulduzlar og'irroq elementlarni hosil qilish uchun vodorod atomlari bir-birlariga birlashganida (yoki yopishganida) energiya hosil bo'lishi tufayli yorug'lik va issiqlik beradi. Olimlar xuddi shu usulda energiya ishlab chiqara oladigan reaktor yaratish bo'yicha ish olib bormoqdalar. Lekin bu yechimi qiyin bo'lgan muammo va biz foydali termoyadroviy reaktorlarni ko'rishimiz uchun ko'p yillar bor.

src: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same. Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.
mt: Element va birikmalar bir holni boshqasiga o'tirsa, xususiyatlarini o'zgartirmaydi. G'azol shaklidagi azotning o'z xususiyatlarini suyuq azotda saqlab qoladi. Suyuq holida zichroq bo'lsa-da, molekulalari o'zgarmaydi. Suv ham shunday. Suv ikkita hidrogen atomidan va bir oksigen atomidan iborat. Ushbu kimyoviy tuzilishda g'azol, suyuq yoki qattiq holatda bo'lsa ham, kimyoviy holat o'zgarmaydi. Biroq, fiziki holat o'zgargan bo'lsa-da, kimyoviy holat o'zgarmaydi.
ref: Element va birikmalar o'zgarmay bir holatdan ikkinchisiga o'tishi mumkin. Gaz va suyuq shaklidagi azot bir xil xususiyatlarga ega. Suyuq holatdagi azot zichroq bo'lishiga qaramay bari bir molekulalari bir xil. Suv yana bir misoldir. Murakkab suv ikkita vodorod atomi va bitta kislorod atomidan tashkil topadi. U gaz, suyuqlik yoxud qattiq jism bo'lishidan qat'i nazar, molekulyar tuzilishi bir xil. Garchi uning fizik holati o'zgarishi mumkin, shunga qaramay, kimyoviy holati shundayligicha qoladi.

src: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation. Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts. It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states. The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.
mt: Qarshilik urushida uchtizlik davlatlar birinchi marta kuchli markaziy hukumatga ega bo'lib, uning yagona komponenti Kongress bo'lgan Konfederatsiya Statlari to'g'risidagi bitimlarga muvofiq tashkil etilgan. Kongress o'z qonunlarini amalga oshirish uchun davlat hokimiyatlariga ishonchli bo'lib, ular ko'pincha unchalik ham yordam bermagan. Ushbu bitimlarga ko'ra, barcha davlatlarning qo'llab-quvvatlashi shart bo'lgan bitimlarni o'zgartirish mumkin edi. Davlatlar markaziy hukumatni o'ziga xos qilib ko'rishdi va ularning vakillari ko'pincha yo'q edi.
ref: Inqilobiy urush davomida o'n uchta shtat dastlab Konfederatsiya qoidalari muvofiq Kongress uning bir qismi bo'lgan kuchsiz markaziy hukumatni tuzdilar. Kongressda soliqlar solish vakolati yo'q va milliy ijroiya va sud hokimiyati bo'lmagani tufayli barcha hujjatlarni ijro etishda ko'p hollarda hamkorlikka xushi yo'q davlat organlariga tayanardi. Shu bilan birga, u shtatlar o'rtasidagi soliq qonunlari hamda tariflarini bekor qilish vakolatiga ega emas edi. Moddalarga tuzatishlar kiritish hamma shtatlarning bir ovozdan roziligini talab etardi hamda shtatlar markaziy hukumatni shunchalik yengil qabul qildilardiki, natijada ularning vakillari ko'p hollarda yo'q bo'lardi.

src: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."
mt: "Agar siz National Treasure filmini ko'rgan bo'lsangiz, sizga qonuniylik deklaratsiyasining orqasida qazilganlik xaritasini yozishganligi haqida fikr qilishingiz mumkin. Biroq, bu to'g'ri emas. Biroq, deklaratsiyada yozilgan narsa qazilganlik xaritasiga o'xshamaydi. Qonuniylik deklaratsiyasining orqasida yozilgan so'zlar ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"" (Qonuniylik deklaratsiyasining asl nusxasi 4-iyul 1776) edi. Yozuvlar deklaratsiyaning pastida, teskari qilib yozilgan. Ushbu yozuvning kim tomonidan yozilganini bilishimiz mumkin emas, lekin uning birinchi davrida, yirik parcham deklaratsiyasi (u 29¾ dyuym 24½ dyuym o'lchamdagi) saqlash uchun qo'ltiqga solingan. Shuning uchun, yozuvni qo'lda belgilash mumkinligi haqida ma'lumotlar bor."
ref: """Milliy xazina"" filmini ko'rgan bo'lsangiz, Mustaqillik deklaratsiyasining orqasiga xazina xaritasi tushirilgan deb o'ylashingiz mumkin. Lekin, bu to'g'ri emas. Hujjat orqasida nimadir yozilgan bo'lishiga qaramay, u xazinaning xaritasi emas. Mustaqillik Deklaratsiyasi orqasida ""1776-yil 4-iyuldagi Mustaqillik Deklaratsiyasining asl nusxasi"" so'zlari yozilgan. Ushbu matnni hujjatning pastki qismida teskari tarzda ko'rish mumkin. Uni kim yozganini hech kim aniq bilmasa-da, o'z hayotining boshida, katta pergament hujjat (uning o'lchami 29¾ duymga 24½ duym) saqlash uchun o'rab qo'yilgan. Demak, hoynahoy bu yozuv shunchaki yorliq sifatida qo'shilgan."

src: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.
mt: Yuragi mustaqillik davrida, Singapur Botanik bog'i ekspertligi orqali orolni tropik bog'ga aylantirishga yordam berdi. 1981-yilda Vanda Miss Joaquim, bir gulli o'simlik, mamlakatning milliy guli sifatida tanlandi.
ref: Davlat mustaqilligining ilk kunlarida Singapur Botanika bog'i ekspertlari orolni tropik bog' shaharga aylantirishga ko'maklashdilar. 1981-yili orxideya gibridi bo'lgan Vanda Miss Joakim xalqning milliy guli sifatida tanlab olindi.

src: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.

ref: Toshdan piramida qurish Qadimgi qirollikning oxirigacha davom etganligiga qaramasdan, ular Giza piramidalaridan o'zlarining o'lchamlari va qurilishdagi texnik afzalliklari jihatidan hech qachon ustun bo'lmagan. Yangi Qirollikdagi qadimiy misrliklar ajdodlarining o'sha vaqtda ming yoshdan oshgan yodgorliklaridan hayratda qolgan.

src: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
mt: Har yili oktyabrda qirg'inlarning yillik sayohatini boshlaydi. Oktabrda shimoldan janubga qirg'inlarning yillik sayohatini boshlaydi. Qirg'inlar Serengeti milliy bog'ini, Ngorongoro qo'riq maydonini va Maswa qo'riq maydonini, Tanzaniyada va Maasai Mara milliy qo'riq maydonini, Keniyada o'tkazadi.
ref: Har yili oktyabr atrofida qariyb 1,5 million o'txo'r hayvonlar yomg'ir uchun shimoliy tepaliklardan Mara daryosini kechib o'tib, janubiy tekisliklar tomon safar qiladi. Va keyin aprel oyidagi yomg'irdan so'ng g'arb orqali, yana Mara daryosini kesib o'tib, shimolga qaytiladi. Serengeti mintaqasii Tanzaniyadagi Serengeti Milliy bog'i, Ngorongoro qo'riqxona hududi hamda Masva Game qo'riqxonasi va Kenyadagi Maasai Mara Milliy qo'riqxonasini qamrab oladi.

src: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.
mt: Fransiyani zabt etish uchun janglar tugaganidan so'ng, Germaniya Buyuk Britaniyani bosib olishni tayyorlashga kirishdi. Germaniya hujumi "Sealion" deb nomlandi. Britaniya armiyasining og'ir qurollari va tashqi yuklari Dunkirkdan chiqib ketganida yo'qolgan edi, shuning uchun armiya juda zaif edi. ref: "Fransiya uchun kurash tugashi bilanoq, Germaniya Britaniya orolini bosib olishga tayyorgarlikni boshladi. Germaniya hujumga ""Dengiz sheri operatsiyasi"" degan shartli nom berdi. Britaniya armiyasining aksariyat og'ir qurollari va zaxiralari Dyunkerkdan evakuatsiya qilinishda yo'qotilgandi, shu sababli armiya g'oyat zaif edi. Biroq Qirollik harbiy-dengiz floti hali ham Germaniya harbiy-dengiz flotiga (""Kriegsmarine"") qaraganda ancha kuchliroq edi va La-Mansh bo'ylab yuborilgan har qanday istilo flotini yanchib tashlay olar edi. Lekin qirollik dengiz flotining oz sonli kemalari ehtimoliy hujum yo'nalishlarida joylashtirilgan edi, chunki admirallar nemis havo hujumi natijasida cho'kib ketishdan qo'rqardi."

src: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.
mt: Fransiyani zabt etish uchun janglar tugaganidan so'ng, Germaniya Buyuk Britaniyani bosib olishni tayyorlashga kirishdi. Germaniya hujumi "Sealion" deb nomlandi. Britaniya armiyasining og'ir qurollari va tashqi yuklari Dunkirkdan chiqib ketganida yo'qolgan edi, shuning uchun armiya juda zaif edi. Biroq, Britaniya dengiz floti ("Royal Navy") Germaniya dengiz floti ("Kriegsmarine")ga nisbatan juda kuchli edi va dengiz floti Germaniya dengiz floti tomonidan o'qqa tashlangan kanal orqali yurish qilganlikka qaramay, Britaniya dengiz floti kemalari dengizda bo'lishi kerak edi. ref: "Fransiya uchun kurash tugashi bilanoq, Germaniya Britaniya orolini bosib olishga tayyorgarlikni boshladi. Germaniya hujumga ""Dengiz sheri operatsiyasi"" degan shartli nom berdi. src: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."
mt: "Boshlang'ichda Italiyaning rejalari haqida izoh beramiz. Italiya asosan Germaniya va Yaponiya kabi bo'lib, o'z armiyasi va dengiz floti kuchlari bilan o'ziga xos bo'lgan. Ular urush boshlanishidan oldin to'rtta yangi kemani qurishgan. Italiyaning asosiy maqsadlari Afrikadagi davlatlarni egallash edi. Ushbu davlatlarni egallash uchun, askarlarni qo'ng'iroqqa chiqarish uchun, ular Afrika qirg'oqchasiga qo'nishi kerak edi. Ushbu maqsad uchun, ular Misrda Britaniya bazalarini va kemalarni yo'q qilishlari kerak edi. Shuningdek, Yaponiyaning jangovar kemalari boshqa harakatlar qilmasligi kerak edi."
ref: "Keling, Italiyaning rejalarini anglashdan boshlaymiz. Xususan, Italiya Germaniya va Yaponiyaning ""kichik ukasi"" edi. Ular shundoqqina urush boshlanishidan oldin to'rtta yangi kema qurishgan bo'lsa-da, kuchsizroq armiya va kuchsizroq dengiz flotiga ega edi. Italiyaning bosh maqsadlari Afrika davlatlari edi. Mazkur mamlakatlarni qoʻlga kiritish uchun ularga harbiy platsdarm kerak bo'lardi, shunda qo'shinlar o'rta yer dengizi bo'ylab suzib o'tib, Afrikani bosib olishlari mumkin edi. Buning uchun ular Misrdagi Britaniya bazalari hamda kemalaridan qutilishlari lozim edi. Bu harakatlardan tashqari, Italiya jangovar kemalari boshqa hech narsa qilmasligi lozim edi. Endi Yaponiya uchun. Yaponiya xuddi Britaniya kabi orol-davlat edi."

src: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."
mt: 1940-yil 6-iyun kuni Britaniya, AQSH va Fransiya qo'shinlari Normandiya sohilida nemis qo'shinlariga hujum qilishdi. Bu hujumga D-Day nomi berildi. D-Day so'zi ingliz tilida "kun" degan ma'noni anglatadi. D-Day so'zi shuningdek, harbiy operatsiyalarga ham tegishli bo'lib, bu operatsiyalarga qo'shni qo'shinlarga hujum qilishda ishlatiladi. ref: "D-kuni operatsiyasidagi qo'shinlarning tushirilishi va keyingi janglar Fransiya shimolini ozod etgan bo'lsa-da, janub hali ham ozod emas edi. U ""Vichi"" fransuzlar tomonidan boshqarilgan. Bular 1940-yili nemislar bilan tinchlik o'rnatgan va bosqinchilarga qarshi kurashish o'rniga, ular bilan birga ishlagan fransuzlar edi. 1940-yilning 15-avgustida Ittifoqchilar Janubiy Fransiyaga bostirib kirdi, bu bosqin ""Ajdar operatsiyasi"" deb atalgan. Atigi ikki hafta ichida amerikaliklar va Ozod fransuzlar kuchlari janubiy Fransiyani ozod qildi hamda Germaniya tomonga yo'naldi."

src: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.
mt: Submarinerlar suv ostida sayohat qilish uchun mo'ljallangan kemalardir, ular uzoq muddatli sayohat uchun suv ostida qolishlari mumkin. Submarinerlar Birinchi jahon urushi va Ikkinchi jahon urushida qo'llanilgan. Ushbu davrlarda ular juda yaviroq va juda cheklangan atrofda o'q otish qobiliyatiga ega bo'lgan. Birinchi jahon urushida ular asosan dengiz ustida sayohat qilishgan, ammo radar boshlanishi va uning to'g'risidagi to'g'risi kelishi bilan ular suv ostida qolishlari kerak bo'lgan. Germaniya submarinerlari U-Boats deb nomlangan. Germaniyaliklar suv ostida sayohat qilish va submarinerlarni boshqarishda juda yaxshi bo'lgan. Submarinerlarning muvaffaqiyatiga ko'ra, urushdan keyin Germaniyaliklarga juda kam submarinerlar berilishi kerak.
ref: Suvosti kemalari suv ostida yurish va u yerda uzoq muddat qolishga mo'ljallangan kemalardir. Birinchi jahon urushi va Ikkinchi jahon urushida suvosti kemalaridan foydalanilgan. o'sha vaqtlarda ular juda sekin bo'lib, o't ochish masofasi juda cheklangan edi. Urushning boshida ular asosan dengiz yuzasida safar qilar edi, lekin radarlar takomillashib, aniqroq bo'la boshlagani sayin, suvosti kemalari ko'zga tashlanmaslik uchun suv ostiga shong'ishga majbur bo'lgan. Nemis suvosti kemalari U-Boats deb atalgan. Nemislar suvosti kemalarida suzish va ularni boshqarishga juda usta bo'lishgan. Suvosti kemalari bilan muvaffaqiyat qozonganliklari sababli urushdan so'ng nemislar ularning ko'pchiligiga ega deb ishonilmaydi.

src: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.
mt: 1939-yil 17-sentabrda Polsha mudofaa qulab tushib ketgan edi, va yagona umid bu qaytish va Ruminiya qirg'ichida qayta tashkil etish edi. Biroq, bu planlar bir kechagi 800 000 kishilik Sovet Ittifoqi Qizil Armiyasi kuchlari tomonidan Belorussiya va Ukraina frontlari yaratilgunga qadar buzib tashlangan edi, bu esa Riga tinchlik shartnomasi, Sovet-Polsha qo'rqoq shartnomasi va boshqa xalqaro shartnomalarga, ikki tomonlama va bir tomonali shartnomalarga qarshi Polsha sharqiy hududlarini bosib olib chiqdi.
ref: 1939-yil 17-sentabrga kelib, Polsha mudofaasi allaqachon parchalangan va yagona umid orqaga chekinish hamda Ruminiya platsdarmi bo'ylab qayta shakllanish edi. Lekin Sovet Ittifoqi qizil armiyasining 800 000 dan ortiq askarlari Riga tinchlik shartnomasi, Tajovuz qilmaslik to'g'risidagi Sovet-Polsha pakti hamda boshqa ikki tomonlama va ko'p tomonlama shartnomalarni buzgan holda Polshaning sharqiy hududlarini bosib olgandan so'ng Belorussiya va Ukrainaga kirishi hamda frontlar yaratganida mazkur rejalar deyarli bir kechaga eskirgandi.

src: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.
mt: Italiyaliklarning Shimoliy Afrikadagi voqealari 1940-yil 10-iyun kuni Italiya urush e'lon qilganidan bir hafta o'tib boshlandi. 11-Hussar britaniyaliklari 1940-yil 17-iyun kuni Liviya Fort Capuzzo'ni egalladi. 1940-yil 19-iyun kuni Bardiya sharsharasida Italiya O'smanti armiyasining muhandis boshlig'i general Lastucci britaniyaliklarga asir olingan. 1940-yil 28-iyun kuni Italiya mustamlakachisi Liviya gubernatori va Mussolini vorisi sifatida ko'rinadigan Italo Balbo Tobrukga qo'nish paytida do'stlik o'tqazib, o'ldirildi.
ref: Shimoliy Amerikada italiyaliklarning ishlari deyarli boshidanoq o'ngidan kelmadi. 1940-yilning 10-iyunida Italiya urush e'lon qilgandan bir hafta o'tib, Britaniyaning 11-gussarlar polki Liviyadagi Kapuzzo qal'asini qo'lga oldi. Bardiya sharqidagi pistirmada britaniyaliklar italyanlarning o'ninchi armiyasi bosh muhandisi Genaral Lastuchchini qo'lga oldi. 28-iyun kuni Liviya general-gubernatori va Mussolinining mo'ljaldagi vorisi — marshal Italo Balbo Tobrukka qo'nish paytida o'z tarafdorlarining yanglish o't ochishi natijasida halok bo'ldi.

Bardiya sharqidagi pistirmada britaniyaliklar italyanlarning o'ninchi armiyasi bosh muhandisi Genaral Lastuchchini qo'lga oldi. 28-iyun kuni Liviya general-gubernatori va Mussolinining mo'ljaldagi vorisi — marshal Italo Balbo Tobrukka qo'nish paytida o'z tarafdorlarining yanglish o't ochishi natijasida halok bo'ldi.

src: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.
mt: Buttalar buddizmida Budda o'qitvchiligi asosida qurilgan, ammo mahayana yo'li yurish va hind yoganing ko'plab texnikalari bilan kengaytirilgan. Buttar buddizmining asosiy prinsiplari juda oddiy. U Kundalini yoga, meditatsiya va sevgi yo'li bilan to'ldirilgan. Kundalini yoga orqali Kundalini energiyasi (xayoliy energiya) yogalar, nafas o'tkazish usullari, mantralar va vizualizatsiyalar orqali o'chiriladi. Buttar meditatsiyasining markazi Deity Yoga. Turli xil xudolarni vizualizatsiya qilish orqali energiya kanalari tozalanadi, chakralar faollashtiriladi va xayoliy tushuncha yaratiladi.
ref: Tibet buddizmi Budda ta'limotlariga asoslanadi, lekin muhabbatning mahayana yo'li bilan va hind yogasining ko'plab uslublari bilan kengaytirilgan. Aslini olganda, Tibet buddizmi juda jo'n. U Kundalini yoga, meditatsiya va barcha narsani qamrovchi muhabbat yo'lidan iborat. Kundalini Yoga bilan Kundalini quvvati (ma'rifat quvvati) yoga pozalari, nafas mashqlari, mantralar hamda vizualizatsiyalar yordamida uyg'otiladi. Tibet meditatsiyasining markazi ilohiy yoga hisoblanadi. Turli ilohlarni vizualizatsiya qilish orqali energiya kanallari tozalanadi, chakralar faollashtiriladi va ma'lifatli ong yaratiladi.

src: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
mt: Program 8:30 p.m. (15.00 UTC) da boshlandi. Mamlakatdagi mashhur qo'shiqlar Shri Shyamga qo'shiq aytishdi. Sanju Sharma tashrif buyurdi, keyinroq Jai Shankar Choudhary tashrif buyurdi. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal uning yordamchisi edi. So'ng, Lakkha Singh tashrif buyurdi. 108 ta Chhappan Bhog (Hinduizmga ko'ra, 56 nafar oziq-ovqat, masalan, shirinliklar, mevalar, yong'ochlar, taomlar va boshqalar, ulardan bittasi deyitga takdim qilinadi) Baba Shyamga takdim qilindi. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal uning yordamchisi edi.
ref: Dastur mahalliy vaqt bilan 8:30 (TK) da (15:00 UTC) boshlandi. Mamlakat bo'ylab mashhur xonandalar Shri Shyamga bag'ishlab qo'shiqlar, bhajanlar namoyish etishdi. Kechani xonanda Sanju Sharma boshlab berdi, ortidan Jay Shankar Choudxari chiqdi. Chhappan bhog bhajan'ni ham taqdim etdi. Xonanda Raju Xandelval unga jo'r bo'layotgandi. So'ng Lakka Singx bhajanlarni kuylashda yetakchilik o'z qo'liga oldi. Baba Shyamga 108 likop Chappan Bog (hinduizmda 56 turdagi yeguliklar, masalan, tangriga taklif etiluvchi shirinliklar, mevalar, yong'oqlar, ovqatlar va h.k.) berildi. Lakkxa Singx chappan bhog bhajanni ham taqdim etdi. Qo'shiqchi Raju Xandelval unga jo'r bo'ldi.

src: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."
mt: "Tayyorlik marosimlari dunyodagi mashhur guruh Cirque du Soleil tomonidan o'tkazilgan maxsus ko'rgazmali shou bilan boshlandi. Keyin Istanbul Davlat Simfonik Orkestri, Yannisari guruh va qo'shiqchilar Fatih Erkoç va Müslüm Gürses kabi guruhlar chiqish qilishdi. Keyin turk divasi Sezen Aksu va italyan tenor Alessandro Safina va yunon qo'shiqchisi Haris Alexiou bilan chiqish qilishdi. Turkiya raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, turk raqs guruhiga qaraganda, tur
ref: "Bayram tantanalari dunyoga mashhur Cirque du Soleil guruhining maxsus shoui bilan boshlandi. Undan so'ng Istanbul Davlat Simfoniya Orkestri, Yanissar guruhi hamda qo'shiqchilar Fotih Erkoch va Muslum Gurseslar davom ettirishdi. Keyin Wherling Dervishes sahnaga chiqdi. Turk primadonnasi Sezen Aksu italyan tenori Alessandro Safina va yunon xonandasi Haris Aleksiu bilan birga ijro etdi. Yakunlash uchun Turkiyaning ""Fire of Anatolia"" raqs guruhi ""Troya"" shousini namoyish qildi."

src: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""
mt: “Bemorlar 90(F)-darajadagi issiqda suv berildi. O't o'chirish boshlig'i Scott Kouns shunday dedi, “Bu Santa Klara da 90 darajadagi issiqda bo'lgan. Barcha uzunlikdagi tebrizda qolish juda qiyin bo'lib, shuning uchun birinchi odamni tebrizdan chiqarishda kamida bir soat kerak bo'lgan”.
ref: "Yo'lovchilarga suv berildi, chunki ular 90 (F) daraja issiqda kutayotgan edi. O't o'chirish xizmati kapitani Skot Kouns: ""Santa Klarada kun issiq bo'ldi, harorat 90 daraja atrofida edi"", dedi. ""Amerika tepaliklari atrraksionida qolib ketganda o'tkazilgan har qanday vaqt juda noqulay va birinchi odamning tushishi uchun kamida bir soat vaqt ketgan""."

src: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
mt: Eng so'nggi xabarda dengiz sath o'lchamlari tsunamin ishlab chiqarilganini ko'rsatdi. Pago Pago va Niue yaqinida tsunamining bir qancha ishlari qayd etildi. Tongada katta zarar yoki jarohatlar haqida xabar berilmadi, ammo elektr energiyasi bir necha soatga yo'qolgan, bu Tonga hukumatiga PTWC tomonidan chiqarilgan tsunamining xabari qabul qilishiga to'siq bo'lgan. Hawaii shtatidagi 14 maktab, shu jumladan dengiz bo'yidagi maktablar kuzatuvlari tufayli kunning boshida yopildi.
ref: So'ngi byulletenga ko'ra, dengiz sathi ko'rsatkichlari sunami vujudga kelganiga ishora qildi. Pago Pago va Niue yaqinida shubhasiz sunami harakati qayd etilgan. Tongada katta zarar yoki jarohatlar qayd qilinmagan, lekin elektr energiyasi vaqtincha uzilgan va bu Tonga hukumatiga PTWC tomonidan berilgan sunami ogohlantirishini qabul qilishga xalal bergani xabar qilinmoqda. Gavayidagi sohil bo'yi yoxud uning yaqinida joylashgan o'n to'rt maktabning barchasi ogohlantirishlar bekor qilinganligiga qaramasdan, chorshanba kuni yopildi.

src: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
mt: Jonni Reid, A1GP Yangi Zelandiya jamoasining boshqaruvchisi, bugun tarixga yozilgan eng tezlikni o'z ichiga olgan 48 yoshli Aukland daryosi ko'prikini o'z ichiga olgan Yangi Zelandiyada qilgan. Mr Reid 160km/h dan oshgan tezlikda yedi marta ko'prikni o'tkazdi. Yangi Zelandiya politsiyasi Black Beauty tashqi ko'rinishi tufayli tezlikni o'lchash uchun ulkan tezlik radarini qo'llab- qo'ymagan. Politsiya Mr Reidni 160km/h tezlikda o'tkazganda faqat bir marta o'lchagan.
ref: "A1GP Yangi Zelandiya jamoasining ikkinchi haydovchisi Joni Rid Yangi Zelandiyadagi qurilganiga 48 yil bo'lgan Oklend ko'rfazi ko'prigidan qonuniy asosda eng katta tezlikda harakatlanish orqali bugun tarixga kirdi. Janob Rid Yangi Zelandiyaning A1GP Black Beauty avtomobilini ko'prik ustidan yetti marta 160 km/soat tezlikda haydab o'tishni uddaladi. ""Black Beauty"" avtomobilining past ekanligi tufayli Yangi Zelandiya politsiyasi janob Ridning qanchalik tez yurganligini aniqlash uchun o'zining tezlikni aniqlash radaridan foydalanishda muammoga duch keldi va politsiya faqat bir marta janob Rid tezlikni 160 km/soatga pasaytirganida uni qayd etishga muvaffaq bo'ldi."

src: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
mt: Montana g'arbida ertalab soat 10:08 da o'rtacha zilzila sodir bo'ldi. AQSH Geologiya xizmati (USGS) va Milliy zilzila xabarlari markazi uning xabar berishicha, zilzila Dillon shahri shimoli-sharqida 20 km (15 milya) va Butte shahri janubida 65 km (40 milya) uzoqlikda markazida joylashgan.
ref: Dushanba kuni tungi soat 10:08 da g'arbiy Montanada o'rtacha silkinishdagi zilzila sodir bo'ldi. Qo'shma Shtatlar Geologiya xizmati (USGS) hamda uning Zilzilalar bo'yicha Milliy Axborot markazi tomonidan yetkazilgan talafot to'g'risida hech qanday tezkor hisobot qabul qilinmagan. Zilzila markazi Dillon shahrining taxminan 20 km (15 mil) shimoli-shimoli-sharqida va Byuttdan taxminan 65 km (40 mil) janubda edi.

src: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.
mt: Guruh Maui'dagi Memorial stadionida 9 ming kishini qabul qilish reysi bo'lganida o'z reysini bekor qildi va o'z muxlislari uchun uzr so'radi. Guruhning boshqaruv kompaniyasi, HK Management Inc., 20-sentabrda reysni bekor qilganda boshqa sabablar borligini aytib, keyinroq logistika sabablari tufayli bekor qilgani haqida xabar berdi.
ref: Guruh Mauidagi Urush yodgorligi stadionida 9000 kishi qatnashishi belgilangan shouni bekor qildi va muxlislaridan uzr so'radi. Guruhning menejment kompaniyasi, HK Management Inc., 20-sentabrda bekor qilganida, hech qanday dastlabki sabablarni keltirmadi, biroq bir kun o'tib logistik sabablarni aybladi.

src: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."
mt: "Bishkekda looting keng tarqaldi, degan xabar berishicha, o'ngi kechki vaqtgacha davom etdi, chunki qonunbuzarlikka qarshi kurashuvchilar ko'chalarida yo'q edi. Bishkekda "anarxiya"ga tushib ketayotganini bir nazar qiluvchi bir kishi tushuntirdi, chunki odamlar guruhlari ko'chalarida yurishib, tovarlar sotib olgan do'konlarni talon-taroj qilishdi. Bishkek aholisi orasida talon-tarojchilarning janubdan kelganlari ekanligi ayblanishlari keng tarqaldi."
ref: "Xabar qilinishicha, Bishkek ko'chlarida huquqni muhofaza qiluvchi organlar xodimlari yo'qligi sababli keng ko'lamli talon-tarojlar tun bo'yi davom etgan. Bishkek bir kuzatuvchi tomonidan ""anarxiya"" holatiga cho'kib ketayotgandek tasvirlangan edi, chunki ko'chalarda to'da-to'da odamlar izg'ib yurar va iste'mol tovarlari do'konlarini talon-taroj qilardi. Bishkekda yashovchilardan bir nechtasi qonunsizliklarda janubdagi namoyishchilarni aybladi."

src: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
mt: Ring kompaniyasining bosh direktori, Jeymi Siminoff, shundan so'ng kompaniya uning garajdagi do'konidan eshitilmasa qolgan eshikka tashrif buyurdi, deya ta'kidlagan. U WiFi eshig'i qurdi, deya ta'kidlagan. Siminoff 2013-yilda "Shark Tank" dasturida ishtirok etganidan keyin kompaniya sotuvlari oshdi, deya ta'kidlagan. 2017-yilda Siminoff "QVC" do'konida ko'rishga chiqdi. Ring ham ADT korporatsiyasi bilan kelishib chiqdi.
ref: "Oldin Ring kompaniyasining bosh direktori Jeymi Siminoff kompaniya o'z garajidagi ustaxonadan eshik qo'ng'irog'i eshitilmaganidan keyin boshlanganini qayd etgandi. U WiFi eshik qo'ng'irog'ini yasadi, dedi u. Siminoffning aytishicha, shou komissiyasi startapni moliyalashtirishni rad etganidan keyin 2013-yili ""Shark Tank"" epizodidagi ko'rinishidan so'ng savdo hajmi oshib ketgan. 2017-yilning oxirida Siminoff QVC xaridlar telekanalida ko'rinish berdi. Ring xavfsizlik bo'yicha raqobatchi kompaniyasi – ADT korporatsiyasi bilan ham nizoni hal qildi."

src: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."
mt: PBS ko'rsatuvining Emmy mukofotlari bilan 20 dan ortiq mukofotlarga ega, uning o'tkazilishi faqat Sesame Street va Mister Rogers' Neighborhooddan keyin. Har bir ko'rsatuvda kitobning biror mavzusi asosida o'ylangan va keyinchalik turli hikoyalar orqali ushbu mavzuni o'rganishga qaratilgan. Har bir ko'rsatuvda o'qishni o'rganish uchun kitoblarni kutib olishga qaror qilgan bolalar uchun kitoblar tavsiya etilgan. John Grant, WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbowning uyi)dan, "Reading Rainbow bolalarga o'qishga qanday qilib qarashni o'rgatdi,... o'qishni sevish — [ko'rsatuv] bolalarga kitobni olib, o'qishga qaror qilishga undadi" deb aytgan. Buning sabablaridan biri, jumladan, John Grant, xabar berishicha, moliyaviy qiyinchilik va o'qishni o'rganishga qaratilgan teleko'rsatuvlarning filosofiyasi o'zgarishi tufayli ko'rsatuvni tugatishga olib keldi.
ref: "PBS shousi yigirma to'rttadan ortiq Emmy mukofotiga ega va uning faoliyati faqat ""Sezam ko'chasi"" hamda ""Janob Rojerning mahallasi""dan qisqaroq. Serialning ham bir qismida muayyan kitobdagi mavzuga e'tibor qaratiladi, so'ng o'sha mavzu ham ko'plab hikoyalarni tadqiq qiladi. Har bir shouda bolalar o'z kutubxonalariga borganida qidirishlari kerak bo'lgan kitoblar yuzasidan tavsiyalar ham beriladi. WNED Buffalo'dan (Reading Rainbow'ning uy bekati) bo'lgan Jon Grant ""Reading Rainbow bolalarga nima uchun o'qish kerakligini,… o'qishni sevishni o'rgatdi — [shou] bolalarni biror kitobni olib, o'qishga rag'batlantirdi"", dedi. Ayrimlar, jumladan, Jon Grant ham, moliyaviy inqiroz va ta'limiy televizion dasturlar falsafasidagi o'zgarish serialning yakunlanishiga hissa qo'shdi, deb hisoblaydi."

src: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.
mt: Amsterdam shahar idoralari va Anne Frank muzeyi xodimlari shahar aholisining sog'lig'iga tahdid soladigan qo'ziqorin kasalligi bilan og'rab qolgan daraxtni o'chirishni talab qilishdi. Ushbu daraxt ertalab o'chirilishi kerak edi, lekin o'chirishdan oldin sud tomonidan qaror chiqarildi.
ref: Amsterdam shahri va Anne Frank muzeyi rasmiylari daraxt zamburug'lar bilan kasallangani va qulash xavfi borligini ta'kidlab, aholi salomatligiga tahdid tug'dirishini aytmoqda. Uni seshanba kuni kesish rejalashtirilgandi, biroq favqulodda sud qaroridan keyin saqlab qolindi.

src: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""
mt: "Hayvonlarni ozod qilish va Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) yana butun Avstraliyadagi qo'rqut qilishga qarshi kurashishda (RSPCA) katta abattoirlarda kamera tizimlarini o'rnatishni talab qilmoqda. RSPCA Yangi Janubiy Uels bosh inspeksiya xodimi David O'Shannessy ABC ga xabar berdi: "Kameralar qo'rqut qilish va abattoirlarga tekshiruvlar Avstraliyada keng tarqalgan bo'lishi kerak. ""Kameralar qo'rqut qilish va abattoirlarga tekshiruvlar Avstraliyada keng tarqalgan bo'lishi kerak. ref: "Hayvonlarni ozod qilish va hayvonlarga nisbatan shafqatsizlikning oldini olish Qirollik hamjamiyati (RSPCA) Avstraliyadagi hamma kushxonalarda CCTV kameralarini majburiy tartibda o'rnatishni talab qilishga chaqirmoqda. RSPCA Yangi Janubiy Uels bosh inspektori Devid O'Shannessi ABC kanaliga kushxonalarni kuzatish hamda tekshirish Avstraliyada odatiy holat bo'lishi lozimligini ta'kidladi. ""CCTV, shubhasiz, hayvonlar bilan ishlaydigan insonlarga ularning farovonligi eng ustuvor vazifa ekanligi haqida kuchli signal beradi""."

src: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.
mt: Bugun Red Lake jamoasida xabar tarqaldi, 21 martdagi maktab o'qituvchilarini o'ldirishda ishtirok etgan Jeff Weise va uchta qurbon uchun dafn marosimlari bo'lib o'tdi. Shuningdek, boshqa talaba hibsga olinganligi haqida xabar berildi. Rasmiy ravishda hech qanday ma'lumot berilmagan, ammo Red Lake qabilasi raisi Floyd Jourdainning o'g'li Louis Jourdain, 16 yoshli talaba hibsga olinganligi haqida Minneapolis Star-Tribune gazetasining manbasi bilan ma'lumot berildi. Hozircha hibsga olingan talabaga qanday ayblovlar qo'yilishi yoki hibsga olinganligi qanday sabab bo'lgani noma'lum, ammo federal sudning yoshlar ishlari boshlangan.
ref: Jeff Vayse va to'qqiz qurbondan uch nafarining dafn marosimi o'tkazilgan Red Leyk mahallasida 21-mart kungi maktabdagi otishmalar yuzasidan yana bir o'quvchi hibsga olingani haqida yangilik tarqaldi. Hukumat organlari bugungi hibsqa olishni tasdiqlashdan boshqa hech qanday rasmiy maʼlumot bermadi. Biroq, tergov haqida ma'lumotlarga ega bo'lgan manbaning Minneapolis Star-Tribune gazetasiga aytishicha, bu Qizil ko'l qabilasining boshlig'I Floyd Jurdenning 16 yashar o'g'li Luis Jurden bo'lgan. Ayni damda qanday ayblovlar qo'yilishi yoki hukumat organlarini bolaga nima yetaklagani noma'lum, lekin federal sudda voyaga yetmaganlar bo'yicha sud jarayoni boshlandi.

src: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.
mt: Protestga chiqishchilar 100 000 nafar kishi ishtirok etganini aytishdi, jumladan, Germaniyaning Berlinda, Keln, Hamburg va Hanover shaharlari. Berlinda politsiya 6 500 nafar ishtirokchini baholadi. Proteslar Fransiyada, Bolgariyada, Litvada, Malta, Estoniyada, Shotlandiyada va Shotlandiyada ham o'tkazildi. Londonda 200 nafar kishi asosiy huquq egalari ofislari oldida namoyish o'tkazdi. Oktabr oyida Polsha ACTAga imzo qoysa, Polsha hukumati shu kelishuvni ratifikatsiya qilishni to'xtatdi. Latviya va Slovakiya ham kelishuvga qo'shilish jarayonini to'xtatdi.
ref: Norozilik namoyishi tashkilotchilarining aytishicha, Germaniyaning Berlin, Kyoln, Gamburg va Gannover kabi shaharlaridan taxminan 100 000 kishi kelgan. Berlinda politsiya namoyishchilarni 6500 nafar deb taxmin qildi. Protestlar Parijda, Bolgariyaning Sofiya, Litvaning Vilnyus, Maltaning Valetta, Estoniyaning Tallin hamda Shotlandiyaning Edinburg va Glazgo shaharlarida ham bo'lib o'tdi. Londonda ayrim mualliflik huquqi egalarining asosiy ofislari oldida chamasi 200 nafar odam e'tirozlar bilan namoyishga to'plandi. o'tgan oy Polsha ACTAni imzolaganda mamlakatda yirik norozilik namoyishlari bo'lib o'tdi, bu Polsha hukumatining hozircha mazkur kelishuvni ratifikatsiya qilmaslik haqida qaror qabul qilishiga sabab bo'ldi. Latviya ham, Slovakiya ham ACTAga qo'shilish jarayonlarini kechiktirdi.

src: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""
mt: Yaponiya iqtisodiyot, savdo va sanoat vazirligi (METI) xabar berishicha, 60 ta iPod ishlatuvchilari to'xtab qolish vaqtida isitib qolish holatlari haqida xabar berishgan, bu holatlar ichida 6 ta o'chirib tashlangan va 4 nafar odam yonib ketgan. METI xabar berishicha, 27 ta holat haqida xabar bergan. Shuningdek, METI xabar berishicha, Apple kompaniyasi 34 ta isitib qolish holatlarini METIga xabar berishni kechiktirganini "xato" deb atagan.
ref: "Nosoz iPod qurilmalarining qizib ketishidan iborat 60 ga yaqin holatlar haqida xabar qilingan, ular jami bo'lib 6 ta yong'in va to'rt kishining yengil kuyishlariga sabab bo'lgan. Yaponiya iqtisodiyot, savdo va sanoat vazirligi (METI) mazkur qurilmalar bilan bog'liq 27 ta holatdan xabar topganini ma'lum qildi. O'tgan hafta METI Apple kompaniyasi ""jiddiy emas"" deb atagan haddan ortiq qizib ketish bilan bog'liq 34 ta qo'shimcha holat to'g'risida xabar berganini e'lon qildi. Vazir Apple kompaniyasining hisobotni kechiktirishiga ""haqiqatda achinarli"" deb javob berdi."

src: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."
mt: Apple CEO Steve Jobs iPhoneni o'zi kiygan jeans paltosidan chiqarib, sahnaga chiqib, 2 soatlik nutqida u ""Bugun Apple telefonni qayta ishlab chiqaradi, bugun biz tarix qilamiz"" deb aytdi.
ref: "Apple bosh ijrochi direktori Stiv Jobs qurilmani sahnada yurib, jinsi shimining cho'ntagidan iPhone'ni chiqargan holda namoyish qildi. 2 soatlik nutqi paytida u ""Bugun Apple telefonni qayta ixtiro qilmoqchi, biz bugun tarix yaratamiz"", – deya ta'kidladi."

src: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
mt: Bugun kechada Argentinaning hozirgi senatori va birinchi xonim Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner La Plata shahrida (Buenos Ayresdan 50 kilometr (31 mil) uzoqlikda) Argentinadagi teatrda prezidentlikka nomzodlik e'lon qildi. Fernandez de Kirchner 2005-yilda Buenos Ayres viloyatining delegatsiyasi a'zosi sifatida Senatga nomzod bo'lganida, u shu joyda prezidentlikka nomzodlik e'lon qilgan edi.
ref: Kecha kechqurun Buenos-Ayresdan 50 km (31 mil) uzoqlikdagi La Platada amaldagi senator va Argentinaning birinchi xonimi Kristina Fernandes de Kirshner prezidentlikka o'z nomzodini qo'yishini ma'lum qildi. Kirchner xonim Argentina teatrida prezidentlikka nomzodini qo'yishni niyat qilganini e'lon qildi, xuddi shu joyda u 2005-yili Buenos-Ayres provinsiyasi delegatsiyasi a'zosi sifatida Senat uchun o'z kampaniyasini boshlagandi.

src: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.
mt: ACMA shuningdek, Big Brotherning veb-saytida saqlanmaganligi sababli, Internetdagi video ko'rsatishda onlayn matn tartibga solish qonunlariga to'g'ri kelmaydi. Radiokompaniyalarga nazorat qilish qonuni Internet matnini tartibga solishga imkon beradi, ammo u shu kimga tegishli bo'lishi kerak.
ref: ACMA, shuningdek, videoning internetda uzatilishiga qaramay, media Big Brother veb-saytida saqlanib qolmaganligi sababli Big Brother onlayn kontent senzurasi to'g'risidagi qonunlarni buzmaganini aniqladi. Teleradioeshittirish xizmatlari to'g'risidagi qonun internet kontentini tartibga solishni ko'zda tutadi, biroq internet kontenti sifatida tan olinishi uchun u jismonan jihatdan serverda joylashishi kerak.

src: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."
mt: "Peter Costello, Avstraliya moliya vaziri va Liberal partiyasi rahbari John Howard o'rniga eng ko'proq o'rinbosar sifatida tanilgan odam nuklear quvvat sanoatini Avstraliyada qo'llab-quvvatlaydi. Mr Costello nuklear quvvat generatsiyasi iqtisodiy jihatdan yaroqsiz bo'lib qolganida, Avstraliya uni o'z ichiga olishi kerak, degan xabardorlikda e'lon qildi. ""Agar u iqtisodiy jihatdan yaroqsiz bo'lib qolganida, biz uni o'z ichiga olamiz. Shuning uchun, nuklear energiyaga qarshi asosiy qarori yo'q"" Mr Costello deydi."
ref: "Avstraliyalik g'aznachi va Bosh vazir Jon Hovarddan keyin Lebiral partiya yetakchisiga aylanish ehtimoli yuqori bo'lgan Piter Kastello Avstraliyadagi atom energetikasi sanoatini qo'llab-quvvatladi. Janob Kostelo so'zlariga ko'ra, atom energiyasini ishlab chiqarish iqtisodiy jihatdan yashovchan bo'lganidan keyin Avstraliya undan foydalanishda davom etishi kerak. ""Agar u tijoriylashtirilsa, biz uni olishimiz shart. Ya'ni, umuman olganda atom energiyasiga qarshilik yo'q"", — dedi janob Kostello."

src: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
mt: Yiliga yigirma sakkiz medali bo'lgani uchun, bir nechta mamlakatlar medallar to'plamiga kirib bormadi. Ular orasida Anna Jochemsen ishtirok etgan Niderlandiya, shuningdek, Finlandiya bilan birga, shuningdek, Anna Ogarzynska ishtirok etgan Polsha, shuningdek, Maciej Krezel ishtirok etgan. Yiliga yigirma sakkiz medali bo'lgani uchun, bir nechta mamlakatlar medallar to'plamiga kirib bormadi. Ular orasida Anna Jochemsen ishtirok etgan Niderlandiya, shuningdek, Finlandiya bilan birga, shuningdek, Anna Ogarzynska ishtirok etgan Polsha, shuningdek, Maciej Krezel ishtirok etgan. Ular orasida Anna Jochemsen ishtirok etgan Niderlandiya, shuningdek, Finlandiya bilan birga, shuningdek, Anna Ogarzynska ishtirok etgan Polsha, shuningdek, Maciej Krezel ishtirok etgan. Yiliga yigirma sakkiz medali bo'lgani uchun, bir nechta mamlakatlar medallar to'plamiga kirib bormadi. Ular orasida Anna Jochemsen ishtirok etgan Niderlandiya, shuningdek, Finlandiya bilan birga, shuningdek, Anna Ogarzynska ishtirok etgan Polsha, shuningdek, Maciej Krezel ishtirok etgan. Yiliga yigirma sakkiz medali bo'lgani uchun, bir nechta mamlakatlar medallar to'plamiga kirib bormadi. Ular orasida Anna Jochemsen ishtirok etgan Niderlandiya, shuningdek, Finlandiya bilan birga, shuningdek, Anna Ogarzynska ishtirok etgan Polsha, shuningdek
ref: Bir kunda bor-yo'g'i o'n sakkizta medal bo'lgani sababli bir qator mamlakatlar medal shohsupasiga ko'tarila olmadi. Gollandiya ham ularning orasida, kecha Anna Yoxumsen Super-G ayollar toifasi bo'yicha to'qqizinchi o'rinni egalladi, Finlandiya esa shu musobaqada Katya Saarinen bilan o'ninchi o'rinda yakunladi. Avstraliyalik Mitchel Gourli erkaklar o'rtasidagi Super-G bellashuvini o'n birinchi o'rinda yakunladi. Chexiyalik raqibi Oldrix Yelinek erkaklar o'rtasidagi Super-G bellashuvini o'n oltinchi pog'onada yakunladi. Meksikalik Arli Velaskes erkaklar o'rtasidagi Super-G bellashuvida o'n beshinchi pog'onadan joy oldi. Erkaklar o'rtasidagi Super-G bellashuvini Yangi Zelandiyalik Adam Hall to'qqizinchi pog'onada yakunladi. Polshalik ko'zi ojiz chang'ichi Masiey Krezel hamda yetaklovchi Anna Ogarzinska Super-G musobaqasini o'n uchinchi o'rinda yakunladi. Janubiy Koreyalik Jong Seork Park erkaklar o'rtasidagi Super-G musobaqasida yigirma to'rtinchi o'rindan joy oldi.

ref: Bir kunda bor-yo'g'i o'n sakkizta medal bo'lgani sababli bir qator mamlakatlar medal shohsupasiga ko'tarila olmadi. Gollandiya ham ularning orasida, kecha Anna Yoxumsen Super-G ayollar toifasi bo'yicha to'qqizinchi o'rinni egalladi, Finlandiya esa shu musobaqada Katya Saarinen bilan o'ninchi o'rinda yakunladi. Avstraliyalik Mitchel Gourli erkaklar o'rtasidagi Super-G bellashuvini o'n birinchi o'rinda yakunladi. Chexiyalik raqibi Oldrix Yelinek erkaklar o'rtasidagi Super-G bellashuvini o'n oltinchi pog'onada yakunladi. Meksikalik Arli Velaskes erkaklar o'rtasidagi Super-G bellashuvida o'n beshinchi pog'onadan joy oldi. Erkaklar o'rtasidagi Super-G bellashuvini Yangi Zelandiyalik Adam Hall to'qqizinchi pog'onada yakunladi. Polshalik ko'zi ojiz chang'ichi Masiey Krezel hamda yetaklovchi Anna Ogarzinska Super-G musobaqasini o'n uchinchi o'rinda yakunladi. Janubiy Koreyalik Jong Seork Park erkaklar o'rtasidagi Super-G musobaqasida yigirma to'rtinchi o'rindan joy oldi.

src: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
mt: Balidagi boshqa masalalar orasida dunyodagi qolgan qariyb o'rnashgan o'rmonlarni saqlash, rivojlanayotgan mamlakatlarga o'zgarmas usullarda rivojlanishga yordam berish uchun texnologiyalarni ulash va global issiqxonalash tufayli ta'sirlangan mamlakatlarga yordam berish uchun fondni yakunlash kabi masalalar ham mavjud.
ref: Balida ko'riladigan boshqa masalalar dunyoning qolgan o'rmonlarini saqlab qolish, rivojlanayotgan mamlakatlarning kamroq ifloslanishlarga sabab bo'luvchi yo'llar bilan o'sishiga yordam beruvchi texnologiyalar bilan bo'lishishni o'z ichiga oladi. BMT global isishdan zarar ko'rgan mamlakatlarga ta'sirlarni yengishda yordam berish uchun jamg'arma yaratishni yakunlashga ham umid qilmoqda. Pullar toshqinga chidamli uylar, yaxshiroq suv resurslarini boshqarish tizimi va ekinlarni diversifikatsiya qilishga yo'naltirilishi mumkin.

src: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."
mt: "Nigeriya tashrif buyuruvchilar oldidan Afrikaning tijorat ittifoqi (AfCFTA)ga qo'shilishini e'lon qildi. AU tijorat va sanoat komissari Albert Muchanga Benin qo'shilishini e'lon qildi. Komissar shunday dedi: ""Biz o'zaro kelishmovchiliklarga qaramay, 2020-yil 1-iyulda savdo qilishni boshlash uchun bizga kerakli tashqi asoslarimiz bor""."
ref: "Nigeriya avvalroq sammitdan bir hafta avval AfCFTA tashkilotiga qo'shilishni rejalashtirganligini e'lon qilgan. AU savdo-sotiq hamda sanoat komissari Albert Muchanga Benin ham qo'shilmoqchi ekanini ma'lum qildi. Komissar: ""Biz hozircha kelib chiqish va tarif imtiyozlari qoidalari bo'yicha kelishuvga erishmadik, lekin holat 2020-yil 1-iyuldan savdo-sotiqni boshlashimiz uchun tayyorligimizni ko'rsatmoqda"", — dedi."

src: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.
mt: Ushbu davrda Atlantada katta tanqidga uchragan va shahar uchun innovatsion shahar ta'limi uchun tan olindi. 2009 yilda u yilning Milliy boshlang'ich ta'limi uchun yilning eng yaxshi boshlig'i unvoniga sazovor bo'ldi. Muddatidan keyin Atlantadagi test natijalari yaxshilangan. Xabar berishicha, test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari oshib ketgan vaqtida, Atlantadagi test natijalari
ref: "U Atlantada bo'lgan paytida tanqidchilarning e'tirofiga sazovor bo'ldi va innovatsion shahar ta'limi bilan tanildi. 2009-yilda u ""Yilning milliy nazoratchisi"" unvoni bilan taqdirlandi. Mukofotlash vaqtida Atlanta maktablarida test natijalarining ancha yaxshilangani kuzatildi. Ko'p o'tmay, Atlanta Journal-Constitution test natijalari bilan bog'liq muammolarni ko'rsatuvchi hisobotni e'lon qildi. Hisobotda test natijalari aql bovar qilmas darajada tez sur'atda oshgani va iddao qilingan maktab o'zining ichki muammolarini aniqlagani, lekin xulosalar asosida harakatlanmagani ko'rsatilgandi. Shundan keyin topilgan dalillar test varaqalari qalbakilashtirilganini ko'rsatgach Xoll va yana 34 nafar ta'lim rasmiylari 2013-yili aybdor deb topildi."

src: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
mt: Gubernatorning ofisi oldida bir bomba portlab ketdi. Ikki soat ichida hukumat binolariga yaqin uch bomba portlab ketdi. Boshqaruvchilar rasmiy o'lim sonini o'niga teng deb e'lon qilishdi, lekin oxirgi sonlarni aniqlash mumkin emas.
ref: Bir bomba general-gubernatorning idorasi tashqarisida portladi. Ikki soat davomida hukumat binolari yaqinida yana uchta bomba portladi. Ayrim xabarlarda vafot etganlarning rasmiy soni sakkiz nafar ekani aytilgan va rasmiy xabarlar jarohatlanganlar soni 30 nafarga yaqinligini tasdiqladi; biroq yakuniy raqamlar hali ham aniq emas.

src: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.
mt: 21 yoshli Jesus 2017 yil yanvar oyida Braziliya klubi Palmeirasdan £27 millionga sotib olinganidan keyin Manchester Cityda o'ynagan. Keyingi yillarda u klubda barcha musobaqalarda 53 ta o'yinda maydonga tushib, 24 ta gol urgan.
ref: "21 yoshli Jezus Braziliyaning ""Plameyras"" klubidan 2017-yil yanvar oyida 27 million funt sterling evaziga ""Manchester Siti""ga kelib qo'shilgan edi. O'shandan beri braziliyalik futbolchi barcha musobaqalarda klub safida 53 ta uchrashuvda maydonga tushib, 24 ta gol muallifiga aylangan."

src: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.
mt: Mecca, islomning yirik shahri, bu kuni soat 10 da qulab tushdi. Binoning mehmonlari asosan Birlashgan Arab Amirliklari fuqarolari edi. O'lim holatlari kamida 15 nafar, bu son o'sib borishi kutilmoqda.
ref: Bugun ertalab mahalliy vaqt bilan soat 10 lar atrofida Islom dinining muqaddas shahri – Makkada hostel qulab tushdi. Bu binoda haj ziyorati arafasida muqaddas shaharga ziyorat uchun tashrif buyurgan ko'plab ziyoratchilar istiqomat qilgan. Ushbu hostelning aksariyat mehmonlari Birlashgan Arab Amirliklarining fuqarolari edi. Qurbonlar soni 15 ta, bu sonning o'sishi kutilmoqda.

src: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.
mt: Ikki yulduz, ularning bittasi 1,000 funtga yaqin vaznli bo'lib, 17,500 mil/soat tezlikda harakat qilgan, Yer sathidan 491 mil uzoqlikda to'qnashib ketdi. Olimlar to'qnashish natijasida paydo bo'lgan portlash katta ekanligini aytishmoqda. Ularning Yer bilan munosabatini aniqlashda davom etayotgan. Qo'shma Shtatlar Strategik Komandasi AQSh Mudofaa Vazirligining ofisi parchalarni kuzatib boradi. Natijalarni jamoatchilik veb-saytida e'lon qilish rejalashtirilgan.
ref: Ikkalasining og'irligi 1000 funtdan ko'proq bo'lgan hamda soatiga 17 500 mil atrofida tezlikda harakatlanayotgan sputniklar Yerdan 491 mil yuqorida to'qnashdi. Olimlar to'qnashuv oqibatida sodir bo'lgan portlash ulkan bo'lganini aytadi. Ular hali ham halokat qanchalik ulkan bo'lganligi va Yerga qanday ta'sir qilishini aniqlashga harakat qilishmoqda. AQSH Mudofaa vazirligi idorasining AQSH strategik qo'mondonligi vayronalarni kuzatyapti. Chizma tahlil natijasi ommabop veb-saytga joylashtiriladi.

src: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.
mt: 2008 yilgi 400 ta eng boy amerikaliklar ro'yxatida 190-o'rinda turib, uning daromadi $2.3 milliardni tashkil etgan. U 1950 yilda Virjiniya universitetining san'at va fanlar kollejini tugatgan va u yerda muhim hisoblangan xayr-ixloskor bo'lgan.
ref: Betten 2,3 milliardga baholangan boyligi bilan 2008 yilda 400 ta eng boy amerikaliklar orasida 190-o'rinni egalladi. U 1950-yilda Virjiniya universitetining San'at va fan kollejini tamomlagan va mazkur muassasaning muhim donori bo'lgan.

src: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."
mt: "Kaliforniya gubernatori Arnold Shvartsenegger ""qo'rqinchli video o'yinlarni bolalarga sotish yoki ijaraga berishga to'g'ri kelmaydigan qonunni imzoladi"". ref: "Kaliforniya gubernatori Arnold Shvartsenegger voyaga yetmaganlarga zo'ravonlikni targ'ib qiluvchi video o'yinlarni sotishni yoki ijaraga berishni taqiqlaydigan qonun loyihasiga imzo chekdi. Qonun loyihasi Kaliforniya shtatida sotiluvchi zo'ravonlik aks etgan video o'yinlarning ""18"" maxsus yorlig'i bilan belgilanishini va ular voyaga yetmaganlarga sotilganda har bir qonunbuzarlik uchun 1000 dollar jarima bilan jazolanishini talab qiladi."

src: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""
mt: “Duvall, uylangan ikki o'g'il-ko'g'ir qoldi, Miller bilan bir xil fikrda emas. Miller, unga hikoya qilingan voqea haqida fikr so'rilganda, shunday dedi: ""Mike eshittirishda ko'p gapiradi...Men tayyorlanayotganim uchun eshitmaydim, nima qilib gapirayotganini.""”
ref: "Oilali, ikki nafar voyaga yetgan farzandi bor Duvall voqeaga aloqador bo'lgan Millerda katta taassurot qoldirmagan. Izoh so'ralganida Miller shunday dedi: ""Mayk tinglov paytida ko'p gapiradi… Men tayyorlanayotgandim, shu sababli u nima deyotganini unchalik eshitmayotgandik""."

src: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."
mt: Stephen Harper bosh vazirining so'zlariga ko'ra, u Jack Layton bilan 25 daqiqa davom etgan uchrashuvda partiyaviy qo'mitaga "Tozli havo qonuni"ni tekshirish uchun yuborishga rozi bo'ldi. Layton PM bilan uchrashuvda Konservatorlar partiyasining o'zgarmagan ekologik qonunini o'zgartirishni so'radi, u "to'liq va to'liq qayta yozish"ni talab qildi. Biroq, Mersey kasalxonasini Devonport, Tasmaniya shtatida qayta ishga tushirishdan keyin, federal hukumat bu kasalxona tizimini qayta ishga tushirishni boshladi. Tasmaniya hukumati va federal parlament a'zolari bu harakatni federal saylovga borishdan oldin qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun q
ref: "Bosh vazir Stiven Xarper hukumatning ""Toza havo haqidagi qonuni""ni uning ikkinchi o'qilishidan avval seshanba kuni NDP yetakchisi Jek Leyton bilan PMOdagi 25 daqiqalik uchrashuvdan keyin barcha partiyalar qo'mitasiga ko'rib chiqish uchun jo'natishga rozilik bildirdi. Bosh vazir bilan uchrashuv paytida Layton konservatorlarning atrof-muhit haqidagi qonun loyihasini ""batafsil va to'liq qayta yozish""ni, Konservatorlar partiyasining atrof-muhit haqidagi qonun loyihasiga o'zgartishlar kiritishni so'radi. Federal hukumat Tasmaniyaning Devonport shahrida joylashgan Mersey shifoxonasini moliyalashtirishni o'z zimmasiga olishga kirishganidan beri, mamlakat hukumati va ba'zi federal parlament a'zolari ushbu harakatni Noyabr oyiga belgilangan federal saylovlar oldidan hiyla deb tanqid qildi. Lekin Bosh vazir Jon Xovardning so'zlariga ko'ra, bu chora faqat qo'shimcha 45 million AUD ajratish orqali Tasmaniya hukumati tomonidan shifoxona reytigini pasaytirishdan himoya qilishga qaratilgan."

src: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
mt: Uchuvchi bo'linma rahbari Dilokrit Pattava ekanligi aniqlandi.
ref: Ifloslangan uy hayvonlari ozuqasini iste'mol qilgandan so'ng vafot etgan uy hayvonlarining siydik namunalarida ham siyanurik kislota, ham melamin aniqlangan. Ikkala qorishma bir-biri bilan reaksiyaga kirishadi va buyrakni faoliyatdan to'xtatib qo'yishi mumkin bo'lgan kristallarni hosil qiladi, dedi oliygoh izlanuvchilari. Tadqiqotchilar mushuk peshobida melamin hamda siyanurik kislotaning qo'shilishidan vujudga kelgan kristallarni kuzatishdi. Bu kristallarning tuzilishi infraqizil spektroskopiya (FTIR) orqali solishtirilganda ta'sirga uchragan hayvonlarning siydigidan topilgan kristallarniki bilan bir xil bo'ladi.

src: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""
mt: “Xinhua xabar berishicha, hukumat olimlari ikki “qora kutu” uchish-qo'nish yozuvlari ertalab eshikka chiqqan. Xalqaro kurashchilar Luna sharafiga bayram qilishdi. Tommy Dreamer aytib o'tdi: “Luna - birinchi Qirolicha. Birinchi mening manejeri. Luna ikki oyning birinchi kechki soatida vafot etdi. Ushbu narsa uning shaxsiyatiga mos keladi. Qattiq ayol.” Dustin “Qizil qorovul” Runnels shunday izoh berdi: “Luna meni o'zgacha qilishda meni ortda qoldirgan. Ushbu narsa uning shaxsiyatiga mos keladi. Unga vaqtincha rahmat.”
ref: "Xinhua xabariga ko'ra, hukumat tergovchilari chorshanba kuni parvozning texnik tafsilotlarini yozib oluvchi ikkita ""qora quti"" moslamani tikladilar. Hamkasb kurashchilar ham Lunaga hurmat bajo keltirishdi. Tommi Drimer: ""Luna birinchi ekstrimlar qirolichasi edi. Mening birinchi menejerim. Luna xuddi o'zi kabi noyob ikki oy tunida vafot etdi. Kichli ayol"", dedi. Dastin ""Goldust"" Runnels ""Luna ham mendek injiq edi… balki mendan-da ko'proq… men uni sevaman va uni sog'inaman… u yaxshiroq joyda deb umid qilaman"", deya fikr bildirdi."

src: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
mt: Uyda uchish mashinasining to'g'risi bilan to'qnashuv paytida uchta kishi bo'lganligi aniqlandi, lekin ularning hech biri jarohatlangan emas. Biroq, haydovchi boshining og'ir jarohatlarini oldi. To'qnashuv sodir bo'lgan yo'lda qisqa muddatli yopilishdan so'ng, qutqaruv xizmatlari haydovchini qizil Audi TT dan ozod qildi. U birinchi marta Yarmouthdagi James Paget kasalxonasida kasalxonaga yotqizilgan. Keyinchalik u Kembrijdagi Addenbrooke kasalxonasiga ko'chirildi.
ref: Avtomobil zarbasi vaqtida uy ichida uch kishi bo'lishiga qaramay, ularning hech biriga jarohat yetkazilmagan. Ammo haydovchining boshi jiddiy shikastlangandi. Favqulodda holatlar xizmati qizil Audi TT dan haydovchini chiqarib olgan vaqtda avtohalokat yuz bergan yo'l vaqtinchalik yopiq edi. U dastlab Greyt-Yarmutdagi Jeyms Paget shifoxonasiga yotqizildi. U keyinchalik Kembrijdagi Addenbruk shifoxonasiga ko'chirildi.

src: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
mt: O'yinlar ertalab soat 10:00da boshlandi va har qanday o'tmishda bo'lganidek, yaxshi ob-havo va o'yin davomida o'tgan o't o'chirishdan tashqari, o'yinlar uchun yaxshi kun edi. 5chi o'rta Zambiyaga qarshi 26 - 00 hisobida yaxshi boshlandi. Janubiy singari o'zlarining janubiy singlari bilan o'ynaganida, Janubiy Afrika o'yinlari o'zlarining o'z-o'zidan yaxshilanishini ko'rdi. src: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
