src: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.
mt: Ushbu uch yuz yildan keyin, Deng Xiaoping boshchiligidagi ishlar paytida, rasman kommunist davlat sifatida qolgan xitoyda bozor iqtisodiyoti rivojlangan. Birinchi iqtisodiy islohotlar Deng Xiaoping boshchiligidagi ishlar paytida amalga oshirildi. Keyingi uch yuz yildan keyin xitoyning iqtisodiy o'lchami 90 marta o'sdi. Xitoyning iqtisodiy o'lchami birinchi marta yil oxirida Germaniyadan ko'ra avtomobillar eksporti bo'lib, AQSHni bu sohada eng yirik bozor sifatida ortda qoldirdi. Xitoyning iqtisodiy o'lchami ikki asr ichida AQSHdan katta bo'lishi mumkin.
ref: Xitoy oxirgi o'n yilda rasmiy tarzda kommunist mamlakat bo'lib qolganiga qaramasdan, bozor iqtisodiyotini rivojlantirdi. Iqtisodiyotdagi ilk islohotlar Den Syaoping rahbarligi ostida amalga oshirilgan. O'sha vaqtlardan buyon Xitoyning iqtisodiy hajmi 90 martaga o'sdi. o'tgan yili ilk bor Xitoy Germaniyadan ko'ra ko'proq avtomobil eksport qildi va mazkur sanoat bo'yicha eng yirik bozor sifatida AQSHni ortda qoldirdi. Xitoyning YaIMi yigirma yil ichida Qo'shma Shtatlarinikidan kattaroq bo'lishi mumkin.

src: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""
mt: Hu shunday dedi: """Biz 2020-yilda 2005-yildagi darajadan katta bo'lgan millatlararo taraqqiyot darajasiga qarab karbon dioksidi chiqindilarini qisqartirishga urinamiz,"" Hu shunday dedi. U chiqindilarini qisqartirishga urinayotganlarning o'ziga xos darajasi va imkoniyatlari bilan bog'liq bo'lgan millatlararo taraqqiyot darajasiga qarab chiqindilarini qisqartirishga urinayotganlarning o'ziga xos darajasi va imkoniyatlari bilan bog'liq bo'lgan millatlararo taraqqiyot darajasiga qarab chiqindilarini qisqartirishga urinayotganlarning o'ziga xos darajasi va imkoniyatlari bilan bog'liq bo'lgan millatlararo taraqqiyot darajasiga qarab chiqindilarini qisqartirishga urinayotganlarning o'ziga xos darajasi va imkoniyatlari bilan bog'liq bo'lgan millatlararo taraqqiyot darajasiga qarab chiqindilarini qisqartirishga urinayotganlarning o'ziga xos darajasi va imkoniyatlari bilan bog'liq bo'lgan millatlararo taraqqiyot darajasiga qarab chiqindilarini qisqartirishga urinayotganlarning o'ziga xos darajasi va imkoniyatlari bilan bog'liq bo'lgan millatlararo taraqqiyot darajasiga qarab chiqindilarini qisqartirishga urinayotganlarning o'ziga xos darajasi va imkoniyatlari bilan bog'liq bo'lgan millatlararo taraqqiyot darajasiga qarab chiqindilarini qisqartirishga urinayotganlarning o'ziga xos daraj
ref: """Biz 2020-yilgacha YaIM birligiga to'g'ri keluvchi karbonat angidrid chiqindilarini 2005-yildagiga qaraganda sezilarli darajada kamaytirishga harakat qilamiz"", dedi Hu. U kamaytirishlar bo'yicha biror raqamni keltirmadi, ularning Xitoy iqtisodiyoti natijalari asosida amalga oshirilishini aytdi. Hu rivojlanayotgan mamlakatlarni ""dastlab ifloslantirish, keyinroq tozalashdan iborat eski usuldan voz kechish""ga chaqirdi. U ""biroq, ulardan imkoniyatlari, javobgarligi, rivojlanish bosqichidan tashqari bo'lgan majburiyatlarni zimmasiga olish so'ralmasligi kerak"", — deya qo'shimcha qildi."

src: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."
mt: Angoladagi eng yomon epidemiyaga yo'l qo'yishda davlat tibbiyot xizmati, Mangola, OIV va Jahon sog'liqni saqlash tashkiloti xabar berishicha, mamlakatdagi eng yomon epidemiyaga yo'l qo'yishda davlat tibbiyot xizmati, Mangola, OIV va Jahon sog'liqni saqlash tashkiloti xabar berishicha, mamlakatdagi eng yomon epidemiyaga yo'l qo'yishda davlat tibbiyot xizmati, Mangola, OIV va Jahon sog'liqni saqlash tashkiloti xabar berishicha, mamlakatdagi eng yomon epidemiyaga yo'l qo'yishda davlat tibbiyot xizmati, Mangola, OIV va Jahon sog'liqni saqlash tashkiloti xabar berishicha, mamlakatdagi eng yomon epidemiyaga yo'l qo'yishda davlat tibbiyot xizmati, Mangola, OIV va Jahon sog'liqni saqlash tashkiloti xabar berishicha, mamlakatdagi eng yomon epidemiyaga yo'l qo'yishda davlat tibbiyot xizmati, Mangola, OIV va Jahon sog'liqni saqlash tashkiloti xabar berishicha, mamlakatdagi eng yomon epidemiyaga yo'l qo'yishda davlat tibbiyot xizmati, Mangola, OIV va Jahon sog'liqni saqlash tashkiloti xabar berishicha, mamlakatdagi eng yomon epidemiyaga yo'l qo'yishda davlat tibbiyot xizmati, Mangola, OIV va Jahon sog'liqni saqlash tashkiloti xabar berishicha, mamlakatdagi eng yomon epidemiyaga yo'l qo'yishda davlat tibbiyot xizmati, Mangola, OIV va Jahon sog'liqni saqlash tash
ref: "Mangola tibbiy yordam xayriya tashkiloti, Chegara bilmas shifokorlar hamda Jahon sog'liqni saqlash tashkiloti buning mamlakatda qayd etilgan rekord darajadagi eng yomon epidemiya ekanini ta'kidladi. Medecines Sans Frontiere vakili Richard Virman: ""Angola boshdan kechirgan pandemiyalarning eng dahshatlisiga yaqinlashmoqda va Angolada vaziyat juda yomonligicha qolmoqda"", dedi u."

src: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.
mt: Joriy davlat prokurori Kier Starmer QC, bu kuni so'nggi xabar berishicha, ikkala Huhne va Prycega ham sud qilishni e'lon qildi. Huhne iste'foga chiqdi va u bosh vazirlikda Ed Davey MP o'rniga qoladi. Norman Lamb MP, Daveyning biznes vaziri o'rnini oladi. Huhne va Pryce 16-fevralda Vestminster sudida sudlanishlari kerak.
ref: Davlat ayblovlari direktori Kier Starmer QC bugun tongda bayonot berib, Huhnega ham, Prisga ham jinoyat ishi qo'zg'atilganini e'lon qildi. Xyun iste'fo berdi va uning Mahkamadagi o'rnini parlament a'zosi Ed Deyvi egallaydi. Parlament a'zosi Norman Lambning Deyvi bo'shatayotgan Biznes vaziri lavozimini egallashi kutilmoqda. 16-fevral kuni Xyun va Praysning Vestminster Magistratlar sudiga kelishi belgilangan.

src: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."
mt: Fransuz operasida qahramon "narkotiklarga bo'lgan sevgi tufayli hayotini o'zgartiradi va Yaponiyaga qaratadi" deyilgan hikoyani aks ettiradi. Natijada, sahnada ishtirok etuvchilar marihuana qutilarini yonib ketishadi va teatr tijoratdagi auditoriyani qo'shishga undaydi.
ref: "Kamilla Sen-Sans tomonidan ijro etilgan fransuz operasidagi hikoya ""hayoti giyohvand moddalar va Yaponiyaga bo'lgan muhabbat asosiga qurilgan"" rassom haqidadir. Natijada, ijrochilar sahnada kannabis o'ramalarini chekishdi va teatrning o'z tomoshabinlarni qo'shilishga undadi."

src: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."
mt: “Leonov, shuningdek, «kosmonavt No. 11» nomi bilan tanilgan, sovet ittifoqining asl kosmonavtlar jamoasining bir qismi edi. 1965-yil 18-martda u birinchi marta odam tashqi kosmik foydalanish (EVA) yoki «kosmik yurish»ni amalga oshirdi, u yerda yerdan tashqarida yigirma ikki daqiqa qoldi. Uning ishi uchun u «Sovet Ittifoqi Qahramoni» mukofotiga sazovor bo'ldi, bu mukofot Sovet Ittifoqi uchun eng yuqori mukofot edi.”
ref: """11-raqamli kosmonavt"" sifatida ham mashhur bo'lgan Leonov Sovet Ittifoqining ilk kosmonavtlar jamoasi tarkibida bo'lgan. 1965-yilning 18-martida u kosmik kema tashqarisida o'n ikki daqiqadan ortiqroq vaqt mobaynida yolg'iz qolib, ilk inson uchuvchili kemadan tashqaridagi harakat (EVA) yoxud ""kosmos sayri""ni amalga oshirdi. U mehnati uchun Sovet Ittifoqining eng yuksak — ""Sovet Ittifoqi qahramoni"" unvonini oldi. O'n yildan keyin u Kosmik poyganing yakuniga yetganini bildirgan holda Apollon-Soyuz missiyasining Sovet qismiga boshchilik qildi."

src: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."
mt: Gibson qo'rqotib, shifokorlarga olib ketildi, biroq qisqa vaqt ichida vafot etdi. Avtomobil haydovchisi, 64 yoshda ekanligi ma'lum, halokatda jarohatlangan emas. Avtomobil halokat joyidan olib ketilgan, bu voqea 1200 GMT da sodir bo'lgan. Qo'rqotgan bolalar o'zlarining o'qish joyidan qochib ketishdi, deb aytib, ishlayotgan garajda ishlayotgan odam aytib, ""Bolalar yo'lga chiqishni kutib turishardi va ular barchasi qo'rqib, qochib ketishardi"".
ref: "Hodisa yuz berganidan so'ng Gibson shifoxonaga yetkazilgan, biroq ko'p o'tmay olamdan o'tgan. 64 yoshli yuk mashinasi haydovchisi halokatda jarohatlanmadi. Avtoulovning o'zi o'sha kuni hodisa joyidan taxminan soat 12:00 GMT da olib ketilgan. Ko'ngilsiz hodisa yuz bergan joy yaqinidagi garajda ishlayotgan kishi: ""U yerda yo'lni kesib o'tmoqchi bo'layotgan bolalar bor edi va ularning barchasi qichqirib yig'layotgandi"" deb aytdi. Ularning hammasi baxtsiz hodisa yuz bergan yerdan orqaga qarab qochishdi."

src: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.
mt: Ushbu ish asosan nazariy, lekin dastur Sagittarius galaksiyasidagi kuzatishlarni simulyatsiya qilish uchun yozilgan. Ushbu guruh tomonidan qidirdirilgan ta'sir galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i jismidan kelib chiqqan bo'lib, u galaktikaning qorong'i
ref: Bajarilgan ishlarning aksariyati nazariy edi, biroq dastur o'qotar galaktikasidagi kuzatuvlarni simulyatsiya qilish uchun yozilgan edi. Jamoa qidirgan effektga galaktikaning qorong'i materiyasi va Somon yo'lining qorong'i materiyasi o'rtasidagi to'lqin kuchlari sabab bo'ladi. Xuddi oy to'lqinlarni yuzaga keltirgan holda yerga tortish kuchi bilan ta'sir ko'rsatgani kabi Somon yo'li ham Qavs galaktikasiga kuch bilan ta'sir qiladi. Olimlar qora materiya boshqa qora materiyaga xuddi odatiy materiya ta'sir qilgani kabi ta'sir ko'rsatadi, degan xulosaga kelishdi. Mazkur nazariyaga ko'ra, galaktika atrofidagi qora materiyaning aksariyati galaktika atrofida chambar shaklida joylashgan va juda ko'p mayda zarralardan tashkil topgan.

src: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."
mt: "Debata iqlim tufanidan keyin New Orleansga qurilish va qayta tiklashga sarflangan pul haqida kontroversiya tufayli paydo bo'ldi; bu haqda boshqalarning qo'rqitgan Washingtonlilariga qurilish shartnomalari berilgani haqidagi fikrlar bilan qo'rqitgan boshqalarning qo'rqitgan Bushning New Orleansga qurilish va qayta tiklashga sarflangan pul haqida kontroversiya tufayli paydo bo'ldi; bu haqda boshqalarning qo'rqitgan Washingtonlilariga qurilish shartnomalari berilgani haqidagi fikrlar bilan qo'rqitgan boshqalarning qo'rqitgan Bushning New Orleansga qurilish va qayta tiklashga sarflangan pul haqida kontroversiya tufayli paydo bo'ldi; bu haqda boshqalarning qo'rqitgan Washingtonlilariga qurilish shartnomalari berilgani haqidagi fikrlar bilan qo'rqitgan boshqalarning qo'rqitgan Bushning New Orleansga qurilish va qayta tiklashga sarflangan pul haqida kontroversiya tufayli paydo bo'ldi; bu haqda boshqalarning qo'rqitgan Washingtonlilariga qurilish shartnomalari berilgani haqidagi fikrlar bilan qo'rqitgan boshqalarning qo'rqitgan Bushning New Orleansga qurilish va qayta tiklashga sarflangan pul haqida kontroversiya tufayli paydo bo'ldi; bu haqda boshqalarning qo'rqitgan Washingtonlilariga qurilish shartnomalari berilgani haqidagi fikrlar bilan qo'rqitgan boshqalarning qo'rqitgan Bushning New Orleansga qurilish va qayta tiklashga sarflangan
ref: "Mazkur munozaralar Katrina to'fonidan keyingi yordam hamda qayta tiklash xarajatlari bo'yicha tortishuvlarga sabab bo'ldi; buni ba'zi moliyaviy konservatorlar buni hazilomuz tarzda ""Bushning Nyu-Orlean kelishuvi"" deb atashdi. Qayta qurish sa'y-harakatlarini erkin tanqid qilish Vashington ichidagi shaxslarga qayta qurish bitimlarini taqdim qilishga qaratilgan."

src: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.
mt: Kapulya Yerda kelganda va atmosferaga kirganda, sharqiy vaqtda soat 5da, Kaliforniya, Oregon, Nevada va Utahda aholi uchun juda ko'zga tashalanadigan ko'rinib turadi. Kapulya quyoshning o'zgacha yulduzi sifatida osmonda uchib ketadi. Kapulya 12,8 km yoki 8 milya tezlikda harakat qiladi, shu tezlikda San-Fransisko va Los-Anjelesni bir daqiqa ichida o'tkazishi mumkin. Stardust Yerda qaytishda yangi rekord o'rnatdi, bu rekord 1969-yil may oyida Apollon X komand modulining qaytishida o'rnatilgan. “U Kaliforniya g'arbidan boshlanib, markaziy Oregon orqali, Nevada va Idaho orqali va Utah orqali o'tadi,” Tom Duxbury, Stardustning loyiha boshlig'i dedi.
ref: "Kapsula Yerga yetib borganda va atmosferaga kirganda, taxminan soat 5 (TO) da (sharqiy vaqt bilan), Shimoliy Kaliforniya, Oregon, Nevada va Yuta aholisi uchun haqiqiy yorug'lik shou bo'lishi kutilmoqda. Kapsula osmonda uchayotgan yulduzga juda ham o'xshaydi. Kapsulaning tezligi soniyasiga 12,8 kilometr yoxud 8 milni tashkil qiladi, bunday tezlik bilan San-Fransiskodan Los-Anjelesga bir daqiqada yetib olish mumkin. Stardust 1969-yil may oyida Apollon X boshqaruv modulining qaytish vaqtidagi avvalgi rekordini yangilab, yerga qaytish bo'yicha eng tezkor kosmik kema sifatidagi yangi barcha davrlar rekordini o'rnatdi. ""U shimoliy Kaliforniyaning g'arbiy sohili bo'ylab harakatlanadi va Kaliforniyadan markaziy Oregon orqali Nevada va Aydahodan o'tib, Yutagacha bo'lgan osmonni yoritadi"", — dedi Stardust loyihasi menejeri Tom Daksberi."

src: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
mt: Pennsylvania shtatidagi bolalar kasalxonasida ishlagan shifokor Malar Balasubramaniyan, 29 yoshda, Ohio shtatining Blue Ash shahrida, Cincinnatidan taxminan 15 mil shimolda joylashgan, ertalab soat 9:00 da politsiyaga qo'lga tushdi. Ushbu shaharda uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq qilgan qarorgohida uning qo'ng'iroq
ref: Pensilvaniya shtati Pittsburg shahridagi bolalar shifoxonasida ishlagan shifokor chorshanba kuni onasi uning avtomobili yukxonasidan o'lik holda topilgandan keyin, og'irlashtiruvchi holatlarda qotillik sodir etishda ayblanmoqda, deb xabar beradi Ogayo shtati rasmiylari. 29 yoshli doktor Malar Balasubramanian aftidan, dorilar bilan kuchli muolaja qilingan holatda, futbolka va ichki kiyimda yo'l yoqasida yotgan holda Sinsinnatidan taxminan 15 mil shimolda joylashgan Ogayo shtatidagi Blu-Eshdan topilgan. U zobitlarni o'zining 500 dut uzoqda joylashgan qora rangli Oldsmobile Intrigue mashinasi tomon yo'naltirdi. Ular u yerda 53 yoshli Saroja Balasubramanianning qonga bulg'angan yopinchiqlar bilan o'ralgan jasadini topishdi. Politsiya jasad u yerda taxminan bir kundan beri yotganligini aniqlanganligini aytdi.

src: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
mt: Bu eBay tarixidagi eng yirik sotib olishdir. Kompaniya Skype kabi xalqaro miqyosda mashhur bo'lgan hududlarda, jumladan Xitoy, Sharqiy Yevropa va Braziliyada, shuningdek, o'z daromad manbalarini kengaytirishga umid qilmoqda.
ref: Bu eBay tarixidagi eng yirik xariddir. Kompaniya o'z daromadlari manbalarini diversifikatsiya qilish hamda Xitoy, Sharqiy Yevropa va Braziliya kabi Skype kuchli mavqega ega hududlarda ommalashishga umid qilmoqda.

src: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

ref: Jarohatlanganlar shifoxonaga olib borilgandan so'ng to'qnashuv tugagach, qolgan mahbuslarning taxminan 40 nafari hovlida qoldi va o'z kameralariga qaytishdan bosh tortdi. Muzokarachilar holatni to'g'rilashga harakat qilib ko'rdi, lekin mahbuslarning talablari noaniq. Soat 10:00–11:00 (TK) MDT orasida hovlidagi mahbuslar yong'in keltirib chiqardi. Ko'p o'tmay, isyonga qarshi qurollangan askarlar hovliga kirdi va mahbuslarni ko'zni yoshlantiruvchi gazlar bilan burchakka burishdi. Yong'indan qutqaruv guruhlari va nihoyat, tungi soat 11:35 da olovni o'chirishdi.

src: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."
mt: “Buni televideniye orqali yashirincha yozib olib, axborot vositalariga yozib olib, bu xabarlar birinchi marta Iran davlatining yuqori martabali shaxslari tomonidan qo'llab-quvvatlangan. Ular moliyaviy cheklashlar va Yevropa Ittifoqining neft eksportini taqiqlashdan iborat. OPECning so'nggi oylik hisobotida neft eksportining 20 yildan buyon eng past darajasi 2,8 million barreldan iboratligi haqida xabar berilgan. Buning sabablaridan biri 1979-yilda islom inqilobi paytida neftga bog'liq bo'lganligi haqida aytilgan. ref: "Televizorda jonli tarzda berilgan sharhlar Eronning yirik manbalari sanksiyalarning ta'sir o'tkazayotganligini tan olganligining dastlabkisi edi. Ular Yevropa Ittifoqi tomonidan Eron iqtisodiyoti 80% tashqi daromadini oladigan ishlov berilmagan neft eksportiga moliyaviy cheklovlar va taqiqlarni o'z ichiga oladi. O'zining eng so'nggi oylik hisobotida OPEC neft xom ashyosi eksportlarining yigirma yil ichida eng past darajasiga tushib, kuniga 2,8 million barrelni tashkil qilganligini aytdi. Mamlakatning oliy yetakchisi Oyatulloh Ali Xomanaiy neftga bog'lanib qolishni 1979-yildagi Islom inqilobidan avval boshlangan va mamlakat o'zini xalos qilishi kerak bo'lgan ""tuzoq"" deb atadi."

src: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
mt: Fransuzda saylovlar asosan past texnologiyalarga asoslangan tajribaga ega: saylovchilar o'zaro ajralib turishlari kerak bo'lgan omborlarda, ularning tanlangan nomzodlari haqidagi qo'shimcha ma'lumotlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarni o'z ichiga olgan qog'ozlarn
ref: Frantsiyada ovoz berish an'anaga ko'ra past texnologiyali tajribaga ega: ovoz beruvchilar o'zlarini butkada yakkalaydilar, o'zlari tanlagan nomzod ko'rsatilgan avvaldan bosma terilgan qog'oz varag'ini konvertga joylaydilar. Rasmiylar saylovchi shaxsini tasdiqlaganidan keyin saylovchi konvertni ovoz berish qutisiga tashlaydi hamda ovoz berish varag'iga imzo chekadi. Fransuz saylov qonunchiligi mazkur jarayonlarni ancha qat'iy kodifikatsiya qiladi. 1988-yildan beri ovoz beruvchilar va kuzatuvchilar boshlanishida konvertlar mavjud emasligi va mos tarzda sanalgan va vakolat berilgan ovoz beruvchilardan tashqari hech qanday konvertlar qo'shilmasligiga guvohlik bera olishlari uchun saylov qutilarining shaffof bo'lishi talab qilinadi. Nomzodlar jarayonning barcha qismlariga guvoh bo'lish uchun vakillarini jo'natishlari mumkin. Kechki payt maxsus qoidalarga amal qilgan holda, qattiq nazorat ostida ko'ngillilar tomonidan ovozlar sanaladi.

src: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.
mt: Agar bu xabar to'g'ri bo'lsa, Allen Musashi uchun olti yildan buyon olib borilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga qaratilgan o'chirib tashlangan dengiz kemasi topishga q
ref: Agar tasdiqlansa, topilma Allenning Musashiga oid sakkiz yillik tadqiqotlariga yakun yasaydi. Dengiz tubini xaritalashdan keyin kema qoldiqlari ROV yordamida topildi. Xabarlarga ko'ra, dunyoning eng badavlat kishilaridan biri bo'lgan Allen o'z boyligining katta qismini dengizni tadqiq qilishga sarmoya sifatida kiritgan va urushdagi azaliy qiziqishi — Musashini topish uchun qidiruvga kirishgan.

src: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.
mt: Televideniye xabarlariga ko'ra, zavoddan oq yong'och chiqib tushmoq. Yonida yashovchi aholi xavfsizligi organlari aholini ichki joylarda qolishga chaqirishdi, sovuq suv iste'mol qilmaslik va havodagi temperaturani oshirishni to'xtatishni so'radilar. Yaponiya atom agentligining xabar berishicha, zavodda radioaktiv cesium va iyod kashf etildi. Xavfsizlik organlari bu xabar bilan ishlatuvchi uranli qaynatuvchilarning konteynerlari yorilganligi va ulardan chiqib ketishiga ishonishdi.
ref: Televizion xabarlarda zavoddan chiqayotgan oq tutun tasvirlangan. Mahalliy hokimiyat organlari zavod atrofidagi aholini uyda qolish, konditsionerlarni o'chirib qo'yish hamda jo'mraklardan suv ichmaslik to'g'risida ogohlantirmoqda. Zavodda radioaktiv seziy va yod aniqlangani haqida Yaponiya yadroviy agentligi xabar bergan. Mutasaddilar organlari joydagi uran yoqilg'isi bo'lgan konteynerlar yorilgan va to'kilayotgan bo'lishi mumkinligini taxmin qilishmoqda.

src: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."
mt: Dr. Tony Moll Janubiy Afrikadagi KvaZulu-Natal viloyatida XDR-TB (qattiq dorilarga qarshi tuberkulyoz)ni kashf etdi. Ushbu variant haqida so'zlaganda, u shunday dedi: ""Bu juda og'ir va xavfli bo'lib, bu tibbiyotda o'qitilgan odamlar orasida keng tarqalgan bo'lib, bu juda og'ir va xavfli bo'lib, bu tibbiyotda o'qitilgan odamlar orasida keng tarqalgan bo'lib, bu juda og'ir va xavfli bo'lib, bu tibbiyotda o'qitilgan odamlar orasida keng tarqalgan bo'lib, bu juda og'ir va xavfli bo'lib, bu tibbiyotda o'qitilgan odamlar orasida keng tarqalgan bo'lib, bu juda og'ir va xavfli bo'lib, bu tibbiyotda o'qitilgan odamlar orasida keng tarqalgan bo'lib, bu juda og'ir va xavfli bo'lib, bu tibbiyotda o'qitilgan odamlar orasida keng tarqalgan bo'lib, bu juda og'ir va xavfli bo'lib, bu tibbiyotda o'qitilgan odamlar orasida keng tarqalgan bo'lib, bu juda og'ir va xavfli bo'lib, bu tibbiyotda o'qitilgan odamlar orasida keng tarqalgan bo'lib, bu juda og'ir va xavfli bo'lib, bu tibbiyotda o'qitilgan odamlar orasida keng tarqalgan bo'lib, bu juda og'ir va xavfli bo'lib, bu tibbiyotda o'qitilgan odamlar orasida keng tarqalgan bo'lib, bu juda og'
ref: "Janubiy Afrikaning KvaZulu-Natal viloyatida shifokor Toni Moll dori vositasiga o'ta bardoshli sil kasalligini (XDR-TB) aniqladi. Intervyuda u yangi tur ""juda yuqori o'lim darajasi tufayli juda xavotirli va qo'rqinchli bo'lganligini"" aytdi. Doktor Mollning fikriga ko'ra, bir nechta bemorlar shifoxonada kasallikni yuqtirgan bo'lishlari mumkin va eng kamida ulardan ikkitasi shifoxonadagi sog'liqni saqlash xodimlari bo'lgan. Kasallangan kishi bir yil ichida 10–15 ga yaqin odamga yuqtirishi mumkin. Ammo sil kasalligi bilan xastalangan odamlarning butun guruhida XDR-TB ulushi hali ham past ko'rinadi; Janubiy Afrikada istalgan muayyan lahzada jami 330 000 kishidan 6000 nafari kasallangan."

src: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.
mt: NextGen - bu Federal Aviatsiya Administratsiyasi (FAA) tomonidan taklif etilgan tizim bo'lib, u uchuvchilarga qisqarib ketishga imkoniyat beradi va har yil millionlar jildlari kerosinni saqlab qolishga va karbon emisiyalarini kamaytirishga imkoniyat beradi. Uning asosiy xususiyatlari - geostatsionar tizimlardan foydalanish, bu esa uchuvchilarga qisqarib ketishga imkoniyat beradi va uchuvchilarga to'g'riroq ma'lumot beradi.
ref: FAA da'vo qilishicha, NextGen — samolyotlarga qisqa yo'nalishda uchish va har yili millionlab gallon yonilg'ini tejash hamda uglerod chiqindilarini kamaytirish imkonini beruvchi tizimdir. U eski radiolokatsiya texnologiyalaridan farqli ravishda, sputnikka asoslangan texnologiyadan foydalanib, havo harakati nazoratchilariga samolyotlarni yanada yaxshiroq aniqlash hamda uchuvchilarga yanada aniqroq ma'lumot berish imkonini taqdim qiladi.

src: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
mt: Tarixchilar sobiq FBI siyosatlarini o'qotar avtomobillar haqidagi hollardan boshqa qolgan hollarni hal qilishga qaratilgan ekanligini tanqid qilishdi. Kongress 2005 yilgi byudjetni moliyalashtirishni boshladi va AQSH Federaliteti (FBI) 10 nafar agentni pornografiyaga bag'ishlashni talab qildi.
ref: Tarixchilar agentlikning muvaffaqiyat darajasini kuchaytirish uchun osongina hal qilish mumkin bo'lgan, ayniqsa avtomobil o'g'rilanishi bo'yicha ishlarga resurslarning qaratilganligi uchun FQB agentligining o'tmishdagi siyosatlarini tanqid qildilar. Kongress 2005-moliyaviy yildan axloqsizlik bo'yicha tashabbusni moliyalashtira boshladi va FQB kattalar pornografiyasiga 10 nafar agent ajratishi lozimligini belgiladi.

src: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
mt: JAS 39C Gripen 9:30 da (0230 UTC) mahalliy vaqt bilan bandarga tushib portlash qilib, aeroportni tijorat uchishlari uchun yopdi. Pilotning nomi kaptan Dilokrit Pattavee edi. Mahalliy axborot vositalari xabar berishicha, portlashdan so'ng aeroportning o'q otish mashinasi qo'rqib ketib tushib ketdi.
ref: JAS 39C Gripen mahalliy vaqt bilan ertalab soat 9:30 lar (0230 UTC) atrofida uchish-qo'nish yo'lagida halokatga uchradi va portlab ketdi, shu tufayli aeroport tijoriy reyslar uchun yopildi. Uchuvchi bo'linma rahbari Dilokrit Pattava ekanligi aniqlandi. Mahalliy axborot vositalarining xabar berishicha, aeroportdagi o't o'chirish mashinasi ish vaqtida ag'darilib ketgan.

src: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
mt: 1960-yillarda Brzezinski Jon F. Kennedi kabinetida maslahatchi bo'lib ishlagan va keyinroq Lyndon B. Johnson kabinetida ishlagan. 1976-yilgi saylovlar davrida u Carterga tashqi siyosat masalalarida maslahat berdi, so'ngra 1977-yildan 1981-yilgacha Milliy xavfsizlik maslahatchisi (NSA) bo'lib ishladi, uning o'rniga Henry Kissingeri almashtirdi. NSA sifatida u Carterga dunyodagi voqealarni diplomatiyadan boshqarishda yordam berdi, masalan, 1978-yilda Camp David shartnomasi, 1970-yillarda AQSh–Xitoy munosabatlarini normalizatsiya qilish, 1979-yilda Eron inqilobi, uning natijasida 1979-yilda Eron qo'rqinchli holatiga olib kelgan, shuningdek, Sovetlarning Afg'onistonga bosqini, 1979-yilda.
ref: 1960-yillar mobaynida Bjezinski Jon F. Kennedining maslahatchisi sifatida, so'ng Lindon B. Jonson ma'muriyatida faoliyat yuritdi. 1976-yilgi saylovlar vaqtida u Karterga tashqi siyosat borasida maslahat bergan, so'ng Genri Kissingerdan keyin 1977-yildan 1981-yilgacha Milliy xavfsizlik maslahatchisi (NSA) sifatida xizmat qilgan. NSA xodimi sifatida u Karterga 1978-yildagi Kemp-Devid shartnomasi; 1970-yillarning oxirlarida AQSH-Xitoy aloqalarini normallashtirish; 1979-yilda Eron garovi inqiroziga sabab bo'lgan Eron inqilobi; va 1979-yildagi Sovet Ittifoqining Afg'onistondagi bosqini kabi xalqaro masalalarni diplomatik tarzda hal qilishda yordam berdi.

src: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.
mt: Bobek Zagreb shahrida tug'ilgan. U Belgradning Partizan jamoasida o'ynab, shuhrat qozondi. U 1945-yilda ular safida o'ynay boshlagan va 1958-yilgacha o'ynagan. Jamoa safida 468 ta o'yinda 403 ta gol urgan. Jamoaning boshqa o'yinchilaridan ko'ra u jamoada eng ko'p o'yin o'tkazgan va eng ko'p gol urgan o'yinchi bo'lgan. 1995-yilda u jamoaning tarixidagi eng yaxshi futbolchisi deb topilgan.
ref: "Xorvatiya poytaxti Zagrebda dunyoga kelgan Bobek ""Partizan Belgrad"" safida to'p surib mashhurlikka erishgan. U ularga 1945-yilda qo'shildi va 1958-yilgacha turdi. Jamoadagi faoliyati davomida u 468 ta uchrashuvda 403 ta gol urgan. Hech kim Bobekdan ko'ra ko'proq guruh uchun maydonga tushmagan yoki gol urmagan. 1995-yili u ""Partizan"" jamoasi tarixidagi eng yaxshi o'yinchi deb topildi."

src: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""
mt: "Hesperonychus elizabethae dromaeosauriyalarning oilasiga tegishli turi va Velociraptorning qarindoshi hisoblanadi. ref: "Hesperonikus Elizabet — Dromaeozavrlar oilasiga mansub va Velosiraptorning yaqin qarindoshi hisoblanadi. Tanasi pat bilan to'liq qoplangan, qoni qaynoq bu yirtqich qush Velosiraptorga kabi tirnoqli ikki old oyog'ini ko'tarib tik holatda yurgan deb ishonilgan. Uning ikkinchi panjasi kattaroq bo'lib, unga ""g'arbiy changal"" ma'nosini anglatuvchi Hesperonikus nomini bergan."

This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.
mt: Shartli ma'lumotlarga ko'ra, kamida 100 kishi tashrif buyurib, turli xil tadbirlar bilan birinchi yilligini nishonlashdi. Boshqaruvchilar aytishicha, turli xil tadbirlar keyingi kunlarda o'tkazilishi kerak edi. Er-xotinning turli xil tadbirlar bilan birinchi yilligini nishonlashdi. ref: O'tgan yili to'yi bo'lgan juftlik nikohining bir yilligini nishonlash uchun bazmga kamida 100 nafar odam keldi. Rasmiylar rasmiy yubiley tadbiri keyinroq o'tkazilishi rejalashtirilganini aytdilar. Juftlik bir yil avval Texasda turmush qurgan hamda do'stlari hamda qarindoshlari bilan nishonlash uchun Buffaloga kelgan edi. Buffaloda tavallud topgan 30 yoshli erkak otishmada halok bo'lgan to'rt kishidan biri edi, lekin uning rafiqasi jabrlanmadi.

src: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.
mt: Vautierning rejissorlikdan tashqari yutuqlari, u 1973-yilda siyosiy sensorlikka qarshi o'zining iste'mol qilishini boshlagan. Fransuz qonuni o'zgartirildi. Ushbu faollikka 15 yoshida Ikkinchi Jahon urushi davrida Fransiya qarshiligi bilan qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo'shilib, qo
ref: Votyening rejissyorlikdan tashqari erishgan yutuqlariga 1973-yilda o'zi siyosiy senzura deb bilgan narsasiga qarshi ochlik e'lon qilgani ham kiradi. Fransuz qonuni o'zgartirildi. Uning faoliyati 15 yoshligiga, u Ikkinchi jahon urushi davrida Fransiya qarshiligi harakatiga qo'shilgan davrga taqaladi. U o'zini 1998-yilgi kitobga kiritdi. 1960-yilda u kino rejissyorligidan dars berish uchun endigina mustaqil bo'lgan Jazoirga yo'l oldi.

src: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
mt: Rimda 4 milliondan ortiq kishi Yohannaning dafn marosimiga qatnashdi. Yohannaning dafn marosimida ishtirok etish uchun har bir kishiga kirish mumkin emas edi. Rimdagi turli joylarda katta televizor ekranlari o'rnatildi. Italiyadagi boshqa shaharlarda va dunyoning boshqa qismlarida, ayniqsa Polshada, shunga o'xshash tizimlar qurildi, ularni katta miqdorda kishilar ko'rdi.
ref: Dafn marosimida ishtirok etish uchun to'rt milliondan ko'proq kishi Rimga tashrif buyurdi. Kelganlar soni shu qadar ko'p ediki, barchaning Avliyo Peter maydonidagi dafn marosimiga kirishi imkonsiz edi. Odamlarga marosimni ko'rishlariga imkon berish uchun Rimning turli joylarida bir nechta katta ekranli televizorlar o'rnatilgan edi. Italiyadagi boshqa ko'pgina shaharlarda hamda dunyoning qolgan qismida, xususan, Polshada ko'p sonli kishilar tomonidan tomosha qilingan shunga o'xshash konstruksiyalar o'rnatildi.

src: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
mt: Gaz chiqishi tufayli Macbeth ko'chasidagi kvartira portlab ketgan. Gaz kompaniyasining rasmiysi gaz chiqish haqida xabardor bo'lgan qo'riqchining xabari tufayli joyga kelgan. Rasmiy ishga kirib kelganda kvartira portlab ketgan. Asosiy jarohatlarga duch kelmaydi, ammo portlab ketgan paytda joyda bo'lgan kamida besh kishi g'ayritibdi simptomlariga duch keldi. Kvartirada hech kim bo'lmagan. Uchish vaqtida atrofida 100 ga yaqin aholi mintaqadan evakuatsiya qilingan.
ref: Xabar qilinishicha, Makbet ko'chasida joylashgan xonadon gaz sizib chiqishi tufayli portlagan. Gaz kompaniyasi rasmiysi qo'shnilaridan biri telefonda sizib chiqayotgani haqida xabar qilganidan so'ng voqea joyiga xabar berayotgan edi. Mutasaddi yetib kelganida kvartira portladi. Og'ir jarohatlar to'g'risida xabar berilmagan, biroq portlash paytida voqea joyida bo'lgan kamida besh kishi shok simtomlariga qarshi davolangan. Xonadon ichkarisida hech kimsa yo'q edi. o'sha vaqtda qariyb 100 ga yaqin aholi hududdan evakuatsiya qilindi.

src: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.
mt: O'limlar 25 yoshli Nicholas Alden va 21 yoshli Zachary Cuddeback edi. Cuddeback avtomobil haydovchisi bo'lgan. Edgar Veguilla qo'li va bo'g'imlaridan jarohatlangan, shuningdek, Kristoffer Schneider yuzidan rekonstruktiv operatsiya o'tkazishga to'g'ri kelgan. Uka boshini boshqa bir kishiga qaratib qo'llab-quvvatlashda muvaffaqiyatsizlikka uchragan. Schneider o'z vatanida AQSh havo kuchlari bazasida videolink orqali dalil berdi.
ref: 25 yoshli Nikolas Alden va 21 yoshli Zakari Kaddebek halok bo'ldi. Kaddebek haydovchi bo'lgan. Edgar Veguilla qo'li va jag'idan jarohat oldi, Kristofer Shnayderning yuzi esa qayta tiklash jarrohlik operatsiyasini talab etadi. Ukaning beshinchi odam boshiga o'qtalgan quroli ishlamay qoldi. Shnayder beto'xtov og'riq sezar, bir ko'zi ko'r, bosh suyagining bir qismi yo'q va yuzi titandan qayta tiklangan edi. Shnayder o'z yurtidagi USAF bazasidan turib video havola orqali guvohlik berdi.

src: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.
mt: Golf va regbi Olimpiya o'yinlariga qaytishini belgiladi. Xalqaro Olimpiya qo'mitasining Berlindagi ijroiya qo'mitasi yig'ilishida bu sportlar tanlab olingan. Regbi, xususan, regbi ittifoqi va golf boshqa besh sportdan tanlab olingan. Qo'ng'iroq, karate va roller sportlar ham Olimpiya dasturiga kirish uchun urinish qilgan. 2005-yilda Olimpiya o'yinlaridan chiqarib yuborilgan beysbol va softbol ham bu dasturga kirish uchun urinish qilgan. Barcha qarorlar Kopenhagen shahrida oktyabr oyida bo'lib o'tadigan to'liq Xalqaro Olimpiya qo'mitasida tasdiqlanishi kerak.
ref: Golf ham, regbi ham Olimpiya o'yinlariga qaytish arafasida. Xalqaro olimpiya qo'mitasi bugun Berlindagi ijroiya kengashi yig'ilishida mazkur sport turlarini kiritishga ovoz berdi. Ko'rib chiqilishi kerak bo'lgan boshqa beshta sport turlaridan ko'ra, regbi, xususan, regbi yunion va golf Olimpiada o'yinlarida ishtirok etish uchun tanlangan. Sqvosh, karate va rolikda uchish 2005-yil Olimpiada o'yinlaridan chiqarib yuborilgan beysbol va softbol singari Olimpiada dasturiga kiritilishiga harakat qilgan sport turlaridir. Ovoz hali ham to'liq XOQ tomonidan oktyabr oyida Kopengagenda bo'lib o'tadigan yig'ilishida tasdiqlanishi kerak.

src: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.
mt: Golf va regbi Olimpiya o'yinlariga qaytishini belgiladi. Xalqaro Olimpiya qo'mitasining Berlindagi ijroiya qo'mitasi yig'ilishida bu sportlar tanlab olingan. Regbi, xususan, regbi ittifoqi va golf boshqa besh sportdan tanlab olingan. Qo'ng'iroq, karate va roller sportlar ham Olimpiya dasturiga kirish uchun urinish qilgan. 2005-yilda Olimpiya o'yinlaridan chiqarib yuborilgan beysbol va softbol ham bu dasturga kirish uchun urinish qilgan. Barcha qarorlar Kopenhagen shahrida oktyabr oyida bo'lib o'tadigan to'liq Xalqaro Olimpiya qo'mitasida tasdiqlanishi kerak.
ref: Golf ham, regbi ham Olimpiya o'yinlariga qaytish arafasida. Xalqaro olimpiya qo'mitasi bugun Berlindagi ijroiya kengashi yig'ilishida mazkur sport turlarini kiritishga ovoz berdi. Ko'rib chiqilishi kerak bo'lgan boshqa beshta sport turlaridan ko'ra, regbi, xususan, regbi yunion va golf Olimpiada o'yinlarida ishtirok etish uchun tanlangan. Sqvosh, karate va rolikda uchish 2005-yil Olimpiada o'yinlaridan chiqarib yuborilgan beysbol va softbol singari Olimpiada dasturiga kiritilishiga harakat qilgan sport turlaridir. Ovoz hali ham to'liq XOQ tomonidan oktyabr oyida Kopengagenda bo'lib o'tadigan yig'ilishida tasdiqlanishi kerak.

src: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.
mt: 1759-yil 24-sentabrda Artur Guinness Dublindagi St James' Gate Brewery uchun 9,000 yillik shartnoma imzoladi. 250 yildan so'ng, Guinness dunyo biznesiga aylandi, har yili 10 milliard evro (AQSH 14,7 milliard dollari) daromad olib keladi.
ref: 1759-yil 24-sentabrda Artur Ginnes Irlandiyaning Dublin shahridagi Avliyo Jeyms darvozasi pivo zavodini 9 ming yilga ijaraga olish bo'yicha shartnomaga imzo chekdi. 250 yildan keyin Ginnes har yili 10 milliard yevro (14,7 milliard AQSH dollari) foyda olib keluvchi global biznesga aylandi.

src: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
mt: O'limga olib keladigan qush qo'rg'oshini, H5N1, Fransiyadagi Lyonda, Fransiyaning sharqiy qismida botqoqli hududlarda topilgan o'ldirilgan o'rdakda tasdiqlangan. Fransiya Yevropa Ittifoqida qo'rg'oshin kasalligidan aziyat chekkan yettiinchi mamlakat bo'lib, uning oldidan Avstriya, Germaniya, Sloveniya, Bolgariya, Gretsiya va Italiya kabi mamlakatlarda bu virus aniqlangan. Xorvatiya va Daniyada H5N1 bilan bog'liq taxminiy holatlar hali tasdiqlanmagan.
ref: Fransiyaning sharqidagi Lion yaqinida joylashgan botqoqdan dushanba kuni topilgan o'lik o'rdak insonlar uchun halokatli bo'lgan parranda grippining H5N1 turi bilan kasallangani tasdiqlandi. Fransiya Avstriya, Germaniya, Sloveniya, Bolgariya, Gretsiya va Italiyadan so'ng, ushbu virsdan aziyat chekkan Yevropa Ittifoqidagi yettinchi mamlakatdir. Xorvatiya va Daniyada H5N1 bilan kasallanishda gumon qilinayotgan holatlar hamon tasdiqlanmagan.

src: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.
mt: 2010 yilgi zilziladan keyin Hayitga kelgan tinchlik kuchlari, shu jumladan, Nepal tinchlik kuchlari, kasallikning tarqalishiga javobgardir, deb ayblanmoqda. Qonun shartnomasiga ko'ra, tinchlik kuchlari lageridan chiqib ketgan qoldiqlar yaxshi sanitariya qilinmaganligi sababli, bakteriyalar Artibonite daryosining bir qismiga kirib borishiga sabab bo'lgan. Hayitda tinchlik kuchlari kelishdan avval kasallik bilan bog'liq muammolar 1800-yillardan beri mavjud emas edi. Hayitda adolat va demokratiya instituti o'zining mustaqil tadqiqotlari asosida tinchlik kuchlari Hayitga kasallikni olib kirdiki haqidagi xabarlarni keltirgan. Kasallikga oid UN eksperti Danielle Lantagne kasallikning tarqalishiga sabab bo'lgan tinchlik kuchlarini aniqladi.
ref: 2010-yildagi zilziladan so'ng Gaitiga yetib kelgan BMT tinchlikparvar kuchlari harbiylar qarorgohi yaqinida boshlangan kasallikni tarqatishda ayblanmoqda. Sudga kiritilgan da'voga ko'ra, BMT lageridagi chiqindilar munosib tarzda sanitarizatsiya qilinmagan bo'lib, bakteriyaning Gaitining eng yirik daryolaridan biri — Artibonit daryosi irmog'iga kirib kelishiga sabab bo'lgan. Qo'shinlar yetib kelishidan avval, Gaitida 1800-yillardan buyon mazkur kasallik bilan bog'liq muammolar kuzatilmagan. Gaiti Adolat va Demokratiya Instituti Nepalning BMT tinchlikparvar bataloni o'zi bilmagan holatda Gaitiga xastalikni olib kelganligini ko'rsatuvchi mustaqil izlanishlarga murojaat etdi. BMTning mazkur kasallik bo'yicha mutaxassisi Deniel Lantan epidemiyaga tinchlikparvar kuchlar sabab bo'lgan bo'lishi mumkinligini ta'kidladi.

src: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."
mt: "Irlandiya hukumati parlament to'g'risidagi qonun loyihasini qabul qilishni tezlashtirishga ishontiradi. "Bu davlat sog'lig'i va jinoyat huquqi nuqtai nazaridan muhimdir", - deydi hukumat vakili. Sog'liqni saqlash vaziri shaxsning xavfsizligi va bu xil moddalar haqida qonun loyihasi kiritilgandan keyin qabul qilingan nazoratsizlikdan foydalanayotgan shaxslar uchun ham, nazoratsizlikdan foydalanayotgan shaxslar uchun ham shubhali ekanligini bildirdi."
ref: "Irlandiya hukumati vaziyatni o'nglash uchun parlament qonunchiligining zarurligida urg'u bermoqda. Hukumat so'zchisining aytishicha, ""hozirda qonunning imkon qadar tezroq qabul qilinishi ham aholi salomatligi, ham jinoiy adliya nuqtayi nazaridan muhim"". Sog'liqni saqlash vaziri mazkur moddalarning vaqtincha qonuniyligidan foydalanuvchi shaxslarning salomatligi yuzasidan hamda endilikda konstitutsiyaga zid bo'lgan o'zgarishlar kuchga kirishi bilan chiqarilgan giyohvand moddalarga oid hukmlar borasida ham tashvishda ekanini bildirdi."

src: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."
mt: Los Angeles politsiyasi vakili Christopher Garcia, aytilishicha, ayblangan erkak qochqin bo'lib, o'qirib yuborish uchun tekshirilmoqda, bu esa vandalizm uchun emas. Belgi materialan jiddiy zarar yetkazmagan; o'zgarishlar tashqi ko'rinishga qarab yozuvlar bilan bezatilgan qora tarpallar bilan amalga oshirilgan.
ref: "Los-Anjeles politsiya boshqarmasi vakili Kristofer Garsiya so'zlariga ko'ra, gumon qilinayotgan erkak jinoyatchi vandalizmda emas, mulkiy daxlsizlikni buzish bo'yicha tergov qilinmoqda. Belgiga moddiy zarar yetkazilmagan; moslashtirish kichkina ""e"" harfini o'qish uchun ""O""ni o'zgartirish maqsadida tinchlik hamda yurak belgilari bilan bezatilgan qora brezentlar yordamida amalga oshirilgan."

src: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'
mt: Karno ingliz tili o'qituvchisi bo'lib, u Modern ta'lim va Qirolning shon-shuhratini o'qituvchi sifatida ishlagan. Ushbu o'qituvchining o'qituvchilik faoliyatida eng yuqori cho'qqida 9 ming talaba bo'lgan. Ushbu o'qituvchining yozuvlarida qo'llanilgan so'zlar ba'zi ota-onalarning fikricha qattiq edi, shuningdek, u sinfda profan so'zlar qo'llaganligi haqida xabar berilgan. Modern ta'lim uni bekor qilgan holda, u avtobuslarda katta reklama e'lon qilgani va u eng yirik ingliz tili o'qituvchisi ekanligini aytgani uchun ayblagan. Ushbu o'qituvchiga avvalroq shaxsiy mulkni himoya qilishda ayblangan, lekin unga javob berilmagan. Bir qancha talabalarning aytishicha, u sinfda qattiq so'zlar qo'llagan, yozuvlarda tanlash qobiliyatini o'rgatgan va talabalar bilan do'stlik qilgan.
ref: "Karno mashhur, lekin o'zi ta'kidlaganidek faoliyatining cho'qqisida 9000 nafar talabasi bo'lgan ""Modern Education"" va ""King's Glory"" ta'lim markazlarida dars bergan munozarali ingliz tili o'qituvchisidir. Qaydlarida u ayrim ota-onalar qo'pol deb hisoblaydigan so'zlardan foydalangan va uning sinfda behayo so'zlardan foydalangani xabar qilingan. Modern Education uni ruxsatsiz katta hajmdagi reklamalarni avtobuslarda chop qilish va o'zini ingliz tili bo'yicha katta o'qituvchisi deb aytish orqali yolg'on gapirishda aybladi. U ilgari mualliflik huquqini buzganlikda ham ayblangan, lekin unga ayblov e'lon qilinmagan. Sobiq talaba ""darsda jargondan foydalangani, eslamarda tanishish ko'nikmalarini o'rgatgani va shunchaki, talabalarning do'stidek bo'lganini"" aytdi."

src: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.
mt: Filipinlik sobiq politsiyachi Maniladagi (Filipin poytaxti) turizmchilar uchun xodimlarni o'z busini o'g'irlab qo'ydi. Rolando Mendoza turizmchilarga qarshi M16 to'pposini ishlatdi. Qo'rqinchli o'g'irlab qo'yuvchilar qutqarildi va kamida olti kishi halok bo'lganini tasdiqladi. Shuningdek, Filippinlik fotosuratchilar qutqarildi. Fotosuratchilar keyinchak qo'rqinchli o'g'irlab qo'yuvchining o'rniga qo'yildi, chunki uqtirishga muhtoj ayolga kerak edi. Mendoza otib o'ldirildi.
ref: Filippinlik sobiq politsiyachi Filippin poytaxti Manila shahrida Gonkonglik sayyohlar avtobusini olib qochib, ularni garovda ushlab turdi. Rolando Mendoza M16 avtomatida sayohatchilarni o'qqa tutdi. Garovdagilarning bir nechtasi qutqarib olindi va hozirga qadar kamida olti kishi o'lgani tasdiqlangan. Olti nafar garovga olinganlar, jumladan, bolalar va keksalardan, filippinlik suratkashlar kabi, erta ozod qilindi. Keksa ayol hojatxonaga muhtoj bo'lgani tufayli keyinchalik suratkashlar uning o'rnini egallashgan. Mendozaga o'q uzilgan.

src: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
mt: Brazil - Yerdagi eng katta Rim katolik davlati va Rim katolik cherkoviga qarshi turib, Braziliyada bir xil jinsdagi nikohni qonuniy qilishga qarshi turadi. Braziliya Milliy Kongressi 10 yil davomida bu masalani muhokama qildi va hozirda faqat Rio Grande do Sulda bu turlardagi fuqarolik nikohlari qonuniydir. Asl qonun Marta Suplicy shahar meri bo'lgan vaqtda tayyorlangan. Tahrir qilingan qonun hozirda Roberto Jeffersonga berilgan. Proteschentlar noyabr oyida Milliy Kongressga 1,2 million imzo to'plashni umid qilishadi.
ref: Braziliya dunyodagi eng katta Rim-katolik mamlakatidir va Rim-katolik cherkovi mamlakatda bir xil jinsli nikohlarning qonuniylashtirilishiga doimiy ravishda qarshilik qilib keladi. Braziliya Milliy Kongressi 10 yildan buyon qonuniylashtirish masalasini muhokama qilib kelmoqda hamda bu kabi fuqarolik nikohlari hozirgi kunda faqatgina Rio Grand de Sulda qonuniydir. Qonun loyihasining asl nusxasini San Pauloning sobiq meri Marta Suplifi ishlab chiqqan. Taklif etilgan qonun, o'zgartirilgandan keyin, hozirda Robert Jeffersonning qo'lida. Namoyishchilar Milliy Kongressga taqdim qilish uchun 1,2 million imzoga ega petitsiyani to'plashga umid qilishmoqda.

src: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
mt: Brazil - Yerdagi eng katta Rim katolik davlati va Rim katolik cherkoviga qarshi turib, Braziliyada bir xil jinsdagi nikohni qonuniy qilishga qarshi turadi. Braziliya Milliy Kongressi 10 yil davomida bu masalani muhokama qildi va hozirda faqat Rio Grande do Sulda bu turlardagi fuqarolik nikohlari qonuniydir. Asl qonun Marta Suplicy shahar meri bo'lgan vaqtda tayyorlangan. Tahrir qilingan qonun hozirda Roberto Jeffersonga berilgan. Proteschentlar noyabr oyida Milliy Kongressga 1,2 million imzo to'plashni umid qilishadi.

Qonun loyihasining asl nusxasini San Pauloning sobiq meri Marta Suplifi ishlab chiqqan. Taklif etilgan qonun, o'zgartirilgandan keyin, hozirda Robert Jeffersonning qo'lida. Namoyishchilar Milliy Kongressga taqdim qilish uchun 1,2 million imzoga ega petitsiyani to'plashga umid qilishmoqda.

src: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."
mt: "Besh daqiqa ichida namoyishda bir soatlik shamol boshlanadi, bir daqiqa o'tib, shamol 70km/ga yetadi... keyin yog'ish boshlanadi, lekin shuncha kuchli va shuncha katta bo'lib, qattiq qotishga o'xshaydi, keyin quyoshdan qor tushadi, odamlar qo'rqib, qo'rqib, bir-biriga to'sib ketishadi,"" Armand Versace deydi.
ref: "Ko'rgazmadan besh daqiqa o'tib, shamol esa boshladi, taxminan bir daqiqadan so'ng, shamolning tezligi 70 km/s ga yetadi… undan keyin yomg'ir yog'ishni boshladi, shunaqangi qattiq va shiddatli yog'adiki, tanaga ignadek sanchiladi, shundan keyin osmondan do'l yog'iladi, odamlar vahimaga tushgan va qichqirib, bir-birining ustiga yugura boshladi. ""Men singlim va uning do'stini yo'qotib qo'ydim, yo'limda nogironlik aravachasidagi ikki nogiron kishi uchradi, odamlar shunchaki ularning ustidan sakrab va ularni itarib o'tayotgandi"", dedi Armand Versache."

src: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.
mt: Bu tufan, Kap Verde orolari yaqinida joylashgan bo'lib, u yerda 645 mil (1040 km) uzoqlikda joylashgan, e'lon qilinishicha, bu yerlarni tahdid qilmasligi mumkin. Fred hozircha 105 mil (165 km/h) tezlikda shimoli-g'arbga yo'nalgan bo'lib, u yerda 35°G' sharoitida joylashgan eng kuchli tropik siklon bo'lib, u yerda 35°G' sharoitida joylashgan eng kuchli tropik siklon bo'lib, u yerda 35°G' sharoitida joylashgan eng kuchli tropik siklon bo'lib, u yerda 35°G' sharoitida joylashgan eng kuchli tropik siklon bo'lib, u yerda 35°G' sharoitida joylashgan eng kuchli tropik siklon bo'lib, u yerda 35°G' sharoitida joylashgan eng kuchli tropik siklon bo'lib, u yerda 35°G' sharoitida joylashgan eng kuchli tropik siklon bo'lib, u yerda 35°G' sharoitida joylashgan eng kuchli tropik siklon bo'lib, u yerda 35°G' sharoitida joylashgan eng kuchli tropik siklon bo'lib, u yerda 35°G' sharoitida joylashgan eng kuchli tropik siklon bo'lib, u yerda 35°G' sharoitida joylashgan eng kuchli tropik siklon bo'lib, u yerda 35°G' sharoitida joylashgan eng kuchli tropik siklon bo'lib, u yerda 35°G' sharoitida joylashgan eng kuchli tropik siklon bo'lib, u yerda 35°G' sharoitida joylashgan eng kuchli tropik siklon bo'lib, u yerda 35°G' sharoitida joylashgan eng kuchli tropik siklon bo'lib, u yerda 35°G' sharoitida joy
ref: Sinoptiklarning ta'kidlashicha, Kabo-Verde orollaridan 645 mil (1040 km) g'arbda joylashgan bo'ron quruqlik hududlariga xavf solishidan oldin tinishi mumkin. Fred hozirda soatiga 105 mil (165 km/s) tezlikka ega va u shimoliy-g'arb tomon harakatlanmoqda. Fred sun'iy yo'ldosh orqali tasvirga olish ixtiro qilinganidan beri Atlantika okeanining janubi va sharqida hozirgacha qayd etilganeng kuchli tropik siklondir va sharqdan 35 daraja kenglikda qayd etilgan uchinchi yirik to'fondir.

src: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n standart 2,4 GHz va 5,0 GHz chastotalarida ishlaydi. Bu uni 802.11a, 802.11b va 802.11g bilan qo'llab-quvvatlashga imkoniyat beradi, shartli ravishda bazaga dual radio tizimiga ega bo'lishi kerak. 802.11n ning oldingilaridan ancha tezroq bo'lishi mumkin bo'lgan maksimal nazariy oqimining tezligi 600 Mbit/s.
ref: 802.11n standarti 2,4 Gs va 5,0 Gs chastotalarining ikkalasida ham ishlaydi. Agar tayanch stansiyada qo'sh radio bo'lsa, bu uning 802.11a, 802.11b va 802.11g bilan orqaga qarab mos kelishiga imkon beradi. 802.11n tezligi eng yuqori nazariy ishlab chiqarish quvvati 600 Mbit/s bo'lgan o'zining avvalgi avlodlaridan ko'ra ancha tezroq.

src: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.
mt: Olimpiya oltin medalini qo'lga kiritgan sportchi Commonwealth Gamesda 100 metr va 200 metr sirkatda va uchta relaysda qatnashishi kerak edi, biroq uning shikoyatlari tufayli uning sharoitlari shubhali edi. U o'zining og'risini bartaraf etish uchun zarur bo'lgan dori-darmonlarni olishga qodir emas, chunki ular o'yinlarda qo'llanilmasligi kerak.
ref: Olimpiada o'yinlarining oltin medali sovrindori 100 va 200 metrga erkin usulda suzish bahslari hamda uch karra Hamdo'stlik o'yinlarida uchta estafetada qatnashishi kerak edi, biroq shikoyatlari sababli uning salomatligi shubha ostida qolayotgandi. U og'riqlarini yengish uchun zarur bo'lgan dori-darmonlarni ololmay qoldi, chunki ular o'yinlarda ta'qiqlandi.

src: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.
mt: Qo'shma Shtat Geologik tadqiqotlar xalqaro zilzila xaritasi Icelandda hech qanday zilzilalar emasligini ko'rsatdi. Shuningdek, Iceland meteorologiya boshqarmasi Hekla vulqonining tepasida 48 soat davomida hech qanday zilzila faoliyatini xabar qilmadi. Vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar 10 martda vulqonning tepasidagi qo'rqinchli zilzilalar
ref: Qo'shma Shtatlar Geologik xizmatining xalqaro zilzilalar xaritasi bir hafta avval Islandiyada zilzila bo'lmaganini ko'rsatdi. Islandiyaning meteorologiya xizmati Xekla xududida so'nggi 48 soat ichida hech qanday zilzila sodir bo'lmaganligi haqida xabar berdi. Fazaning o'zgarishiga olib keligan sezilarli zilzila 10-mart kuni vulqonning cho'qqi kalderasining shimoliy-sharqiy tomonida yuz berdi. Biror bir vulqon harakatiga aloqador bo'lmagan qora bulutlar tog' yonbag'rida qayd etilgan edi. Bulutlar haqiqatan ham portlash sodir bo'lgan yoki yo'ligi haqidagi ehtimoliy chalkashlikni keltirib chiqardi.

src: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.
mt: Chandrayaan-1 sayyora orbitirining MIP (sayyora to'g'risidagi ta'sir) sayyora yuzasidan 1,5 km/s (3000 mil/s) tezlikda uchib o'tib, muvaffaqiyatli tushib ketdi. Sayyora to'g'risidagi ta'sir tashqi kuzatuv apparatlaridan tashqari, Hindiston milliy bayrogini ham uchta tomonida chizgan.
ref: Uchuvchisiz oy orbital apparati Chandrayaan-1 oy kosmik zondi (MIP) chiqarib yuborildi va Oy sirti bo'ylab soniyasiga 1,5 km (3000 mil/soat) tezlik bilan uchib, Oyning janubiy qutbiga yaqin joyda muvaffaqiyatli qo'ndi. Oy zondi uchta muhim ilmiy asbobdan tashqari barcha tomonlaridan bo'yalgan Hindiston milliy bayrog'i tasvirini ham olib yurgan.

src: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
mt: Bu mavsumning birinchi holatlari iyulning oxirida qayd etilgan. src: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.
mt: 2011-yilda ikki palatada qabul qilingan taklifga o'zgartirish qo'shildi. Ushbu qonun loyihasi 2013-yilgi parlament sessiyasida ikki palatada qabul qilindi. ref: Taklif qilingan tuzatish 2011-yilda allaqachon ikkala palata tasdig'idan ham o'tgan edi. o'zgartirish mazkur qonunchilik sessiyasida amalga oshirildi, avval ikkinchi gap Vakillar Palatasi tomonidan o'chirildi va keyin dushanba kuni xuddi shu shaklda Senat tomonidan qabul qilindi. Bir jinsli fuqarolik uyushmalarini taqiqlash taklif etilgan ikkinchi gapning muvvaffaqiyatsizligi kelgusida fuqarolik uyushmalariga eshiklarni ochib berishi mumkin. Jarayondan keyin jarayonda qolishi uchun HJR-3 keyingi saylangan qonunchilik organi tomonidan 2015 yoki 2016-yilda qaytadan ko'rib chiqiladi.

src: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."
mt: "Panama Papers" - bu Panamalik yuridik firmasi Mossack Fonseca dan o'qirib chiqqan taxminan o'n million hujjatlar uchun umumiy nom. Hujjatlar shundan iboratki, 1200 shaxsiy korxona yordamida yirik banklar yirik mablag'lar (birlashgan AQSH dollarlari)ni o'zlashtirish uchun soliq va boshqa tartiblar bilan kurashish uchun foydalanishgan. Britaniya gazetasining The Guardian nashri shundan so'ng, Deutsche Bank 1200 shaxsiy korxona uchun taxminan uchinchi qismni boshqarganini aytdi. Boshqa mamlakatlarda namoyishlar bo'lib o'tdi, bir nechta jinoyat sudlariga murojaat qilindi va boshqalari ham bo'ldi.
ref: """Panama hujjatlari"" — Panamaning Mossack Fonseca yuridik kompaniyasining 2016-yili matbuotga sizdirilgan o'n millionga yaqin hujjatlar uchun umumiy atamadir. Hujjatlar o'n to'rtta bankning badavlat mijozlariga soliqlar va boshqa tartib-qoidalardan qochish uchun milliardlab AQSH dollariga teng boyliklarini yashirishga yordam berganini ko'rsatdi. Britaniyaning The Guardian gazetasi Germaniya banki buni amalga oshirish uchun foydalanilgan 1200 ta soxta kompaniyaning taxminan uchdan birini nazorat qilishini aytadi. Dunyo bo'ylab norozilik namoyishlari bo'lib o'tdi, bir qancha jinoiy ta'qiblar amalga oshirildi va Islandiya hamda Pokiston hukumatlari rahbarlari iste'fo berdi."
