src: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.
mt: Aviahalokatlari Eronda keng tarqalgan, bu mamlakatda yosh aviafloti, shuningdek, sivil va harbiy operatsiyalarni yaxshi saqlab qolish qobiliyatiga ega emas. Xalqaro sanksiyalar tufayli yangi samolyar sotib olinishi mumkin emas. Bu hafta boshida politsiya helikopteri halokatga uchradi, uchuvchi va ikki nafar yo'lovchi halok bo'ldi, uchta nafar yaralanib qolgan. Yilning oxirida Eronda yilning eng yirik aviahalokatiga uchradi, Eronning Yerevanga boradigan samolyaridan birining halokatga uchrashi natijasida 168 nafar yo'lovchi halok bo'ldi. Shu oyda Mashhadga boradigan samolyar qo'nish yo'lagidan chiqib, devorga urilib, 17 nafar yo'lovchi halok bo'ldi.
ref: Ham fuqarolik, ham harbiy operatsiyalar uchun texnik soz holatda saqlanmagan eski flotga ega bo'lgan Eronda aviahalokatlar tez-tez sodir bo'ladi. Xalqaro sanksiyalar yangi samolyotlarni xarid qila olmaslikni anglatadi. Joriy hafta boshida politsiya vertolyotining halokati uch nafar kishini hayotiga zomin bo'ldi va yana uch kishi jarohatlandi. O'tgan oy Armanistonga yo'l olgan samolyot qulab tushib, bortdagi 168 nafar kishining umriga zomin bo'lganida Eron yillar mobaynidagi eng yomon havo halokatini boshdan kechirdi. Aynan shu oyda boshqa bir samolyot uchish-qo'nish yo'lagidan chiqib ketib, devorga urilgan va o'n yetti kishi vafot etgandi.

src: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
mt: Bugun 12.00 GMT da Irak tadqiqoti guruhining hisoboti e'lon qilindi. Ushbu hisobotda shunday yozilgan: "Barcha kuchlarga qaram bo'lib, hech kim bu vaqtga qadar Irakda bo'lib o'tayotgan diniy urush, o'sib borayotgan qurollanish yoki qo'rqinchga tushib qolishga yo'l qo'yishni to'xtatishga ishonchini berishi mumkin emas. Hisobot boshida AQSHning O'rta Sharqga qarshi siyosatini o'zgartirishga chaqirib, o'zaro kelishuvga erishishga chaqiradi. Hisobot AQSHning hozirgi siyosatini asosan qoralaydi va tezda yo'nalishni o'zgartirishni talab qiladi. Birinchi taklif shundaki, yilning oxirida Irakning chegaralarini qo'rqinchli to'qnashuvlardan saqlab qolish uchun yangi diplomatik initsiativani o'z ichiga olgan holda, uning atrofida diplomatik munosabatlarni tiklashni talab qiladi.
ref: Iroqni o'rganish guruhi bugun soat 12:00 GMT da o'z hisobotini taqdim etdi. Bu mazkur holatda Iroqdagi hech bir harakat mazhablararo qurolli kurashni, oshib borayotgan zo'ravonlikni yoxud tartibsizlik sari siljishni to'xtatishga hech kim kafolat bermasligidan ogohlantiradi. Hisobot Yaqin Sharqqa nisbatan siyosat haqida AQSHda umumiy kelishuvni shakllantirish hamda ochiq muhokama uchun da'vo bilan ochiladi. Hisobot Iroqqa nisbatan Ijroiya siyosatining deyarli har bir jihatini qattiq tanqid ostiga oladi va zudlik bilan yo'nalishni o'zgartirishga undaydi. Uning 78 tavsiyasidan birinchisi shuki, shu yil oxiriga qadar Iroq chegaralarini tajovuzlardan himoya qilish va qo'shnilar bilan diplomatik aloqalarni qayta tiklashga oid yangi diplomatik choralarni boshlash lozim.

src: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""
mt: “Ansa nashriga ko'ra, "politsiya Lo Piccolo tomonidan Provenzano o'rniga o'tirish uchun qo'rqitgan bir nechta yuqori darajadagi to'qnashuvlarni kuzatib borishdi. Politsiya Lo Piccolo Provenzano tomonidan Palermoda yordamchisi bo'lganligi uchun Provenzano o'rniga o'tirishda ustunlikka ega ekanligini ta'kidlaydi. Politsiya u Palermoda Provensanoning o'ng qo'li bo'lgani va tajribasi kattaroqligi bilan Provensanoning imkon qadar panada yurish siyosatini davom ettirishni ko'zlayotgan keksa avlod xo'jayinlarining hurmatini qozongani sababli Lo Pikkoloning qo'li baland kelganini aytdi. 1992-yili Provensano Riina olib borgan va mafia faollari Jovanni Falkone va Paolo Borsellinolarning hayotini olib ketgan davlatga qarshi urushga chek qo'yganidan so'ng ushbu xo'jayinlarni jilovlab olgandi""."

src: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.
mt: Yaponiyalik jodok Hitoshi Saito, ikkita Olimpiada oltin medalini qo'lga kiritgan, 54 yoshida vafot etdi. Vafot sababini intrahepatik qalqonsuv qisqarishi sifatida e'lon qilindi. U Osaka shahrida mart kuni vafot etdi. Shuningdek, vafotidan oldin u Yaponiya Judo Federatsiyasi mashg'ulot qo'mitasi raisi bo'lgan.
ref: Yaponiyalik dzyudochi, ikki karra Olimpiada o'yinlari oltin medali sovrindori Hitoshi Saito 54 yoshida olamdan o'tdi. Jigar ichi safro yo'llari saratoni o'lim sababi deb e'lon qilindi. U seshanba kuni Osakada olamdan o'tdi. Sobiq olimpiada o'yinlari va jahon chempioni Saito vafot etgan vaqtida Butun Yaponiya dzyudo federatsiyasining o'quv qo'mitasi raisi bo'lgan.

src: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
mt: Uyga qaytib kelganida, Iwasaki ko'plab voqealarda qiyinchiliklarga duch keldi. U qaroqchilarga to'g'ri kelib, Tibetda qo'rqoq it tomonidan hujumga uchradi, Nepalda nikohga kirib qolishga majbur bo'ldi va Hindistonda hibsga olinib qolgan.
ref: O'z sayohati mobaynida Ivasaki ko'p vaziyatlar muammoga ro'baro' kelgan. Uni qaroqchilar tunagan, unga Tibetda quturgan kuchuk hamla qilgan, Nepalda nikohdan qochib ketgan hamda Hindistonda hibsga olingan.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.
mt: So'nggi 3 oy ichida, Central Booking qabul joyida 80 dan ortiq hibsga olinganlarni rasmiy jazo berilmagan holda ozod qilishgan. Bu yilning aprel oyida, sudya Glynn tomonidan Central Booking qabul joyida 24 soatdan ortiq qolgan hibsga olinganlarni ozod qilish uchun qisqa muddatli qoida chiqarildi. Sudya qabul qilish marosimida hibsga olinganlarni sudya qabul qiladi. Sudya qabul qilish marosimida sudya qabul qiladi. Sudya qabul qilish marosimida sudya qabul qiladi. ref: Oxirgi 3 oy ichida 80 dan ortiq hibsga olingan kishi rasmiy tarzda biror ayblov qo'yilmasdan tergov izolyatoridan ozod qilindi. Shu yilning aprelida sudya Glinn tomonidan hibsga olinganidan so'ng 24 soatdan ortiq sud komissari ishtirokida tinglov o'tkazilmasdan ushlab turilganlarni ozod qilinishini kuchga kiritish maqsadida muassasaga nisbatan vaqtinchalik taqiqlovchi sud buyrug'i chiqarilgan. Agar ruxsat berilsa komissar garov pulini belgilaydi va hibsga oluvchi ofitser qo'ygan ayblovlarni rasmiylashtiradi. Bundan so'ng ayblovlar ish kuzatib boriladigan shtat kompyuter tizimiga kiritiladi. Eshituv gumonlanuvchining ishni sudda tezkor ko'rib chiqish huquqi uchun sanani ham belgilashi kerak.

src: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.
mt: Shuningdek, Lodin shahzodasi xabar berdi, xalqaro diplomatlar konstitutsiyada to'g'ri tushunishga erishdilar va bu tashabbusga qarshi ekanligini aniqladilar. Boshqa xabarlar shuni ko'rsatadiki, tashabbus konstitutsiyaga to'g'ri kelmaydi.
ref: Lodin, shuningdek, rasmiylarning afg'onlarni yana bir saylov xarajati va xavfsizlikka tahdiddan saqlash maqsadida saylovlarning ikkinchi turini bekor qilishga qaror qilganini aytdi. Diplomatlar Afg'oniston konstitutsiyasida saylovlarning ikkinchi turini keraksiz degan qarorga kelish uchun yetarlicha noaniqlik topishganini aytdi. Bu saylovning ikkinchi turini bekor qilish konstitutsiyaga xilof bo'lar edi, deyilgan oldingi xabarlarga zid.

src: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."
mt: "Pakistonda Britaniya hukmronligidan mustaqillikka erishganidan beri FATAni boshqarish uchun Pakistondagi Prezident tomonidan ""siyosiy agentlar"" tayinlangan, ular FATAni boshqarishda o'z-o'zidan to'liq mustaqil bo'lib, bu yerda 247-Pakistondagi Konstitutsiyada nazar etiladi."
ref: "1947-yilda Pokiston Britaniya hukmronligidan mustaqil bo'lgan vaqtdan buyon, Pokiston prezidenti hududlar ustidan deyarli to'liq avtonom nazoratni amalga oshiradigan FATAni boshqaruvchi ""Siyosiy agentlar""ni belgilaydi. Bu vakillar Pokiston Konstitutsiyasining 247-moddasiga ko'ra hukumat va adliya xizmatlarning ko'rsatilishiga mas'uldirlar."

Bu vakillar Pokiston Konstitutsiyasining 247-moddasiga ko'ra hukumat va adliya xizmatlarning ko'rsatilishiga mas'uldirlar."

src: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
mt: Filmda Ryan Gosling va Emma Stone rol o'ynagan. Filmda barcha asosiy nominatsiyalar oldi. Gosling va Stone bitta aktyor va aktrisa nominatsiyalariga nomzod bo'ldi. Boshqa nominatsiyalar orasida eng yaxshi film, rejissor, kinematografiya, kostyum dizayni, film montaj, asosiy musiqa, prodyuserlik dizayni, to'g'ri rejissorlik, to'g'ri rejissorlik, asosiy musiqa va asosiy musiqa. Filmdagi ikkita qo'shiq, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) va City of Stars, eng yaxshi asosiy qo'shiq nominatsiyalariga nomzod bo'ldi. Lionsgate studiyasi 26 nominatsiyaga nomzod bo'ldi — boshqa studiyadan ko'ra.
ref: "Rayan Gosling va Emma Stoun ishtirokidagi kinofilm hamma asosiy yo'nalishlar bo'yicha nominatsiyalarni qo'lga kiritdi. Gosling va Stoun mos ravishda ""Eng yaxshi aktyor va aktrisa"" nominatsiyalarini qo'lga kiritishdi. Boshqa nominatsiyalar eng yaxshi film, rejissyor, kinematografiya, kiyim dizayni, filmni montaj qilish, o'ziga xos rol, mahsulot dizayni, ovoz montaji, ovozlarni aralashtirish va o'ziga xos ssenariylarni o'z ichiga oladi. Kinoning ikki ashulasi — ""Tinglov"" (""Orzu qiladigan ahmoqlar"") hamda ""Yulduzlar shahri"" eng yaxshi original qo'shiq nominatsiyalarini qo'lga kiritdi. Lionsgate studiyasi boshqa har qanday studiyadan ko'ra ko'proq – 26 ta nominatsiyaga sazovor bo'ldi."

src: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
mt: Filmda Ryan Gosling va Emma Stone rol o'ynagan. Filmda barcha asosiy nominatsiyalar oldi. Gosling va Stone bitta aktyor va aktrisa nominatsiyalariga nomzod bo'ldi. Boshqa nominatsiyalar orasida eng yaxshi film, rejissor, kinematografiya, kostyum dizayni, film montaj, asosiy musiqa, prodyuserlik dizayni, to'g'ri rejissorlik, to'g'ri rejissorlik, asosiy musiqa va asosiy musiqa. Filmdagi ikkita qo'shiq, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) va City of Stars, eng yaxshi asosiy qo'shiq nominatsiyalariga nomzod bo'ldi. Lionsgate studiyasi 26 nominatsiyaga nomzod bo'ldi — boshqa studiyadan ko'ra.
ref: "Rayan Gosling va Emma Stoun ishtirokidagi kinofilm hamma asosiy yo'nalishlar bo'yicha nominatsiyalarni qo'lga kiritdi. Gosling va Stoun mos ravishda ""Eng yaxshi aktyor va aktrisa"" nominatsiyalarini qo'lga kiritishdi. Boshqa nominatsiyalar eng yaxshi film, rejissyor, kinematografiya, kiyim dizayni, filmni montaj qilish, o'ziga xos rol, mahsulot dizayni, ovoz montaji, ovozlarni aralashtirish va o'ziga xos ssenariylarni o'z ichiga oladi. Kinoning ikki ashulasi — ""Tinglov"" (""Orzu qiladigan ahmoqlar"") hamda ""Yulduzlar shahri"" eng yaxshi original qo'shiq nominatsiyalarini qo'lga kiritdi. Lionsgate studiyasi boshqa har qanday studiyadan ko'ra ko'proq – 26 ta nominatsiyaga sazovor bo'ldi."

src: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
mt: Shuningdek, NHK xabar berishicha, Niigata prefekturasidagi Kashiwazaki Kariwa yadroviy elektr stansiyasi normal ishlamoqda. Hokuriku Elektr Stansiyasi Shika yadroviy elektr stansiyasining 1 va 2 reaktorlarini yopdi. Xabar berishicha, mintaqada 9400 ta uyda suv borishda qiyinchiliklar yuz berdi va elektr energiyasi bilan 100 ta uy borishda qiyinchiliklar yuz berdi. Qo'rqinchli hududlarda yo'llar zararlangan, temir yo'slarning xizmati to'xtatilgan va Ishikawa prefekturasidagi Noto aeroporti yopilgan.
ref: NHK, shuningdek, Niigata prefekturasidagi Kashivazaki Kariva atom elektrostansiyasi odatdagi tarzda ishlayotganini xabar qildi. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. kompaniyasi zilzilaning ta'sir qilmaganligini va o'zining Shika atom elektr stantsiyasidagi 1- va 2-raqamli reaktorlarining o'chirilganligini xabar qildi. Mintaqadagi 9400 ta uy suvsiz va taxminan 100 ta uy elektr tokisiz ekanligi xabar qilinadi. Zararlangan hududlarda ayrim yo'llarga zarar yetgan, temir yo'l xizmati uzilib qolgan hamda Ishikava prefekturasida joylashgan Note aeroporti yopiqligicha qolmoqda.

src: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.
mt: Shahodatga ko'ra, hujjat, shuhratli Mideast urushi oldidan chegaralar nizosi, shuningdek, ikki davlat uchun qadimgi shahar Qudus va Yordan daryosi masalasini o'z ichiga oladi. Isroil shartnoma imzolanishidan keyin o'n yil davomida daryo vodiysida harbiy mavjudligini talab qiladi, bu esa PAga faqat besh yil davomida qolishga rozi bo'lgan.
ref: Sizdirilgan ma'lumotlarga ko'ra, hujjat 1967-yilgi Yaqin Sharq urushidan avval chegaralarga asoslangan, Falastin xohlagan chegara mojarosiga ishora qiladi. Aytilishicha, ikkala millat uchun ham muqaddas hisoblangan bo'lajak Quddus mamlakati hamda Iordaniya vodiysi masalasi ham qamrab olingan. Isroil shartnoma imzolanganidan keyin vodiyda o'n yil davomida harbiy qismlarini muntazam saqlab qolishni talab qilmoqda, PA esa bunday harbiy qismlarni faqat besh yil davomida qoldirishga rozi.

src: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.
mt: Uchta oila evaktsiyadan qochish uchun qonuniy yordamga murojaat qilishdi. 20 mart kuni Ostin shahridagi Sharqiy Bay jamoat qonun markazi evaktsiyaga uchragan oilalarning yig'indisida yig'ilish o'tkazildi. Oilalar o'zlariga nisbatan sodir bo'lgan narsalarni o'zaro baholash boshladi. Lockwood Gardensdagi uy egalari OHA politsiyasi shuningdek Ostin shahridagi boshqa jamoat uylarida ham shunga o'xshash holatlar mavjudligini bilishdi.
ref: Ko'pgina oilalar ko'chirishga qarshi kurashish maqsadida yuridik yordam so'rayotgani ma'lum bo'lganidan keyin, 20-mart kuni Shariy Ko'rfaz hamjamiyati huquqiy markazida uy-joy firibgarligi qurbonlari uchun uchrashuv bo'lib o'tdi. Ijarachilar ular bilan yuz bergan narsalarni baham ko'ra boshlaganlarida ishtirok etgan oilalarning ko'pchiligi OHA vakili Karolin Uilson ularning garov pullarini og'irlaganini va shahardan chiqib ketganini angladilar. Lokvud Gardensdagi ijarachilar yana 40 yoki undan ko'proq oilalarning ko'chirilishi mumkinligiga ishonadilar, chunki ular OHA politsiyasining boshqa jamoat turarjoy mulklarining uy-joy bilan bog'liq firibgarlikka aralashgan bo'lishi mumkinligini ham o'rganayotganligini bildilar.

src: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.
mt: Uchrashuvdan so'ng Keselowski 2,250 ochkoga ega bo'lib, poytaxt chempioni bo'lib qolmoqda. Johnson 2,243 ochkoga ega bo'lib, ikkinchi o'rinda turibdi. Uchinchi o'rinda Hamlin 20 ochkoga ega bo'lib, Bowyerdan besh ochko oldinda. Kahne va Truex, Jr. beshinchi va oltinchi o'rinda 2,220 va 2,207 ochkoga ega. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth va Harvick chempionatda o'ninchi o'rinda turibdi, mavsumning qolgan to'rtta uchrashuvi qolgan.
ref: Musobaqaning yakuniy natijalariga ko'ra, Keselovski 2250 ochko bilan Poygachilar chempionati yetakchilikni saqlab kelmoqda. Yetti ochko ortda qolgan Jonson 2243 ochko bilan ikkinchi o'rinda joylashgan. Uchinchi o'rindagi Hemlin yigirma ochkoga ortda qolyapti, biroq Boyerdan besh ochko oldinda. Kane va kichik Trueks 2220 va 2207 ochko bilan mos ravishda beshinchi hamda oltinchi o'rinda bormoqda. Styuart, Gordon, Kenset hamda Garvik mavsumda to'rttagina poyga qolgan bir paytda Haydovchilar chempionatidagi yuqori o'ntalikni yakunlab berdi.

src: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.
mt: Bu tarixda uchinchi marta bo'lgan deb ishoniladi, shuning uchun bu martian materialni kimyoviy tasdiqlangan holda Yer yuzasiga tushganligi aniqlangan. Yer yuzasiga tushgan 24 mingdan ortiq meteoritlardan faqat 34 tasi martian materiali ekanligi tasdiqlangan. Yuliy oyining oxirida tushgan meteoritlardan 15 tasi bu ro'yxatga kiritilgan. Qo'shma Shtatda bitta o'ndan bir ozina 11 ming dollar va 22,5 ming dollar qilib sotiladi, bu oltin narxidan 10 marta ko'p.
ref: Bu kimyoviy jihatdan tasdiqlangan Marsga tegishli modda yerga tushishi hodisasi odamlar tomomidan beshincha marta kuzatilishi deb hisoblanadi. Yerga tushgan taxminan 24 000 ta ma'lum meteoritdan atigi 34 ga yaqini Marsdan ekanligi tasdiqlangan. Ushbu xarsang toshlardan o'n beshtasi o'tgan iyul oyidagi meteorit yomg'iriga aloqador. Yer yuzida nihoyatda kamyob bo'lgan ayrim toshlarning bir unsiyasi 11 000 AQSH dollaridan 22 500 AQSH dollarigacha sotilmoqda, bu oltin narxidan o'n baravar ko'p.

src: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.
mt: 2006-yilda Formula 1 chempionligini yetti marta qo'lga kiritgan Schumacher 2009-yilgi Vengriya Gran Prisida qo'pol to'xtashdan keyin og'rigan og'ir bosh jarohatidan so'ng iste'foga chiqqan edi. Braziliyalik Massa iste'molchilar uchun kamida 2009-yilgi mavsumning qolgan qismi uchun chetda bo'lishi kerak edi.
ref: Formula 1 chempionatida yetti karra g'olib bo'lganida keyin 2006-yili nafaqaga chiqqan Shumaxer jarohatlangan Filipe Massaning o'rniga kelishi kerak edi. 2009-yildagi Vengriya Gran prisi vaqtidagi avtohalokatdan keyin braziliyalik jiddiy bosh jarohati olgan. Massa kamida 2009-yilgi mavsumning qolgan qismini o'tkazib yuborishi kerak.

src: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.
mt: Shu kungacha AOL AQSHda keng tarqalganligi sababli IM bozorini o'ziga xos sur'atda rivojlantirib kelgan. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
mt: Gaziantep, Turkiyada politsiya boshqarmasida bir kuni soat ertalab bomba portlatilgan. Bomba portlashda ikki politsiyachi o'ldi, yuzdan ortiq kishi yaralandi. Gubernatorlik xabar berishicha, yaralanganlarning o'n beshi politsiyachi ekanligi aniqlandi. Politsiya shu portlashda Daesh (ISIL) guruhiga ishonchli shaxsning ishtirok etganligini aytib chiqdi.
ref: Kecha ertalab Turkiyaning Gaziantep shahridagi politsiya shtab-kvartirasi yaqinida mashinada bomba portlatilishi natijasida ikki politsiya xodimi halok bo'ldi va yigirmadan ortiq kishi jarohatlandi. Gubernator idorasi jarohatlanganlarning o'n to'qqiz nafari politsiya xodimlari bo'lganini ma'lum qildi. Politsiya Daish (ISHID) jangarisi hujum uchun javobgarlikda gumon qilinayotganini aytdi.

src: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
mt: Massachusets shtatining sobiq gubernatori Mitt Romney Florida Respublikachilar partiyasi prezidentlik saylovlarida kuni 46 foizdan ortiq ovoz olib, g'alaba qozondi. Qadimiy AQSH Oliy Majlisining rahbari bo'lgan Newt Gingrich ikkinchi o'rin oldi, 32 foiz ovoz olib. Florida g'alaba qozonuvchi bo'lgan holda, uchinchi o'rin uchun 50 nafar delegatni Mitt Romneyni qo'ydi, shu tariqa u Respublikachilar partiyasi nomzodligi uchun oldingi o'rin egasi bo'ldi.
ref: Sobiq Massachusets shtati gubernatori Mitt Romni seshanba kuni Florida Respublikachilar partiyasida o'tkazilgan boshlang'ich prezidentlik saylovida 46 foizdan ko'proq ovoz bilan g'alaba qozondi. AQSH Vakillar Palatasining sobiq spikeri Nyut Gingrich 32 foiz bilan ikkinchi o'rinni egalladi. g'olib butun shtatni qo'lga kiritadi, degan qoidaga ko'ra, Florida ellikta delegatning barchasini Romniga taqdim qilib, uni respublikachilar partiyasi nomzodligi uchun kurashda yetakchi sifatida oldingi o'ringa chiqardi.

src: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."
mt: "Qadimiy Palata rahbari Nyut Ginzberg, Texas gubernatori Rik Peri va Kongress rahbari Mishel Beshman beshinchi, oltinchi va oltinchi o'rinda yakunladi. Natijalar chiqqach, Ginzberg Santorumni maqtadi, ammo Romeni uchun qarshi kampaniya roliklari namoyish etilganidan so'ng, u qattiq so'zlarda chiqdi. Peri shunday dedi: "Men bu saylovda yo'qotishni hisoblab chiqaman, men Texasga qaytaman va bu saylovda yo'qotishni hisoblab chiqaman, men Texasga qaytaman va bu saylovda yo'qotishni hisoblab chiqaman, men Texasga qaytaman va bu saylovda yo'qotishni hisoblab chiqaman, men Texasga qaytaman va bu saylovda yo'qotishni hisoblab chiqaman, men Texasga qaytaman va bu saylovda yo'qotishni hisoblab chiqaman, men Texasga qaytaman va bu saylovda yo'qotishni hisoblab chiqaman, men Texasga qaytaman va bu saylovda yo'qotishni hisoblab chiqaman, men Texasga qaytaman va bu saylovda yo'qotishni hisoblab chiqaman, men Texasga qaytaman va bu saylovda yo'qotishni hisoblab chiqaman, men Texasga qaytaman va bu saylovda yo'qotishni hisoblab chiqaman, men Texasga qaytaman va bu saylovda yo'qotishni hisoblab chiqaman, men Texasga qaytaman va bu saylovda yo'qotishni hisoblab chiqaman, men Texasga qaytaman va bu saylovda yo'qotishni hisoblab chiqaman, men Texasga qaytaman va bu saylovda yo'qotishni hisoblab chiqaman, men Texasga qaytaman va bu saylovda yo'qotishni hisoblab ch
ref: "Vakillar palatasining sobiq spikeri Nyut Gingrich, Texas gubernatori Rik Perri hamda kongressmen Mishel Baxman mos ravishda to'rtinchi, beshinchi va oltinchi o'rinlarni egalladi. Natijalar chiqqanidan keyin Gingrich Santorumni maqtadi, lekin Romni haqida keskin so'zlar aytdi, Ayovada uning nomidan Gingrichga qarshi salbiy kompaniya reklamalari namoyish qilingandi. Perri ""bu kecha o'tkazilgan partiyaning saylovoldi kengashi natijalarini baholash, mazkur kurashda o'zim uchun oldinga boradigan yo'l bor-yo'qligini aniqlash uchun Texasga qaytaman"" dedi, lekin keyinroq u kurashda qolishini hamda 21-yanvarda Janubiy Karolina shtatidagi ilk saylovlarda qatnashishini bildirdi. Avgust oyidagi Ames Strow so'rovnomasida g'olib bo'lgan Baxman o'z kampaniyasiga yakun yasashga qaror qildi."

src: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."
mt: Shouning internet saytida shouning tavsifi """katta shahar radio teatri bilan yangi va qo'rqinchli geek spin!"" deb ataladi. Shouning dastlabki kunlarida shou TogiNet Radio internet radio saytida namoyon etildi, bu sayt nutq radio asosida ishlaydi. 2015-yil oxirida TogiNet AstroNet Radio filial stantsiyasini tashkil etdi. Shou aslida East Texasda yashovchi amator ovoz aktyorlari bilan namoyon etildi.
ref: "Stansiya veb-sayti shouni ""yangi va g'azablantiruvchi g'alati aylanishga ega bo'lgan eski maktab radio teatri!"", deya ta'rifladi. Ilk kunlarida shou faqatgina suhbat efiriga e'tibor qaratadigan, uzoq vaqtdan beri faoliyat yuritib kelayotgan internet radiosi TogiNet Radio'da efirga uzatildi. 2015-yil oxirida TogiNet yordamchi stansiya sifatida AstroNet Radioni tashkil qildi. Shouda dastlab Sharqiy Texasdan bo'lgan havaskor dublyaj aktyorlari qatnashgan."

src: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.
mt: 2008-yil 26-noyabrda Mumbayga suzib kelgan terrorchilar portlatmalar, avtomat qurollar va mashhur Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus temir yo'l stantsiyasini va mashhur Taj Mahal mehmonxonasini kiritgan boshqa ko'plab maqsadlarga hujum qilgan. David Headleyning tekshiruv va ma'lumot to'plashi Lashkar-e-Taiba terrorchilarining operatsiyasini osonlashtirdi. Hujum Hindiston va Pokiston o'rtasidagi munosabatlarni kuchaytirib qo'ydi.
ref: "Mumbayga hujum uyushtirganlar 2008-yilning 26-noyabr kuni qayiqda granata, avtomat qurollari bilan yetib kelgan hamda bir qancha nishonlarga, jumladan, gavjum Chatrapati Shivaji Terminus temir yo'l bekati va mashhur Toj Mahal mehmonxonasiga zarba bergan. Devid Hedlining razvedkasi hamda axborot yig'ishi Pokistonning ""Laskhar-e-Taiba"" jangari guruhidan 10 nafar qurollangan shaxsning operatsiyasini amalga oshirishga yordam berdi. Bu hujum Hindiston bilan Pokiston o'rtasidagi munosanatlarni juda taranglashtirdi."

src: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.
mt: Shimtadan bir hafta oldin, Naked News xabar berdi, u xalqaro til talabini katta miqdorda oshiradi, uchta yangi axborot axboroti e'lon qiladi. Xalqaro tashkilot ingliz va yapon tilida xabar berishdan oldin, ispan, italyan va koreys tilida axborot axboroti e'lon qiladi, televideniye, veb-sayt va mobil qurilmalarga ega.
ref: o'tgan hafta Naked News dasturi uchta yangi ko'rsatuv bilan o'zining xalqaro til vakolatini yangiliklarni xabar qilishga keskin ravishda oshirishini e'lon qildi. Allaqachon ingliz va yapon tillarida lavhalar berayotgan хalqaro idora TV, internet va mobil qurilmalar uchun ispan, italyan va koreys tilidagi dasturlarni boshlamoqda.

src: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.
mt: Shanba kunidan keyin Carpanedo Chempionatda ikkita individual musobaqada qatnashdi. Birinchisi Slalom bo'lib, u birinchi bosqichda Did Not Finish (DNF) natijasini qo'lga kiritdi. 116 nafar musobaqada qatnashganlar orasida 36 nafar musobaqada DNF natijasini qo'lga kiritdi. Ikkinchi musobaqasi Giant Slalom bo'lib, u ayollar o'rtasida o'tirish guruhida o'ntalikda o'tdi, jami bosqich vaqti 4:41.30 da, birinchi o'rin uchun Avstriyalik Claudia Loesch bilan 2:11.60 da va o'n o'rin uchun Vengriyalik Gyöngyi Dani bilan 1:09.02 da o'zib ketdi. Ayollar o'rtasida o'tirish guruhida 4 nafar musobaqada qatnashganlar bosqichni tugatmadi, jami 117 nafar musobaqada qatnashganlar orasida Giant Slalomda 45 nafar musobaqada o'rin ololmadi.
ref: "Karpanedo chorshanba tadbiridan tashqari, chempionatda ikkita yakkalik poyga musobaqalarida ishtirok etdi. Uning birinchisi Slalom edi, u yerda birinchi yugurishda ""Tugamadi"" natijasini olgan. Ushbu yugurish musobaqasida 116 raqibdan 36 tasi bir xil natijaga erishgan. U o'zining boshqa poygasi Gigant slalomda ayollar joylashgan guruhda birinchi o'rinni egallagan avstriyalik Klaudiya Loesning natijasi 4:41.30 ga solishtirganda 2:11.60 daqiqa sekinroq va to'qqizinchi o'rinni egallagan vengriyalik Kyongyi Danidan 1:09.02 daqiqaga sekinroq kelib, o'ninchi o'rinni egalladi. Ayollarning startda qo'yilgan guruhidan to'rtta chang'ichi o'z masofasini tugata olmadilar va Katta Slalomdagi jami 117 ta chang'ichidan 45 tasi poydaga o'rin ola olmadi."

src: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.
mt: Chorshanba kuni, AQSH Milliy Basketbol Ligasi (NBA) COVID-19 nazoratiga ko'ra professional basketbol mavsumini to'xtatdi. NBAning qarori Utah Jazz jamoasining o'yinchisi COVID-19 virusi uchun sinovdan o'tganidan keyin keldi.
ref: Chorshanbada Qo'shma Shtatlar Milliy basketbol uyushmasi (NBA) professional basketbol mavsumini COVID-19 ga oid xavotirlar sababli to'xtatib qo'ydi. NBA qarori Yuta o'yinchisining COVID-19 virusiga topshirgan testi ijobiy chiqqanidan so'ng qabul qilindi.

src: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
mt: Bugunning O'yinchisi kuni Washington Capitals jamoasining Alex Ovechkin o'yinchisi. U Washington jamoasi Atlanta Thrashers jamoasiga qarshi 5:3 hisobida g'alaba qozonib, 2 gol va 2 assist bilan o'zini ko'rsatdi. Ovechkin o'yin davomida birinchi assisti o'yin g'alabasini qo'ldan bergan yangi o'yinchi Nicklas Backstromga berdi; ikkinchi goli Ovechkin o'yin davomida 60-golni qo'ldan berganligi bilan 60 yoki undan ortiq gol urgan birinchi o'yinchi bo'ldi, 1995-96-yillarda Jaromir Jagr va Mario Lemieux har biridan 60 yoki undan ortiq gol urgan.
ref: "Bugunning kun o'yinchisi ""Washington Capitals"" jamoasidan Aleks Ovechkin bo'ldi. U ""Washington"" jamoasi ""Atlanta Thrashers"" jamoasi ustidan 5:3 hisobda g'alaba qilgan o'yinda 2 gol urdi va 2 ta to'p uzatishni amalga oshirdi. Ovechkinning kechadagi ilk golli uzatmasi jamoaga yangi qo'shilgan Niklas Bekstormning g'alaba keltirgan goliga aylandi. uning o'sha tundagi ikkinchi goli mavsumdagi 60-goli bo'lib, u 1995–96 yilgi mavsumdan buyon Jaromir Jagr va Mario Lemyonlarning har biri ushbu marraga yetganidan beri bir mavsumda 60 yoki undan ko'p gol urgan birinchi o'yinchi edi."

src: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
mt: 2008-yilda bankning subprime ipoteka krizi tufayli yordam so'raganligi aniqlanganidan so'ng milliyizatsiyalangan Northern Rock banki Sir Richard Bransonning Virgin guruhiga sotib olinishi haqidagi taklifdan oldin bank milliyizatsiyalangan. 2010-yilda milliyizatsiyalangan bankda Northern Rock plc (hozirgi ko'ngil ochish banki) va Northern Rock (Mulkni boshqarish) (qimmatli qog'ozlarni boshqarish kompaniyasi) o'rtasida ajralish bo'lib, Virgin faqat Northern Rock (Mulkni boshqarish) kompaniyasini sotib olgan.
ref: "Shimoliy Rok banki 2008-yilda Birlashgan Qirollik hukumati tomonidan favqulodda yordamni qabul qilganligi fosh bo'lganidan keyin davlat mulkiga aylantirildi. Shimoliy Rok 2007-yildagi ikkilamchi ipoteka inqirozi davomida inqirozidan zarar ko'rgani sababli yordam talab qildi. Janob Richard Brensonning ""Virgin Group"" kompaniyasining bank uchun taklifi bank milliylashtirilishidan oldin rad etilgandi. 2010-yilda, milliylashtirilganida, hozirgi yuqori ko'chadagi bank — Nothern Rock plc ""yomon bank"" Nothern Rock (Asset Management) dan ajratildi. Virgin faqat Shimoliy Rokning ""yaxshi banki""ni sotib oldi, aktivlarni boshqarish kompaniyasini emas."

src: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
mt: Mr. Ruddning qabul qilish qarori AQShni o'z ichiga olgan boshqa rivojlangan mamlakatlardan ajratib qo'yadi, chunki u shu kelishuvni tasdiqlamagan yagona rivojlangan mamlakat bo'lib qoladi. Avstraliyaning sobiq konservativ hukumati shu kelishuvni qabul qilmadi, chunki u iqtisodiyotga ta'sir qiladi, uning yirik qo'llab-quvvatlashi ko'mirlar eksporti bilan bog'liq bo'lib, shu kelishuvga rioya qilish uchun Hindiston va Xitoy kabi mamlakatlarga qo'llab-quvvatlash yo'q edi.
ref: Janob Rudning Kioto iqlim kelishuvini imzolash haqidagi qarori hozirda kelishuvni ratifikatsiya qilmagan yagona rivojlangan mamlakat Amerika Qo'shma Shtatlarini yakkalab qo'ydi. Avstraliyaning sobiq konservativ hukumati Hindiston va Xitoy kabi davlatlar zaharli gazlar chiqindisini kamaytirish rejasi bilan o'zlarini cheklamayotgan bir paytda uning ko'mir eksportiga qattiq suyanib qolishi iqtisoiyotga zarar yetkazadi deya Kyoto protokolini ratifikatsiya qilishni rad etdi.

src: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.
mt: Sho'nta'qsimloqni tekshirishda ishlatiladigan otuvchilar rahbarlar tomonidan yaqin nazorat qilinadi, chunki bu tajriba nazorat qilinib va samaradorligi baholandi. ref: Sinov monitoring qilinishi va uning samaradorligi baholanishi sababli qo'shimcha zararkunandalarga qarshi kurash sinovida o'q uzuvchilar qo'riqchilar tomonidan yaqindan nazorat qilinishi lozim edi. NPWS va Sports Shooters Association Australiya (NSW) Inc. kompaniyasi bilan hamkorlikda malakali ko'ngillar Sportiv o'q otish uyushmasining ovlash dasturi ustida yollandilar. NPWS bilan bog' muhofazasi va merosi bo'yicha direktor vazifasini bajaruvchi Mik o'Flinning so'zlariga ko'ra, dastlabki o'q otish amaliyoti uchun tanlangan to'rt nafar mergan keng qamrovli xavfsizlik va o'quv mashg'ulotidan o'tgan.

ref: Sinov monitoring qilinishi va uning samaradorligi baholanishi sababli qo'shimcha zararkunandalarga qarshi kurash sinovida o'q uzuvchilar qo'riqchilar tomonidan yaqindan nazorat qilinishi lozim edi. NPWS va Sports Shooters Association Australiya (NSW) Inc. kompaniyasi bilan hamkorlikda malakali ko'ngillar Sportiv o'q otish uyushmasining ovlash dasturi ustida yollandilar. NPWS bilan bog' muhofazasi va merosi bo'yicha direktor vazifasini bajaruvchi Mik o'Flinning so'zlariga ko'ra, dastlabki o'q otish amaliyoti uchun tanlangan to'rt nafar mergan keng qamrovli xavfsizlik va o'quv mashg'ulotidan o'tgan.

src: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."
mt: “Bu fosilga asoslanib, bu ajralish molekulyar dalillarga nisbatan ko'proq oldinda bo'lib, bu barcha narsalarni qayta qo'yish kerak,” deya tashrif buyuruvchi etiopiyalik Berhane Asfaw ismli tadqiqotchi aytadi.
ref: "Mazkur qazilmaga asoslangan holda, bu bo'linish molekulyar dalillar tomonidan kutilganidan ancha ertaroq bo'lganini anglatadi. ""Bu hammasi orqaga qaytarilishi kerak degani"", dedi Efiopiyadagi Rift vodiysi tadqiqotlar xizmati taqdidotchisi va tadqiqot hammuallifi Berxan Asfav."

src: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
mt: Joi kuni Tokio o'yinlar festivalida Nintendo prezidenti Satoru Iwata yangi Nintendo Revolyusiya konsolining boshqaruvchi dizaynini e'lon qildi. Boshqaruvchi televizor batareka shaklida bo'lib, foydalanuvchining televizoriga yaqin joylashgan ikkita sensor orqali uch o'lchamli joylashuvini tushunishga imkon beradi. Bu o'yinchilarga o'yinlarda harakat va tadbirlarni havoda harakatlanish orqali boshqarishga imkon beradi.
ref: Tokio o'yin shouning payshanba kungi asosiy taqdimotida Nintendo prezidenti Satoru Ivata kompaniyaning yangi Nintendo Revolution konsolining boshqaruv dizaynini taqdim etdi. Televizor pultiga o'xshab, boshqaruv pulti foydalanuvchi televizori yaqinida joylashgan ikkita sensordan uning uch o'lchamli bo'shliqdagi joylashuvini aniqlash uchun foydalanadi. Bu qurilmani havoda harakatlantirish orqali o'yinchilarga video-o'yinlardagi harakatlar va siljishlarni boshqarish imkoniyatini taqdim etadi.

src: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
mt: Avvalroq Xinhua xabar berishicha, samolyotni olib qochishga urinayotganligi haqida xabar berilgan. Keyingi xabarlar shuni ko'rsatdiki, samolyotga bomba xavfi borligi haqida xabar berilgan va Qandahor shahriga yo'naltirilgan. Avvalgi xabarlar shuni ko'rsatdiki, samolyot Qandahorga qaytarilganidan so'ng Ürümqi shahriga qo'nganidan so'ng qaytarilgan.
ref: Oldinroq Xitoyning Xinhua axborot agentligi samolyot olib qochib ketilishi to'g'risida xabar bergandi. Keyinchalik hisobotlarda aytilishicha, samolyotda bomba xavfi borligini qabul qilishgan va ortga — Afg'onistonga yo'naltirilgan hamda Qandahorga qo'ngan. Dastlabki xabarlarga ko'ra, samolyotning Urumchiga favqulodda qo'nishi rad etilgandan keyin u ortga — Afg'onistonga yo'l olgan.

src: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""
mt: “Dushanba kuni, Bob Dilen 2016-yilda adabiyot bo'yicha Nobel mukofoti sohibi ekanligini e'lon qilish uchun Shvetsiya akademiyasining adabiyot bo'yicha Nobel komitetining doimiy kotibi Sara Danius Shvetsiya radiosida o'tkazilgan dastlabki dasturda shunday dedi: “Bugun biz hech narsa qilmaymiz. Men uning eng yaqin hamkorini chaqirib, elektron pochta orqali murojaat qildim va juda yaxshi javob oldim. Hozirga qadar shunday bo'lsa, shubhasiz, bu juda yaxshi”.
ref: "Dushanba kuni Shvetsiya Fanlar akademiyasi adabiyot bo'yicha Nobel mukofoti qo'mitasining doimiy kotibasi Sara Danius Shetsiyaning Sveriges radiosidagi dastur davomida qo'mitaning adabiyot bo'yicha 2016-yili Nobel mukofotini yutganlik to'g'risida to'g'ridan-to'g'ri Bob Dilan bilan bog'lana olmagandan keyin u bilan bog'lanish bo'yicha urinishlarini to'xtatganligini ommaviy tarzda e'lon qildi. Danius ""Biz hozirda hech nima qilmayapmiz. Men uning yaqin hamkoriga qo'ng'iroq qildim hamda elektron xatlar yubordim va do'stona javoblar oldim. Hozircha, shuning o'zi yetarli"", dedi."

src: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""
mt: “AQSH prezidenti Jorj Bush Shimoliy Koreyaning e'lon qilganligini qabul qildi. Bush vakili Gordon Johndroe Shimoliy Koreyaning e'lon qilganini “Koreya yarim orolining verifikatsiyalangan nuklearlashtirilmaganligi uchun qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun katta qadam” deb atadi.
ref: "AQSH prezidenti Jorj V. Bush bu xabarni mamnuniyat ila qabul qildi. Bushning matbuot kotibi Gordon Jondro Shimoliy Koreya va'dasi to'g'risida quyidagicha fikr bildirdi: ""Koreya yarim orolining yadrosizlantirilishini tekshirilishiga erishish yo'lidagi yirik qadam""."

src: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."
mt: 1956-yilda Słania Shvetsiyaga ko'chib o'tdi, u yerda uch yil o'tib u Shvetsiya pochtasi uchun ish boshladi va u yerda ularning bosh chizgichchisi bo'ldi. U Shvetsiya va 28 boshqa mamlakat uchun 1000 dan ortiq pochta markalari chizdi. Ushbu xizmatlari uchun u filatelistlarning "xonadon nomi"laridan biri bo'lib, u faqat uning ishini to'plagan filatelistlar orasida tanilgan. Uning 1000chi pochta markasi 2000-yilda David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl tomonidan chizilgan "Shvetsiya malikalarining katta ishlari" bo'lib, u Guinness reytingida ro'yxatga olingan. U shuningdek, bir qancha mamlakatlarning banknotlari uchun chizgichchilik qilgan, yangi Kanada 5 va 100 dollarlik banknotlarning old tomonidagi Prezident portretlari uning ishiga misol bo'la oladi.
ref: "Slaniya 1956-yil Shvetsiyaga ko'chib o'tib, uch yildan keyin Shvetsiya pochtasida ishlay boshladi va u yerning bosh naqqoshiga aylandi. U Shvetsiya va boshqa 28 davlat uchun mingdan ortiq markalar ishlab chiqargan. Uning ishi shunchalik tan olingan sifatga ega va batafsilki, u filatelistlar orasidagi juda kam sonli ""mashhur nomlardan"" biridir. Ba'zilar faqat uning ishini kolleksiya qiladi. Uning 1000-markasi 2000-yilda David Klyoker Erenstrahl tomonidan yaratilgan, Dunyo rekordlari Ginnes kitobiga kiritilgan ulug'vor ""Shved shohlariningbuyuk ishlari"" bo'lgan edi. Shuningdek, u ko'p davlatlar uchun kupyuralar yaratish bilan shug'ullangan, Kanadaning yangi 5$ va 100$ lik kupyuralari old tomonidagi bosh vazir suratlari uning so'nggi ishlaridan namunalar sirasiga kiradi."

src: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.
mt: Trans-Alaska Pipeline Systemning 800 milyasi Fairbanksdan janubda katta miqdorda quruq neft tashlab ketganidan keyin yopildi. Rutin testdan so'ng yorqinlik tizimi to'xtatilganda elektr yo'qolishi tufayli qo'rg'ochlar ochilib, neft oqib chiqdi. Qo'rg'ochlarning ochilishi tizimni ozod qilish uchun ishlatilgan va neft quruq neft omboridan o'tib, tankga o'tdi, u tank 55,000 barreldan (2.3 million gallon) tashkil etadi. Shaxsiy qo'rg'ochlarning ochilishi tizimni ozod qilish uchun ishlatilgan va neft quruq neft omboridan o'tib, tankga o'tdi, u tank 55,000 barreldan (2.3 million gallon) tashkil etadi. Shaxsiy qo'rg'ochlarning ochilishi tizimni ozod qilish uchun ishlatilgan va neft quruq neft omboridan o'tib, tankga o'tdi, u tank 55,000 barreldan (2.3 million gallon) tashkil etadi. Shaxsiy qo'rg'ochlarning ochilishi tizimni ozod qilish uchun ishlatilgan va neft quruq neft omboridan o'tib, tankga o'tdi, u tank 55,000 barreldan (2.3 million gallon) tashkil etadi. Shaxsiy qo'rg'ochlarning ochilishi tizimni ozod qilish uchun ishlatilgan va neft quruq neft omboridan o'tib, tankga o'tdi, u tank 55,000 barreldan (2.3 million gallon) tashkil etadi. Shaxsiy qo'rg'ochlarning ochilishi tizimni ozod qilish uchun ishlatilgan va neft quruq neft omboridan o'tib
ref: 800 millik Trans-Alyaska quvur liniyasi tizimi Alyaskadagi Fairbanks janubida minglab barrel tozalanmagan neft to'kilganidan keyin yopildi. Olovni boshqarish tizimi sinovidan keyin elektr quvvatining uzilishi xavfsizlik klapanlarning ochilishiga sabab bo'lgan va 9-sonli Fort-Grili nasos stansiyasi yaqinida ishlov berilmagan neft toshib ketgan. Klapanlarning ochilishi tizim bosimning pasayishiga olib keldi hamda moy taglik bo'ylab 55 000 barrel (2,3 million gallon) sig'imga ega bakka oqib tushdi. Chorshanba kuni tushdan keyinga kelib bak teshikaridan hali ham oqib ketmoqda edi, sababi bak ichidagi issiqlikdan kengayish bo'lishi mumkin. 104 500 barell sig'imga ega baklar pastidagi boshqa ikkilamchi saqlash hududi hali sig'imiga qadar to'lmagan.

src: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.
mt: Qo'rqinchli xabar: AQSHning inshootlari 6 dyuymli yog'inga qadar qadimiy dambalarni buzish ehtimoli borligini hisoblab chiqdi. Suv damba ustudan 100 fut kenglikdagi bo'limdan toshib ketmoqda.

src: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.
mt: Hamilton Howard universitetining shifoxonasi shifokorlarga qaraganda sog'liqda bo'lgan bemor qabul qilgani tasdiqladi. Bemor Nigeriyaga tashrif buyurgan edi, u yerda Ebola virusi bilan bog'liq ba'zi holatlarga yo'ldosh bo'lgan. Shifoxona infeksiya nazoratini kuzatish protokolini bajarishda, jumladan, boshqa bemorlarni kasallanishiga yo'ldosh bo'lish uchun bemorlarni boshqa bemorlardan ajratishda.
ref: Hamilton Xovard universiteti kasalxonasi barqaror holatdagi bemorni qabul qilganligini tasdiqladi. Bemor ba'zi Ebola holatlari qayd etilgan Nigeriyada bo'lgan. Kasalxona yuqumli kasalliklarni nazorat qilish protokoliga, jumladan infeksiyaning boshqalarga yuqishining oldini olish uchun bemorni boshqalardan ajratishga amal qildi.

src: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.
mt: Kometlar o'z ichiga o'zgarmagan suv va organik moddalar, shuningdek, proteindan iborat bo'lgan hayotni qo'llab-quvvatlovchi moddalar o'z ichiga oladi. Ilmiyotdoshlar o'zlarining o'zgarmagan suv va organik moddalar, shuningdek, proteindan iborat bo'lgan hayotni qo'llab-quvvatlovchi moddalar o'z ichiga oladi. Ilmiyotdoshlar o'zlarining o'zgarmagan suv va organik moddalar, shuningdek, proteindan iborat bo'lgan hayotni qo'llab-quvvatlovchi moddalar o'z ichiga oladi. ref: Kometalar oqsillarni hosil qilishi va hayotni ta'minlashi mumkin bo'lgan organik moddalar bilan bir qatorda yerga suv yetkazib berish manbai bo'lgan bo'lishi mumkin. Olimlar sayyoralar qanday qilib shakllanishini, ayniqsa, Yer qanday shakllanganini tushunishga umid qiladilar, chunki kometalar ancha avval Yer bilan to'qnashgan.

src: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.
mt: Vazirlar xonadonining xavfsizligi haqidagi xabarlarning to'g'riligi haqida ishonchli ma'lumotlar yo'q, ammo Maryland Transportaion Authority FBI tomonidan maslahat berilganda yopildi. Qo'rg'on yuk mashinalari tayoq kiritish uchun ishlatilgan va 80 nafar politsiyachilar yo'nalishni boshqarish uchun ishlatilgan. Qo'rg'on yo'nalishda yuk tashish yo'q.
ref: Hokimiyat organlarining tahdidning mavjudligiga ishonchlari komil bo'lmasada, Merilend transport ma'muriyati FQB talabiga ko'ra yopishni amalga oshirdi. Metroga kirishni to'sib qo'yish uchun samosvallardan foydalanildi va avtoulovchilarni aylanma yo'llarga yo'naltirish uchun 80 ta politsiyachi yordam berdi. Shaharning muqobil yo'nalishi hisoblanuvchi halqa yo'lida kuchli qatnov kechikishlari qayd etilmagan.

src: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."
mt: "Fotograf Ronald Reagan UCLA tibbiyot markaziga olib ketildi, u yerda keyinroq vafot etdi. Uning yoshi 20 yoshga yaqin ekanligi xabar qilingan. Bieberring xabar berishicha, "Bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinchli hodisada ishtirok etgan emasman, lekin bu qo'rqinch
ref: "Fotosuratchi Ronald Reygan nomidagi UCLA Tibbiyot Markaziga yetkazilgan va keyinchalik u yerda vafot etgan. Aytilishicha, u 20 yoshlarda bo'lgan. Biber bayonotida ""Ushbu fojiali baxtsiz hodisa vaqtida [b]o'lmagan, unda bevosita ishtirok ham etmagan bo'lsam-da, o'y-xayollarim va duolarim qurbonning oilasi bilan birga"", dedi. TMZ ko'ngilochar yangiliklar veb-sayti tushunishiga ko'ra, suratkash o'z avtomobilini Sepulveda bulvarining boshqa tomonida to'xtatgan va politsiya to'xtatgan mashinani suratga olishga harakat qilgan, keyin ko'chani kesib o'tib harakatida davom etgan, bu mashinani to'xtatgan Kaliforniya yo'l harakati politsiya zobiti ikki marotaba uni qaytishini so'rashiga sabab bo'lgan. Politsiyaning aytishicha, suratkashni urib yuborgan avtoulov haydovchisining jinoiy javobgarlikka tortilish ehtimoli kam."

src: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."
mt: "Ariya virusi uchun o'zining o'rtacha og'ir shakli bilan sinovdan o'tdi, Prezidentning vaziri Rodrigo Arias aytdi. Prezidentning holati barqaror, lekin u bir necha kun davomida uyda izolyatsiya qilinadi. ""Fevr va bo'g'oz bilan tashqi ko'rinishimdan tashqari, men ishlashda telekommunikatsiya orqali ishlashga tayyorman. Men dushanba kuni barcha vazifalarni o'zlashtiraman,"" Arias shaxsiy xabardasida aytdi."
ref: "Ariasdagi test virusning yengil shakliga ijobiy natija berdi, dedi prezident vaziri Rodrigo Arias. Prezidentning holati barqaror, biroq u bir necha kun davomida uyida isolyatsiya qilinadi. Isitma va tomoq og'rig'ini hisobga olmaganda, ishimni masofadan turib bajara oladigan darajada o'zimni yaxshi va tetik his qilyapman. ""Men dushanbada hamma vazifalarimga qaytishni kutyapman"", — dedi Arias bayonotida."

src: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.
mt: Gonu, Maldiv orasida qo'lda to'qima qiluvchi qopning nomi, o'zining cho'kindiida 240 kilometr soatiga (149 mil soatiga) sathga erishdi. Erta kunning boshida 83 km/h ga yaqin bo'lgan shamollarni tashkil etdi va o'zakchilikka davom etishini kutishgan.
ref: Maldiv tilida bir qop palma barglari sharafiga nomlangan tropik Gonu sikloni o'zining eng kuchli holatida soatiga 240 kilometr (soatiga 149 mil) barqaror shamol tezligiga yetdi. Bugun erta tongda shamol tezligi 83 km/s atrofida edi va uning susayishi kutilayotgan edi.

src: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.
mt: Qizil tosh suvda yashovchi bir hujayrali o'simliklardan tashkil topgan. Bu o'simliklarning soni ko'payib borishi uchun tabiiy omillar o'zaro to'qnashib ketishi kerak. Bu o'simliklar toshini o'z ichiga olgan suvda yashovchi baliqlar o'ldiradi. Odamlar toshini o'z ichiga olgan suvni eshitib chiqqanda o'ziga zarar etkazadi.
ref: Qizil oqim tabiiy tarzda yuz beruvchi bir hujayrali dengiz organizmi hisoblangan Karenia brevisning me'yordan ortiq to'planishi sababli yuzaga keladi. Tabiiy omillar kesishib, suv o'tlari sonining keskin ko'payishiga imkon beradigan ideal muhitni hosil qilishi mumkin. Suvo'tlari odamlarning ham, baliqlarning ham asablarini ishdan chiqaruvchi neyrotoksin ishlab chiqaradi. Aksar holatlarda baliqlar suvdagi toksik moddalarning yuqori darajasi sababli o'ladi. Insonlar shamol yoki to'lqinlar havoga olib chiqqan ifloslangan suvdan nafas olish orqali kasallanishi mumkin.

src: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."
mt: Felicia, Saffir-Simpson tufan shkalasida to'rtinchi darajadagi tufan bo'lgan, kuchayishdan so'ng, dushanba kuni tropik depressiyaga aylanib yo'qolib ketdi. Ushbu qolgan qismi orasida ko'pchilik orollarda yog'inga ega bo'lib, shuningdek, Oahu orolida 6,34 dyuym yog'inga ega bo'lib, bu yog'inga ega bo'lganligi tushuntirilgan. Yomg'irning bir qismi to'g'ri yomg'ir va tez-tez yorug'lik bilan birga kelgan.
ref: "Bir vaqtlar Saffir-Simpson dovul shkalasida 4-toifa bo'roni bo'lgan Felisia seshanba kuni tarqalishidan avval zaiflashib, tropik depressiyaga aylandi. Uning qoldiqlari orollarning katta qismida jalalarni yuzaga keltirdi, biroq hozirgacha hech qanday zarar yoki toshqinlar haqida xabarlar olinmadi. Oaxudagi yo'lakda 6,34 duymga yetgan yog'ingarchilik miqdori ""foydali"" deb tavsiflandi. Yomg'irlarning ayrimlari momaqaldiroq va tez-tez chaqmoq chaqishlar bilan kuzatildi."

src: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
mt: 2008 yilgi Singapur Gran Prisida Piquet Jr. pit stopidan keyin Fernando Alonso uchun o'tkazilganidan so'ng halokatga uchradi, bu esa xavfsizlik mashinasini chiqarib qo'ydi. Alonso oldidagi boshqa avtomobillar xavfsizlik mashinasida qolganida, u to'plamni o'zgartirib, g'alaba qozondi. Piquet Jr. 2009 yilgi Vengriya Gran Prisidan keyin ishdan bo'shatildi.
ref: Kichik Pike 2008-yilgi Singapur gran-prisida Fernando Alonso uchun xavfsizlik mashinasini olib chiqishda erta pit-stopdan keyin halokatga uchradi. Alonsodan oldinda ketayotgan avtomobillar xavfsizlik avtomobili ortidan yonilg'i quyishga kirdi, u g'alabani qo'lga kiritish uchun to'daning oldiga o'tib oldi. Piket Jr 2009-yilgi Vengriya Gran-prisidan keyin ishdan bo'shatildi.

src: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: Jorijiy Galapagos orolari (Ecuador)da yangi qush turi paydo bo'lgani haqida jurnal Science nashrida chop etilgan tadqiqot e'lon qilindi. AQSHda joylashgan Princeton Universiteti va Shvetsiyada joylashgan Uppsala Universiteti olimlari yangi turga ikki avlodda evolyutsiya qilinishini xabar qilishdi, chunki bu jarayon ko'proq vaqt talab qiladi, chunki bu jarayon o'zgarmagan Darwin finchi (Geospiza fortes) va kaktus finchi (Geospiza conirostris) o'rtasida ko'payishni talab qiladi.
ref: Science jurnalining payshanba kungi nashrida Ekvador Galapagos orollarida yangi qush turlari paydo bo'lgani haqida xabar chop etilgan. Amerika Qo'shma Shtatlaridagi Prinston universiteti va Shvetsiyadagi Uppsala universiteti tadqiqotchilari atigi ikkita avlodda rivojlangan yangi turlar haqida xabar qildilar, biroq bu jarayon endemik Darvin zyabligi bo'lgan Geospiza fortes va immigrant kaktus zyabligi bo'lgan Geospiza conirostris o'rtasidagi nasl berish tufayli anchagina uzoqroq vaqtni olishiga ishonib kelingan.

src: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
mt: Bu san'at tadbiri shuningdek, Bukarest shahar kengashi tomonidan yaratilgan kampaniya tarkibida bo'lib, u Ruminiya poytaxtini yaratuvchi va rang-barang shahar sifatida qayta tiklashga intiladi. Bu yilning iyunidan avgustigacha shahar Janubiy-Sharqiy Yevropada birinchi bo'lib CowParade, dunyodagi eng yirik jamoat san'at tadbiri o'tkazadi.
ref: Badiiy tadbir Buxarest shahar meriyasining Ruminiya poytaxtining ijodiy va rang-barang metropolis obrazini qayta tiklash kampaniyasining bir qismi hamdir. Shahar joriy yilning iyun va avgust oylari orasida Yevropaning janubi-sharqida birinchi bo'lib dunyoning eng yirik jamoat san'at tadbiri — Sigirlar paradiga mezbonlik qiladi.

src: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.
mt: Uchishga tayyorlanayotgan samolyot Irkutskka borishga qaror qilgan va ichki qo'shimcha kuchlarga tegishli edi. O'qib chiqish uchun so'zlashuv tashkil etildi. Il-76 1970-yillarda Rossiya va Sovet Ittifoqining asosiy qismi bo'lgan va shu yilning oxirida Rossiya tashqarisida yirik halokatga uchragan. 7-oktyabrda qo'nish paytida dvigatellar ajralib chiqqan, lekin jarohatlar yo'q edi. Il-76larni Rossiya qo'nishdan keyin bir necha kun davomida to'xtatib qo'ygan.
ref: Samolyot Irkutsk tomon yo'l olgan va ichki qo'shinlar tomonidan boshqarilayotgan edi. o'rganish uchun surishtiruv tayinlandi. Il-76 samolyoti 1970-yillardan buyon Rossiya hamda Sovet harbiy kuchlarining asosiy komponenti bo'lib kelgan va u bilan o'tgan oyda Rossiyada jiddiy halokat yuz berdi. 7-oktabr havoga ko'tarilish vaqtida dvigatel ajralib ketdi, jarohatlar kuzatilmadi. Rossiya mazkur voqeadan so'ng II-76 samolyotlari parvozini qisqa muddatga taqiqlab qo'ydi.

src: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.
mt: The Simpsons'dan oldin Simon 1980-yillarda Taxi, Cheers va The Tracy Ullman Show kabi ko'plab shoularda turli lavozimlarda ishlagan. 1989-yilda u Brooks va Groening bilan birga The Simpsons'da ishlab chiqaruvchi bo'lgan va shouda birinchi yozuvchilar jamoasini tanlagan. 1993-yilda shoudan ketgan bo'lsa-da, u ishlab chiqaruvchi bo'lib qolgan va har mavsumda o'nlab million dollarlarga teng miqdorda royalti olgan.
ref: """Simpsonlar""dan oldin Simon bir necha seriallarda turli lavozimlarda ishlagan. U 1980-yillarda ""Taxi"", ""Cheers"" va ""The Tracy Ullman Show"" singari shoular ustida ish olib borgan. 1989-yili u Brooks va Gryoning bilan birgalikda The Simpsons serialini yaratishga yordam berdi va u shouning birinchi yozuvchilar jamoasini yaratishga mas'ul edi. Shouni 1993-yili tark etganligiga qaramasdan, u ijrochi prodyuser unvonini saqlab qoldi hamda har mavsumda o'nlab million dollar goronar olishda davom etdi."

src: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
mt: Flukka ko'ra, ayollar sog'liqni saqlash haqidagi fikrlarini ifodalashga urinayotgan ba'zi odamlarning urinishlari muvaffaqiyatsiz bo'ldi. Ushbu xulosaga kelishiga sabab bo'lgan narsa ayollar va erkaklardan kelgan ko'plab yaxshi fikrlar va ta'sirlanganlikni yozish edi, ular uni tug'ruqni oldindan o'chirish dori-darmonini tibbiy zarurlik sifatida ko'rishga undagan.
ref: Flyukning yozishicha, ayrimlarning ayollarni ayollar sog'lig'i haqida gapirishdan to'xtatishga bo'lgan harakatlari muvaffaqiyatsiz tugagan. U ayollar va erkaklarni kontrasepsiya vositalarini tibbiy ehtiyoj deb hisoblashga undovchi ko'pgina ijobiy fikrlar va rag'bat sababli shunday xulosa chiqargan.

U ayollar va erkaklarni kontrasepsiya vositalarini tibbiy ehtiyoj deb hisoblashga undovchi ko'pgina ijobiy fikrlar va rag'bat sababli shunday xulosa chiqargan.

src: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."
mt: """Ushbu suyuqlik suyakka o'xshaydi. U suyakka o'xshash shaklga ega. Shuning uchun siz daryoning sohilida turib, siz suvning tashqi qismiga qadar ko'rishingiz mumkin. Bizning ma'lumotlarimizga ko'ra, Titan kabi dinamiklikka ega bo'lgan yagona geosaniyadagi jismning nomi Yerdir,"" dedi Stofan.
ref: "Bu xuddi suvga o'xshaydi. Suv qanday shaffof bo'lsa, u ham xuddi shunday shaffof. Shunday qilib, agar siz qirg'oq yoqasida turgan bo'lsangiz, pastga qarab, uning tubidagi har qanday toshlar yoki balchiqni ko'rishingiz mumkin. ""Bizga ma'lumki, Titandan ko'ra ko'proq dinamizm namoyon bo'ladigan yagona sayyoraviy jism bor va uning nomi Yerdir"", — dedi Stofan."

src: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
mt: Shuningdek, bu qushlarning qanotlari bo'lganligini tasdiqlaydi, bu nazariyani ham keng qo'llagan, lekin turlarini aniqlashga yordam beradi.. Olimlar bu qushning qanotlari qora rangda bo'lib, pastki qismi esa yashil yoki karotenoit rangda bo'lganini aniqladi. Bu qushlarning qanotlari bo'lganligini tasdiqlaydi, bu nazariyani ham keng qo'llagan, lekin turlarini aniqlashga yordam beradi.. Olimlar bu qushning qanotlari qora rangda bo'lib, pastki qismi esa yashil yoki karotenoit rangda bo'lganini aniqladi. Bu qushlarning qanotlari bo'lganligini tasdiqlaydi, bu nazariyani ham keng qo'llagan, lekin turlarini aniqlashga yordam beradi.. Olimlar bu qushning qanotlari qora rangda bo'lib, pastki qismi esa yashil yoki karotenoit rangda bo'lganini aniqladi. Bu qushlarning qanotlari bo'lganligini tasdiqlaydi, bu nazariyani ham keng qo'llagan, lekin turlarini aniqlashga yordam beradi.. Olimlar bu qushning qanotlari qora rangda bo'lib, pastki qismi esa yashil yoki karotenoit rangda bo'lganini aniqladi. Bu qushlarning qanotlari bo'lganligini tasdi
ref: Bu faqat allaqachon keng tarqalgan nazariya — hech bo'lmaganda ayrim dinozavrlarda tuk bo'lganini tasdiqlabgina qolmay, balki rangli va uch o'lchamli joylashuv kabi odatda qoldiqlar berolmaydigan tafsilotlarni taqdim etadi. . Olimlarning aytishicha, mazkur hayvonning ustki patlari kashtan-jigarrang, pastkilari esa och yoki karatenoid rangda bo'lgan. Topilma qushlardagi patlar evolyutsiyasi to'g'risida ham tushuncha beradi. Dinozavrlarning patlarida raxis deb ataluvchi yaxshi shakllangan pat o'zagi mavjud bo'lmagani, biroq patlarning boshqa xususiyatlari — soqolcha va tukchalarga ega bo'lgani bois tadqiqotchilar, hoynahoy, raxis boshqa xususiyatlarga qaraganda kechroq paydo bo'lgan evolyutsion rivojlanish, degan xulosaga kelishdi. Patlarning tuzilishi shuni ko'rsatadiki, ulardan uchish uchun emas, balki haroratni nazorat qilish yoxud ko'z-ko'z qilish maqsadida foydalanilgan. Tadqiqotchilar fikricha, bu yosh dinozavrning dumi bo'lsa ham, namuna jo'janing patini emas, balki voyaga yetganning tuklarini ko'rsatadi. Tadqiqotchilar fikricha, garchi ushbu yosh dinozavrning dumi bo'lsa-da, namuna jo'janing patlarini emas, balki katta turning tukini ko'rsatadi.

src: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
mt: Shu vaqtgacha, Ebola kasalligidan o'limni kamaytirishga qodir bo'lgan bir nechta tajribali vaksinalar mavjud bo'lsa-da, kasallanganlarni davolash uchun mos keladigan dori-darmonlar haqida to'g'ri dalillar mavjud emas. Maydonlarda ZMapp dori-darmoni dastlab muvaffaqiyatli ko'rinib, ammo rasmiy tadqiqotlar shuni ko'rsatdiki, o'limni oldini olishga umid qilganidan ko'ra kamroq foydali ekanligini ko'rsatdi. PALM sinovida ZMapp dori-darmoni nazorat vositasi sifatida ishlatilgan, ya'ni olimlar uni standart sifatida ishlatib, uni boshqa uchta davolash usullari bilan solishtirishgan.
ref: Birgina tajriba vaksinasi Eboladan o'lish xavfini kamaytira olishga qodir ko'rinsa ham, shu vaqtga qadar mavjud infeksiyani davolash uchun mos keladigan aniq birorta dori vositasi ko'rsatilmagan. Antitanacha kokteyl ZMapp preparati dastlab bu sohada samaradorlik va'da qilgandi, biroq rasmiy tadqiqotlar uning o'limning oldini olish bo'yicha izlanishlarga qaraganda kamroq foyda keltirishini ko'rsatdi. PALM sinovida ZMapp nazorat sifatida xizmat qildi, bu olimlarning undan asos sifatida foydalangani va u bilan boshqa uchta davolash usulini taqqoslaganini anglatadi.

src: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
mt: Shu vaqtgacha, Ebola kasalligidan o'limni kamaytirishga qodir bo'lgan bir nechta tajribali vaksinalar mavjud bo'lsa-da, kasallanganlarni davolash uchun mos keladigan dori-darmonlar haqida to'g'ri dalillar mavjud emas.
