src: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
mt: Jamoatdagi daromadlar bo'yicha sog'liqni saqlash muassasalarida kasalliklarning, jumladan, sut emizuvchilar kasalligi, tuberkulyoz, HIV va malariyaning oldini olish uchun yangi tashxis usuli e'lon qilindi. Ushbu usulni ishlab chiqarish uchun standart bosma qog'ozlarni ishlatish mumkin. Ushbu usulni ishlab chiqarish uchun standart bosma qog'ozlarni ishlatish mumkin. ref: Dushanba kuni Stenford Universitetining Tibbiyot maktabi olimlari hujayralarni turlariga qarab saralay oladigan yangi tashxis vositasi ixtirosini e'lon qildi: har biri taxminan bir AQSH senti atrofida bo'lgan standart rangli printerlardan foydalangan holda ishlab chiqarish mumkin bo'lgan ingichka bosma chip. Yetakchi tadqiqotchilarning aytishicha, bu kam daromadli davlatlarda bemorlarning saraton, sil, OIV va bezgakni erta aniqlash imkonini berishi mumkin bo'lib, bunday davlatlarda ko'krak bezi saratoni kabi kasalliklardan omon qolish darajasi boyroq davlatlardagi ko'rsatkichning yarmiga teng.

src: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.
mt: Ilmiyotchiylar Oyning yuzasida joylashgan qo'pol qirralar deb nomlangan landshaftlarni topdilar. Ular Oyning juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda yaxshi o'zgarmaganligi aniqlangan holda juda y
ref: Olimlar yassi qiyaliklar deb ataladigan, oy yuzasi bo'ylab sochilib yotgan, aftidan oyning juda sekinlik bilan kichrayishi natijasida yuzaga kelgan relyef shakllarini topishdi. Mazkur jarliklar butun Oy bo'ylab topilgan va ob-havo ta'sirida minimal darajada yemirilgan, bu ularni yuzaga keltirgan geologik hodisalar anchagina yaqinda bo'lganligini ko'rsatadi. Mazkur nazariya Oyning geologik faoliyatdan to'liq mahrum bo'lganligi to'g'risidagi da'voga zid.

src: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."
mt: “Adekoya keyinroq Edinburg sheriflik sudida o'g'li uchun o'ldirganlikda ayblangan. U hibsga olingan, biroq shaxsiy tan olinishlari tashvishli bo'lib, bu boshqa joylarda ham sodir bo'lib keladi. Shu sababli, Shotlandiya adolatining ishlash usuli boshqa joylardan farq qiladi va sudlar nashrlarida shaxsiy taniqlashlarni tashvishli deb ko'radi. Dundee Universitetining professor Pamela Ferguson shunday deydi: “jurnalistlar juda xavfli yo'lga chiqishlari mumkin”. Bosh prokuratura, jamiroqda sud ishlarini boshqaradi, jurnalistlarga shaxsiy taniqlashlarni kamaytirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kamchiliklarni o'zgartirishni so'radi, kam
ref: "O'shandan buyon Adekoya Edinburg Sherif sudida o'g'lini o'ldirganlikda ayblanmoqda. U ayblov xulosasi va sud muhokamasiga qadar hibsda bo'ladi, biroq guvohlarning istalgan dalili yanglish bo'lishi mumkin, chunki uning rasmi keng chop etilgan. Bu Birlashgan Qirollikning boshqa joylarida umumiy amaliyotdir, biroq Shotlandiya adliyasi boshqacha ishlaydi va sudlar fotosuratlarning chop qilinishini ziddiyatli deb qaraydi. Dandi universitet professori Pamela Ferguson qayd etishicha, ""gumon qilinuvchilarning suratlar va boshqalarni chop etayotgan bo'lsa, jurnalistlar chindan ham xavfli yo'lakdan yurayotganga o'xshaydi"". Prokuraturaning umumiy ayblovida bo'lgan Crown Office kamida ayblov xulosasigacha jurnalistlarga boshqa izoh berilmasligini bildirdi."

src: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.
mt: Shuningdek, qattiq muz bilan birga, qiyin iqlim sharoitlari qutqarishga to'siq bo'lgan. Pittman qutqarish urunishlari shartnomasiga qadar keyingi haftaning boshida yaxshilanmaydi, degan xabardorlikda e'lon qildi. Muz qatlami, Pittmanning aytishicha, 15 yil ichida qo'rqoqchilar uchun eng yomon holatda.
ref: Maydalangan muzga qo'shilib keskin ob-havo sharoiti ham qutqaruv ishlariga xalal bermoqda. Pittman sharoitlar keyingi haftaning ma'lum vaqtigacha o'nglanmasligini taxmin qildi. Pittmanning so'zlariga ko'ra, pakli muzning miqdori hamda qalinligi tyulen ovlovchilar uchun oxirgi 15 yildagi eng yomonidir.

src: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."
mt: Roberts to'g'risida hayot boshlanishiga qanday qilib ishonishini so'radilar, bu muhim masala bo'lib, u o'qituvchilarni o'qitishda qo'llaniladigan etik qoidalariga qarshi chiqishni rad etdi, lekin uning oldingi bayonotini takrorladi, u shunday dedi: ""Roe v. Wade - bu qonun hukmida qolgan"", uqtirish muhimligini ta'kidlab, o'zining qonuniy huquqiga ishonishini tasdiqladi.
ref: "Roberts abort qilish etikasini ko'rib chiqishda muhim bo'lgan savol — u hayot qachon boshlanadi, deb ishonishi to'g'risida gapirishdan qat'iy bosh tortdi va bunday holatlarning o'ziga xos xususiyatlari haqida fikr bildirish axloqsizlik bo'ladi, dedi. Biroq u o'zining ""Rou Ueytga qarshi"" ""mamlakatning o'rnatilgan qonuni"" ekani haqida aytganlarini takrorlab, Oliy sud qarorlarining izchil bo'lishi muhimligini ta'kidladi. U yana Rouning qarori bog'liq bo'lgan, ko'zda tutilgan dahlsizlik huquqiga ishonishini ham tasdiqladi."

src: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
mt: To'g'ri 8:46 da shahar bo'ronli bo'lib qoldi, birinchi jetning maqsadiga urilganidan aniq vaqtda. Ikki nurli ishlar tashkil etilgan bo'lib, ertalabga qadar quyoshga qaratilgan. Inshoat ishlari davom etmoqda, u yerda besh ta yangi inshoatli binolar qurilishi kutilmoqda, ularning o'rtasida transport markazi va xotiraga bag'ishlangan bog' mavjud.
ref: Aynan soat 8:46 (TO) da, aniqroq aytadigan bo'lsak, birinchi samolyot nishoniga zarba bergan vaqtda butun shahardagi sokinlik buzildi. Ikkita yorug'lik nuri tunda osmondagi nuqta tomon yo'naltirildi. Qurilish maydonida transport markazi va xotira bog'i bilan birgalikda beshta yangi osmono'par bino qurilishi olib borilmoqda.

src: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."
mt: "Barcha yon bag'irlar, ularga "Yetti singlim" deyilgan, kamida 100 dan 250 metrga (328 dan 820 futgacha) diametrda. src: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. src: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
mt: Shaxsning ayblanishicha, u uch o'rta avtomobilni portlatgan bomba bilan qo'rqitgan jamoaga hujum qildi. Portlashdan keyin yaralangan shaxsni hibsga olishgan. Uning ismi hali rasmiylar tomonidan ma'lum emas, lekin ular uning uigur millatiga mansubligini bilishgan.
ref: Erkak portlovchi moddalar bilanto'ldirilgan uch g'ildirakli transport vositasini olomon ustiga tomon haydagani gumon qilinmoqda. Bombani portlatganlikda gumon qilingan erkak portlash oqibatida jarohatlar olganidan keyin qo'lga olindi. Hukumat organlari uning uyg'ur etnik guruhi a'zosi ekanini bilsa-da, uning ismi haligacha ularga ma'lum emas.

src: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
mt: Janubiy Afrika jamoasi "All Blacks" (Yangi Zelandiya) bilan Tri Millatlar kubogi o'yinida Royal Bafokeng stadionida Rustenburg shahrida g'alaba qozondi. Final natija 21:20 bo'ldi, bu All Blacks 15 ta g'alaba seriyasini tugatdi. Springboks uchun bu 5 ta mag'lubiyat seriyasini tugatdi. Ushbu o'yin All Blacks uchun ikki haftadan keyin kubokni qo'lga kiritganidan keyin so'nggi o'yin edi. Bir haftadan keyin Springboks va Avstraliya o'rtasidagi so'nggi o'yin Ellis Park stadionida Yohannesburgda bo'lib o'tadi.
ref: "Janubiy Afrikaning Rustenburg shahrida joylashgan Royal Bafokeng stadionida o'tkazilgan Uch Millat Seriyasi doirasidagi o'yinda Janubiy Afrika All Blacks (Yangi Zelandiya) jamoasini mag'lub etdi. Oxirgi ochko 21 ga 20 ko'rinishdagi bir ballik g'alabani keltirdi va ""All Blacks""ning 15 ta g'alabali o'yinlar seriyasiga barham berdi. Bu Springboks uchun besh o'yindan iborat mag'lubiyatlar seriyasiga yakun yasadi. Bu ikki hafta avval sovrin yutgan ""All Blacks"" jamoasi uchun oxirgi o'yin edi. Turkum musobaqalarning final o'yini kelgusi hafta Yoxannesburgning Ellis Park stadionida bo'lib o'tadi, unda Springbooks Avstraliya bilan bellashadi."

src: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.
mt: Stansiya o'z holatini saqlab qolgan, boshqa gyroskopni yo'qotishdan oldin kosmik stansiyada, kosmik sayohatning oxirigacha saqlab qolgan. Chiao va Sharipov o'z holatini o'zgarmas holda saqlab qolganini xabar berishdi. Rossiya tomonidan boshqariladigan stansiya o'z holatini tikladi.
ref: Kosmik stansiya missiyasida avvalroq giroskopning yo'qolganiga qaramay, stansiya ochiq kosmosga chiqish jarayoni oxiriga qadar o'z yo'nalishini saqlab qoldi. Chiao va Sharipovlarning balandlikni sozlovchi uloqtirish qurilmalaridan xavfsiz masofada ekanligi xabar qilindi. Rossiya yer usti nazorati samolyotlarni faollashtirdi hamda stansiyaning odatdagi munosabati qayta tiklandi.

src: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.
mt: Shikoyatlar AQShning Virjiniya shtatida ishga tushirildi, chunki u AOLga ega bo'lib, bu kompaniya shikoyatlarni boshlab yuborgan. 2003-yilda qo'pol elektron pochta, ya'ni spam, foydalanuvchilarning pochta bo'limlariga qo'pol ravishda tarqatishni to'xtatish uchun qabul qilingan qonunlarga ko'ra, bu birinchi marta ayblanishga olib keldi.
ref: Ish Virjiniyada olib borildi, chunki u yerda ayblovlarni qo'zg'atgan kompaniya — yetakchi internet provayder AOL joylashgan. Bu ommaviy elektron pochta xabarlarining — spam nomi bilan ham mashhur — foydalanuvchilar pochta qutilariga nomaqbul tarqatilishini cheklash maqsadida 2003-yilda qabul qilingan qonunga tayanib chiqarilgan ilk hukmdir.

src: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
mt: 28 yoshli Vidal uch yil oldin Sevilladan Barçaga o'tgan. Barça tarkibida o'ynagan 49 uchrashuvda u katalon poytaxtida o'ynagan.
ref: 28 yoshli Vidal uch mavsum avval Sevilya jamoasidan Barsa jamoasiga kelib qo'shildi. Kataloniya poytaxtiga ko'chib o'tganidan beri Vidal klub uchun 49 ta o'yinda qatnashdi.

src: Jarque was practicing during pre-season training at Coverciano in Italy earlier in the day. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.

src: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.
mt: To'g'risi bilan, tsunami xabari chiqarilmagan va Jakarta geofizika agentligining aytishicha, tsunami xabari chiqarilmaydi, chunki zilzila 6,5 balli talabni qo'llab-quvvatlamadi. Biroq, tsunami xavfi yo'q bo'lib, aholi qo'rquvga tushib, biznes va uy-joydan chiqib ketdi.
ref: Sunami to'g'risida hech qanday ogohlantirish berilmagan hamda Jakarta geofizika agentligiga ko'ra, 6,5 ballik talabga mos kelmaganligi sababli sunami to'g'risida ogohlantirish berilmaydi. Sunami xavfi yo'qligiga qaramay, aholi vahimaga tushdi va o'z uylari va bizneslarini tark eta boshladi.

src: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
mt: Ular quyoshning boshqa yulduzlarga o'xshash asosiy tamoyillariga ishlaydiganini topdilar: tizimdagi barcha yulduzlarning faollik darajasi ularning yorqinligi, ularning aylanishi va boshqa narsalar bilan birlashtirilgan. Yorqinlik va aylanish ularga plazma oqimini aniqlash uchun birgalikda ishlatiladi. Rossby soni kichikroq bo'lgan yulduzlar magnitlik o'zgarishlari bilan bog'liq bo'lgan.
ref: Ular Quyosh boshqa yulduzlarga o'xshagan asosiy tamoyillar asosida harakatlanganini aniqlashdi: tizimdagi barcha yulduzlar faolligi ularning yorug'ligi, aylanishidan boshqa hech narsaga bog'liq emasligi aniqlandi. Yorug'lik va aylanish yulduzning plazma oqimi bilan bog'liq bo'lgan Rossbi raqamini aniqlash uchun birgalikda foydalaniladi. Rossbi soni qancha kichik bo'lsa, yulduzning magnetik o'zgarishlarga nisbatan faolligi shuncha past bo'ladi.

src: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.
mt: 2010 yilgi federal saylovoldi 1400 nafar kishining o'tkazilgan so'rovi natijasida, 2008 yilda 8 foizga ko'payib, Avstraliyani respublika qilishga qarshi bo'lganlarning soni aniqlandi. Saylovoldi davri davomida 2010 yilgi federal saylovda qatnashgan Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard Avstraliyani respublika qilishni tanladi, shu tufayli u Avstraliyani respublika qilishni xohlaydi, deb da'vo qildi. ref: 2010-yilgi federal saylovga qadar o'tkazilgan so'rovnomalarda qatnashgan 1400 kishidan Avstraliyaning respublika bo'lishiga qarshi chiqqanlar soni 2008-yildan beri 8 foizga oshdi. Vaqtincha Bosh vazir vazifasini bajarayotgan Juliya Gillard 2010-yilgi federal saylovlar kampaniyasi chog'ida Qirolicha Yelizaveta II hukmronligidan keyin Avstraliya respublika bo'lishi kerak, deb hisoblashini aytdi. So'rovnomada ishtirok etganlarning 34 foizi qirolicha Yelizaveta II ning Avstraliyaning oxirgi monarxi bo'lishini xohlagan holda shu fikrni bildirgan. So'rovnomaning eng ko'zga tashlanadigan natijalariga ko'ra, ishtirokchilarning 29 foizi Avstraliya imkon qadar tezroq respublika bo'lishi kerak, 31 foizi esa Avstraliya hech qachon respublika bo'lmasligi kerak deb hisoblaydi.

src: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.
mt: 2010 yilgi federal saylovoldi 1400 nafar kishining o'tkazilgan so'rovi natijasida, 2008 yilda 8 foizga ko'payib, Avstraliyani respublika qilishga qarshi bo'lganlarning soni aniqlandi. Saylovoldi davri davomida 2010 yilgi federal saylovda qatnashgan Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard Avstraliyani respublika qilishni tanladi, shu tufayli u Avstraliyani respublika qilishni xohlaydi, deb da'vo qildi. src: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
mt: Lesli Aun, Komen jamg'armasi vakili, tashkilotning yangi qoidasini e'lon qildi, u shu qoida tashkilotlarga mablag' berish yoki mablag' berishni taqiqlaydi, ularning qonuniy tekshiruvi ostida bo'lsa. Komenning siyosati tashkilotga tashkilotning pulni sarf etishi va hisobini yozish bo'yicha qonuniy tekshiruv o'tkazilishi kerakligi sababli, Representative Cliff Stearns tashkilotda abortga mablag' berishni o'rganish uchun tashkilotga mablag' berishni taqiqlaydi. Stearns, uning rahbarligi ostida, Energiya va savdo qo'mitasining tekshiruv va tekshiruv bo'limi, tashkilotda abortga mablag' berishni o'rganish uchun tashkilotga mablag' berishni taqiqlaydi.
ref: Komen fondi vakili Lesli Aunning so'zlariga ko'ra, tashkilot qonuniy tergov o'tkazilayotgan tashkilotlarning grant yoki pul mablag'lari bilan mukofotlanishini taqiqlaydigan yangi qoidani qabul qilgan. Vakil Kliff Stirns tomonidan Rejalashtirilgan ota-onalik tashkiloti mablag'larni qay tarzda sarflashi va bu haqda hisobot berishi yuzasidan olib borilishi kutilayotgan tergov sababli Komen siyosati Rejalashtirilgan ota-onalik tashkilotini diskvalifikatsiya qildi. Sterns Uy energiyasi va tijorat qo'mitasi qoshidagi Nazorat va surishtiruvlar quyi qo'mitasining raisi sifatida o'z vazifasida Rejalashtirilgan ota-onalik federatsiyasi orqali abortni moliyalashtirish uchun soliqlardan foydalanilayotganligi yoki yo'qligini o'rganmoqda.

src: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."
mt: Madhya Pradesh politsiyasi qo'rqinchli ayolning kompyuter va mobil telefonini o'g'irlaganini aniqladi. D K Arya deputat politsiyachi o'g'irlangan shveysariyalik ayolni zo'ravon qilgan 5 nafar ishchini hibsga oldi va uni qo'rqinchli ayolning mobil va kompyuterini qaytarib berdi. Ishchilar nomlari Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar va Vishnu Kanjar. Politsiya boshlig'i Chandra Shekhar Solanki ishchilarning yuzlarini qopqoq bilan chiqishlari haqida ma'lumot berdi.
ref: "Madxya-Pradesh politsiyasi o'g'irlangan noutbuk hamda mobil telefonni qaytardi. ""Shveytsariyalik ayolni zo'rlagan besh kishini hibsga oldik hamda mobil telefoni va noutbukni egasiga qaytardik"", deb aytdi bosh inspektor o'rinbosari D. K. Arya. Ayblanuvchilar Baba Kanjar, Buta Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar hamda Vishnu Kanjar deb atalgan. Politsiya boshlig'i Chandra Shekxar Solanki so'zlariga ko'ra, ayblanuvchi sudga yuzi berkitilgan holda kelgan."

src: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
mt: ASUS Eee PC, dunyo bo'ylab xarajatni kamaytirish va funksionallik faktorlari uchun chiqarilgan, 2007 yilda Taypey IT Oyi bo'lib o'tdi. Biroq, ASUS 2007 yilda Tayvan sotib olishga qodir bo'lgan mukofotga sazovor bo'ldi, bu mukofot Tayvan Respublikasining Prezidenti tomonidan berilgan.
ref: "Avvalroq iqtisodiy tejamkorlik va funksionallik omillari uchun dunyo bo'ylab ishlab chiqarila boshlangan ASUS Eee PC 2007-yili Taypeydagi IT oyligida dolzarb mavzuga aylandi. Biroq ASUS 2007-yilgi ""Tayvan barqarorlik mukofoti"" taqdirlash marosimida Xitoy Respublikasi boshqaruvchisi Yuan tomonidan taqdirlanganidan keyin noutbuk kompyuterlari iste'molchilari bozori nihoyatda xilma-xil bo'ladi va o'zgaradi."

src: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.
mt: Shubha bo'ldi, chunki 1-yanvar kuni Obanazavada yashovchi yuzlab aholi yilning o'ziga xos va muayyan bo'lgan yangi yil kartalari bilan birga 600 dan ortiq post tashriflari, jumladan 429 yangi yil kartalari, ulardan bir qanchasi qo'ng'iroq qilganlarga yetib kelmaganini tushunib, post tashriflari bilan birga 600 dan ortiq post tashriflari, jumladan 429 yangi yil kartalari, ulardan bir qanchasi qo'ng'iroq qilganlarga yetib kelmaganini tushunib, post tashriflari bilan birga 600 dan ortiq post tashriflari, jumladan 429 yangi yil kartalari, ulardan bir qanchasi qo'ng'iroq qilganlarga yetib kelmaganini tushunib, post tashriflari bilan birga 600 dan ortiq post tashriflari, jumladan 429 yangi yil kartalari, ulardan bir qanchasi qo'ng'iroq qilganlarga yetib kelmaganini tushunib, post tashriflari bilan birga 600 dan ortiq post tashriflari, jumladan 429 yangi yil kartalari, ulardan bir qanchasi qo'ng'iroq qilganlarga yetib kelmaganini tushunib, post tashriflari bilan birga 600 dan ortiq post tashriflari, jumladan 429 yangi yil kartalari, ulardan bir qanchasi qo'ng'iroq qilganlarga yetib kelmaganini tushunib, post tashriflari bilan birga 600 dan ortiq post tashriflari, jumladan 429 yangi yil kartalari, ulardan bir qanchasi qo'ng'iroq qilganlarga yetib kelmaganini tushunib,
ref: Bu muammo 1-yanvar kuni o'nlab mahalliy rezidentlarning Obanazava pochta idorasiga an'anaviy va doimiy Yangi yil otkritkalarini olmaganidan shikoyat qilishi bilan boshlandi. Kecha pochta bo'limi mo'ljallangan qabul qiluvchilariga yetkazib berilmagan 600 dan ortiq pochta hujjatlarini, jumladan, 429 ta Yangi Yil otkritkalarini bolakay tomonidan yashirilganligini aniqlaganidan keyin, fuqarolar hamda ommaviy axborot vositalaridan uzr so'radi.

src: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.
mt: Murray birinchi setda ikkala o'yinchi ham setni uzatishda o'z xizmatini saqlab qolganidan so'ng uzatishda mag'lub bo'ldi. Del Potro ikkinchi setda hamyon oldinda edi, ammo shu ham 6-6 ga yetgach, uzatishda qolganidan so'ng uzatishda qolgan. src: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""
mt: Ushbu holatda xalqni himoya qilish uchun qo'llab-quvvatlovchi davlat xizmatchilari bilan birga, u Texas aholisiga shoshilinch chora-tadbirlar olib borilayotganini ta'kidlab, xalqning xavfsizligini himoya qilishda qandaydir muammolar yo'q ekanligini ta'kidlab, Perry shunday dedi: "Bu holat juda muhim. Sizga ishonib, bizning tizimimiz faqat shunday ishlaydi." U shuningdek, shunday dedi: "Bugun biz o'qituvchilar bilan birga o'qish yoshlaridan biri bilan bog'liq bo'lgan bemorlarni aniqladik." U shuningdek, shunday dedi: "Bu holat juda muhim. Sizga ishonib, bizning tizimimiz faqat shunday ishlaydi."
ref: "O'sha mulozimlar hamrohligida u Texas aholisini jamoat xavfsizligini himoyalash chora-tadbirlari ko'rilayotganiga ishontirdi. Perri, xususan: ""Dunyoda bu holatda yuzaga keladigan muammoni munosib qarshi olish uchun yaxshiroq jihozlangan atigi bir nechta joy bor"", — dedi. Shuningdek, ""Bugun ayrim maktab yoshidagi bolalar bemor bilan aloqada bo'lgani aniqlanganidan xabar topdik"", — dedi gubernator. ""Bu masala jiddiy. Tizimimiz zarur darajada ishlayotganiga ishonchingiz komil bo'lsin"", deya davom etdi u."

src: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

ref: """Kunlik shou"" va ""Kolbert hisoboti""dan ancha oldin Xek va Jonson 1988-yili UWda talaba bo'lgan paytlari yangiliklar va xabarlarni parodiya qiladigan nashrni tasavvur qilishgandi. Asos solinganidan beri The Onion bosma nashri, oktyabr oyida 5 000 000 individual tashrif buyuruvchilari, shaxsiy reklamalar, 24 soatlik yangiliklar tarmog'i, podkastlari va yaqinda ishga tushirilgan ""Bizning ahmoqqina dunyomiz"" nomli dunyo atlasi bilan chinakam yangiliklar parodiyasi imperiyasiga aylandi. Al Gor va general Tommi Frenks bexosdan o'zlarining sevimli sarlavhalarini (The Onion nashriga ko'ra, Gor o'zining 2000-yilgi Saylov kollegiyasidagi mag'lubiyatidan keyin u va Tipper hayotlaridagi eng yaxshi jinsiy aloqani qilishni boshlaganliklarini) aytib yuboradi. Ularning ko'pgina yozuvchilari Jon Styuart hamda Stiven Kolbertning yangiliklar parodiyasi shoulariga kuchli ta'sir ko'rsatgan."

src: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
mt: Protest ertalab soat 11:00 (UTC+1)da Whitehalldagi Downing Streetning politsiyaga qaram bo'lgan kirish joyi oldida boshlandi. 11:00 da, protestchilar Whitehalldagi shimoliy yo'nalishdagi yo'lovchilar yo'lini to'xtatdilar. 11:20 da, politsiyachilar protestchilarga yo'lovchilar to'xtatishga to'g'ri kelmaydigan yo'nalishga qaytishni so'radilar. 11:29 da, protest Whitehalldan Trafalgar Squarega, so'ngra Strandga, Aldwychga va keyin Kingswayga yo'nalib ketdi, u yerda konservatorlar partiyasi Spring Forumini Grand Connaught Rooms mehmonxonasida o'tkazishgan edi.
ref: Norozilik namoyishi mahalliy vaqt bilan taxminan 11:00 da (UTC+1) Bosh vazirning rasmiy qarorgohi – politsiya qo'riqlaydigan Dauning-stritga kirish ro'parasidagi Uaytxollda boshlandi. Soat 11:00 dan o'tishi bilan namoyishchilar Uaytxolldagi shimol tomonga yo'nalgan transport yo'lini to'sib qo'ydilar. 11:20 da politsiya namoyishchilar norozilik namoyishiga bo'lgan huquqi bilan yo'l harakati tirbandligi muvozanatini saqlashi kerakligini aytib, ulardan trotuarga qaytishini so'radi. Norozilik yurishi 11:29 atrofida Uaytxolldan yuqoriga harakatlanib, Trafalgar tarafga o'tdi hamda Strand bo'ylab Aldvaych va Kingsvay orqali konservatorlar partiyasi Grand Connaught Rooms mehmonxonasida o'zlarining bahorgi forumini o'tkazayotgan Xolborn tomon yo'naldi.

src: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

ref: """Hozir bizda diabetik bo'lishi kerak bo'lgan, diabetik bo'lmagan 4 oylik sichqon mavjud"", deb qo'shib qo'ydi u. Yangi Shotlandiyaning Galifaks shahridagi Dalxauzi universiteti tibbiyot professori hamda Kanada diabet birlashmasining klinik va ilmiy bo'limi raisi doktor Ehud Ur tadqiqot hali o'zining boshlang'ich davrida ekani haqida ogohlantirdi. Ayrim boshqa mutaxassislar kabi, u diabetni davolash mumkinligiga shubha bilan qaraydi hamda mazkur xulosalar allaqachon 1-toifa diabetga chalingan kishilarga aloqador emasligini qayd etadi."

src: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

ref: Twin Otter kecha Kokodada PNG Parvoz CG4684 samolyoti sifatida qo'nishga urinayotgandi, biroq avvalroq bir marta bekor qilingan edi. Ikkinchi yaqinlashishidan keyin qo'nishi kerak bo'lgan vaqtdan taxminan o'n daqiqa avval u yo'qolib qolgan. Halokat joyi bugun aniqlandi va u yerga kirish shu qadar imkonsizki, ikkita politsiyachi omon qolganlarni izlash va voqea joyini ko'zdan kechirish uchun changalzorga tushirildi. Qidiruvga bekor qilingan qo'nishga sabab bo'lgan aynan shu ob-havo xalaqit bergan.

src: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.
mt: Lee shuningdek, Turkiyada bolalar A(H5N1) qo'qon quchini o'z ichiga olgan va kasallikka chalinganligi haqidagi xabarlarga qarshi fikr bildirdi. Ushbu kasallikni global epidemiyaga olib kelish uchun o'ldirish darajasi kamayishi kerakligi haqidagi ba'zi tadqiqotlarni eslatdi. Ushbu kasallikning belgilari o'zgarganligi sababli, bemorlar o'z kechki ishlari bilan davom etishi mumkinligi haqidagi xavotirlar mavjud.
ref: Doktor Li ayni damda Turkiyada bolalar xastalanmasdan A (H5N1) parranda grippi virusini yuqtirayotganligi to'g'risidagi xabarlardan xavotrilanayotganini ham aytdi. Ba'zi tadqiqotlar kasallik global epidemiyani keltirib chiqarishidan oldin uning o'lim darajasi pastroq bo'lishi kerakligini ko'rsatadi, deb qayd etdi u. Gripp belgilari yengilligicha qolsa, bemorlar kundalik yumushlarini bajarish orqali ko'proq insonlarga infeksiyani yuqtirishda davom etishlari mumkin, degan xavotir bor.

src: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.
mt: Morakot tufani xabar berishicha, 9 avgust kuni kechqurun Xitoyning Fujian viloyatidan taxminan yetti yuz kilometr uzoqlikda bo'lgan. Tufan Xitoyga o'n bir kilometr/soat tezlikda yurishi taxmin qilinmoqda.
ref: 9-avgust tunida Morakot ko'zi Xitoyning Futzyan provinsiyasidan taxminan yetmish kilometr masofada edi. To'fon Xitoy tarafga taxminan 11 km/soat tezlikda harakatlanmoqda.

src: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
mt: Qo'shaqiy Bush Singapurga 16-noyabr kuni soat ertalab kelib, Osiyodagi bir haftalik sayohatini boshladi. U Singapurning vitse-prezidenti Wong Kan Seng va Singapurning bosh vaziri Lee Hsien Loong bilan savdo va terrorizm masalalari haqida gaplashdi. O'z davlatidagi o'rtacha saylovlar natijasida yo'qotishlari tufayli Bush auditoriyaga savdo tarmoqlarining Osiyodagi kengayishi haqida gapirdi.
ref: AQSH Prezidenti Jorj V. Bush, Osiyo bo'ylab bir haftalik sayohatini boshlab, 16-noyabr kuni tongda Singapurga yetib keldi. U Singapur Bosh vazirining muovini Vong Kan Seng tomonidan kutib olindi hamda Singapur Bosh Vaziri Li Syan Lun bilan savdo-sotiq va terrorizm masalalarini muhokama qildi. Oraliq saylovlardagi bir haftalik yo'qotishlardan keyin, Bush ommaga Osiyoda savdo-sotiqning kengayishi to'g'risida so'zlab berdi.

src: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.
mt: Bugun e'lon qilingan xabarda shuningdek, bu yilning mart oyida qilgan qarorni davom ettirishga shaxsiy transport vositalarini sotib olishga qaratilgan. 300 ta qo'shimcha qo'shish bilan umumiy 1,300 ta qo'shishga erishildi, bu qo'shishni qoplash uchun.
ref: Bugungi e'lon hukumatning joriy yilning martida berilgan qo'shimcha vagonlarni moliyalashtirish majburiyatlarini ham kengaytirdi. Qo'shimcha 300 tadan keyin jami vagonlar 1300 taga yetib, tirbandlikni kamaytiririshga erishiladi.

src: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""
mt: Ushbu xabar qilishda, u shunday dedi: ""Menimcha, bu xabardorlikni sezishga yo'l qo'yish uchun hech qanday ma'lumot yo'q. Biroq, xabardorlik darajasini og'ir qilish shuni anglatmasa ham, umumiy xabardorlik yo'qolmaganini anglatadi."""
ref: "U: ""Hujumning yaqin-orada kutilishini taxmin qilish uchun hech qanday razvedka ma'lumotlari yo'q"", dedi. ""Lekin tahdid darajasini keskin tushirish umumiy tahdidning yo'qolganini anglatmaydi""."

src: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.
mt: Martelly ertalabki kuni o'n a'zodan iborat yangi Ovoz berish qonuniga muvofiq qabul qilindi. Bu Martellyning to'rt yil ichida beshinchi CEP edi. Oktabr oyining oxirida prezident komissiyasi CEPning iste'foga chiqishini tavsiya qildi, bu esa yangi saylovlar uchun mamlakatni olib chiqish uchun qo'llaniladigan paketning bir qismi edi. Komissiya Martellyning kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kelgan kengashi ovoz berishni boshlashdan oldin yuzaga kel
ref: Kecha Martelli to'qqiz nafar a'zodan tarkib topgan yangi Muvaqqat saylov kengashi (CEP) oldida qasamyod keltirdi. Bu Martellining to'rt yil ichidagi beshinchi CEPidir. O'tgan oy prezident komissiyasi davlatni yangi saylovlar sari yo'naltirishga mo'ljallangan bir qancha chora-tadbirlar doirasida oldingi CEPning iste'foga chiqishini tavsiya qildi. Oktyabrda boshlangan rejimga qarshi keng qamrovli norozilik namoyishlariga Martelli komissiya bilan javob qaytardi. Ba'zi hollarda kuchli norozilik namoyishlari ayrimlari 2011-yildan beri o'tkazilishi kerak bo'lgan saylovlarning o'tkazilmaganligi tufayli yuz berdi.

src: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
mt: USA gimnastikasi Olimpiya qo'mitasining xatini qo'llab-quvvatlaydi va sport oilasining barcha sportchilari uchun xavfsiz muhitni targ'ib qilish zarurligini tan oladi. Biz USOCning xabari bilan ham to'la to'g'ri kelishmiz. Bizning tashkilotimizda shunday qadr qilgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari haqida qo'rqmas holda eshitgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari haqida qo'rqmas holda eshitgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari haqida qo'rqmas holda eshitgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari haqida qo'rqmas holda eshitgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari haqida qo'rqmas holda eshitgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari haqida qo'rqmas holda eshitgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari haqida qo'rqmas holda eshitgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari haqida qo'rqmas holda eshitgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari haqida qo'rqmas holda eshitgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari haqida qo'rqmas holda eshitgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari haqida qo'rqmas holda eshitgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari haqida qo'rqmas holda eshitgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari haqida qo'rqmas holda eshitgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari haqida qo'rqmas holda eshitgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari haqida qo'rqmas holda eshitgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari haqida qo'rqmas holda eshitgan shaxslarning shaxsiy tajribalari
ref: AQSH Gimnastika qo'mitasi Qo'shma Shtatlar Olimpiya Qo'mitasining maktubini qo'llab-quvvatlaydi hamda bizning hamma atletlarimiz uchun xavfsiz muhitni ta'minlash maqsadida Olimpiya oilasining mutlaq ehtiyojlarini qabul qiladi. Biz USOCning sportchilarimiz va klublarimiz hamda ularning sporti manfaatlarini sertifikatdan mahrum qilishdan koʻra, tashkilotimiz ichida jiddiy oʻzgarishlar qilish orqali olgʻa siljish yaxshiroq taʼminlashi mumkin, degan fikriga qoʻshilamiz. AQSH gimnastika federatsiyasi Larri Nassar qurbonlari tomonidan shu qadar jasurlarcha tasvirlangan darajadagi jinoyat qanday qilib shuncha payt aniqlanmay davom etganiga oydinlik kiritadigan mustaqil tekshiruvni qo'llab-quvvatlaydi hamda har qanday zaruriy va tegishli o'zgarishlarni qabul qiladi. AQSH Gimnastika va USOC bir maqsadga ega — gimnastika va sport turini hamda boshqalarni atletlarning o'z orzulariga xavfsiz, ijobiy hamda vakolatli muhitda erishishlari uchun imkon qadar xavfsiz qilish.

src: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."
mt: Qo'shimcha ma'lumotlarga ko'ra, AQSH dengiz floti ham voqeani tekshirishda. Shuningdek, AQSH dengiz floti vakillari shunday deyishdi, "Uchuvchilar hozirgacha kemani o'z qo'llab-quvvatlashi mumkin bo'lgan eng yaxshi usulni aniqlashda ishlamoqda". Avenger sinfidagi mina qarshilashtirish kemasi, kema Puerto Princesa shahriga borishda edi. U AQSH dengiz floti VII floti tarkibiga kiradi va Sasebo shahrida, Nagasaki prefekturasida, Yaponiyada joylashgan.
ref: "AQSH harbiy-dengiz floti ham mazkur voqea bo'yicha surishtiruv ishlari olib borilayotganini bildirdi. Ular bayonotda yana ""Ekipaj ayni damda kemani xavfsiz tarzda chiqarib olishning eng yaxshi usulini aniqlash ustida ish olib bormoqda"", dedi. Evenjer tipidagi minalarga qarshi kurashish kemasi Palava shahridagi Puerto Prince tomonga ketayotgan kema edi. U AQSHning yettichi flotiga tayinlangan hamda Yaponiyadagi Nagasaki prefekturasining Sasebo shahrida joylashgan."

src: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". src: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.
mt: Yakshanba kuni AQSh prezidenti Donald Trump, press sekretariy orqali e'lon qilingan xabarda AQSh qo'shinlari Suriyadan chiqib ketishini e'lon qildi. Xabar AQSh prezidenti Donald Trump va Turkiya prezidenti Recep Tayyip Erdoğan o'rtasidagi telefon suhbatidan so'ng e'lon qilindi. Xabar shuni ham o'z ichiga oladi ki, Turkiya ozod qilingan IS jangchilarni qo'riq qiladi, bu esa, xabar qilinishicha, Yevropa mamlakatlari qaytarishdan bosh tortgan.
ref: Yakshanba oqshomida AQSH prezidenti Donald Tramp matbuot kotibi orqali bergan bayonotida AQSH qo'shinlari Suriyadan chiqib ketishini e'lon qildi. Tramp Turkiya prezidenti Rajab Toyyib Erdo'g'an bilan telefonda gaplashganidan keyin bu haqida ma'lum qilindi. Bayonotda qayd etilishicha, Turkiya, shunigdek, Yevropa davlatlari yurtiga qaytarishdan bosh tortgan ISHID jangarilarini qo'riqlashni o'z zimmasiga oladi.

src: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
mt: Ittifoqchilar va Afg'oniston qo'shini joyga kirib, joyni qamrab olish va boshqa ittifoqchilar uchuvchilarini yordamga chaqirish uchun yuborishdi. Halokat tog'li hududda sodir bo'lgan va qo'shinning aytishicha, bu qo'shinning o'q otishidan kelib chiqqan. Qo'shinning joyga kirib borishga urinishlari yomon ob-havo va qattiq tog'li hududga to'g'ri keladi.
ref: Koalitsiya hamda afg'on qo'shinlari mazkur joyni himoya qilish uchun bu hududga ko'chib o'tishdi hamda koalitsiyaning boshqa samolyotlari yordam berish uchun yuborildi. Halokat tog'li hududning baland qismida sodir bo'lgan va dushmanlarning o't ochishi natijasida kelib chiqqan deb ishonilmoqda. Halokat sodir bo'lgan joyni qidirish harakatlari yomon ob-havo hamda qattiq yer sharoitlariga duch kelmoqda.

src: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
mt: 1963-yilda barjani qurishdan keyin mavsumiy toshqinlar, daryoning barcha qismida tuproqni tarqatib yuborardi. Bu tuproq qumli tepaliklar va qumli qirg'oqlar yaratish uchun zarur edi, ular o'smirlik uchun muhim bo'lgan. Natijada, ikkita balik turi yo'q bo'lib, ikkitasi qo'rqoq holatga kelgan, jumladan, qorincha chub. Biroq, suv sathining ko'tarilishi faqat bir nechtadan futga yetadi, shuning uchun xodimlar umid qiladilar, u eritilgan qumli tepaliklarni tiklash uchun kifoyat bo'lishi mumkin.
ref: 1963-yili to'g'on qurilganidan keyin butun daryo bo'ylab cho'kindilarni tarqatuvchi mavsumiy suv toshqinlar to'xtadi. Mazkur loyqa yovvoyi tabiat uchun yashash joyi sifatida xizmat qiluvchi qumloqlar va sohillarning hosil bo'lishi uchun zarur edi. Natijada, ikki baliq turi yo'q bo'lib ketdi hamda yana boshqa ikkitasi, jumladan, bukri baliq turi ham yo'qolish xavfi ostida qolgan. Garchi suv toshqinidan keyin suv sathi atigi bir necha fut ko'tarilsa-da, rasmiylar yemirilgan qumtepalarni qayta tiklash uchun yetarli bo'ladi, deb umid qilmoqdalar.

src: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."
mt: Keniyada joylashgan AQSH elchixonasi "Somaliyadagi ekstremistlar" Kenya va Efiopiya hududlarida o'z-o'zini portlatish yurishi bilan shaxsiy hujumlar o'rganishini e'lon qildi. AQSH bu xabarlar haqida ma'lumotlar o'z manbasidan olganini ta'kidlaydi, bu ma'lumotlar Efiopiya va Keniyada "ayniqsa, mashhur diqqatga sazovor joylarni" portlatishga qaratilganligini ko'rsatadi.
ref: "Keniya, Nayrobi shahridagi AQSH elchixonasi ""Somalidan kelgan ekstremistlar"" Keniya hamda Efiopiyada xudkushlik hamlalarini uyushtirishni reja qilayotgani haqida ogohlantirdi. AQSH Efiopiya va Keniyada ""mashhur diqqatga sazovor joylarni"" portlatish uchun xudkush terrorchilardan foydalanganligi to'g'risida oshkor etilmagan manbadan axborot olganligini ta'kidlamoqda."

src: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."
mt: "Yunonistonning mashhur advokatlari, Sakis Kechagioglou va George Nikolakopoulos Korydallus qamoqxonasida qamoqqa olingan, chunki ular o'g'irlik va korrupsiyada ayblangan. Shu sababli, yunoniston advokatlarining o'g'irlik va korrupsiyaga kirishganligi haqidagi xabarlar orqali yunoniston advokatlarining o'g'irlik va korrupsiyaga kirishganligi haqidagi xabarlar orqali yunoniston advokatlarining o'g'irlik va korrupsiyaga kirishganligi haqidagi xabarlar orqali yunoniston advokatlarining o'g'irlik va korrupsiyaga kirishganligi haqidagi xabarlar orqali yunoniston advokatlarining o'g'irlik va korrupsiyaga kirishganligi haqidagi xabarlar orqali yunoniston advokatlarining o'g'irlik va korrupsiyaga kirishganligi haqidagi xabarlar orqali yunoniston advokatlarining o'g'irlik va korrupsiyaga kirishganligi haqidagi xabarlar orqali yunoniston advokatlarining o'g'irlik va korrupsiyaga kirishganligi haqidagi xabarlar orqali yunoniston advokatlarining o'g'irlik va korrupsiyaga kirishganligi haqidagi xabarlar orqali yunoniston advokatlarining o'g'irlik va korrupsiyaga kirishganligi haqidagi xabarlar orqali yunoniston advokatlarining o'g'irlik va korrupsiyaga kirishganligi haqidagi xabarlar orqali yunoniston advokatlarining o'g'irlik va korrupsiyaga kirishganligi haqidagi xabarlar orqali yunoniston advokatlarining
ref: "Mashhur grek advokatlari Sakis Kechagioglou hamda Jorj Nikolakopuloslar poraxo'rlik hamda korrupsiyada aydbor deb topilgani sababli Afinadagi Korydallus qamoqxonasiga qamald. Buning natijasida sudyalar, huquqshunoslar, advokatlar va yuristlar tomonidan avvalgi yillarda qilingan noqonuniy harakatlarning ochilib qolinishi tufayli grek huquqiy hamjamiyati doirasida katta janjal ko'tarildi. Bir necha hafta avval, jurnalist Makis Triantafillopulos Alfa telekanalidagi o'zining ""Zoungla"" ko'rsatuvida e'lon qilgan ma'lumotdan keyin, parlament a'zosi hamda huquqshunos Petros Mantuvalos idorasi xodimlarining noqonuniy pora va korrupsiya bilan shug'ullanganligi sababli lavozimidan ozod etildi. Bundan tashqari, eng yaxshi sudya Evengelos Kalousis xulqi buzilganlikda va korrupsiyaga aloqadorlikda aybdor deb topilganligi sababli qamoqqa tashlanadi."

src: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.
mt: Robin Uthappa o'yinning eng yuqori ko'rsatkichini 70 ta runni faqat 41 ta to'p bilan qo'ldan qo'yib, 11 ta to'pni 2 ta to'pni tashlab ketdi. O'rta o'rinli to'pchilar, Sachin Tendulkar va Rahul Dravid, yaxshi o'ynab, 100 ta runlik sheriklik qilishdi. Biroq, kapitanning yiqilishi bilan Hindiston faqat 36 ta runni 7 ta yiqilish bilan o'yinni tugatdi.
ref: Robin Utappa 11 ta to'rtlik va 2 ta oltilikni urgan holda atigi 41 ta to'pda 70 ta ranlardan iborat to'p uzatishlarda eng yuqori balni qayd etdi. o'rta zveno betsmenlari Sachin Tendulkar va Rahul Dravid yaxshi o'yin ko'rsatdi va birgalikda yuz ran to'plagan sheriklarga aylandi. Biroq sardor viketini yo'qotganidan keyin, Hindiston uzatmalarni yakunlash uchun 7 ta viket yo'qotishlar bilan faqatgina 36 ta ranni amalga oshirdi.

src: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."
mt: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden o'z g'azabini o'zining so'nggi oyda Wikinews bilan suhbatida ifodaladi. ""U [Uels] bizga birinchi navbatda qonuniy sabablarga ko'ra qilganini aks ettirish orqali yolg'on gapirdi. Ikkinchisi, u bizga quloq soyib, o'z artini o'chirishga qadar qo'rqitdi."" Jamiyat g'azabi hozirgi urinishlarga olib keldi, bu saytda millionlab ochiq litsenziyalangan media uchun siyosat tahrirlashga.
ref: "Parlamentning quyi palatasi ma'muri Adam Kuerden o'tgan oyda Wikinews bilan suhbatida o'chirishlardan ranjiganini aytdi. ""U [Uels] boshidanoq bizga yolg'on gapirgan. Birinchidan, buning huquqiy sabablar tufayli bo'lganligi kabi harakat qilish orqali. Ikkinchidan, to o'zining mohirona yo'qolishigacha o'zini bizni tinglayotgandek qilib ko'rsatish orqali"". Jamiyat g'azablanishi millionlab ochiq litsenziyali media joylashtirilgan sayt uchun jinsiy kontentga oid siyosat loyihasini tayyorlash bo'yicha joriy harakatlarga olib keldi."

src: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."
mt: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden o'z g'azabini o'zining so'nggi oyda Wikinews bilan suhbatida ifodaladi. ""U [Uels] bizga birinchi navbatda qonuniy sabablarga ko'ra qilganini aks ettirish orqali yolg'on gapirdi. Ikkinchisi, u bizga quloq soyib, o'z artini o'chirishga qadar qo'rqitdi."" Jamiyat g'azabi hozirgi urinishlarga olib keldi, bu saytda millionlab ochiq litsenziyalangan media uchun siyosat tahrirlashga.
ref: "Parlamentning quyi palatasi ma'muri Adam Kuerden o'tgan oyda Wikinews bilan suhbatida o'chirishlardan ranjiganini aytdi. ""U [Uels] boshidanoq bizga yolg'on gapirgan. Birinchidan, buning huquqiy sabablar tufayli bo'lganligi kabi harakat qilish orqali. Ikkinchidan, to o'zining mohirona yo'qolishigacha o'zini bizni tinglayotgandek qilib ko'rsatish orqali"". Jamiyat g'azablanishi millionlab ochiq litsenziyali media joylashtirilgan sayt uchun jinsiy kontentga oid siyosat loyihasini tayyorlash bo'yicha joriy harakatlarga olib keldi."

src: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."
mt: "Barcha ayollar toifasiga kiritilishga qarshi bo'lgan emas. 2004-yilgi Olimpiada oltin medali sohibi Amir Xon deydi: ""Bunda ayollar bilan kurashishga qarshi bo'lishim mumkin. Menimcha, bu qarash."" Biroq, u o'z fikrini o'zgartirib, 2012-yilda Londonda bo'lib o'tadigan Olimpiada o'yinlarida Britaniya sportchilari uchun qo'llab-quvvatlashini aytdi.
ref: "Hamma ham ayollarning razryadlari qo'shilishini qo'llab-quvvatlayvermas edi. 2004-yilgi Olimpiadadagi kumush medal sovrindori Amir Xon: ""Chin qalbimdan aytadigan bo'lsam, ayollar urushmasliklari kerak. Bu mening fikrim"", dedi. O'zining sharhlariga qaramasdan u Londonda o'tkaziladigan 2012-yilgi Olimpiadada Britaniyalik raqiblarini qo'llab-quvvatlashini aytdi."

src: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.
mt: 13 yoshli mototsikl sportchisi Peter Lenz vafot etdi. U Indianapolis Motor Speedwayda bir necha yil oldin yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda ishtirok etayotganida, uqtirishda yurishda is
ref: 13 yoshli mototsikl haydovchisi Piter Lens Indianapolis Motor Sidveyda avtohalokatga uchrab, vafot etdi. Tayyorgarlik mashqini olib borayotgan vaqtida, Lenz velosipeddan yiqilib tushdi va keyin hamkasbi Xaver Zayat uni urib yubordi. Unga zudlik bilan tez tibbiy yordam xodimlari tomonidan yordam ko'rsatlib, mahalliy shifoxonaga yetkazildi va u keyinchalik o'sha yerda vafot etdi. Zayat baxtsiz hodisada jarohat olmadi.

src: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.
mt: Uchish-qo'nish mashinasi bilan sayohat barcha yosh va aslida turmush tarzi bo'lgan odamlar uchun qo'rquvli tajriba bo'lishi mumkin, ayniqsa ularning oldin uchib o'tgan yoki og'ir voqea tufayli og'irlikka uchib ketganlar. Bu nimalardan boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa narsalarga qarama-qarshi shubha qilmaslik kerak: boshqa n
ref: Samolyotda safar qilish barcha yoshdagi va kelib chiqishdagi kishilar uchun qo'rqinchli tajriba bo'lishi mumkin, ayniqsa, ular oldin parvoz qilmagan yoki ruhiy shikast qoldirgan hodisani boshdan kechirgan bo'lsa. Bu uyaladigan narsa emas: bu juda ko'p odamlarda bo'lishi mumkin bo'lgan boshqa narsalarni yoqtirmaslik va shaxsiy qo'rquvlaridan bo'lak narsa emas. Ba'zilar uchun samolyotning qanday ishlashi va uchish vaqtida nimalar bo'lishi haqida ayrim narsalarni tushinish noma'lum nazorat ostida bo'lish yoki bo'lmaslikdan kelib chiquvchi qo'rquvni yengishga yordam beradi.

src: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.
mt: Bugun uchish yo'li bilan sayohatni faqat havo yuragi orqali emas, balki boshqa agregatorlardan ham qiyoslashdan o'tkazib, so'ngda buyurish orqali hamda aviakompaniya veb-saytida ham ko'rishdan o'tkazib, keyinroq buyurish orqali ham qilish mumkin. Bunday uchish yo'li bilan sayohatni faqat havo yuragi orqali emas, balki boshqa agregatorlardan ham qiyoslashdan o'tkazib, so'ngda buyurish orqali hamda aviakompaniya veb-saytida ham ko'rishdan o'tkazib, keyinroq buyurish orqali ham qilish mumkin.
ref: Hozirgi kunda havo safarlari dastlab narxlarni izlamasdan va taqqoslamasdan turib, faqat kamdan-kam hollardagina bevosita aviakompaniya orqali bron qilinadi. Ba'zi hollarda bitta reys turli agregatorlarda katta farq bilan turlicha narxlarga ega bo'lishi mumkin hamda qidiruv natijalarini solishtirish va chipta buyurtirishdan avval aviakompaniyaning veb-saytini ham ko'rib chiqish foydalidir.

src: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
mt: Yuk tashish kompaniyalari tezda narsalarni yetkazib berish uchun juda ko'p to'lanadi. Ko'pincha, biznes hujjatlarida, sotuvchilik yoki muolajalash uchun zarur bo'lgan qismlar bilan shug'ullanishda vaqt juda muhim. Boshqaruvchilar uchun katta kompaniyalarga qo'shimcha ravishda, boshqa yo'llar va kichikroq firmalarda muammos bor edi. Agar ular narsalarni havodagi yuk tashish orqali yuborsalar, ba'zi yo'llarda uning tashish va tashrif buyurishdan o'tishiga qarab kunlar o'tishi mumkin edi. Yagona usul uning tezroq o'tishini ta'minlash uchun uni tashrif buyurishga qo'yish edi, bu yerda siz kelib chiqib qoladi.
ref: Narsalarni tez yetkazib berish uchun kuryerlik kompaniyalariga yaxshi haq to'lanadi. Odatdagidek, vaqt biznes hujjatlari, tovarlar yoki tezkor ta'mirlash uchun ehtiyot qismlari bilan juda muhimdir. Ayrim yo'nalishlarda yirikroq kompaniyalar o'z samolyotlariga ega, ammo boshqa yo'nalishlar va kichik firmalar uchun muammo mavjud edi. Agar yuklarni havo transporti orqali yuborgan bo'lsalar, ayrim yo'nalishlarda yukni tushirish va bojxona jarayoni uchun bir necha kun vaqt talab qilinishi mumkin. Buni tezroq bitirishning yagona yo'li — uni tekshirilgan yuk sifatida yuborishdir. Aviakompaniya qoidalari ularga yo'lovchisiz yuklarni jo'natishga ruxsat bermaydi, shu yerda siz kirib borasiz.

src: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.
mt: Siz o'zangiz uchish yo'nalishini birgalikda o'zlashtirib, o'zaro hamkorlik qilishda qo'llaniladigan tizimlarga qo'shilishni tanlashingiz kerak. src: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
mt: Alkogolli ichishni juda cheklovchi. Alkogol har bir kishiga farq qiladi va o'z chegarangizni bilish juda muhim. Qo'llab-quvvatlanmaydigan alkogolni iste'mol qilishdan chetlatilgan. ref: Alkogolli ichimliklarni me'yorida iching. Alkogol turli odamlarga turlicha ta'sir qiladi va me'yoringizni bilish juda muhimdir. Haddan ortiq ichkilikbozlik tufayli yuzaga keladigan sog'liqqa oid uzoq muddatli oqibatlar jigarning shikastlanishi va hatto ko'rlik va o'limni ham o'z ichiga olishi mumkin. Noqonuniy ishlab chiqarilgan spirtli ichimliklar iste'mol qilinganda, ehtimoliy xavf ortadi. Noqonuniy spirtli ichimliklar xavfli aralashmalar, jumladan, hatto kichik dozasi ham ko'rlikka yoki o'limga sabab bo'lishi mumkin bo'lgan metanolni o'z ichiga oladi.

ref: Alkogolli ichimliklarni me'yorida iching. Alkogol turli odamlarga turlicha ta'sir qiladi va me'yoringizni bilish juda muhimdir. Haddan ortiq ichkilikbozlik tufayli yuzaga keladigan sog'liqqa oid uzoq muddatli oqibatlar jigarning shikastlanishi va hatto ko'rlik va o'limni ham o'z ichiga olishi mumkin. Noqonuniy ishlab chiqarilgan spirtli ichimliklar iste'mol qilinganda, ehtimoliy xavf ortadi. Noqonuniy spirtli ichimliklar xavfli aralashmalar, jumladan, hatto kichik dozasi ham ko'rlikka yoki o'limga sabab bo'lishi mumkin bo'lgan metanolni o'z ichiga oladi.

src: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.
mt: Kanal tuman (olmoncha: Grachtengordel) Amsterdamning Binnenstad tumanida joylashgan 17-asr tumanidir. Barcha tuman UNESCOning Jahon merosi ob'ekti sifatida belgilangan, uning madaniy va tarixiy qiymati uchun va uning mulk qiymatlari mamlakatdagi eng yuqori darajadadir.
ref: Kanal okrugi (gollandcha: Grachtengordel) — Amsterdamning Binnestadini o'rab turuvchi 17-asrning mashhur okrugidir. Butun tuman o'zining yagona madaniy hamda tarixiy qiymati uchun YUNESKOning Butunjahon madaniy merosi ro'yxatiga kiritilgan bo'lib, uning mulkiy qiymati mamlakatning eng yuqorilaridan biridir.

src: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.
mt: Phnom Krom, Siem Reap shahridan janubda 12 km masofada joylashgan bu tepalikdagi ibodatxona IX asrning oxirida, Yasovarman shahzodasi davrida qurilgan. Ibodatxonaga chiqishda qalbga sotilgan atmosfera va Tonle Sap ko'lidan ko'rinadigan ko'rinish o'ziga xos. Angkor pasporti kerak bo'lib, ibodatxonaga kirish uchun pasportni olib yurishni unutmang.
ref: Pnon Krom Siem Reapdan 12 km janubi-g'arbda. Mazkur tepalikdagi ibodatxona 9-asr oxirida, qirol Yasovorman davrida qurilgan. Ibodatxonaning g'amgin muhiti va Tonlesap ko'li manzarasi tepalikka chiqishga arziydi. Mazkur manzilga tashrif ko'lga qayiqdagi safar bilan qulay ravishda umumlashtirilishi mumkin. Ibodatxonaga kirish uchun Angkor chiptasi kerak, shu sababli Tonlesapga borishda pasportingizni o'zingiz bilan olib kelishni unutmang.

src: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
mt: Antarktika Yerda eng sovuq joy bo'lib, u Shimoliy polarni o'rab oladi. Tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun qimmat, jismoniy jihatdan yaxshi holatda bo'lishi kerak, faqat qishda Nov-dekabr oylarida yoki yozda (Nov-dekabr) tashrif buyurish mumkin. Ushbu hududlarda, asosan, qirg'oq, orollar va Ross dengizida joylashgan to'qqiz yuzga yaqin bazada yozda bir necha ming xodim yashaydi. Qishda qolishda bir necha yuzga yaqin xodim bor. Inland Antarktika 2-3 km qalin qor bilan qoplanib, qorli tog'larga ega. Qo'shimcha maxsus havo turlari qorli tog'larga borish yoki Shimoliy polga borish uchun o'tkaziladi, u yerdagi katta bazaga ega.
ref: Antarktika Yer yuzasidagi eng sovuq joy hisoblanadi va Janubiy Qutbni o'rab turadi. Sayohatchilarning tashrifi qimmatga tushadi, jismoniy chidamlilikni talab etiladi, faqat yozgi noyabr-fevral oylarida amalga oshishi mumkin hamda asosan yarimorol, orollar va Ross dengizi bilan cheklanadi. Yozda asosan o'sha hududlardagi qirq sakkiztacha bazada bir necha ming xodim yashaydi; kamchiligi qish bo'yi qoladi. Ichki Antarktida — bu 2–3 kilometrlik muz bilan qoplangan tashlandiq platodir. Tasodifiy mutaxassislarning havo orqali sayohatlari alpinizm bilan shug'ullanish yoki katta bazaga ega bo'lgan Qutbga yetib borish uchun materik ichiga kirib boradi.

src: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
mt: Qadimgi astronomik observatoriyalar ko'pincha hozirgi kunda ishlatilmaydi va muzeylar yoki ta'lim markazlari sifatida qolmoqda. Ularning yoshligida yorug'lik to'siqlari kabi muammosi bugungi kunda emas edi, shuning uchun ular ko'pincha shaharlarda yoki kampuslarda joylashgan, modern davrda qurilganlarga qaraganda yaxshi erishiladi.
ref: Hozirga qadar saqlangan rasadxonalardan odatda bugungi kunda foydalanilmaydi va muzeylar yoxud ta'lim maskanlari sifatida saqlanib qolmoqda. Ularning gullab-yashnagan davrida yengil ifloslanish bugungidek muammo hisoblanmagani tufayli ular odatda shaharlarda yoki kampuslarda joylashgan bo'lib, ularga yetib borish hozirgi davrda qurilganlaridan ko'ra osonroq. Zamonaviy tadqiqot teleskoplarining ko'pchiligi qulay atmosfera sharoitlariga ega chekka joylarda joylashgan katta inshootlardir.

src: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.
mt: Uchta hududda ko'p ko'p qirg'oq bor, chunki Auckland ikki portga tutash. Shimoliy qirg'oqlar (Shimoliy port tumanida) Shimoliy portning o'ng qirg'oqida joylashgan bo'lib, Long Baydan shimolda boshlanadi va Devonportdan janubda tugaydi. Ularning ko'plari qumli qirg'oqlar va xavfsiz suzishga ega, shuningdek, ko'pchilik qirg'oqlarda pohutukava daraxtlari shumqo'q o'tkazadi. Tamaki Drive qirg'oqlari Waitemata portida, Mission Bay va St Heliers kabi yuqori sifatli tumanlarda joylashgan. Ushbu qirg'oqlar qo'shni savdo yo'nalishlarida joylashgan bo'lib, xavfsiz suzishga ega.
ref: Oklend ikkita portni aylanib o'tgani sababli ko'p sonli plyajlarga ega. Eng mashhurlari uchta hududda joylashgan. (Shimoliy Xarbor tumanidagi) Shimoliy Qirg'oq plyajlari Tinch Okeanida joylashgan bo'lib, shimoldagi Long ko'rfazidan janubdagi Devenportgacha cho'zilgan. Ular cho'milish xavfsiz bo'lgan deyarli to'laligicha qumli plyajlardir va aksariyatida pohutukava daraxtlarining soyasi tushib turadi. Tamaki Drayv plyajlari Markaziy Oklenddagi Mishshion-Bey hamda Sent-Heliers shaharlarining nufuzli chekkalaridagi Waitemata portida joylashgan. Bular ba'zida tiqilinch bo'ladigan, sohil bo'ylab tizilgan qator do'konlari bor oilaviy plyajlardir. Cho'milish xavfsiz.

src: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
mt: Bu saytda o'lim qabrlari borligi uchun, shuningdek, dunyo aholisining katta qismiga e'tibor beringan nisbatan tushunib bo'lmaydigan ma'no borligi uchun, sizda bu saytda tashrif buyurishga o'xshash xatolik qilishga yo'q.
