src: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.
mt: Har bir so'z, shuningdek, siz uchun "Sie" so'zidan boshlanadi, bu so'zda ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'z boshida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so
ref: Hamma otlar, siz uchun Sie so'zi bilan bir qatorda, doimo, hatto gapning markazida ham katta harf bilan boshlanadi. Bu ba'zi bir fe'l va predmetlarni farqlashning muhim usulidir. Garchi yozish fe'l yoki sifatning substansiya shaklida foydalanilishini bilish zarurati bilan bir oz murakkablashsa-da, u o'qishni osonlashtiradi.

src: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.
mt: Har bir so'z, shuningdek, siz uchun "Sie" so'zidan boshlanadi, bu so'zda ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'z boshida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so'zning oxirida ham, so'zning o'rtasida ham, so
ref: Hamma otlar, siz uchun Sie so'zi bilan bir qatorda, doimo, hatto gapning markazida ham katta harf bilan boshlanadi. Bu ba'zi bir fe'l va predmetlarni farqlashning muhim usulidir. Garchi yozish fe'l yoki sifatning substansiya shaklida foydalanilishini bilish zarurati bilan bir oz murakkablashsa-da, u o'qishni osonlashtiradi.

src: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."
mt: "Jahonning ko'p qismida, qo'li bilan qo'zg'arganda, "salom" degan ma'noni anglatadi. Biroq, Malayziyada, kamdan-kam joylarda yashovchi malaylar orasida, bu "kelib chiq" degan ma'noni anglatadi, bu esa boshqa g'arb mamlakatlari, jumladan, Britaniyada ishlatiladigan indeks barmog'i boshiga qarab qo'zg'arganda kabi, faqat shu maqsadda ishlatilishi kerak. Shuningdek, Ispaniyada sayohat qilayotgan britaniyalik sayohchilar, qo'zg'arganda qo'li boshqa odamga qarab qo'zg'arganda, qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda qo'zg'arganda
ref: "Dunyoning ko'plab qismlarida qo'lni silkitish do'stona ishora bo'lib, ""salom"" degan ma'noni bildiradi. Biroq Malayziyada, hech bo'lmaganda chekka hududlardagi malaylar orasida, ko'rsatkich barmoqning tana tomon bukilishi — ma'lum g'arb mamlakatlarida foydalaniluvchi imo-ishoraga o'xshash va undan faqat shu maqsadda foydalanilishi kerak. Xuddu shu kabi, Ispaniyadagi britaniyalik sayyoh kaft silkituvchi odam tomonga (silkitilayotgan odam tomonga qaratilgan bo'lishi o'rniga) qaratilgan holda qo'l silkitishni xayrlashish sifatida noto'g'ri tushunishi mumkin."

src: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.
mt: Glatsiyalar o'zgarmaydi, balki tog'dan oqib tushadi. Bu qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qirralar, qir
ref: Muzliklar barqaror emas, biroq ular tog'dan pastga oqib tushadi. Bu qor ko'priklari osida ko'rinmay qolishi mumkin bo'lgan yorilishlar, darz ketishlarga olib kelishi mumkin. Muz g'orlarining devorlari va tomlari qulab tushishi va yoriqlar yopilib qolishi mumkin. Muzliklarning chetidan yirik bo'laklar sinib, pastga qulaydi, ba'zan esa uzoqroqqa irg'ib yoki dumalab ketadi.

src: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.
mt: Goma — Kongo Demokratik Respublikasining sharqiy qismida, Ruanda yaqinida turizm shahri. 2002-yilda Goma Nyiragongo vulqonining lavasi bilan vayron qilingan, bu yerda shaharning ko'p qismi, ayniqsa, shahar markazi qoplangan. Goma juda xavfsiz, ammo Goma tashqarisidagi barcha tashriflar o'qishga muvaffaq bo'lishi kerak, shuning uchun Kivu provinsiyasidagi kurashning holati tushuniladi. Shuningdek, Nyiragongo vulqonini ko'tarish uchun Goma markazida eng kamroq tog' gorillalari izlashi mumkin. Goma boda-boda (mototsikl taksisi) bilan o'tirish mumkin. Odatiy (mahalliy) narx ~500 Kongo franki.
ref: Goma — Ruandaning yaqinidagi nihoyatda sharqda joylashgan Kongo Demokratik Respublikasining sayyohlik shahridir. 2002-yilda Goma shahardagi, ayniqsa, shahar markazidagi ko'chalarni kulga aylantirgan Nyiragongo vulqoni lavasi tomonidan vayron qilingan. Goma yetarli darajada xavfsiz bo'lsada, Gomadan tashqariga har qanday tashriflar Shimoliy Kivu viloyatida doimiy uchrab turuvchi mushtlashuvlar holatini tushunish uchun o'rganib chiqilishi kerak. Shahar Afrikadagi eng arzon tog' Gorilla kuzatuvi bilan birga Nyiragongo vulqoniga ko'tarilish uchun ham bazadir. Siz Gomani aylanib chiqish uchun boda-bodadan (mototsikl taksi) foydalanishingiz mumkin. Qisqa safarlar uchun odatiy (mahalliy) narx — ~500 Kongo franki.

src: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.
mt: Grand Canyonning qirg'ichida qamqo'rga tushish uchun qamqo'rga ruxsatnomasiga ega bo'lish kerak. Ruxsatnomalar qamqo'rga saqlash uchun cheklangan va boshlanish oyining 1-kuni, boshlanish oyidan to'rt oy oldin, ruxsatnomalar ochiq bo'lishi mumkin. Shuning uchun, may oyidagi boshlanish sanasi uchun qamqo'rga ruxsatnomasi 1-yanvarda ochiq bo'ladi. Qamqo'rga ruxsatnomasi uchun eng mashhur joylar, jumladan, Phantom Ranchga yaqin Bright Angel qamqo'rga, asosan, ruxsatnomalar ochiq bo'lgan birinchi kuni so'rovlar qabul qilinishi bilan to'liq bo'ladi. Qamqo'rga ruxsatnomalari qamqo'rga so'rovlar uchun cheklangan soni mavjud bo'lib, ular qamqo'rga so'rovlar asosida birinchi kelgan, birinchi olgan tizimiga ega.
ref: "Grand Kanyonda gardishi ostidagi har qanday kemping uchun chekka hudud ruxsatnomasi talab etiladi. Kayonni himoya qilish uchun ruxsatlar cheklangan va ular boshlash oyinda to'rt oy avval, oyning 1-kuni beriladi. Shunday qilib, may oyidagi istalgan sanadan boshlanuvchi chekka hududlarda kemping uchun ruxsatni 1 yanvardan boshlab olish mumkin bo'ladi. Fantom ranchosiga tutash ""Yorqin farishta"" lageri kabi eng mashhur hududlarda joylar odatda ular band qilinish uchun ochilgan birinchi sanadayoq olingan so'rovlar bilan to'lib qoladi. Kirish so'rovlari uchun cheklangan miqdordagi ruxsatnomalar mavjud bo'lib, ularni kim birinchi kelsa, o'sha qo'lga kiritadi."

src: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.
mt: Ba'zi mehmonxonalar qadimiy temir yo'l va dengiz kemalari o'rtasidagi oltin davrining merosini o'z ichiga oladi; Ikkinchi Jahon urushi oldidan, 19 yoki 20-asrlarning boshida. Bu mehmonxonalar o'z davrlarida qonuniy va mashhur odamlar yashagan joy bo'lib, ko'pincha yaxshi ovqatlanish va tashvishli hayot turlari bor edi. Qadimiy uslub, yangi xizmatlarning yo'qligi va bir xil qadimiylik ham ularning xarakteriga kiradi. Ularning aksariyati shaxsiy mulk bo'lib, bosh vazirlar va boshqa sharaflangan shaxslar tashrif buyurishlari uchun mehmonxonalar bo'lishi mumkin. Puldan to'la sayohatchi boshqa mehmonxonalar bilan bo'lgan dunyo aylanish uchun parvozni to'xtatib, turli mehmonxonalarda qolishni o'z ichiga olishi mumkin.
ref: Ayrim mehmonxonalarda bug' temir yo'llari hamda okean laynerlari oltin davridan qolgan meros mavjud; Ikkinchi jahon urushidan avval, 19 yoki 20-asr boshlaridagi. Mazkur hostellar o'sha davrning boy va mashhur kishilari joylashadigan joy bo'lib, ko'pincha yaxshi tamaddixonalar hamda tungi hayotga ega bo'lardi. Eskicha uslubdagi furnitura, eng so'ngi qulayliklarning yo'qligi va qandaydir nafis qarilik ham ularning xususiyatlaridandir. Odatda xususiy mulk bo'lsa-da, ularga ba'zida tashrif buyuruvchi davlat rahbarlari va yuqori lavozimli amaldorlar joylashadi. g'aram-g'aram puli bor sayyoh mazkur mehmonxonalarning ko'pida to'xtab-to'xtab, dunyo bo'ylab parvozni amalga oshirish haqida o'ylab ko'rishi mumkin.

Eskicha uslubdagi furnitura, eng so'ngi qulayliklarning yo'qligi va qandaydir nafis qarilik ham ularning xususiyatlaridandir. Odatda xususiy mulk bo'lsa-da, ularga ba'zida tashrif buyuruvchi davlat rahbarlari va yuqori lavozimli amaldorlar joylashadi. g'aram-g'aram puli bor sayyoh mazkur mehmonxonalarning ko'pida to'xtab-to'xtab, dunyo bo'ylab parvozni amalga oshirish haqida o'ylab ko'rishi mumkin.

src: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."
mt: “Tengiz telefon kabellari orqali Yevropa bilan bog'lanish va keng tarqalgan geostatsionar tarmoqlar tufayli Grinlandiya juda bog'liq. Aholining 93% internetga ega. Sizning mehmonxona yoki mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolishdan oldin internetga ulangan PC yoki internetga ulangan mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolishdan oldin internetga ulangan PC yoki internetga ulangan mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolishdan oldin internetga ulangan PC yoki internetga ulangan mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolishdan oldin internetga ulangan PC yoki internetga ulangan mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolishdan oldin internetga ulangan PC yoki internetga ulangan mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolishdan oldin internetga ulangan PC yoki internetga ulangan mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolishdan oldin internetga ulangan PC yoki internetga ulangan mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolishdan oldin internetga ulangan PC yoki internetga ulangan mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolishdan oldin internetga ulangan PC yoki internetga ulangan mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolishdan oldin internetga ulangan PC yoki internetga ulangan mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolishdan oldin internetga ulangan PC yoki internetga ulangan mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolishdan oldin internetga ulangan PC yoki internetga ulangan mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolishdan oldin internetga ulangan PC yoki internetga ulangan mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolishdan oldin internetga ulangan PC yoki internetga ulangan mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolishdan oldin internet
ref: "Dengiz osti optik tolali kabel orqali Yevropaga hamda keng polosali sputnikka ulanish sababli Grenlandiyaning internetga ulanganlik darajasi yaxshi – aholining 93%i ulangan. Mehmonxonangiz yoki mezbonlaringiz (agar uy mehmonxona yoki xususiy uyda qolsangiz) katta ehtimol bilan Wi-Fi yoki shaxsiy kompyuterga ulangan internetga ega bo'ladi va barcha aholi manzilgohlarida internet-kafe yoki ochiq Wi-Fi tarmog'i bo'lgan joylar mavjud. Yuqorida qayd etilganidek, ""Eskimo"" so'zi Qo'shma Shtatlarda maqbul so'z bo'lib qolayotgan bo'lsa-da, u ko'plab AQSHlik bo'lmagan Arktika xalqlarida, ayniqsa, Kanadada kamsituvchi so'z hisoblanadi. Grenlandiyaning tub aholisi qo'llaydigan so'zni eshitish mumkin bo'lgani holda xorijliklar undan foydalanishdan qochishlari kerak. Grenlandiyaning tub aholisi o'zini Kanadada Inuit, Glenlandiyada Kalaaleq (ko'plikda — Kalaallit) — grenlandiyalik deb ataydilar. Jinoyat va chet elliklarga yomon niyatda bo'lish Grenlandiyada umuman mavjud emas. Hatto shaharlarda ham ""qo'pol hududlar"" yo'q. Hoynahoy, sovuq ob-havo — tayyorgarlik ko'rmagan odamlar duch keladigan yagona haqiqiy xavfdir. Agarda siz Grenlandiyaga sovuq mavsumlarda borsangiz (qancha shimolroqqa borsangiz, shuncha sovuq bo'lishi hisobga olinsa), yetarlicha issiq kiyimlar olib borish kerak. Yozning juda uzun kunlari yetarli darajada uxlamaslik va ular bilan bog'liq sog'liq muammolariga olib kelishi mumkin. Yoz davomida Nordik chivinlaridan ham ehtiyot bo'ling. Garchi hech qanday kasallik yuqtirmasa-da, ular juda g'ashingizga tegishi mumkin."

src: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.
mt: Jardín de la Unión. Bu maydon 17-asrda qurilgan 17-asrda qurilgan monastirning atriumi sifatida qurilgan, uning yagona saqlanib qolgan binosi Templo de San Diego. U hozirda markaziy maydon sifatida ishlaydi va kunduzgi va kechqurun katta narsalarga ega. Maydon atrofida bir nechta restoranlar bor, kechqurun va kechqurun oqsoqollar odatda markaziy gumbazdan chiqariladi.
ref: Jardin de la Union. Mazkur joy 17-asr monastiri uchun atrium sifatida bunyod etilgan bo'lib, undagi Templo de San Diego omon qolgan yagona imoratdir. U hozir markaziy maydon sifatida xizmat qiladi va unda tunu-kun doimo juda ko'p narsalar o'tkaziladi. Bog' atrofida bir qator restoranlar mavjud bo'lib, tushdan so'ng va kechki paytlarda ko'pincha markaziy ayvonda tekin konsertlar beriladi. Callejon del Beso (o'pish hiyoboni). Atigi 69 santimetr ajratib turuvchi ikki balkon muhabbat haqidagi eski afsona makonidir. Ayrim bolalar ozgina chaqa uchun sizga bu voqeani aytib berishadi.

src: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.
mt: Yuraklash - tabiatda o'tirish, odatda yuraklash yo'llarida o'tirishdan iborat bo'lgan tashabbus. Yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'lgan yuraklash yo'llari bo'
ref: Piyoda yurish — ko'pincha piyoda safar qilish yoki tabiat qo'ynida sayr qilishdan iborat ochiq havodagi mashg'ulotdir. Kunduzgi piyoda sayohat bir mildan kamroq masofadan tortib bir kunda bosib o'tish mumkin bo'lgan uzoqroq masofalarni qamrab oladi. Oson yo'lda bir kunlik piyoda sayr uchun bir oz tayyorgarlik talab qilinadi hamda har qanday o'rtacha sog'lom odam undan zavqlana oladi. Yoshi kichik bolalari bor oilalar ko'proq tayyorgarlik ko'rishi kerak bo'lishi mumkin, ammo chaqaloq va bog'cha yoshidagi bolalar bilan ham ochiq havoda kun oson o'tishi mumkin.

src: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."
mt: Norvegiyada tipik bo'lgan narsa tog'li qirg'oq va vodiylar bo'lib, bu yerda bir necha soat ichida baland, asosan teng tepaliklarga o'tish mumkin. Bu tepaliklar ko'pincha ""vidde"" degan ma'noni anglatuvchi keng, ochiq, o'simliklardan bo'lmagan maydon, cheklovsiz maydon deb ataladi. Rogaland va Agderda ular ko'pincha ""hei"" degan ma'noni anglatuvchi o'simliklardan bo'lmagan qo'ng'iroq o'rniga o'g'ir deb ataladi.
ref: "To'satdan baland, u yoki bu darajada tekis platolarga o'rin bo'shatuvchi fordlar va vodiylar Norvegiya uchun xosdir. Mazkur platolar bu keng, ochiq daraxtsiz makon, cheksiz kenglikni anglatuvchi ""vidde"" nomi bilan ataladi. Rogaland va Agderda ular ko'pincha archagul bilan qoplangan bepoyon kenglik ma'nosini beruvchi ""hei"" deb nomlanadi."

src: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
mt: Qo'ltiq shaharlarning turist mavsumi asosan hind yozida cho'kib ketadi. Biroq, ular qishda ham boshqa turlarda zamonaviylik va xususiyatlarga ega bo'lib, ba'zi qo'ltiq shaharlarda qor yog'ishi mumkin va skayt va snoubord kabi sport turlarini taklif qiladi.
ref: Tog' bekatlari uchun sayyohlik mavsumi odatda hind yozida avjiga chiqadi. Shunday bo'lsa-da, ular qish vaqtida o'zgacha go'zallik va jozibaga ega bo'lib, ko'plab tog' bekatlarida yirik miqdorda qor bo'ladi hamda chang'ida uchish va snouboard kabi mashg'ulotlarni taklif qiladi.

src: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.
mt: Qo'llab-quvvatlashga qo'shilib qolgan baliqchilar bilan uchrashgandan so'ng, sizga barcha narsa juda ochiq bo'ladi. Siz boshqa qo'llab-quvvatlashga qo'shilib qolgan baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, ular sizga ma'lumot berishadi. Aslida siz sizga yordam berishni taklif qiladigan xabarlarni qo'yib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, yachtlarni tozalashda ishlaydigan odamlarga murojaat qilish, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqchilar bilan uchrashib, baliqch

Umuman olganda siz yordamingizni taklif qilib, doklarni aylanib, yaxtalarini tozalayotgan odamlr, bardagi kemachilar bilan aloqaga kirishishga urinib xabar tarqatasiz. Imkoni boricha ko'proq odam bilan gaplashishga harakat qiling. Ma'lum vaqtdan keyin barcha siz haqingizda biladi va qaysi qayiq biror kimni izlayotganligi haqida maslahatlar beradi.

src: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.
mt: Hong Kong orollari Hong Kongning nomini beradi va turizmning asosiy markazi sifatida ko'plab sayyohlar uchun uning nomi bilan bog'liq. Hong Kongning shahar rejasini ko'rib chiqishda, u yerdagi binolar to'qimachilik tarmog'i sifatida taqqoslanadi, bu yerda Victoria ko'rfazining mavjudligi tufayli ko'rinib turadi. Hong Kong orolining shahar rejasini yaxshi ko'rish uchun orolni tark eting va Kowloon qirg'oqqa qarang. Britaniya kolonizatorlari orolni o'ziga olib chiqqan joyda shahar rejasining katta qismi qayta qazib olingan yerlarga qisqartirilgan. Bu yerda kolonial o'zgacha xususiyatlarini topish uchun yaxshi boshlanish uchun.
ref: Gonkong oroli Gonkong hududiga o'zining nomini tortiq qilgan hamda u ko'pgina sayohatchilar asosiy e'tibor qaratadigan yerdir. Gonkong gorizont chizig'ini hosil qiluvchi binolar tizmasi Viktoriya porti suvlarining mavjudligi sababli aniq ko'rinadigan yaltiroq shtrixli jadvalga o'xshatilgan. Gonkongning eng yaxshi manzarasini ko'rish uchun oroldan chiqib, qarama-qarshi tarafda joylashgan Koulun sohiliga boring. Gonkong orolidagi shaharsozlik taraqqiyotining katta qismi shimoliy sohil bo'ylab o'zlashtirilgan yerlarda zich joylashgan. Bu ingliz mustamlakachilari o'ziniki deb bilgan joy, shunday ekan, agar siz hududning mustamlaka bo'lgan o'tmishiga dalil diqirayotgan bo'lsangiz, bu yer boshlash uchun yaxshi joydir.

src: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
mt: Stirrups - otga o'rnashgan boshliqning qo'li uchun qo'llaniladigan qo'llab-quvvatlovchi vosita. Ushbu vosita boshliqni o'tqazishga yordam beradi, lekin boshliqning qo'llari qo'llab-quvvatlovchi vositaga qo'rilmasa, boshliqni o'tqazishga o'xshash xavotir mavjud. Boshliq qo'llarini qo'llab-quvvatlovchi vositaga qo'rilmasa, boshliq qo'llarini qo'llab-quvvatlovchi vositaga qo'rilmasa, boshliq qo'llarini qo'llab-quvvatlovchi vositaga qo'rilmasa, boshliq qo'llarini qo'llab-quvvatlovchi vositaga qo'rilmasa, boshliq qo'llarini qo'llab-quvvatlovchi vositaga qo'rilmasa, boshliq qo'llarini qo'llab-quvvatlovchi vositaga qo'rilmasa, boshliq qo'llarini qo'llab-quvvatlovchi vositaga qo'rilmasa, boshliq qo'llarini qo'llab-quvvatlovchi vositaga qo'rilmasa, boshliq qo'llarini qo'llab-quvvatlovchi vositaga qo'rilmasa, boshliq qo'llarini qo'llab-quvvatlovchi vositaga qo'rilmasa, boshliq qo'llarini qo'llab-quvvatlovchi vositaga qo'rilmasa, boshliq qo'llarini qo'llab-quvvatlovchi vositaga qo'rilmasa, boshliq qo'llarini qo'llab-quvvatlovchi vositaga qo'rilmasa, boshliq qo'llarini qo'llab-quvvatlovchi vositaga qo'rilmasa, boshli
ref: Egarning har ikkala tomonidan osilib turuvchi chavandoz oyoqlari uchun tayanch uzangdir. Ular chavandozga mahkamroq o'rnashish imkonini taqdim etadi, lekin chavandozning oyoqlari ularga tiqilib qolishi xavfi tufayli xavfsizlik masalasida xavotir uyg'otishi mumkin. Agar chavandoz otdan irg'itib ketsa-yu, oyog'i uzangiga ilinib qolsa, ot qochib ketgan hollarda u sudralib ketilishi mumkin. Bu xavfni kamaytirish uchun bir qatoq ehtiyotkorlik choralarini ko'rish mumkin. Avvalo, aksariyat chavandozlar poshnali, tekis, yetarli darajadagi tor tagcharmli chavandoz etigini kiyishadi. Shuningdek, ba'zi egarlarda, xususan, ingliz egarlarida, agar yiqilayotgan otliq tomonidan orqaga tortilsa, uzangi terisini egardan tushib qolishiga imkon beradigan xavfsizlik kamari mavjud.

src: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.
mt: Turizm tarmog'ida mehmondo'stlik tarmog'i mehmonlarni mahalliy aholi bilan shaxsiy aloqada bo'lishga yordam beradi. Bunday tarmoqqa qo'shilish asosan internetda ro'yxatdan o'tish bilan cheklangan, ba'zan boshqa sayohatchilar tomonidan berilgan ma'lumotlar va sharhlarga ega bo'lgan mehmonlarni ro'yxatga olish shart emas. Couchsurfing 2004-yil yanvar oyida tashkil etilgan bo'lib, kompyuter muhandisi Kesi Fenton Ispaniyaga qarshi chet elda qo'ng'iroq qilgan, lekin u yerda qolish joyi yo'q edi. U mahalliy universitet talabalariga elektron pochta orqali xabarlarni yubordi va ulardan qabul qilishni so'radi.
ref: Mehmondo'stlik almashinuvi tarmog'i sayyohlarni ular bormoqchi bo'lgan shaharlardagi tub aholi bilan bog'lovchi tashkilot hisoblanadi. Bu kabi tarmoqqa qo'shilish odatda shunchaki onlayn shaklni to'ldirishni talab etadi; garchi ayrim tarmoqlar qo'shimcha tekshirishni taklif yoki talab qilsa ham. Mavjud mezbonlar ro'yxati bosma va/yoki onlayn shaklda, ba'zida boshqa sayyohlarning tavsiyalari va sharhlari bilan birga beriladi. Couchsurfing 2004-yilning yanvar oyida kompyuter dasturchisi Keysi Fenton Islandiyaga arzon reys topib, tunab qolishga joy topa olmaganidan keyin tashkil qilingan. U mahalliy universitetdagi talabalarga elektron pochta orqali xat yubordi va bepul turar joy uchun nihoyatda ko'p takliflar qabul qildi.

src: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.
mt: Yoshlar uchun xizmat ko'rsatadigan mehmonxonalar asosan yoshlarga xizmat ko'rsatadi – odatda mehmonxonada yashovchi odam yuz yoshida bo'lgan – lekin ular orasida ham ko'proq kattalar bor. Bolalar bilan oilalar ko'pincha ko'rinmaydi, lekin ba'zi mehmonxonalar ularni xususiy xonalarda qabul qiladi.
ref: Hostellar birinchi navbatda yoshlarga — odatda yigirma yoshlarda bo'lgan mehmonlarga xizmat ko'rsatadi, lekin u yerda ko'pincha keksa sayohatchilarni ham uchratishingiz mumkin. Bolali oilalarni kamdan-kam hollarda ko'rish mumkin, lekin ayrim hostellar ularning shaxsiy xonalarda qolishiga ruxsat beradi.

src: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy
mt: Boomerang tashlash mashg'uloti ko'plab sayohchilarga mashhur bo'lib, agar siz boomerangni qo'lga qaytaradigan bo'lishni istaysiz, bo'lishi kerak bo'lgan boomerangni o'zlashtirishni ta'minlang. Avstraliyada sotiladigan ko'p boomeranglar qaytmasdir. Boshlang'ichlarga eng yaxshi bo'lmagan bo'lib, qo'rqmaslik uchun tashlashni boshlashni tavsiya etiladi.
ref: Bumerang uloqtirish — ko'plab sayyohlar o'rganishni xohlaydigan ommabop ko'nikmadir. Agarda qo'lingizga qaytib keluvchi bumerangni otishni o'rganmoqchi bo'lsangiz, qaytishi uchun mos bumerangga egaligingizga ishonch hosil qiling. Avstraliyada mavjud bo'lgan bumeranglar aslida qaytib kelmaydigan bo'ladi. Boshlovchilar uni shamolda uloqtirmaslikka harakat qilgan yaxshi.

src: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
mt: 17 000 orasidan tanlash mumkin bo'lgan Indoneziya o'lkasida, Indoneziya taomi katta hududlardagi regional taomlarni o'z ichiga oladi. Ammo, foydalanishda boshqa tushuntirishlar qo'shilmasa, bu atama markaziy va sharqiy qismda joylashgan Javada aslida topilgan taomlarni anglatadi. Indoneziya arxipelagida keng tarqalgan Javan taomi o'zgaruvchan taomlardan iborat bo'lib, Javanlar favqur qilishdagi asosiy ta'mlardan biri - makkajo'xori, chilli, shakar (asosan Javan makkajo'xori shakari) va turli aromatik qo'shimchalar.
ref: Indoneziya taomlari, 17 000 ta oroldan tanlash imkoniyati bo'lgani sababli, butun mamlakatda uchraydigan turfa xil mahalliy taomlarni o'z ichiga oluvchi soyabon atamadir. Biroq, bu atama qo'shimcha ta'riflarsiz aslida asosiy Yava orolining markaziy va sharqiy qismlaridan kelib chiqqan taom nomini anglatishga moyil. Hozirda butun arxipelag bo'ylab keng tarqalagan Yava oshxonasi oddiy ziravorlar qo'shilgan taomlardan iborat, yavaliklar yaxshi ko'radigan asosiy ziravorlar yeryong'oq, chili qalampiri, shakar (ayniqsa Yava kokos yong'og'idan olinadigan shakar) va turli xushbo'y ziravorlardir.

src: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.
mt: Shaxsiy VPN (virtual private network) shirkatlari siyosiy sensorlik va tijorat IP-geofilteringni o'tkazish uchun juda yaxshi usullar bo'lib, ular web proxylarga qaraganda bir qancha sabablarga ko'ra yaxshi. Ular http ni o'tkazishdan tashqari barcha Internet trafikini reyting qiladi. Ularning aksariyatida bandrash va xizmat ko'rsatish sifatini yaxshilaydi. Ularning aksariyatida xavfsizlikni o'z ichiga oladi va shuning uchun ularni o'tkazib yuborish qiyinroq.
ref: Shaxsiy VPN (virtual shaxsiy tarmoq) provayderlari ham siyosiy senzurani, ham tijoriy IP-geofiltrlashni aylanib o'tishning ajoyib usulidir. Bir qancha sabablarga ko'ra, ular veb proksi-serverlardan afzaldir: Ular faqatgina http'ni emas, balki butun internet trafikni qayta yo'naltiradi. Ular odatda yuqoriroq tarmoq kengligi va yaxshiroq xizmat ko'rsatish sifatini taklif qilishadi. Ular shifrlangani sababli ularni kuzatish mushkulroq.

src: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
mt: Telefon qo'ng'iroqlari Internet orqali uzatiladi, shuning uchun siz yashagan yoki sayohat qilgan joyda joylashgan telefon kompaniyasi ishlatmasliga to'g'ri keladi. ref: Siz o'zingiz yashaydigan yoki sayohat qilayotgan yeringizda joylashgan telefon kompaniyasidan foydalanishingiz shart emas, chunki qo'ng'iroqlar internet orqali yo'naltiriladi. O'zingiz yashaydigan hamjamiyatdan mahalliy raqamni olishingiz kerakligi to'g'risidagi talab ham mavjud emas; Chiken, Alyaskaning yovvoyi tabiatida sun'iy yo'ldoshli internet ulanishini olishingiz va sizning quyoshli Arizonada ekanligingizni tasdiqlovchi raqamni tanlashingiz mumkin. Ko'p hollarda, PSTN telefonlari uchun sizga qo'ng'iroq qilish imkonini beruvchi global raqamni alohida xarid qilishingizga to'g'ri keladi. Raqamning qayerdan ekanligi sizga qo'ng'iroq qilayotganlar uchun ahamiyatga ega.

src: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
mt: Italiyada so'zlar ko'pincha yozilishiga mos ravishda o'qiladi. C va G harflari tushunishda muhimdir, chunki ularning ifodagi o'zgarishlari so'nggi fonemaga qarab farq qiladi. Shuningdek, r va rr harflarini farqlashni unutmaslik kerak: caro - sevgi, carro - arava.
ref: Italyan tilida so'zlarning talaffuzi nisbatan osonroq, chunki aksar so'zlar qanday yozilsa, shunday talaffuz qilinadi. Ehtiyot bo'lish lozim bo'lgan asosiy harflar c va g, chunki ularning talaffuzi o'zidan keyin keladigan unli harfga qarab o'zgaradi. Shu bilan birga, r va rr harflarini talaffuz qilishda ularning farqiga ishonch hosil qiling: caro qadrdon degan ma'noni anglatadi, carro esa jang aravasi degan ma'noni bildiradi.

src: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
mt: İzmir Turkiyada aholisi 3,7 millionga yaqin bo'lgan uchinchi yirik shahar, Istanbul keyingi port, juda yaxshi transport markazi. Qadimgi Smyrna shahri bo'lgan İzmirda modern, rivojlangan va yurakli savdo markazi, katta qo'ltiq atrofida joylashgan. Keng bulvarlar, qopqoqli binolar va modern savdo markazlari qadimiy qizil toshli qalqonlar, 18-asr bozori va eski masjidlar va cherkovlari bilan o'ralgan bo'lib, shahar Yevropa qirg'oqidan ko'ra Turkiyadan ko'ra ko'proq.
ref: Izmir 3,7 millionga yaqin aholisi bilan Turkiyadagi uchinchi eng katta shahar, Istambuldan keyingi ikkinchi eng katta port va juda yaxshi transport markazi hisoblanadi. Bir vaqtlar qadimiy shahar bo'lgan Smirna hozirda yirik ko'rfaz atrofida joylashgan hamda tog'lar bilan o'ralgan zamonaviy, rivojlangan va tig'iz savdo markazidir. Garchi shahar o'zida an'anaviy Turkiyadan ko'ra o'rta Yer dengizi Yevropasi muhitini ko'proq aks ettirsa-da, keng bulvarlar, oynavand binolar va zamonaviy savdo markazlar an'anaviy qizil plitkali tomlar, 18-asr bozorlari, eski masjid va cherkovlarga to'la.

src: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
mt: Cherry gullab ko'rish, hanami sifatida tanilgan, 8-asrda yapon madaniyatiga kirib kelgan. Bu tushishni tanlash, Xitoydan kelgan bo'lib, mevali gullar tanlangan. Yaponiyada, imperator tomonidan boshqarilgan imperator sudida faqat u va boshqa ariqchilar uchun tashkil etilgan birinchi cherry gullab ko'rishlari bo'lgan.
ref: Hanami deb ataluvchi olcha gullarini tomosha qilish 8-asrdan buyon yapon madaniyatining bir bo'lagi bo'lib kelmoqda. Bu tushuncha olxo'ri guli tanlov guli bo'lgan Xitoydan kelgan. Yaponiyada dastlabki olcha guli bazmlari imperator tomonidan faqat o'zi va Imperiya sudi atrofidagi aristokratiyaning boshqa a'zolari uchun tashkillashtirilgan.

src: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.
mt: Yerushalayim Isroilning poytaxi va eng katta shahri bo'lib, boshqa davlatlar va Birlashgan Millatlar Tashkiloti uni Isroil poytaxi sifatida tan olmaydi. Qadimgi shahar Yuda tog'larida joylashgan bo'lib, uziyga ming yillar davomida qo'rqinchli tarixga ega. Shahar yahudiylar, nasroniylar va musulmonlar uchun yagona dinli dinlar uchun muqaddas bo'lib, u yerda ruhoniylar, diniy va madaniy markaz bo'lib xizmat qiladi. Shuning uchun, shaharning qadimgi hududida ko'plab tarixiy, arxeologik va madaniy joylar mavjudligi sababli, Yeruhalim Isroilning eng muhim sayyohlik yo'nalishlaridan biridir. Yeruhalimda ko'plab tarixiy, arxeologik va madaniy joylar, shuningdek, to'la bo'lib turuvchi sotuvchilar, kafelar va restoranlar mavjud.
ref: Quddus Isroilning eng katta shahri hamda poytaxti sanaladi, biroq aksariyat boshqa davlatlar hamda Birlashgan Millatlar Tashkiloti bu shaharni Isroil poytaxti sifatida tan olmaydi. Yahudiy tog'laridagi qadimiy shahar minglab yillarni qamrab olgan maftunkor tarixga ega. Shahar uch yakkaxudolik dinlari — yahudiylik, xristianlik hamda islom dinlari uchun muqaddas sanaladi va ma'naviy, diniy, madaniy markaz sifatida xizmat qiladi. Shaharning diniy ahamiyatga egaligi, xususan, Eski shaharning ko'plab diqqatga sazovor joylari sababli Quddus Isroilning asosiy sayyohlik manzillaridan biridir. Quddusda jo'shqin hamda gavjum savdo do'konlar, kafelar va restoranlar bilan birga, ko'plab tarixiy, arxeologik hamda madaniy joylar ham bor.

Yeruhalimda ko'plab tarixiy, arxeologik va madaniy joylar, shuningdek, to'la bo'lib turuvchi sotuvchilar, kafelar va restoranlar mavjud.
ref: Quddus Isroilning eng katta shahri hamda poytaxti sanaladi, biroq aksariyat boshqa davlatlar hamda Birlashgan Millatlar Tashkiloti bu shaharni Isroil poytaxti sifatida tan olmaydi. Yahudiy tog'laridagi qadimiy shahar minglab yillarni qamrab olgan maftunkor tarixga ega. Shahar uch yakkaxudolik dinlari — yahudiylik, xristianlik hamda islom dinlari uchun muqaddas sanaladi va ma'naviy, diniy, madaniy markaz sifatida xizmat qiladi. Shaharning diniy ahamiyatga egaligi, xususan, Eski shaharning ko'plab diqqatga sazovor joylari sababli Quddus Isroilning asosiy sayyohlik manzillaridan biridir. Quddusda jo'shqin hamda gavjum savdo do'konlar, kafelar va restoranlar bilan birga, ko'plab tarixiy, arxeologik hamda madaniy joylar ham bor.

src: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.
mt: Kruger Milliy Parki (KNP) Janubiy Afrika shimoli-sharqida joylashgan va Mozambikning sharqiy chegarasida, Zimbabvening shimolida va janubiy chegarasi Krokodil daryosi bo'lib, park 19,500 km²ni qamrab oladi va 14 turli ekosistemalarda bo'lib, har birida turli xil hayvonot dunyosini qo'llab-quvvatlaydi. U Janubiy Afrikadagi asosiy tashrifgohlaridan biri bo'lib, u Janubiy Afrikadagi Milliy Parklarning (SANParks) yorqin nishoni hisoblanadi. Janubiy Afrikadagi barcha Milliy Parklar kabi, parkda har kuni saqlanish va kirish to'lovlarini o'tkazish mumkin. Shuningdek, Wild Card sotib olish ham mumkin, u Janubiy Afrikadagi bir nechta parklarga kirishni yoki Janubiy Afrikadagi barcha Milliy Parklarga kirishni ta'minlaydi.
ref: Kruger Milliy parki (KMP) Janubiy Afrikaning shimoliy-sharqida joylashgan va sharqda Mozambik, shimolda Zimbabve bilan chegara chegaradosh, janubiy chegarasi esa Timsoh daryosidir. Bog' 19 500 km² maydonni qamrab olgan hamda har biri turlicha yovvoyi tabiatni qo'llab-quvvatlovchi 14 ta ekohududga bo'lingan. U Januniy Afrikadagi asosiy diqqatga sazovor manzillardan biridir hamda Janubiy Afrika Milliy parklarining (SANParks) flagmani sanaladi. Olimlar ayni shu usulda energiya ishlab chiqara oladigan reaktor yaratish ustida ish olib bormoqdalar. Janubiy Afikaning tanlangan bog'lariga yoki Janubiy afrikaning barcha milliy bog'lariga kirish imkoniyatini beruvchi Wild Card'ni sotib olish foydali bo'lishi mumkin.

src: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.
mt: Machu Pikchu shimol tomonida bu baland tog' ustidan ko'tarilgan. Ushbu balandlikdan pastda ko'p fotoshoyalarda ko'rinib turadi. Ushbu balandlikdan pastda ko'p fotoshoyalarda ko'rinib turadi. ref: Machu-Pikchuning shimoliy uchidan tepaga ko'tarilgan mazkur tik tog' ko'p hollarda vayronalarning ko'plab suratlariga fon bo'ladi. Bu pastdan bir oz vahimali ko'rinadi va tik hamda mashaqqatli ko'tarilishdir, ammo bardam odamlar buni deyarli 45 daqiqada bosib o'tishlari kerak. Yo'lning katta qismiga tosh zinalar yotqizilgan va qiyaroq bo'limlarida po'lat kabellar tayanch bo'luvchi tutqich vazifasini bajaradi. Shunday bo'lsa-da, nafasingiz tiqilib qolishi mumkinligini hisobga oling va tikroq qismlarda, ayniqsa, yog'ingarchilik payti ehtiyot bo'ling, chunki tezda yurish xavfli bo'lib qolishi mumkin. Yuqorida kichik g'or bo'lib, u orqali o'tish lozim, u juda past va anchagina tor.

src: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
mt: Majorkan ta'mi, shuningdek, o'xshash zonalar bilan o'xshash bo'lib, unda pishloq, tunafish kabi kondimentlar bilan birga oliv oilasi, pomidor va boshqa mevalar asosiy o'rin tutadi. Yozgi oshxonada eng oddiy oshxona, ayniqsa yozda, Pa amb Oli: oliv oilasi, pomidor va boshqa mevalar bilan birga pishirilgan non.
ref: Mayorka oshxonasi, o'rta Yer dengizidagi shu kabi hududlar singari, non, sabzavotlar va go'shtga (ayniqsa cho'chqa go'shti) asoslanadi va doim zaytun moyidan foydalaniladi. Ayniqsa yoz oylarida ommabop oddiy kechki ovqat bu Pa amb Olidir: zaytun yog'i, pomidor hamda pishloq, tunesva boshqalar qo'shimchalar bilan tortilgan non.

src: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
mt: Hangi oshqozi yer ostida issiq o'rtacha qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib qazib q
ref: Xangi taomi yerdagi qaynoq chuqurda pishiriladi. O'ra olovdan qizigan issiq toshlar bilan isiydi yoki ayrim joylarda geotermal issiqlik yer maydonlarini tabiiy isitadi. Hangi ko'pincha odatiy qovurilgan uslubdagi kechki ovqatni pishirishda foydalaniladi. Rotoruadagi bir nechta joylar gerotermal xangini taqdim etadi, qolgan xangilarni Vellingtondagi Krayschyorchda va boshqa joylarda tatib ko'rish mumkin.

src: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!
mt: Monastirlarga tashrif buyurishda ayollar o'rtasida qo'pol bo'lmagan qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini qoplab, boshqa qo'llarini q
ref: Ibodatxonalarga tashrif qilish vaqtida ayollardan tizzalarini berkitishlari uchun yubka kiyish va yelkalarini ham yopib olish talab qilinadi. Monastirlarning katta qismi tayyorgarliksiz kelgan ayollarga ro'mollar beradi, biroq agar siz o'zingiznikini, ayniqsa, yorqin rangdagisini olib kelsangiz, kirishda rohib yoki rohibaning tabassumini qabul qilib olasiz. Xuddi shu tarzda, erkaklar tizzalarni yopib turuvchi shim kiyishlari lozim. Buni kirishdagi tayyor mahsulotlar omboridan ijaraga olish ham mumkin, biroq u kiyim har bir foydalanuvchidan keyin yuvilmaydi, shuning uchun bu yubkalarni kiyish sizga noqulaylik tug'dirishi mumkin. Bitta o'lcham hamma erkaklarga mos keladi!

src: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
mt: Agar siz qishda Arktika yoki Antarktika hududlariga tashrif buyurishingiz mumkin bo'lsa, siz qutb tungi dunyosini ko'rish imkoniyatiga ega bo'lasiz, bu yerda quyoshning chiqib ketishi mumkin emas. Bu Auroralarini ko'rishga imkoniyat beradi, chunki quyosh ko'pincha kun davomida chiqib ketmaydi. Aholi zich emasligi sababli, shuning uchun yorug'lik ziyoniga qaramasdan siz yulduzlarni ko'rishga imkoniyatga ega bo'lasiz.
ref: Qish faslida Arktika yoki Antarktika hududiga kelsansiz, qutb tuniga guvoh bo'lishingiz mumkin, ya'ni quyosh ufqdan yuqori ko'tarilmaydi. Bu Qutb yog'dularini ko'rish uchun yaxshi imkoniyat taklif etadi, chunki osmon sutka davomida ozmi-ko'pmi qorong'i bo'ladi. Hududlarda aholi siyrakligi tufayli, yorug'lik ifloslanishi ko'p hollarda muammo bo'lmaydi, siz ham yulduzlardan zavqlana olasiz.

src: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.
mt: Moldovaning poytaxti Chişinău. Yerlik tili rumın, lekin rus tili keng qo'llaniladi. Moldova etnik nizolardan to'liq mustahkamlangan davlat bo'lib, bu nizolar 1994-yilda Moldovaning sharqiy qismida o'z hukumatini va valyutani yaratgan Transnistria Respublikasiga olib keldi. Buning uchun boshqa davlatlar tomonidan tan olinmagan. Iqtisodiy aloqalar bu ikki qism o'rtasida qayta tiklangan, bu siyosiy muzokaralar muvaffaqiyatsizlikka olib keldi. Moldovada asosiy din pravoslav xristianlik.
ref: Moldova poytaxti Kishinyov. Mahalliy til rumin tili bo'lsa-da, rus tili keng qo'llaniladi. Moldova etnik ziddiyatlardan aziyat chekkan ko'p millatli respublikadir. Bu ziddiyat 1994-yilda Moldovaning sharqida o'z hukumati va valyutasiga ega bo'lgan, biroq BMTga a'zo mamlakatlarning hech biri tomonidan tan olinmagan Pridnestrovye Respublikasining yaratilishiga olib keldi. Siyosiy muzokaralarning muvaffaqiyatsizligiga qaramasdan, Moldovaning mazkur ikki qismi o'rtasida iqtisodiy munosabatlar qayta tiklandi. Moldovadagi asosiy din pravoslav nasroniylikdir.

src: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."
mt: “Montevideo Janubiy yarim shar bo'lib, u Shimoliy yarim sharda qishda yozda bo'lgani kabi qishda yozda bo'lib, aksincha. Montevideo subtropiklarda; yoz oylarida +30°C dan ortiq haroratlar keng tarqalgan. Qishda sovuq deyarli bo'lmaydi: sovuq haroratlar qariyb dona qo'rqishga olib keladi, lekin shamol va namlik kombinatsiyasi termometrga ko'rsatgan haroratdan ham sovuqroq his qilishga olib keladi. Yil davomida yomg'ir va qurg'oq oylar bo'lmaydi: yomg'irning miqdori yil davomida o'zgarmaydi.”
ref: "Montevideo Ekvatorning janubida bo'lgani tufayli Shimoliy yarim sharda qish bo'lganida, u yerda yoz bo'ladi va aksincha. Montevideo subtropikada joylashgan; yoz oylarida harorat +30°C dan yuqori bo'lishi odatiy hol. Qish chalg'itadigan sovuq bo'lishi mumkin: haroratlar kamdan-ham hollarda muzlash nuqtasidan pastga tushadi, biroq shamol va namlik birlashgan holda termometr ko'rsatganiga qaraganda sovuqroqdek tuyulishi mumkin. Alohida ""yomg'irli"" va ""quruq"" fasllar bo'lmaydi: yomg'ir miqdori yil davomida deyarli bir xilligicha qoladi."

src: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

ref: Ayrim festivallar uchun, musiqa festivallari ishtirokchilarining katta qismi hududda lager qurishga qaror qiladi va aksariyat ishtirokchilar buni mazkur tajribaning muhim qismi deb hisoblaydi. Agar siz harakatga yaqin bo'lishni xohlasangiz, musiqaga yagin lager joyini qo'lga kiritish uchun ertaroq kirishingiz kerak bo'ladi. Shuni yodda tutingki, garchi asosiy sahnadagi musiqa tugagan bo'lsa ham, festivalning yarim tungacha musiqa ijrosi davom etiladigan bo'limlari bo'lishi mumkin. Ayrim festivallarda yosh bolalari bo'lgan oilalar uchun maxsus kemping hududlari mavjud bo'ladi.

src: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.
mt: Shuningdek, ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun tijorat turlarida tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun tijorat turlarida tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun tijorat turlarida tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun tijorat turlarida tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun tijorat turlarida tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun tijorat turlarida tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun tijorat turlarida tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun tijorat turlarida tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyur
ref: Ko'plab pueblolarning qanchalik uzoq masofada ekanligini inobatga olsak, siz Albukerke yoki Santa Fega sayohat qilmasdan turib, tungi hayotning sezilarli qismini topa olmaysiz. Lekin yuqorida sanalgan qariyb barcha kazinolar ichimliklar taklif qiladi va ularning ba'zilari o'yin-kulgi brendlarini vujudga keltiradi (asosan, Alkuberka va Santa-Fe atrofida joylashgan katta kazinolar). Ogoh bo'ling: bu yerdagi kichik shahar barlari shtatlik bo'lmagan tashrif buyuruvchilar aylanishi uchun har doim ham yaxshi joylar emas. Bir tomondan, shimoliy Nyu-Meksikoda mast holda transport vositalarini boshqarish bilan bog'liq anchagina muammolar bor va kichik shahar barlari yaqinida mast haydovchilar soni ko'p.

Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.
mt: Shuningdek, ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun tijorat turlarida tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun tijorat turlarida tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun tijorat turlarida tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun tijorat turlarida tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun tijorat turlarida tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun tijorat turlarida tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun tijorat turlarida tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun tijorat turlarida tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyurish qiyin bo'lib, bu yerda ko'plab pueblosda tashrif buyur
ref: Ko'plab pueblolarning qanchalik uzoq masofada ekanligini inobatga olsak, siz Albukerke yoki Santa Fega sayohat qilmasdan turib, tungi hayotning sezilarli qismini topa olmaysiz. Lekin yuqorida sanalgan qariyb barcha kazinolar ichimliklar taklif qiladi va ularning ba'zilari o'yin-kulgi brendlarini vujudga keltiradi (asosan, Alkuberka va Santa-Fe atrofida joylashgan katta kazinolar). Ogoh bo'ling: bu yerdagi kichik shahar barlari shtatlik bo'lmagan tashrif buyuruvchilar aylanishi uchun har doim ham yaxshi joylar emas. Bir tomondan, shimoliy Nyu-Meksikoda mast holda transport vositalarini boshqarish bilan bog'liq anchagina muammolar bor va kichik shahar barlari yaqinida mast haydovchilar soni ko'p.

src: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."
mt: "Asosiy mahalliy bira 'Birinchi raqam' deb nomlanadi, u murakkab emas, lekin xush va sog'inish uchun mos. Boshqa mahalliy bira 'Manta' deb nomlanadi. Fransuz vinalari bor, ammo Yangi Zelandiya va Avstraliya vinalari yaxshi tashish mumkin. Mahalliy suv tashish suvini ichish uchun to'g'ri, lekin shisha suvni topish juda qulay, agar siz xavotirli bo'lsangiz. Avstraliyaliklarga 'flat white' qahva g'oyasi xalqaro. Qisqa qora 'espresso', kappuchino qaynatma bilan qoplanadi (emulsiyasi emas), va choy suv bilan beriladi. Issiq chokold belgian standartlariga mos keladi. Mevali sushilar qimmat, lekin yaxshi.
ref: "Asosiy mahalliy pivo ""Birinchi raqami"" bo'lib, u murakkab profilli pivo emas, lekin yoqimli va tetiklantiruvchi. Ikkinchi mahalliy pivoning nomi ""Manta"". Ichishga ko'p fransuz vinolari bor, biroq Yangi Zelandiya va Avstraliya vinolari yo'lda yaxshiroq ketishi mumkin. Mahalliy jo'mrak suvi butunlay xavfsiz, ammo qo'rqsangiz, shisha idishdagi suvni topish oson. ""Yassi oq"" qahva g'oyasi avstraliyaliklar uchun begona. ""Espresso"" qora pakana deb nomlanadi, kapuchino qaymoq (ko'pik bilan emas) bilan to'ldirligan bo'ladi, choy esa sutsiz beriladi. Issiq shokolad Belgiya talablariga mos. Meva sharbatlari qimmat bo'lsa-da, a'lo."

src: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."
mt: Guaranílar Paragvayning sharqiy qismida yashagan eng muhim mahalliy aholi turlaridan biri bo'lib, ular o'sha paytda nomi "Indiyalar Provinsiyasi" bo'lgan Paragvayni yashab, o'sha paytda nomi "Indiyalar Provinsiyasi" bo'lgan Paragvayni yashab, o'sha paytda nomi "Indiyalar Provinsiyasi" bo'lgan Paragvayni yashab, o'sha paytda nomi "Indiyalar Provinsiyasi" bo'lgan Paragvayni yashab, o'sha paytda nomi "Indiyalar Provinsiyasi" bo'lgan Paragvayni yashab, o'sha paytda nomi "Indiyalar Provinsiyasi" bo'lgan Paragvayni yashab, o'sha paytda nomi "Indiyalar Provinsiyasi" bo'lgan Paragvayni yashab, o'sha paytda nomi "Indiyalar Provinsiyasi" bo'lgan Paragvayni yashab, o'sha paytda nomi "Indiyalar Provinsiyasi" bo'lgan Paragvayni yashab, o'sha paytda nomi "Indiyalar Provinsiyasi" bo'lgan Paragvayni yashab, o'sha paytda nomi "Indiyalar Provinsiyasi" bo'lgan Paragvayni yashab, o'sha paytda nomi "Indiyalar Provinsiyasi" bo'lgan Paragvayni yashab, o'sha paytda nomi "Indiyalar Provinsiyasi" bo'lgan Paragvayni yashab, o'sha paytda nomi "Indiyalar Provinsiyasi" bo'lgan Paragvayni yashab, o'sha paytda nomi "Indiyalar Provinsiyasi" bo'lgan Paragvayni yashab, o'sha paytda nomi "Indiyalar Provinsiyasi" bo'lgan Paragv
ref: "Guarani hozirgi Sharqiy Paragvay tuprog'ida istiqomat qiluvchi eng muhim tub jamoa bo'lgan hamda yordamchi qishloq xo'jaligi bilan shug'ullanuvchi yarim-ko'chmanchi ovchilar sifatida hayot kechirgan. Chako mintaqasida Guaykuru va Payagua kabi mahalliy qabilalarning boshqa guruhlari yashab, ular ovchilik, termachilik va baliq ovlash orqali hayotlarini saqlab qolishgan. Ilgari ""Hindlarning ulkan provinsiyasi"" deb atalgan Paragvay 16-asrda ispan bosqinchilarining mahalliy aholi guruhlari bilan to'qnashuvi natijasida yuzaga kelgan. Ispanlar 3 asrga cho'zilgan mustamlakachilik davrini boshlashdi. 1537-yili Asunson tashkil topganidan beri Paragvay o'zining tub xususiyatlari va o'ziga xosligining katta qismini saqlab qolishga muvaffaq bo'ldi."

src: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."
mt: "Parijliklar egocentrizm, xatolik va qo'rqoqchilik uchun shaxsiyatlari bilan tanilgan. Buning aksariyatida faqat xato tasavvur bo'lib, eng yaxshi usul Parijliklarga qarshi o'zining eng yaxshi xatti-harakatini ko'rsatishdir. Bu harakatlanishni ancha oson qiladi. Parijliklarning qattiq tashqi sharoitlari tezda parchalanadi agar siz ba'zi asosiy marosimlarni ko'rsatgan bo'lsangiz."
ref: "Parijliklar xudbin, qo'pol va dimog'dorligi bilan tanilgan. Bu ko'pincha faqat noaniq stereotip bo'lgani holda Parijda yurishning eng yaxshi usuli hali ham eng yaxshi ahloq-odobda bo'lish, ""bien eleve"" (yaxshi tarbiya ko'rgan) shaxslar kabi harakat qilishdir. Bu aylanib yurishni anchagina osonlashtiradi. Agar siz bir oz iltifot qilsangiz, parijliklarning keskin tashqi qiyofasi biz zumda g'oyib bo'ladi."

src: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.
mt: Kap Town atrofida va uning ichida yo'lovchi tayoqchilarida ikkita sinf mavjud: MetroPlus (birinchi sinf) va Metro (uchinchi sinf). MetroPlus qulayroq va to'planmagan bo'lib, ammo Metroga nisbatan bir oz ko'p pul talab qiladi, lekin Yevropada normal metroning biletiga nisbatan kamroq. Har bir tayoqda ikkita MetroPlus va Metro tayoqlari mavjud; MetroPlus tayoqlari har doim Kap Town tayoqning eng yaqin qismida joylashgan.
ref: MetroRail Keyptaun atrofida qatnovchi poyezdlarning ikki sinfiga ega: MetroPlus (Birinchi sinf deb ham ataladi) va Metro (Uchinchi sinf deb ham ataladi). MetroPlus yanada qulay va u qadar tiqilinch emas, lekin bir oz qimmatroq, shunga qaramay, Yevropadagi odatiy metro chiptalaridan arzonroq. Poyezdlarning har biriga MetroPlus va Metro vagonlari ulangan bo'lib, MetroPlus vagonlari doimo Keyptaun tomon eng yaqin poyezdning oxiriga joylashtiriladi.

src: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.
mt: Yurakchilar o'z yashash hududlarida keng tarqalgan hayvonlar qaroqchilariga duch kelishlari mumkin. Qaroqchilar oziq-ovqatni buzib, g'azablanishga sabab bo'lishi yoki shaxsiy hujjatlarni buzib, odamlarni o'ldirishga yoki o'ldirishga sabab bo'lishi mumkin. O'z-o'zidan kasalliklar yoki odamlarni kuch bilan o'ldiradigan yoki o'ldiradigan hayvonlar o'z-o'zidan qaroqchilar emas.
ref: Sayyohlar o'z mintaqalarida noma'lum bo'lgan hayvon parazitlariga duch kelishlari mumkin. Zararkunandalar oziq-ovqat mahsulotlarini buzishi, qichishishga sabab bo'lishi yoki bundan-da yomonroq holatlarda, allergik reaksiyalarga sabab bo'lishi, zahar tarqatishi yoki infeksiya yuqtirishi mumkin. Yuqumli kasalliklarning o'zi yoxud kuch bilan insonlarni jarohatlashi yoxud halok qilishi mumkin bo'lgan xavfli hayvonlar odatda zararkunandalar toifasiga kiritilmaydi.

src: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.
mt: Har bir ko'chma do'kon o'z ichiga qo'ng'iroq telefonlaridan yoki oddiy telefonlardan foydalanish uchun qulflangan telefon kartalari bilan to'la bo'lib turadi. Ko'pchilik kartalar barcha mamlakatlarga qo'ng'iroq qilish uchun yaxshi bo'lib, ba'zilari xususiy guruhlarga qo'ng'iroq qilish uchun yaxshi bo'lib turadi. Ularga kirish odatda to'lovsiz telefon raqamidan foydalanish orqali amalga oshiriladi, bu ko'pchilik telefonlardan bepul qo'ng'iroq qilish mumkin.
ref: Har bir burchak do'kon pullik telefonlar yoki odatiy telefonlardan foydalansa bo'ladigan oldindan to'lash telefon kartalarining chalkash qatori bilan to'la. Ko'pchilik kartalar istalgan joyga qo'ng'iroq qilish uchun juda mos bo'lgani holda ayrimlari ma'lum mamlakatlar guruhi uchun foydali qo'ng'iroq narxlarini taqim etadi. Mazkur xizmatlardan foydalanish, ko'pincha, aksariyat telefonlardan bepul qo'ng'iroq qilish mumkin bo'lgan bepul telefon raqamlari orqali amalga oshiriladi.

src: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
mt: Plitvice ko'l milliy bog'i o'zining beech, spruce va fir o'simliklari bilan o'ziga xos o'rmonli hududga ega. Uning o'ziga xos o'simliklari, turli tuproqlar va balandliklar tufayli o'ziga xos o'simliklari bor. Bu hududda juda keng turdagi hayvonlar va qushlar mavjud. Ushbu hududda juda kam uchraydigan faunaga misol sifatida qora ayiq, o'rdak, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq, qo'rqoq
ref: Plitvits ko'llari milliy bog'i qalin o'rmonlarga ega, unda asosan qora qayin, qoraqarag'ay, archa daraxtlari mavjud va unda Alp va o'rta yer dengizi hududi o'simliklari bor. U o'zining bir qator mikroiqlimlari, farq qiluvchi tuproqlari va turli darajalardagi balandligi tufayli sezilarli darajada keng o'simlik turlariga egadir. Hudud juda keng turdagi hayvonlar va qush turlari uchun vatandir. Bu yerdan ko'pgina keng tarqalgan turlar bilan qatorda qo'ng'ir ayiq, bo'ri, burgut, boyo'g'li, silovsin, yovvoyi mushuk va karqur kabi Yevropaning noyon faunasini topish mumkin.
