ref: Plitvits ko'llari milliy bog'i qalin o'rmonlarga ega, unda asosan qora qayin, qoraqarag'ay, archa daraxtlari mavjud va unda Alp va o'rta yer dengizi hududi o'simliklari bor. U o'zining bir qator mikroiqlimlari, farq qiluvchi tuproqlari va turli darajalardagi balandligi tufayli sezilarli darajada keng o'simlik turlariga egadir. Hudud juda keng turdagi hayvonlar va qush turlari uchun vatandir. Bu yerdan ko'pgina keng tarqalgan turlar bilan qatorda qo'ng'ir ayiq, bo'ri, burgut, boyo'g'li, silovsin, yovvoyi mushuk va karqur kabi Yevropaning noyon faunasini topish mumkin.

src: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."
mt: “Boshqaruvchilar odatda bu maqsadni o'ylab topishganini aytishadi, degan xatolar bilan, bu esa ""piratlikni oldini olish""ga yo'naltirilgan. Aslida, mintaqalar kodlari qo'llab-quvvatlashda hech qanday ta'sirga ega emas; diskning asl nusxasi o'ziga xos bo'lgan barcha qurilmalarda o'z-o'zidan ishlaydi. Asl maqsad - bu kompaniyalarning bozorlari ustidan nazorat qilishga yo'naltirilgan; bu barcha narsa pullar bilan aylanishga yo'naltirilgan”.
ref: "Media kompaniyalari ""qaroqchilikni oldini olish"" uchunligini da'vo qilib, buning maqsadi haqida muntazam ravishda yolg'on gapirishadi. Hududiy kodlar noqonuniy nusxalashga umuman ta'sir ko'rsatmaydi; diskning bitma-bit qilingan nusxasi har qanday qurilmada asl nusxasi kabi yaxshi ishlaydi. Asl maqsad mazkur kompaniyalarga o'z bozorlari ustidan kengroq nazoratni berishdir; barchasi mablag' aylanishi bilan bog'liq."

src: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.
mt: Qaytishda immigratsiya nazorati asosan yo'q yoki shaxsiy hujjatlarni tekshirishdan iborat bo'lib, o'z yurtida kelishda tijorat nazorati qandaydir muammolarga sabab bo'lishi mumkin. src: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.
mt: Kochamo vodiysi - Janubiy Amerikadagi Yosemite, ko'plab granitli baland devor va qirg'ichlari bilan shuhrat qozgan Chilening asosiy chiqish joyi. Ko'plab cho'qqilarda ko'rinadigan nafis ko'rinishlari mavjud. ref: Koxamo vodiysi — Janubiy Amerikaning Yosemiti deb nomlangan, turli granitli yirik devorlar va qoyalarga ega bo'lgan Chilining toqqa chiqish uchun asosiy manzilidir. Cho'qqilar eng yuqori nuqtalardan ajoyib ko'rinishlarni o'z ichiga oladi. Butun dunyodan kelgan alpinistlar uning devorlariga oid cheksiz imkoniyatlar orasidan doim yangi yo'nalishlarni ochmoqdalar.

src: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
mt: Agar siz butunlay Janubiy yarim sharda dunyo bo'ylab uchishni xohlasangiz, uchish yo'llari va manzillar tanlash imkoniyatlari cheklangan. Janubiy yarim sharda okean bo'ylab yo'llar yo'q. Shuning uchun barcha uchish yo'llarini qoplab turish uchun hech bir aviakompaniya ittifoqi yo'q. Biroq, Star Alliance barcha yo'llarni qoplab turadi, faqat Janubiy Tinch okeani va Janubiy Amerikadagi g'arbiy qirg'oqni o'tib o'tish uchun LATAM Oneworld uchish yo'li mavjud. Buning uchun siz Janubiy Tinch okeanini va Janubiy Amerikadagi g'arbiy qirg'oqni o'tib o'tishni xohlasangiz, boshqa yo'llar mavjud (qarang).
ref: Agar siz janubiy yarimshar bo'ylab to'liq parvoz qilmoqchi bo'lsangiz, transokean yo'nalishlarning yo'qligi tufayli parvozlar va manzillar tanlovi cheklangan bo'ladi. Hech qaysi aviakompaniya ittifoqi Janubiy Yarimshardagi barcha uchta okeanni kesib o'tishni qamrab olmaydi (va SkyTeam birorta kesib o'tishni qamrab olmaydi). Biroq Star Alliance aviakompaniyasi, LATAM Oneworld reysi bo'lgan janubiy Tinch okeanining sharqiy qismi Santyago de Chilidan Taitigacha reysidan tashqari, barchasini qamrab oladi. Agar siz Janubiy Tinch okeani va Janubiy Amerika g'arbiy qirg'og'ini chetlab o'tmoqchi bo'lsangiz, bu reys yagona variant emas. (pastga qarang)

src: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.
mt: Jahon miqyosida yiliga taxminan 200 tashkilot yurish turlari tashkil etadi. Ularning aksariyati mustaqil ravishda ishlaydi. Global Running Toursning vorisi, Go Running Tours to'rt qit'adagi ko'plab ko'rinishli yurish tashkilotlarini tarmog'lashga muvaffaq bo'ldi. Barcelona yurish turlari bilan Barcelona va Kopengagen yurish turlari bilan Kopengagen bilan boshlanib, keyin Pragada yurish turlari bilan Praga va boshqalari qo'shilgan.
ref: "Xalqaro miqyosda 200 ga yaqin ishlab turgan sayyohlik tashkilotlari bor. Ularning aksariyati mustaqil faoliyat yuritadi. ""Global yugurish turlari"" vorisi — ""Yugurishga chiq turlari"" to'rt qit'ada o'nlab tomoshaviy yugurish provayderlarini birlashtiradi. Ildizi Barselonaning ""Barselona yugurish turlari"" va Kopengagenning ""Kopengagenda yugurish"" iga borib taqalgan, tez orada unga Pragada joylashgan ""Praga yugurish turlari"" va boshqalar qo'shildi."

src: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."
mt: "Safarilarning afrikada turizmga qaratilgan eng katta g'oyalaridan biri ekanligi bilan tanilgan. Boshqa so'zlar bilan aytganda, safar - qo'shni savannada yashovchi afrikalik hayvonlarni ko'rish uchun o'z-o'zidan o'tish yo'li. Boshqa hayvonlarga qaraganda, qo'ziqorlar va giraffalar avtomobillarga yaqinlashishga moyil bo'lib, standart jihozlar bilan yaxshi ko'rish mumkin. Leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlardan tashqari, leoparlard
ref: "Safarilar, ehtimol, Afrikaning eng katta sayyohlik jozibasi va ko'plab tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun eng diqqatga sazovor joydir. Hammaga tanish safari atamasi Afrikaning ajoyib hayvonot olami, xususan, savannani tomosha qilish uchun quruqlik bo'ylab sayohatga taalluqli. Ayrim hayvonlar, masalan, fillar va jirafalar mashinalarga yaqin kelishga moyil hamda standart uskunalar yaxshi tomosha qilish imkonini beradi. Sherlar, gepardlar va leopardlar ba'zan tortinchoq bo'ladi va siz ularni durbin orqali yaxshiroq ko'rasiz. ""Yuruvchi safari"" (""buta yurish"", ""piyoda safari"" yoki ""piyoda yurish"" deb ham ataladi) bir necha soatlik yoxud bir necha kunlik piyoda sayr qilishdan iborat."

src: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.
mt: Katta guruhlar uchun turlar arzonroq, shuning uchun siz yolg'iz yoki bir do'stingiz bilan bo'lsa, boshqa odamlar bilan uchrashib, to'rtta yoki oltita odamdan iborat guruhga aylanib, har bir nafar uchun yaxshiroq narxga ega bo'lishingiz mumkin. Biroq, bu sizga qo'pol emas, chunki ko'pincha tashrif buyuruvchilar avtomobillarga to'ldirish uchun o'zgartiriladi. Ushbu usul aslida odamlarni ko'proq pul to'lashga ishontirish uchun ishlatiladi.
ref: Kattaroq guruhlar uchun sayohatlar arzonroq, shu sababli o'zingiz yoki faqat bir nafar do'stingiz bilan bo'lsangiz, boshqa odamlar bilan tanishib, odam boshiga to'g'ri keluvchi narx yaxshiroq bo'lishi uchun to'rt-olti kishilik guruh tuzishga harakat qiling. Lekin bu aslida sizni bezovta qilmasligi kerak, chunki sayyohlar mashinalarni to'ldirish uchun ko'pincha aralashib ketadi. Bu ko'proq odamlarni ko'proq to'lashlari kerakligiga ishontirish usuliga o'xshaydi.

src: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.
mt: San Fransisko iqtisodiyoti dunyodagi klassik sayyohlik manzilgohlari bilan bog'liq bo'lib, iqtisodiyotni turli sektorlarda bo'lishiga qaramay, turli sektorlarda bo'lib, turizm va sayyohlik sektori eng katta hissa qo'shadi. Shuningdek, shahar va uning diqqatga sazovor joylari dunyo bo'ylab mashhur bo'lganligi uchun musiqada, filmlarda, adabiyotda va xalq madaniyatida ko'p marta tasvirlangan. San Fransisko sayyohlik infratuzilmasi bilan bir qatorda, ko'plab mehmonxonalari, restoranlari va yaxshi konferensiyalar uchun mo'ljallangan joylari bor. San Fransisko AQShda boshqa o'smirlar uchun eng yaxshi o'rinlardan birida bo'lib, Koreya, Tailand, Hindiston va Yaponiya ta'mi.
ref: San-Fransisko iqtisodiyoti uning dunyo darajasidagi sayyohlik manzili ekanligi bilan bog'liq bo'lsa-da, uning iqtisodi xilma-xildir. Ish bilan ta'minlovchi eng yirik sohalar professional xizmatlar, hukumat, moliya, savdo hamda turizmdir. Musiqa, film, adabiyot va ommaviy madaniyatda ko'p aks ettirilishi shahar va uning diqqatga sazovor yerlarini dunyoga tanitishga hissa qo'shdi. San-Fransisko ko'p sonli mehmonxonalar, restoranlar hamda yuqori darajadagi anjumanlar o'tkaziladigan inshootlardan iborat yirik turizm infratuzilmasini rivojlantirgan. San-Fransisko boshqa Osiyo oshxonalari: koreys, tay, hind hamda yapon oshxonalari uchun ham mamlakatdagi eng yaxshi joylardan biridir.

src: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.
mt: Avvalroq buyurtma qilish sayohatchiga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi. Sayohat agentlari odatda xususiy mehmonxonalarga shartnoma tuzishlari bilan tanish, lekin siz boshqa turar joylarni, masalan, kamplar orqali sayohat agentidan buyurishingiz mumkin. Ular odatda oqshom, transport vositalarini aeroportga olib kelish yoki bitta uchish-qo'nish yo'lagi va mehmonxona paketlari bilan paketlarni taklif qiladi. Ular sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi yoki sizga kelishini bilish imkoniyatini beradi
ref: Oldindan band qilish manzilga yetib borgach, tunash uchun joy bor bo'lishini ta'minlab, sayohatchiga xotirjamlik baxsh qiladi. Garchi siz sayohat agentligi orqali kemping kabi turar-joyning boshqa shakllarini buyurtma qilishingiz mumkin bo'lsada, sayohat agentliklari ko'pincha ma'lum mehmonxonalar bilan kelishuvga ega bo'ladilar. Sayyohlik agentlari odatda nonushta, aeroportga/dan transportni tashkillashtirish yoxud hatto parvoz hamda mehmonxona xizmatlarini o'z ichiga oluvchi to'plamlarni taklif etadi. Agar sizga boradigan joyingiz uchun boshqa hujjatlarni (masalan, viza) taqdim etishingiz yoki olishingiz uchun vaqt kerak bo'lsa, ular siz uchun buyurtma qilib qo'yishlari ham mumkin. Barcha o'zgartirishlar va so'rovlar bevosita mehmonxonalarga emas, balki avval sayyohlik agentligi orqali yuborilishi kerak.

src: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
mt: Real-time text tushunish qo'shimchalar – bu qo'shimchalar, ular bitta tilni boshqa tilga avtomatik ravishda tushunish qilish qobiliyatiga ega. Bu kategoriyadagi ba'zi qo'shimchalar shuningdek, foydalanuvchining smartfonini nisbatan narsalarga qaratib, ularda yozilgan xalqaro tillarda yozilgan matnlarni tushunishga qodir. Tushunish moslamalari juda yaxshi rivojlangan, ular ko'pincha to'g'ri tushunishga (va qo'shimcha ravishda qo'rqoq) ega, lekin boshqalarga qaraganda, ular hali ham boshqalarni to'g'ri tushunishga qodir emas. Bu kategoriyadagi eng mashhur qo'shimchalaridan biri Google Translate, u foydalanuvchilar tomonidan yuklab olinadigan til ma'lumotlarini tushunishga qodir.
ref: Real vaqt matnli tarjimon ilovalari — matnning butun boshli segmentlarini bir tildan ikkinchisiga avtomatik tarzda tarjima qila oladigan ilovalardir. Ushbu toifadagi ba'zi ilovalar, foydalanuvchi smartfonini obyektlar tomon olib borganda, hatto real hayotdagi mazkur belgilar yoki boshqa obyektlar ustidagi chet tillarida yozilgan matnlarni ham tarjima qila oladi. Tarjima tizimlari keskin yaxshilandi va hozirda ko'pincha muayyan darajada to'g'ri tarjimalar (hamda kamdan-kam hollarda tushunarsiz) beriladi, lekin bir oz ehtiyotkorlik zarur, chunki ular hali ham hammasini noto'g'ri qabul qilgan bo'lishi mumkin. Mazkur toifadagi eng mashhur ilovalardan biri – bu Google Translate bo'lib, u zarur til ma'lumotlari yuklab olinganidan keyin oflayn tarjima qilish imkonini beradi.

src: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.
mt: Qor to'qsonlari normal holat emas; baland tepaliklarda yashil qor juda yopishqoq bo'lib, uning o'zida juda ko'p qor bo'lishi mumkin. ref: Qor ko'chkisi g'ayritabiiy holat emas; tik qiyaliklar faqatgina juda sekin ushlab tura oladi va ortiqcha hajmdagi qor ko'chki sifatida pastga tushadi. Muammo shundaki, qor yopishqoq, shuning uchun pastga tushishi uchun unga turtki kerak bo'ladi va pastga tushayotgan qor qolganlari uchun turtki beruvchi kuch bo'lishi mumkin. Ba'zan dastlabki turtki bo'ladigan sabab quyoshning qorni isitishi, ba'zan yana qor yog'ishi, ba'zida boshqa tabiiy hodisalar, ko'pincha esa inson bo'ladi.

src: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."
mt: "Kari - oshxona mahsulotlaridan biri bo'lib, uning tarkibiga o'simliklar va qo'ziqorinlar, biror qo'shimcha mahsulotlar (qo'ziqorinlar) kiritiladi. Kari qo'ziqorinlar yoki sabzavotlardan iborat bo'lishi mumkin. Shimoliy Hindiston va Pokistonning qirg'oq hududlarida yog'urt keng qo'llaniladi, Janubiy Hindiston va boshqa qirg'oq hududlarida qo'ziqorinlar keng qo'llaniladi."
ref: "Karri giyohlar hamda ziravorlar bilan birgalikda go'sht yoxud sabzavotlarga asoslangan ovqatdir. Karri suyuqlik miqdoridan kelib chiqib, ""quruq"" yoxud ""ho'l"" bo'lishi mumkin. Shimoliy Hindiston hamda Pokistonning ichki hududlarida yogurtdan odatda karrilarda foydalaniladi; Janubiy Hindistonda hamda subkontinentning boshqa ayrim qirg'oq bo'yi hududlarida kokos suti keng qo'llaniladi."

src: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."
mt: "Kari - oshxona mahsulotlaridan biri bo'lib, uning tarkibiga o'simliklar va qo'ziqorinlar, biror qo'shimcha mahsulotlar (qo'ziqorinlar) kiritiladi. Kari qo'ziqorinlar yoki sabzavotlardan iborat bo'lishi mumkin. Shimoliy Hindiston va Pokistonning qirg'oq hududlarida yog'urt keng qo'llaniladi, Janubiy Hindiston va boshqa qirg'oq hududlarida qo'ziqorinlar keng qo'llaniladi."
ref: "Karri giyohlar hamda ziravorlar bilan birgalikda go'sht yoxud sabzavotlarga asoslangan ovqatdir. Karri suyuqlik miqdoridan kelib chiqib, ""quruq"" yoxud ""ho'l"" bo'lishi mumkin. Shimoliy Hindiston hamda Pokistonning ichki hududlarida yogurtdan odatda karrilarda foydalaniladi; Janubiy Hindistonda hamda subkontinentning boshqa ayrim qirg'oq bo'yi hududlarida kokos suti keng qo'llaniladi."

src: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.
mt: Janubiy polusutki (yoki yo'li) 1600 km uzunlikdagi yo'ldan iborat bo'lib, u McMurdo stansiyasidan Ross dengiziga qadar bo'lgan yo'lni tashkil etadi. U qopqoq qor bilan qoplangan bo'lib, unda o'q-dorilar bilan to'ldirilgan va bayroqlar bilan belgilangan o'q-dorilar bilan to'ldirilgan bo'lib, u qopqoq qor bilan qoplangan bo'lib, unda o'q-dorilar bilan to'ldirilgan va bayroqlar bilan belgilangan o'q-dorilar bilan to'ldirilgan bo'lib, u qopqoq qor bilan qoplangan bo'lib, unda o'q-dorilar bilan to'ldirilgan va bayroqlar bilan belgilangan o'q-dorilar bilan to'ldirilgan bo'lib, u qopqoq qor bilan qoplangan bo'lib, unda o'q-dorilar bilan to'ldirilgan va bayroqlar bilan belgilangan o'q-dorilar bilan to'ldirilgan bo'lib, u qopqoq qor bilan qoplangan bo'lib, unda o'q-dorilar bilan to'ldirilgan va bayroqlar bilan belgilangan o'q-dorilar bilan to'ldirilgan bo'lib, u qopqoq qor bilan qoplangan bo'lib, unda o'q-dorilar bilan to'ldirilgan va bayroqlar bilan belgilangan o'q-dorilar bilan to'ldirilgan bo'lib, u qopqoq qor bilan qoplangan bo'lib, unda o'q-dorilar bilan to'ldirilgan va bayroqlar bilan belgilangan o'q-dorilar bilan to'ldirilgan bo'lib, u qopqoq qor bilan qoplangan bo'lib, unda o'q-d
ref: Janubiy qutb shossesi (yoki magistral yo'li) Ross dengizidagi Mak-Merdo bekatidan qutbgacha cho'zilgan 1600 kilometrli yo'ldir. Bu qalin muz yoriqlari to'ldirilgan va bayroqlar bilan belgilangan siqilgan qor. Unda faqat yonilg'i va materiallar yordamida chanalarni tortib, ixtisoslashgan traktorlarda harakatlanish mumkin. Bular juda ildam emas, shu sababli yo'l yassi tog'likka yetib borish uchun Transantarktik tog'lar atrofidan uzun burilish olishiga to'g'ri keladi.

src: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.
mt: Shimoliy Afrikaga avtomobil bilan kirish - bu mintaqaning barcha go'zalligini ko'rish va normal sayohat yo'llaridan tashqarida joylashgan joylarga borishning muhim usuli. Bu qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo'llab-quvvatlanadigan qo
ref: Janubiy Afrikaga avtomobilda kirish — mintaqaning barcha go'zalliklarini ko'rish, shuningdek, oddiy sayyohlik yo'nalishlaridan tashqari joylarga borishning ajoyib usulidir. Buni oddiy avtomobilda yaxshi rejalashtirish orqali qilish mumkin, biroq 4x4 turidagi mashinalar yuqori darajada tavsiya qilinadi va ko'plb hududlarga faqatgina 4x4 turdagi baland g'ildiraklar bilan borish mumkin. Reja tuzayotganda shuni yodda tutingki, Janubiy Afrika barqaror mamlakat bo'lsa-da, barcha qo'shni davlatlar ham bunday emas. Viza talablari va chiqimlari davlatdan davlatga farq qiladi hamda sizning davlatingiz unga ta'sir qiladi. Har bir mamlakat avtomobilda qanday favqulodda yordam buyumlari bo'lishi kerakligini talab qiluvchi o'ziga xos qonunlarga ega.

src: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.
mt: O'zidan boshqa narsalarga xizmat qilish - Qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yishdan qo'rqmasdan, xususan xalqaro chegaralarni kesib o'tishda qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini qo'yib qo'ng'iroqlarini
ref: Boshqalarning yukini ko'tarish — Hech qachon, ayniqsa, xalqaro chegaralarni kesib o'tish vaqtida sumkalaringizni ko'zdan qochirmang. o'zingiz bilmagan holda sizdan giyohvand moddalar tashuvchisi sifatida foydalanishayotganini tushunib yetasiz, bu siz uchun katta muammolar keltirib chiqaradi. Bu navbat kutishni ham o'z ichiga oladi, chunki narkotik moddalarni izlovchi itlardan istalgan paytda ogohlantirishlarsiz foydalanilishi mumkin. Ayrim mamlakatlarda xattoki birinchi marta jinoyat qilganlik uchun ham o'ta shafqatsiz jazolar, jumladan 10 yildan ortiq vaqtga ozodlikdan mahrum qilish yoki o'lim jazosi tayinlanadi. Qarovsiz qolgan sumkalar o'g'irlik uchun nishondir hamda bomba xavflaridan ehtiyotkor mutasaddilar e'tiborini jalb qilishi ham mumkin.

src: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.
mt: Uyda qahva bilan boshlang va tunda kamomil choyi bilan o'zini qo'llab-quvvatlang. Qo'shimcha vaqtga ega bo'lganda sizga xush ekanligi haqida xabardor bo'lishingiz mumkin. Agar siz tajribaliroq bo'lishni istaysiz, sizga qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun o'ziga xos shirinliklarni qaynatish yoki aralashtirish mumkin. Agar siz shaharda turli xil ichimliklarga ega bo'lgan shaharda yashaysiz, sizga tushunarsiz bo'lgan mahallalarda barlar yoki publarga borishingiz mumkin.
ref: Uyingizni ertalab to'yingan qahva bilan va tunda orom oldiruvchi moychechak choyi bilan to'ldiring. O'z uyingizda dam olayotganingizda, o'zingizga qarash uchun vaqtingiz bo'ladi va maxsus biror narsa pishirish uchun qo'shimcha bir necha daqiqa sarflang. Agar sizni ko'proq sarguzashtlar kutib turgan bo'lsa, sharbat ichish yoki kokteyl tayyorlash imkoniyatidan foydalanib qoling: Ehtimol, siz kundalik yumushingizga qaytganingizda nonushta tayyorlashingiz uchun oddiy ichimlikni kashf qilarsiz. Agar xilma-xil ichish madaniyatiga ega shaharda yashasangiz, o'zingiz tez-tez borib turmaydigan mahallalardagi barlar yoki qovoqxonalarga boring.

src: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

ref: Haldarsvik qishlog'i yonma-yon joylashgan Eysturoy oroli manzarasini taqdim qiladi hamda noodatiy sakkiz qirrali cherkovga ega. Cherkovning hovlisida, ayrim qabrlarning ustida marmardan ishlangan ajib kabutarlar haykallari bor. Jozibali qishloq atrofi yarim soat sayr qilishga arziydi.

src: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.
mt: Shuningdek, sizga turizm yoki biznes uchun qisqa muddatli tashrif buyurish uchun boshqa mamlakatlarga kirish uchun vizasiz bo'lish mumkin, ammo xalqaro talabga kirish uchun sizga talabga kirish uchun vizasiz bo'lish mumkin. ref: Ish yuzasidan yoki sayyoh sifatida ma'lum davlatlarga qisqa tashriflar uchun viza shart bo'lmasa-da, u yerga xalqaro talaba sifatida borish oddiy sayyoh sifatida borishga nisbatan ko'proq qolishingizni talab etadi. Umumiy holda istalgan xorijiy mamlakatda uzoqroq muddat turish avvaldan viza olishni talab qiladi. Talaba vizalari odatiy sayyohlik yoki ish vizalaridan farqli ravishda, odatda turli talablar va ariza topshirish jarayonlariga ega bo'ladi. Ko'pgina davlatlar uchun sizga o'qimoqchi bo'lgan muassasangizdan taklif xati, shuningdek, kursingizning kamida birinchi yilida o'zingizni ta'minlash uchun mablag'ga egaligingizni isbotlovchi hujjat kerak bo'ladi. Batafsil talablarni bilish uchun institut, shuningdek, o'qishni istagan davlatingizning immigratsiya bo'limiga murojaat qiling.

src: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.
mt: Yozda, ayniqsa, siz o'tloq orqali yurishga qararsangiz, qorovullar bilan shoshqalangishga e'tibor bering. Subtropik o'tloq orqali o'tishda, avtomobilga kirishda bir necha soniya ochiq qolgan eshiklardan qorovullar siz bilan birga avtomobilga kirib keta oladi.
ref: Ayniqsa, yoz payti tropik o'rmon oralab sayr qilishga qaror qilsangiz, chivinlardan ehtiyot bo'lishingiz lozim. Agar siz subtropik yomg'irli o'rmonlar bo'ylab harakatlanayotgan bo'lsangiz ham avtomobilga minayotganingizdagi eshik ochiq bo'ladigan bir necha soniya chivinlarning siz bilan avtomobil ichiga kirishi uchun yetarli vaqtdir.

src: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
mt: Sunarbans dunyodagi eng katta dengizga tutash qamish o'rmoni bo'lib, u 80 km (50 mi) gacha mamlakat ichidagi Bangladesh va Hindistondan dengizga tutashgan. Sunarbans UNESCO Jahon Merosi Joyi deb e'lon qilingan. Hindiston hududida joylashgan qismi Sunarbans Milliy Parki deb ataladi. O'rmonlar faqat qamish o'rmonlari emas — ularning ichida qadimiy o'rmonlarning qolgan qismi ham bor, ular Ganga daryosining qadimiy o'rmonlarini qoplagan. Sunarbans maydoni 3,850 km²ni tashkil etadi, undan bir qismi suv/yovvoyi o'rmonlarga to'la. 1966-yildan beri Sunarbans tabiat qo'riqzoni sifatida qo'llanilmoqda, unda 400 Royal Bengal tigri va 30,000 nafar qo'rqoq qo'ylari bor deb taxmin qilinadi.
ref: "Sandarban sohildan Bangladesh va Hindistonning ichki qismigacha 80 km (50 mil) cho'zilgan dunyodagi eng yirik qirg'oq bo'yi mangrov kamardir. Sundarban YUNESKO Butunjahon merosi obyekti deb e'lon qilindi. o'rmonning Hindiston hududidagi qismi ""Sundarban milliy bog'i"" deb ataladi. Biroq o'rmonlar, shunchaki mangrov botqoqlari emas — ular bir vaqtlar Hindgang tekisligini qoplagan qudratli changalzorlardan qolgan oxirgi daraxtlarni ham o'z ichiga oladi. Sundarban taxminan uchdan bir qismi suv/botqoq hududlar bilan qoplangan 3850 km² maydonni qamrab olgan. 1966-yildan beri Sandarban yovvoyi tabiat qo'riqxonasi bo'lib kelmoqda hamda mazkur hududda hozirda 400 ta qirollik Bengal yo'lbarslari va qariyb 30 000 tog' kiyiklari borligi taxmin qilinadi."

src: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.
mt: Jahon 5 mingdan ortiq tillarga ega, jumladan, 50 million yoki undan ortiq so'zlashuvchilar bilan yuzlab tildan ko'proq. Yozma so'zlar ko'pincha so'zlashuv so'zlar qilishdan ham aniqroq tushuniladi, ayniqsa, manzilnomalar, ularni tushunish qiyin. Barcha mamlakatlarda ingliz tili to'liq yoki qisman bilinishi mumkin, shuningdek, yoshlarning kamchiliklari mavjud. Uchuvchi bo'linma rahbari Dilokrit Pattava ekanligi aniqlandi. Mahalliy axborot vositalarining xabar berishicha, aeroportdagi o't o'chirish mashinasi ish vaqtida ag'darilib ketgan. Yozma so'zlar ko'pincha so'zlashuv so'zlar qilishdan ham aniqroq tushuniladi, ayniqsa
ref: Dunyoda 5000 dan ortiq turli tillar mavjud, jumladan, ularning yigirmadan ortig'i 50 million yoki undan ko'p so'zlashuvchiga ega. Og'zaki so'zlarga qaraganda yozilgan so'zlarni tushunish osonroq hamdir. Bu, ayniqsa, tushunarli talaffuz qilish ko'p hollarda mushkul bo'lgan holatlarga taalluqli. Ko'pgina xalqlar ingliz tilida ravon gapiradi va hatto siz yanada cheklangan bilimni kutishingiz mumkin — ayniqsa, yoshlar orasida. Agar istasangiz, mankunianlik, bostonlik, yamaykalik va sidneylikning Torontodagi restoranda kechki ovqat tanovul qilib stol atrofida o'tirishganini tasavvur qiling. Ular o'zlarining o'ziga xos talaffuzi va mahalliy jargonlarida aytilgan o'z shaharlaridagi hikoyalar bilan bir-birlarini xursand qilmoqdalar.

src: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
mt: Shahararo buslar tumanaro bus stantsiyasidan (daryo tomonida) kunduzi davomida chiqib ketadi, lekin ko'pchilik, ayniqsa, sharqga va Jakar/Bumthangga boradiganlar 06:30 va 07:30 orasida chiqib ketadi. Shahararo buslar ko'pincha to'liq bo'lgani uchun, bir necha kun oldin bilet sotib olish tavsiya etiladi. Yaponiya Coaster Bussi bilan qo'shni joylarga, masalan, Paro (Nu 150) va Punakha (Nu 200)ga borish uchun hamkorlik qilish juda tez va qulay usul bo'lib, u yerdan qulay va mustahkam.
ref: Avtobuslar kun davomida (daryoning narigi tomonidagi) tumanlararo avtobus bekatidan jo'naydi, biroq aksariyati, ayniqsa, sharqqa va Jakar/Bumtangga borayotganlari 06:30 va 07:30 orasida yo'lga chiqadi. Tumanlararo avtobuslar ko'p hollarda to'la bo'lganligi tufayli, chiptani bir necha kun avval xarid qilish tavsiya qilinadi. Ko'pchilik tumanlarga Yaponiyaning qulay va mustahkam bo'lgan kabotaj avtobuslari tomonidan xizmat ko'rsatiladi. Hamroh taksilar Paro (Nu 150) va Punaxa (Nu 200) singari uzoq bo'lmagan joylarga safar qilishning tez va qulay usullari hisoblanadi.

Tumanlararo avtobuslar ko'p hollarda to'la bo'lganligi tufayli, chiptani bir necha kun avval xarid qilish tavsiya qilinadi. Ko'pchilik tumanlarga Yaponiyaning qulay va mustahkam bo'lgan kabotaj avtobuslari tomonidan xizmat ko'rsatiladi. Hamroh taksilar Paro (Nu 150) va Punaxa (Nu 200) singari uzoq bo'lmagan joylarga safar qilishning tez va qulay usullari hisoblanadi.

src: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."
mt: “Bunda, Timbuktu qo'shimcha ravishda, unchalik o'qishmasligi tufayli, eksotik, uzoq yerlarga ishora qiladi. Hozir, Timbuktu qashshoqlikda yashaydi, lekin uning reytingi tufayli u turizm yo'nalishi bo'lib, u shahar aeroportiga ega. 1990-yilda u dunyodagi meroslar ro'yxatiga kiritildi, qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli qumli q
ref: "Yetishish imkoniyati nisbatan kamligi bilan birga, ""Timbuktu"" uzoq, ekzotik o'lkalar uchun metafora sifatida ishlatila boshlandi. Bugungi kunda obro'si va u yerda aeroport bo'lishiga qaramay Timbuktu qashshoq shaharcha. Cho'l qumlarining xavfi sababli, 1990-yili u xavf ostida bo'lgan butunjahon madaniy merosi obyektlari ro'yxatiga kiritildi. Bu Genri Luis Geystning PBS kanalidagi ""Afrika dunyosi mo'jizalari"" maxsus serialidagi asosiy to'xtash nuqtalaridan biri bo'lgan edi. Bu shahar mamlakatning boshqa shaharlaridan keskin farq qiladi, chunki u afrikanchadan ko'ra, ko'proq arabcha uslubga ega."

src: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.
mt: Paralimpiada 2021-yil 24 avgustdan 5 sentyabrgacha bo'lib o'tadi. Boshqa joylarda bo'lib o'tadigan tadbirlar mavjud. Tokio 1964-yilda o'tkazilgan yozgi Olimpiada o'yinlarini o'tkazgan yagona Osiyo shahri bo'lib qoladi. 2020-yilda o'tkazilishi rejalashtirilgan Olimpiada o'yinlarining bekor qilinishi e'lon qilingandan so'ng siz 2020-yilda reys va turar joyni oldin buyurib, qanday qilib qolishingizni bilasiz. Keyingi o'tmishda coronavirus asosidagi bekor qilish siyosatlaridan 2020-yil iyulida o'tkazilishi rejalashtirilgan Olimpiada o'yinlariga oid emas. Olimpiada o'yinlarining aksariyat tadbirlari 2,500 va 130,000 yen aralashda bo'lishi kutilmoqda, odatda 7,000 yen tushkunlikka chiqadi.
ref: Paralimpiada o'yinlari 2021-yilning 24-avgustidan 5-sentabrigacha bo'lib o'tadi. Ba'zi musobaqalar Yaponiya bo'ylab boshqa joylarda ham o'tkaziladi. Tokio 1964-yilda yozgi Olimpiada o'yinlariga mezbonlik qilgani sababli, ikkita yozgi Olimpiada o'yinlariga mezbonlik qilgan yagona Osiyo shahri bo'ladi. Agar siz kechiktirish e'lon qilinishidan avval 2020-yil uchun reyslar va mehmonxonani buyurtna qilgan bo'lsangiz, siz qiyin vaziyatda qolishingiz mumkin. Bekor qilish tartib-qoidalari turlicha, lekin mart oyi oxiridagi koronavirusga asoslangan bekor qilish tartib-qoidalari Olimpiada o'yinlari rejalashtirilgan vaqt — 2020-yilning iyul oyiga qadar davom etmaydi. Tadbir chiptalarining aksariyati 2500 ¥ va 130 000 ¥ oralig'ida, odatiy chiptalar narxi 7000 ¥ atrofida bo'lishi kutilyapti.

src: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."
mt: „Tornad - bu juda past bosimli havoda aylanib turuvchi tizim, uning o'zaro havoni ichiga va tepasiga tortadi. Ular tezlikda (ko'pincha 100-200 mil/saathga) kuchli shamollarni hosil qiladi va og'ir narsalarni havoga ko'taradi, bu esa tornadaning harakati davomida uning bilan birga o'tadi.“
ref: "Tornado aylanadigan juda past bosimli havo ustuni bo'lib, atrofdagi havoni ichkariga va tepaga so'rib oladi. Ular kuchli shamollarni yuzaga keltiradi (ko'pincha 100–200 mil/soat) va og'ir obyektlarni havoga ko'tarib, tornado harakatlanayotganda ularni o'zi bilan tashib yuradi. Ular bo'ronli bulutlardan tushayotgan voronka sifatida boshlanadi va yerga tekkanida ""tornadolar""ga aylanadi."

src: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
mt: Agar siz tashrif buyuradigan mamlakatga sayohat maslahatiga ega bo'lsa, sizning sayohat sog'liqni saqlash sug'urtangiz yoki sayohat bekor qilish sug'urtangizga ta'sir qilishi mumkin. Siz shuningdek, sizning o'z-o'ziga qaraganda boshqa davlatlarning maslahatlarini ham so'rab bo'lishingiz mumkin, ammo ular sizning fuqarolaringiz uchun mo'ljallangan. Maslahatlar faqat bitta mamlakatdagi siyosiy vaziyatning qisqacha, umumiy va o'zgaruvchan tahlili bo'lib, boshqa kengroq ma'lumotlarga nisbatan ko'proq ma'lumotlarga ega.
ref: Agar siz tashrif buyurayotgan mamlakatda sayohatlarga oid ogohlantirishlar bo'lsa, bu sizning turistik tibbiy sug'urtangiz yoki sayohatni bekor qilinishingizga ta'sir qilishi mumkin. Siz, shuningdek, o'zingiznikidan boshqa hukumatlar maslahatini olishni xohlashingiz mumkin, biroq ularning maslahati o'zlarining fuqarolari uchun mo'ljallangan. Misol uchun, o'rta Sharqdagi Amerika fuqarolari yevropaliklar yoxud arablardan farqli holatlarga duch kelishi mumkin. Rasmiy maslahat xabarlari bir davlatdagi siyosiy vaziyat haqidagi qisqacha xulosasisini taqdim etadi. Taqdim etilgan qarashlar ko'p hollarda boshqa joylarda mavjud bo'lgan batafsil ma'lumotlarga nisbatan yuzaki, umumiy va nihoyatda sodda bo'ladi.

src: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.
mt: Reyshahoratlar 19-asrda paydo bo'lgan. Reyshahorat odatda tashrif buyuruvchining tabiat, madaniyat, tillar yoki kam daromadli davlatlardagi tashriflardan keyingi tajribasidan chetda bo'lgan sayohatni o'z ichiga oladigan sayohat uchun yaxshi nishon bo'lishi mumkin. Ko'pchilik reyshahoratlar odatda o'zlarining tashriflari bilan o'xshash tashriflarni olib borishga tayyor. Reyshahoratda olib boriladigan tashriflarni ko'rib chiqing, u shuningdek veb-sayt yoki do'konning o'zida reklama qilinadi.
ref: Sayyohlik agentliklari 19-asrdan buyon mavjud. Sayohat agenti odatda sayyohning tabiat, madaniyat, til yoki rivojlanmagan davlatlarga tashrif bo'yicha avvalgi tajribalaridan tashqarida bo'lgan sayohat uchun yaxshi tanlovdir. Garchi aksariyat agentliklar eng odatiy buyurtmalarni olishga tayyor bo'lsa ham, ko'p agentlar sayohatning ayrim turlari, ma'lum miqdordagi byudjet yoki belgilangan manzillarga ixtisoslashgan. Aksar hollarda siznikiga o'xshagan sayohatlarni bron qiladigan agentdan foydalanish yaxshiroq bo'lishi mumkin. Xoh veb-sayt, xoh do'kon peshtaxtasida bo'lsin, agent qanday sayohatlarni reklama qilayotganini ko'rib chiqing.

src: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."
mt: “Boshqa joyga borishdan oldin va u yerda bo'lganida bir qancha narsalarni o'ylab ko'rish kerak. U yerda bo'lganda, sizning yashagan joyingizda bo'lgan narsalarga o'xshamaydi. Bu sizga mahalliy usullarda narsalarni qilishga qarshi norozilik yoki shubha tushishga olib kelishi mumkin.”
ref: "Sayohat qilgan vaqtingizda va undan oldin inobatga olishingiz shart bo'lgan ko'plab narsalar mavjud. Sayohat qilganingizda, narsalarning ""uyingizdagidek"" bo'lib chiqmasligini kuting. Xulq, qonunchilik, oziq-ovqat, tirbandlik, turar joy, standartlar, til va boshqalar siz istiqomat qiladigan yerdan ma'lum darajada farq qiladi. Buni hafsalangiz pir bo'lmasligi uchun yoki ehtimol, ishlarni bajarishning mahalliy usullaridan jirkanmaslik uchun doim yodda tutishingiz kerak."

src: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.
mt: Agar siz birinchi marta rivojlanayotgan mamlakatda yoki jahonning yangi qismida sayohat qilmoqchi bo'lsangiz, rivojlanayotgan mamlakat sayohatida bo'lgan madaniy chocki nazar etib bo'lmaydi. Ko'plab mustahkam, qobiliyatli sayohatchilar rivojlanayotgan mamlakat sayohatida bo'lgan yangiliklarga qaramay choklanib qolgan. Shunday qilib, rivojlanayotgan mamlakatda bo'lgan barcha kichik madaniy o'zgarishlarni tezda to'planadi. Boshlang'ich kunlaringizda sizga yordam berish uchun qadimiy usullarga qaraganda yaxshiroq xizmat ko'rsatish uchun qimmatroq xizmatlarga vaqt o'tkazishga ishona bering. Sizga o't o'chirish yoki o't o'chirish uchun yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqiz
ref: Agar rivojlanayotgan mamlakatda yoki dunyoning yangi burchagiga ilk marta sayohat qilayotgan bo'lsangiz, madaniy shok ehtimolini past baholamang. Ko'plab sabotli, layoqatli sayyohlar ko'pgina kichik madaniy o'zgarishlar tezda to'planib qoladigan rivojlanayotgan mamlakatlarga sayohatning yangiliklariga bardosh bera olmagan. Ayniqsa, ilk kunlarda moslashishingizga yordam berishi uchun g'arbiy va sifatli mehmonxonalar, oziq-ovqat hamda xizmatlardan pulingizni ayamang. o'zingiz mahalliy faunasini bilmaydigan joylarda yerga qo'yilgan matras yoki to'shakda uxlamang. Agar siz tunni ochiq havoda o'tkazmoqchi bo'lsangiz, ilon, chayon kabilardan saqlanish uchun yig'ma krovat yoki to'r belanchak olib oling.

Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.
mt: Agar siz birinchi marta rivojlanayotgan mamlakatda yoki jahonning yangi qismida sayohat qilmoqchi bo'lsangiz, rivojlanayotgan mamlakat sayohatida bo'lgan madaniy chocki nazar etib bo'lmaydi. Ko'plab mustahkam, qobiliyatli sayohatchilar rivojlanayotgan mamlakat sayohatida bo'lgan yangiliklarga qaramay choklanib qolgan. Shunday qilib, rivojlanayotgan mamlakatda bo'lgan barcha kichik madaniy o'zgarishlarni tezda to'planadi. Boshlang'ich kunlaringizda sizga yordam berish uchun qadimiy usullarga qaraganda yaxshiroq xizmat ko'rsatish uchun qimmatroq xizmatlarga vaqt o'tkazishga ishona bering. Sizga o't o'chirish yoki o't o'chirish uchun yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqizilgan yoki yotqiz
ref: Agar rivojlanayotgan mamlakatda yoki dunyoning yangi burchagiga ilk marta sayohat qilayotgan bo'lsangiz, madaniy shok ehtimolini past baholamang. Ko'plab sabotli, layoqatli sayyohlar ko'pgina kichik madaniy o'zgarishlar tezda to'planib qoladigan rivojlanayotgan mamlakatlarga sayohatning yangiliklariga bardosh bera olmagan. Ayniqsa, ilk kunlarda moslashishingizga yordam berishi uchun g'arbiy va sifatli mehmonxonalar, oziq-ovqat hamda xizmatlardan pulingizni ayamang. o'zingiz mahalliy faunasini bilmaydigan joylarda yerga qo'yilgan matras yoki to'shakda uxlamang. Agar siz tunni ochiq havoda o'tkazmoqchi bo'lsangiz, ilon, chayon kabilardan saqlanish uchun yig'ma krovat yoki to'r belanchak olib oling.

src: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

Ular maslahat/avtorizatsiyalar va shikoyatlar uchun sug'urtalovchining elektron pochta manzili va xalqaro telefon raqamlarini ko'rsatishi kerak. Boshqa nusxasini yuk sumkangiz va internetda (ilova qilib elektron pochtangizga yuboring yoki ""bulut""da) saqlang. src: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).
mt: Filmlar yillar davomida turli xil formatlarda ishlatilgan. Standart 35 mm filmda (36 by 24 mm negative) ko'p uchraydi. Ushbu formatda bo'lgan filmlar qayta to'ldirish mumkin bo'lib, shuningdek, hozirgi DSLR bilan solishtirganda resolyutsiya o'xshash. Boshqa o'rta formatli filmlar 6 by 6 cm formatda ishlatiladi, aniqrog'i 56 by 56 mm negative. Bu 35 mm negativega qaraganda resolyutsiya tushkunligi 3136 mm2 va 864.
ref: Yillar davomida foydalanib kelingan ko'plab turli kinoplyonka formatlari mavjud. Standart 35 mm li kinoplyonka (36 ga 24 mm li negativ) juda keng tarqalgan. Agar tugab qolsa, uni ancha oson to'ldirish mumkin va u joriy DSLR ga taxminan mos keladigan tasvir aniqligini beradi. Ayrim o'rta formatdagi kameralar 6 ga 6 sm, aniqrog'i, 56 ga 56 mm salbiy formatdan foydalanadi. Bu 35 mm salbiy o'lcham (3136 mm² ga 864) dan ko'ra qariyb to'rt baravar yuqori o'lchamni beradi.

src: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.
mt: Sayohat yozuvchiligi biznesiga kirishning eng oson usuli - mahalliy sayohat blog veb-saytida qobiliyatlarini yaxshilashdir. Keyinchalik, siz o'z veb-saytini yaratishga tayyor bo'lgach, siz o'z veb-saytini yaratishingiz mumkin.
ref: Sayohat haqida yozish bilan shug'ullanishni boshlashning eng oson usuli — biror mashhur sayohat blogi veb-saytida o'z ko'nikmalaringizni charxlashdir. Internetda formatlash hamda tahrirlashga qo'lingiz kelib qolgandan keyin, keyinchalik, shaxsiy veb-saytingizni yaratishingiz mumkin.

src: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.
mt: Uyda, bu yerda tibbiyot muhitiga doimiy ravishda ta'sir qilish natijasida sizga bu yerda yashirin mikroorganizmlarga qarshi immunitet bor. Boshqa qismlarda, bu yerda tibbiyot muhitiga sizga yangi ekanligi sababli, sizga muammolarga duch kelish imkoniyatlari juda yuqori. Shuningdek, issiq iqlimda bakteriyalar o'zining tezroq rivojlanishi va tashqi jasadga tushirilganidan keyin saqlanib qolishiga qarindosh bo'lgan. Shuning uchun Deli Belly, Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge va ularning ko'plab do'stlari. Qorli iqlimda o'tkir oqib o'tishlarga qaraganda issiq iqlimda ichak muammolari juda keng tarqalgan va ko'pincha juda g'ayrioddiy bo'lsa-da, aslida xavfli emas.
ref: Uyda mahalliy mikroblarning doimiy ta'siri tufayli sizda ularga qarshi immunitetingiz borligi ehtimoli yuqori. Dunyoning bakteriologik fauna siz uchun yangilik bo'lgan boshqa hududlarida muammolarga ro'baro' kelishingiz ehtimoli ancha yuqori. Shuningdek, iliqroq iqlim sharoitida bakteriya ham tezroq o'sadi, ham tanadan tashqarida uzoqroq yashab qoladi. Shu tarzda Deli Belli balosi, Fir'avn la'nati, Montezuma qasosi va ularning ko'plab do'stlari. Sovuq iqlim sharoitlaridagi xuddi nafas olish bilan bog'liq muammolar kabi, issiq iqlim sharoitlarida ichak muammolari ancha keng tarqalgan hamda aksariyat holatlarda aniq bezovta qiladi, lekin u qadar xavfli emas.

src: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
mt: Yevropa — bu ko'p mustaqil davlatlarga ega bo'lgan, ammo o'ziga xos bo'lmagan katta hudud. Normal holatlarda, bir nechta davlatlardan o'tishni talab qiladigan vizalar va pasport nazorat punktlarini o'tkazishni talab qiladi. Schengen zonasi, shu jumladan, bitta davlatga o'xshaydi. Schengen a'zolari uchun Schengen vizasi bo'lsa, siz har bir Schengen a'zosi uchun vizaga ariza berishni talab qilmasdan chegaralarni o'tib chiqishingiz mumkin, shuning uchun vaqt, pullar va hujjatlar qo'llab-quvvatlashni olib tashladi.
ref: Yevropa nisbatan kichik, biroq ko'plab mustaqil davlatlarga ega bo'lgan qit'adir. Odatiy sharoitlarda bir nechta mamlakatlar bo'ylab sayohat qilish bir necha marta vizaga ariza topshirish va pasport nazoratidan o'tish kerakligini anglatadi. Ammo bu jihatdan Shengen hududi go'yo bitta davlat kabi ishlaydi. Siz mazkur hududda bo'lsangiz, odatda yana pasport nazorati punktlaridan o'tmasdan chegaralarni kesib o'ta olasiz. Xuddi shuningdek, Shengen vizasiga ega bo'lsangiz, Shengenga a'zo davlatlarning har biriga viza uchun alohida ariza berishingiz shart emas, shu tarzda vaqt, pul va hujjatbozlik ishlarini tejashingiz mumkin.

src: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.
mt: KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.
ref: Tutanxamon maqbarasi (KV62). KV62, ehtimol, vodiydagi maqbaralarning eng mashhuri, Hovard Karter 1922-yilda kashf etgan yosh podshoh dafn etilgan deyarli buzilmagan shohona joy. Boshqa shohlarning qabrlariga qaraganda Tutanxamon qabri ancha kichkina va bezaklarning kamligi bilan tashrif buyurishga arzimaydi. Mumiyoni tobutdan olishga urinishlar paytida unga yetkazilgan zararni isbotlovchi dalillarni ko'rishga qiziquvchi barchaning hafsalasi pir bo'ladi, chunki ularning faqat boshi va yelkalarini ko'rish mumkin. Maqbaraning aql bovar qilmas boyliklari endi uning ichida emas, balki Qohiradagi Misr muzeyiga ko'chirilgan. Vaqti cheklangan tashrif buyuruvchilar o'z vaqtini boshqa biror yerda o'tkazgani ma'qul.

src: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.
mt: Bowen orolida kayaking, yurish, do'konlar, restoranlar va boshqa ko'plab mashg'ulotlarga yo'naltirilgan kunlik sayohalar yoki shanba kunlari tashrif buyurish mumkin. Bu xususiy jamoa Howe Soundda, Vankuverdan bir necha kilometr uzoqlikda joylashgan. Ushbu orolarni tashrif buyurish uchun Granville Islanddan (Vankuver markazida) reysli suv taksilari qatnashish mumkin. ref: Bouen oroli qayiqda suzish, piyoda yurish, do'konlar, restoranlar kabilarni taklif qiluvchi ommabop kunlik sayohat va dam olish kunlaridagi sayohat maskani. Bu asl hamjamiyat Vankuver yaqinidagi Xau-Saundda joylashgan va unga Vankuver markazidagi Granvil orolidan jadval bo'yicha jo'naydigan suv taksilari yordamida osonlik bilan yetib olish mumkin. Ochiq havodagi mashg'ulotlardan zavqlanadiganlar uchun Dengizdan osmongacha yo'lagi bo'ylab sayr juda muhimdir. Vistler (Vankuverdan 1,5 soatlik yo'l) qimmat, biroq 2010-yilgi Qishki olimpiada tufayli mashhur bo'lgan shahardir. Qishda Shimoliy Amerikadagi eng yaxshi chang'i uchish tajribasidan zavqlaning, yozda esa haqiqiy tog'da velosiped uchish mashg'ulotini sinab ko'ring.

src: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.
mt: Bowen orolida kayaking, yurish, do'konlar, restoranlar va boshqa ko'plab mashg'ulotlarga yo'naltirilgan kunlik sayohalar yoki shanba kunlari tashrif buyurish mumkin. Bu xususiy jamoa Howe Soundda, Vankuverdan bir necha kilometr uzoqlikda joylashgan. Ushbu orolarni tashrif buyurish uchun Granville Islanddan (Vankuver markazida) reysli suv taksilari qatnashish mumkin. ref: Bouen oroli qayiqda suzish, piyoda yurish, do'konlar, restoranlar kabilarni taklif qiluvchi ommabop kunlik sayohat va dam olish kunlaridagi sayohat maskani. Bu asl hamjamiyat Vankuver yaqinidagi Xau-Saundda joylashgan va unga Vankuver markazidagi Granvil orolidan jadval bo'yicha jo'naydigan suv taksilari yordamida osonlik bilan yetib olish mumkin. Ochiq havodagi mashg'ulotlardan zavqlanadiganlar uchun Dengizdan osmongacha yo'lagi bo'ylab sayr juda muhimdir. Vistler (Vankuverdan 1,5 soatlik yo'l) qimmat, biroq 2010-yilgi Qishki olimpiada tufayli mashhur bo'lgan shahardir. Qishda Shimoliy Amerikadagi eng yaxshi chang'i uchish tajribasidan zavqlaning, yozda esa haqiqiy tog'da velosiped uchish mashg'ulotini sinab ko'ring.

src: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!
mt: Victoria Falls shahri Zimbabveda g'arbiy qismida, Zambiyadagi Livingstone shahridan chekka, Botswanadan ham yaqin joyda joylashgan. Shahar qadimiy shahar qoldiqlari bilan o'ralgan bo'lib, bu mashhur sayyohlik yo'nalishida turli xil turlarida sayohatchilarga xizmat qiladi. Yozda (noyabr-dekabr) suv hajmi ko'p bo'lib, qadimiy shahar qoldiqlari bilan o'ralgan bo'lib, bu mashhur sayyohlik yo'nalishida turli xil turlarida sayohatchilarga xizmat qiladi. Yozda (noyabr-dekabr) suv hajmi ko'p bo'lib, qadimiy shahar qoldiqlari bilan o'ralgan bo'lib, bu mashhur sayyohlik yo'nalishida turli xil turlarida sayohatchilarga xizmat qiladi. Yozda (noyabr-dekabr) suv hajmi ko'p bo'lib, qadimiy shahar qoldiqlari bilan o'ralgan bo'lib, bu mashhur sayyohlik yo'nalishida turli xil turlarida sayohatchilarga xizmat qiladi. Yozda (noyabr-dekabr) suv hajmi ko'p bo'lib, qadimiy shahar qoldiqlari bilan o'ralgan bo'lib, bu mashhur sayyohlik yo'nalishida turli xil turlarida sayohatchilarga xizmat qiladi. Yozda (noyabr-dekabr) suv hajmi ko'p bo'lib, qadimiy shahar qoldiqlari bilan o'ralgan bo'lib, bu mashhur sayyohlik yo'nalishida turli xil turlarida sayohatchilarga xizmat qiladi. Yozda (noyabr-dekabr) suv hajmi ko'p bo'lib,
ref: Viktoriya sharsharasi — Zimbabvening g'arbiy qismida, Zambiyaning Livingstoun shahri va Botsvana yaqinidagi chegara bo'ylab joylashgan shaharchadir. Shahar shundoqqina sharsharalar yonida joylashgan va ular asosiy diqqatga sazovor joydir, lekin bu mashhur sayyohlik manzili ham sarguzasht izlovchilarga, ham ekskursiyachilarga uzoq vaqt qolish uchun ko'plab imkoniyatlarini taqdim qiladi. Yomg'ir mavsumida (noyabrdan martgacha) suv hamji balandroq hamda sharsharalar yanada dramatik bo'ladi. Ko'prikdan o'tsangiz yoki sharshara yaqinidagi egri-bugri yo'laklar bo'ylab yursangiz, ho'l bo'lishingiz kafolatlanadi. Boshqa tomondan, aynan suv hajmi shu qadar baland bo'lgani tufayli mana shu butun suv asl sharsharani nigohingizdan yashiradi!

src: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.
mt: Shaxsiy fotografik ma'lumotlarni o'zlashtirish qoidalariga videokameradan foydalanish ham tegishli. Shu narsani suratga olishga ruxsat berilmagan bo'lsa, videoni suratga olishga ham hech qachon o'tkir bo'lmaydi. Drone bilan uchishdan foydalanishda, shuningdek, qanday filmlar suratga olishga ruxsat berilganligini, shuningdek, qanday shartnomalar yoki qo'shimcha litsenziyalar talab qilinayotganini ancha oldin tekshirib chiqing. Aeroport yaqinida yoki jamoada uchish drone bilan juda yomon fikr bo'lib, agar bu erda qonuniy bo'lsa ham.
ref: Odatiy suratkashlik qoidalari videoga olishga ham taalluqlidir, balki undan ham ko'proq. Agar biror narsani shunchaki rasmga olish ruxsat etilmagan bo'lsa, unda uni videoga olishni hatto xayolingizga ham keltirmasligingiz kerak. Agar siz drondan foydalanayotgan bo'lsangiz, avvaldan nimalarni suratga olishga ruxsat berilganligi va qanday ruxsatlar yoki qo'shimcha litsenziyalarni olish talab qilinishini tekshiring. Hatto bu sizning hududda noqonuniy bo'lmasa-da, aeroport yaqinida yoxud olomon ustida dron uchirish deyarli hamma vaqt yomon fikrdir.

src: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.
mt: Ro'yxatga olish vizaga kirish jarayonida shart bo'lib, ba'zi mamlakatlarda sizning mavjudligingiz va siz yashagan joyingizni mahalliy hukumatga ro'yxatga olish kerak. Bu yerda siz mahalliy politsiyaga shaxsiy xulosalar yozish yoki immigratsiya boshqarmasiga tashrif buyurishlaringiz mumkin. Boshqa mamlakatlarda, shuningdek, bu qonun mavjud bo'lsa, mahalliy mehmonxonalar sizning ro'yxatga olishni (shart emas) bajaradi (shart emas). Boshqa hollarda, faqat turizm tashabbuslaridan tashqarida yashovchilar ro'yxatga olish kerak. Biroq, bu qonunni ancha qorong'i qiladi, shuning uchun oldinroq ma'lumot oling.
ref: Ro'yxatdan o'tish viza olish jarayonidagi qo'shimcha talabdir. Ayrim davlatlarda siz mahalliy hokimiyat organlarida o'sha yerda ekaningiz hamda yashash manzilingizni ro'yxatdan o'tkazishingiz lozim. Buning uchun shaklni mahalliy politsiya punktlarida to'ldirish yoki immigratsiya idoralariga tashrif buyurish talab etilishi mumkin. Shunday qonunga ega ko'plab davlatlarda, roʻyxatdan oʻtkazish ishlarini mahalliy mehmonxonalar amalga oshiradilar (albatta, so'rab oling). Boshqa holatlarda, faqat sayyohlik turar joylaridan tashqarida qolayotganlar ro'yxatdan o'tishi kerak. Lekin qonunni yanada noaniqlashtiradi, shu sababli oldindan bilib oling.

src: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.
mt: Yurak yo'q qilishda sayohat qilish juda yaxshi usul bo'lib, u yerda farq qilishga yordam beradi, lekin bu faqat berishga emas. Boshqa madaniyatni bilish, yangi odamlar bilan uchrashish, o'zini bilish, nazar vaqti va baholashni o'rganish uchun yashash va xizmat qilish juda yaxshi usul bo'lib, u yerda farq qilishga yordam beradi. Ushbu xizmatlarda yashash va ovqatlanish va bir nechtasi kichik maosh beradi.
ref: Sayohat vaqtida volontyorlik qilish o'zgarishlar qilishning eng ajoyib yo'li, biroq bu shunchaki nimadir berish bilan bog'liq emas. Xorijiy davlatda yashash va volontyorlik bilan shug'ullanish — boshqa madaniyat bilan tanishish, yangi odamlarni uchratish, o'zingizni o'rganish, istiqbolni his qilish va hatto yangi ko'nikmalarni o'zlashtirishning ajoyib usulidir. Biror joyda uzoqroq turis uchun byudjetni qisqartirish ham yaxshi usul bo'lishi mumkin, chunki ko'ngillilar uchun ko'p ishlar xona va oziq-ovqat bilan ta'milaydilar, ba'zilari esa kichik maosh to'laydilar.

src: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."
mt: "Walt Disney Worldga sayohat ko'plab amerikalik oilalar uchun katta ziyoratgahga o'xshaydi. Boshqa turli xil variantlarga qaramay, bu ko'pchilik odamlarning so'zlarida "Disney Worldga borish" degan ma'noni anglatadi. Bir nechta park-hopper tashrif buyuruvchilar uchun sotiladigan onlayn savdo saytlari kabi eBay yoki Craigslist orqali sotiladigan qisqartirilgan multi-kunlik tashrif buyuruvchilar kartalari juda keng tarqalgan. Biroq, bu Disney tomonidan taqiqlangan: kartalar o'zgaruvchan emas."
ref: "Walt Disney World parkiga sayohat qilish ko'pchilik amerikaliklar uchun katta ziyoratdek. ""An'anaviy"" tashrif Orlando xalqaro aeroportiga borib qo'nish, avtobusda istirohat bog'i ichida joylashgan mehmonxonaga borish, bir haftani tashqariga chiqmasdan Disney parkida o'tkazish va uyga qaytishdan iborat. Cheksiz xilma-xilliklar bor, biroq ""Disney olamiga borish"" to'g'risida gap ketganda ko'pchilik shuni nazarda tutadi. eBay yoxud Craigslist singari auksiion veb-saytlari orqali onlayn sotiluvchi ko'p chiptalar qisman foydalaniladigan ko'p kunlik park-hopper chiptalari hisoblanadi. Bu juda keng tarqalgan ish bo'lishiga qaramay, u Disney tomonidan taqiqlangan: chiptalarni boshqalarga o'tkazib bo'lmaydi."

src: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.
mt: Har qanday mamlakatni urush zonasiga aylantirish mumkin bo'lgan mamlakatga tashrif buyurishni rejalashtirayotgan har qanday kishi professional tayyorlanishi kerak. Internetda "Hostile environment course" so'zlarini qidirishda mahalliy kompaniyalarning manzilini o'ylash mumkin. Kurs asosan barcha masalalarni ancha kengroq tahlil qiladi, odatda amaliy tajriba bilan. Kurs asosan 2-5 kun davom etadi va ro'yxatga olish, birinchi yordam va ba'zan qurollar bilan shug'ullanadi. Qo'rqoqda hayotni saqlashga oid kitob va jurnallar keng tarqalgan, lekin urush zonalariga oid nashrlar kam.
ref: "Urush hududi deya hisoblash mumkin bo'lgan davlatga tashrif buyurishni rejalashtirayotgan har bir shaxs professional tayyorganlikdan o'tishi lozim. Internetdan ""Urush muhiti kursi"" deb izlash, hoynahoy, mahalliy kompaniya manzilini chiqarib beradi. Kurs odatda bu yerda muhokama qilingan masalalarni ancha ko'p tafsilot, odatda amaliy tajriba bilan qamrab oladi. Kurs odatda 2–5 kun davom etadi va rol o'ynash, ko'plab birinchi yordam va ba'zan qurol-yarog' mashqlarini o'z ichiga oladi. Sahroda omon qolishga oid kitob va jurnallar keng tarqalgan, biroq urush hududlariga oid nashrlar kam."

src: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.
